ON Full: Where piping passes through or under a wall, it shall be installed so that the wall does not bear on the pipe.
ON Variations: Where piping passes through or under a wall, it shall be installed so that the wall does not bear on the pipe.

ON Full: The minimum distance between any two storage tanks, neither of which has a capacity of more than 250000 L, shall be 1 m.
ON Variations: The minimum distance between any two storage tanks, neither of which has a capacity of more than 250000 L, shall be 1 m.

ON Full: Piping shall be properly supported and arranged to prevent excessive vibration or strain on equipment connected to it.
ON Variations: Piping shall be properly supported and arranged to prevent excessive vibration or strain on equipment connected to it.

ON Full: The requirements of this Section are in addition to the requirements of other Parts of the Code as they apply to the proposed construction.
ON Variations: The requirements of this Section are in addition to the requirements of other Parts of the Code as they apply to the proposed construction.

ON Full: Flanged joints shall be tightly bolted to prevent leakage.
ON Variations: Flanged joints shall be tightly bolted to prevent leakage.

ON Full: Except for an aisle serving bleacher seats, where rows of seats discharge into an aisle, the minimum clear width required by Sentence (5) shall be increased by 25 mm for each metre of length of the aisle measured in the direction towards an exit.
ON Variations: Except for an aisle serving bleacher seats, where rows of seats discharge into an aisle, the minimum clear width required by Sentence (5) shall be increased by 25 mm for each metre of length of the aisle measured in the direction towards an exit.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2) and as provided in Sentences (3) and (4), a potable water system shall be protected against backflow where the heat transfer loop of a solar domestic hot water system is directly connected to the potable water system.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2) and as provided in Sentences (3) and (4), a potable water system shall be protected against backflow where the heat transfer loop of a solar domestic hot water system is directly connected to the potable water system.

ON Full: Solder-joint fittings for drainage systems shall not be used in a water system.
ON Variations: Solder-joint fittings for drainage systems shall not be used in a water system.

ON Full: A camp for housing of workers shall have an area of not less than 3.72 m2 per employee in every room used for sleeping purposes.
ON Variations: A camp for housing of workers shall have an area of not less than 3.72 m2 per employee in every room used for sleeping purposes.

ON Full: Glass block that has not been tested in accordance with Article 9.10.3.1. is permitted as a closure in a fire separation required to have a fire-resistance rating of not more than 1 h.
ON Variations: Glass block that has not been tested in accordance with Article 9.10.3.1. is permitted as a closure in a fire separation required to have a fire-resistance rating of not more than 1 h.

ON Full: Where galvanized steel pipe is used in a drainage system, it shall be used with drainage fittings.
ON Variations: Where galvanized steel pipe is used in a drainage system, it shall be used with drainage fittings.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and elsewhere in this Part, materials and components, and their installation, shall conform to the requirements of the applicable standards in Table 5.10.1.1. where those materials or components are,(a) incorporated into environmental separators or assemblies exposed to the exterior, and (b) installed to fulfill the requirements of this Part. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and elsewhere in this Part, materials and components, and their installation, shall conform to the requirements of the applicable standards in Table 5.10.1.1. where those materials or components are,(a) incorporated into environmental separators or assemblies exposed to the exterior, and (b) installed to fulfill the requirements of this Part. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: All spaces between masonry or concrete chimneys and combustible material shall be sealed top or bottom with noncombustible material.
ON Variations: All spaces between masonry or concrete chimneys and combustible material shall be sealed top or bottom with noncombustible material.

ON Full: Pumps located indoors shall be in rooms built in conformance with Subsection 4.2.9.
ON Variations: Pumps located indoors shall be in rooms built in conformance with Subsection 4.2.9.

ON Full: Except as provided in Articles 9.10.11.2. and 9.10.11.4., a party wall on a property line shall be constructed as a firewall.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Articles 9.10.11.2. and 9.10.11.4., a party wall on a property line shall be constructed as a firewall.

ON Full: In mixed storage areas, matches shall be stored in a specific area separated from the remainder of the storage by a clear space of at least 2.4 m.
ON Variations: In mixed storage areas, matches shall be stored in a specific area separated from the remainder of the storage by a clear space of at least 2.4 m.

ON Full: The building shall be designed to meet the requirements of this Subsection and of the design standards referenced in Section 4.3.
ON Variations: The building shall be designed to meet the requirements of this Subsection and of the design standards referenced in Section 4.3.

ON Full: The building shall be located or the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building and will not adversely affect adjacent properties.
ON Variations: The building shall be located or the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building and will not adversely affect adjacent properties.

ON Full: Spray booth baffle plates shall not be located in exhaust ducts.
ON Variations: Spray booth baffle plates shall not be located in exhaust ducts.

ON Full: Roofs shall be protected with roofing, including flashing, installed so as to,(a) effectively shed water, (b) prevent the ingress of water and moisture into building assemblies and occupied space, and (c) minimize the ingress of water due to ice damming into building assemblies.
ON Variations: Roofs shall be protected with roofing, including flashing, installed so as to,(a) effectively shed water, (b) prevent the ingress of water and moisture into building assemblies and occupied space, and (c) minimize the ingress of water due to ice damming into building assemblies.

ON Full: The bottom layer of roofing required in Sentence (4) shall consist of not less than Type S smooth roll roofing or Type M mineral surface roll roofing (mineral surface not less than 457 mm wide, centred in the valley and fastened with nails spaced not more than 450 mm o.c. located 25 mm away from the edges.
ON Variations: The bottom layer of roofing required in Sentence (4) shall consist of not less than Type S smooth roll roofing or TypeÃ M mineral surface roll roofing (mineral surface not less than 457 mm wide, centred in the valley and fastened with nails spaced not more than 450 mm o.c. located 25 mm away from the edges.

ON Full: No dimension of the compartment described in Clause (4)(b) shall exceed 20 m.
ON Variations: No dimension of the compartment described in Clause (4)(b) shall exceed 20 m.

ON Full: Fixed noncombustible ladders, steps or grab rails shall be provided to permit access to the doors or panels required in Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Fixed noncombustible ladders, steps or grab rails shall be provided to permit access to the doors or panels required in Sentence (2).

ON Full: Portable extinguishers for Class A fires shall be provided on vehicles operating on chip piles in addition to the units for Class B fires normally required for the vehicles.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers for Class A fires shall be provided on vehicles operating on chip piles in addition to the units for Class B fires normally required for the vehicles.

ON Full: Vacant buildings shall be secured against unauthorized entry.
ON Variations: Vacant buildings shall be secured against unauthorized entry.

ON Full: Stickered lumber piles in storage yards shall be located at least 15 m from property lines and buildings.
ON Variations: Stickered lumber piles in storage yards shall be located at least 15 m from property lines and buildings.

ON Full: One person shall be on duty at each entrance to the premises undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging to prevent any unauthorized person from entering until such premises have been ventilated.
ON Variations: One person shall be on duty at each entrance to the premises undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging to prevent any unauthorized person from entering until such premises have been ventilated.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Article 9.10.19.8., within dwelling units, sufficient smoke alarms shall be installed so that,(a) there is at least one smoke alarm installed on each storey, including basements, and (b) on any storey of a dwelling unit containing sleeping rooms, a smoke alarm is installed, (i) in each sleeping room, and (ii) in a location between the sleeping rooms and the remainder of the storey, and if the sleeping rooms are served by a hallway, the smoke alarm shall be located in the hallway. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Article 9.10.19.8., within dwelling units, sufficient smoke alarms shall be installed so that,(a) there is at least one smoke alarm installed on each storey, including basements, and (b) on any storey of a dwelling unit containing sleeping rooms, a smoke alarm is installed, (i) in each sleeping room, and (ii) in a location between the sleeping rooms and the remainder of the storey, and if the sleeping rooms are served by a hallway, the smoke alarm shall be located in the hallway. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where combination smoke and fire dampers are used as a closure in a duct, they shall be installed within 610 mm of the plane of the fire separation, provided there is no inlet or outlet opening between the fire separation and the damper.
ON Variations: Where combination smoke and fire dampers are used as a closure in a duct, they shall be installed within 610 mm of the plane of the fire separation, provided there is no inlet or outlet opening between the fire separation and the damper.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) and Article 9.10.21.2., suites in residential occupancies shall be separated from adjacent rooms and suites by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 min.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) and Article 9.10.21.2., suites in residential occupancies shall be separated from adjacent rooms and suites by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 min.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (14), where cantilever parapet walls, other cantilever walls, exterior ornamentation and appendages, towers, chimneys or penthouses are connected to or form part of a building, they shall be designed, along with their connections, for a lateral force, Vsp, distributed according to the distribution of mass of the element and acting in the lateral direction that results in the most critical loading for design using the following equation:Vsp = 0.1FsIEWp where Wp is the weight of a portion of a structure as defined in Article 4.1.8.2.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (14), where cantilever parapet walls, other cantilever walls, exterior ornamentation and appendages, towers, chimneys or penthouses are connected to or form part of a building, they shall be designed, along with their connections, for a lateral force, Vsp, distributed according to the distribution of mass of the element and acting in the lateral direction that results in the most critical loading for design using the following equation:Vsp = 0.1FsIEWp where Wp is the weight of a portion of a structure as defined in Article 4.1.8.2.

ON Full: Smoke detectors required by Clause (1)(g) shall, upon actuation, recall the elevators served by machinery located in the machine room or machinery space in which the smoke detector is installed.
ON Variations: Smoke detectors required by Clause (1)(g) shall, upon actuation, recall the elevators served by machinery located in the machine room or machinery space in which the smoke detector is installed.

ON Full: A tank vehicle shall be provided with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 80B:C.
ON Variations: A tank vehicle shall be provided with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 80B:C.

ON Full: At least one main aisle having a width equal to at least half the height of the highest adjacent pile and extending the length of the structure shall be provided but in no case shall the width of the aisle be less than 2.4 m.
ON Variations: At least one main aisle having a width equal to at least half the height of the highest adjacent pile and extending the length of the structure shall be provided but in no case shall the width of the aisle be less than 2.4 m.

ON Full: Articles 5.16.2.1. and 5.16.2.2. do not apply to industries that conduct frequent fumigation operations on a routine basis where approved prior to the conducting of the operations.
ON Variations: Articles 5.16.2.1. and 5.16.2.2. do not apply to industries that conduct frequent fumigation operations on a routine basis where approved prior to the conducting of the operations.

ON Full: The hydrostatic design loads shall be determined in accordance with Subsection 5.2.2.
ON Variations: The hydrostatic design loads shall be determined in accordance with Subsection 5.2.2.

ON Full: Except as provided for in Sentence (2), every trap shall,(a) have a trap seal depth of at least 38 mm, (b) be so designed that failure of the seal walls will cause exterior leakage, and (c) have a water seal that does not depend on the action of moving parts.
ON Variations: Except as provided for in Sentence (2), every trap shall,(a) have a trap seal depth of at least 38 mm, (b) be so designed that failure of the seal walls will cause exterior leakage, and (c) have a water seal that does not depend on the action of moving parts.

ON Full: Material that is susceptible to changes in volume due to variations in moisture content or chemical-microbiological oxidation shall not be used as fill beneath floors-on-ground in a concentration that will damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies separating dissimilar environments.
ON Variations: Material that is susceptible to changes in volume due to variations in moisture content or chemical-microbiological oxidation shall not be used as fill beneath floors-on-ground in a concentration that will damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies separating dissimilar environments.

ON Full: This Section applies to that portion of a property where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are received in bulk quantities and are stored or handled for the purpose of being distributed.
ON Variations: This Section applies to that portion of a property where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are received in bulk quantities and are stored or handled for the purpose of being distributed.

ON Full: A plumbing fixture that is not located in a Group B occupancy need not comply with Sentence (4) if the building is sprinklered.
ON Variations: A plumbing fixture that is not located in a Group B occupancy need not comply with Sentence (4) if the building is sprinklered.

ON Full: ABS floor flanges shall be certified to CAN/CSA-B181.1, "Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene (ABS) Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Pipe Fittings".
ON Variations: ABS floor flanges shall be certified to CAN/CSA-B181.1, "Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene (ABS) Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Pipe Fittings".

ON Full: In locations where the seismic spectral response acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.35, but less than or equal to 0.55, loadbearing elements of masonry buildings 3 storeys in building height shall be reinforced with not less than the minimum amount of reinforcement as required in Subsection 9.20.15.
ON Variations: In locations where the seismic spectral response acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.35, but less than or equal to 0.55, loadbearing elements of masonry buildings 3 storeys in building height shall be reinforced with not less than the minimum amount of reinforcement as required in Subsection 9.20.15.

ON Full: Fire escapes are permitted to be used as exits on existing buildings provided they are designed and installed in conformance with Subsection 3.4.7.
ON Variations: Fire escapes are permitted to be used as exits on existing buildings provided they are designed and installed in conformance with Subsection 3.4.7.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Article 9.20.7.4., no chase or recess shall be constructed in any wall 190 mm or less in thickness.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Article 9.20.7.4., no chase or recess shall be constructed in any wall 190 mm or less in thickness.

ON Full: Where it is not practical to locate bulk transfer stations on separate piers and wharves, such stations may be located on general purpose piers and wharves provided that guards or fences are installed around valves or pumping equipment to prevent entry of unauthorized personnel.
ON Variations: Where it is not practical to locate bulk transfer stations on separate piers and wharves, such stations may be located on general purpose piers and wharves provided that guards or fences are installed around valves or pumping equipment to prevent entry of unauthorized personnel.

ON Full: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool and except as provided in Sentence (11), a public pool shall be surrounded by a hard-surfaced pool deck that shall, except for a pool described in Sentence 3.11.5.2.(1), be not less than 1 800 mm wide, in the case of an outdoor pool, be sloped away from the pool to waste drains or to adjacent lower ground at a slope of between 2% and 4%, and in the case of an indoor pool, be impervious and sloped away from the pool to waste drains at a slope of between 1% and 4%.
ON Variations: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool and except as provided in Sentence (11), a public pool shall be surrounded by a hard-surfaced pool deck that shall, except for a pool described in Sentence 3.11.5.2.(1), be not less than 1 800 mm wide, in the case of an outdoor pool, be sloped away from the pool to waste drains or to adjacent lower ground at a slope of between 2% and 4%, and in the case of an indoor pool, be impervious and sloped away from the pool to waste drains at a slope of between 1% and 4%.

ON Full: Screws shall be located not less than 10 mm from the side or edge of the board.
ON Variations: Screws shall be located not less than 10 mm from the side or edge of the board.

ON Full: Nails used to comply with Table 9.23.3.4. shall have a diameter not less than that required by Table 9.23.3.1.
ON Variations: Nails used to comply with Table 9.23.3.4. shall have a diameter not less than that required by Table 9.23.3.1.

ON Full: The installation of insulation, including the replacement of insulation, shall be carried out in accordance with the Building Code.
ON Variations: The installation of insulation, including the replacement of insulation, shall be carried out in accordance with the Building Code.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 9.15.3.4.(2), where the span of the supported joists exceeds 4.9 m, footings shall be designed in accordance with Section 4.2.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 9.15.3.4.(2), where the span of the supported joists exceeds 4.9 m, footings shall be designed in accordance with Section 4.2.

ON Full: Local locking devices permitted by Sentence (6) shall be operable by a key from both sides of the door.
ON Variations: Local locking devices permitted by Sentence (6) shall be operable by a key from both sides of the door.

ON Full: Where a chimney flue serves only one solid fuel-burning appliance, the flue area shall be at least equal to that of the flue pipe connected to it.
ON Variations: Where a chimney flue serves only one solid fuel-burning appliance, the flue area shall be at least equal to that of the flue pipe connected to it.

ON Full: Exterior surfaces of concrete block foundation walls above ground level shall have tooled joints, or shall be rendered, parged or otherwise suitably finished.
ON Variations: Exterior surfaces of concrete block foundation walls above ground level shall have tooled joints, or shall be rendered, parged or otherwise suitably finished.

ON Full: The buildings described in Sentence (1) shall comply with all the requirements of this Part, except where they are specifically exempted in this Section.
ON Variations: The buildings described in Sentence (1) shall comply with all the requirements of this Part, except where they are specifically exempted in this Section.

ON Full: Where a heat recovery ventilator is installed to provide all or part of the requirements of this Subsection, this Article shall apply.
ON Variations: Where a heat recovery ventilator is installed to provide all or part of the requirements of this Subsection, this Article shall apply.

ON Full: Pneumatic leakage tests shall not be performed on storage tanks with flammable liquids or combustible liquids in the tanks.
ON Variations: Pneumatic leakage tests shall not be performed on storage tanks with flammable liquids or combustible liquids in the tanks.

ON Full: The flame-spread rating limits specified in Sentence (5) do not apply to a corridor in which the flame-spread rating is not more than 150 provided the floor area is sprinklered.
ON Variations: The flame-spread rating limits specified in Sentence (5) do not apply to a corridor in which the flame-spread rating is not more than 150 provided the floor area is sprinklered.

ON Full: In buildings containing a hotel, the intervals referred to in Articles 6.6.3.3. and 6.6.3.4. are permitted to be once per month.
ON Variations: In buildings containing a hotel, the intervals referred to in Articles 6.6.3.3. and 6.6.3.4. are permitted to be once per month.

ON Full: Lintels referred to in Sentence (2),(a) shall be not less than 50 mm greater in depth than those shown in Tables A-12 to A-16 for the maximum spans shown, and (b) shall not exceed 2.24 m in length.
ON Variations: Lintels referred to in Sentence (2),(a) shall be not less than 50 mm greater in depth than those shown in Tables A-12 to A-16 for the maximum spans shown, and (b) shall not exceed 2.24 m in length.

ON Full: The requirements in Section 5.13 for dip tanks shall also apply to roll-coating processes described in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: The requirements in Section 5.13 for dip tanks shall also apply to roll-coating processes described in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Where two or more wythes are tied together with metal ties of the individual rod type, the ties shall conform to the requirements in Sentences (3) to (6).
ON Variations: Where two or more wythes are tied together with metal ties of the individual rod type, the ties shall conform to the requirements in Sentences (3) to (6).

ON Full: A mezzanine need not conform to Sentence (1) provided Article 3.2.8.2. does not require it to terminate at a vertical fire separation.
ON Variations: A mezzanine need not conform to Sentence (1) provided Article 3.2.8.2. does not require it to terminate at a vertical fire separation.

ON Full: A leaching bed shall not be located,(a) in an area that has an average slope that exceeds one unit vertically to four units horizontally, (b) in soil or leaching bed fill having a percolation time of, (i) less than one minute, or greater than 125 minutes if constructed as a shallow buried trench, or (ii) less than one minute, or greater than 50 minutes for all other leaching beds, or (c) in or on an area that is subject to flooding that may be expected to cause damage to the leaching bed or impair the operation of the leaching bed.
ON Variations: A leaching bed shall not be located,(a) in an area that has an average slope that exceeds one unit vertically to four units horizontally, (b) in soil or leaching bed fill having a percolation time of, (i) less than one minute, or greater than 125 minutes if constructed as a shallow buried trench, or (ii) less than one minute, or greater than 50 minutes for all other leaching beds, or (c) in or on an area that is subject to flooding that may be expected to cause damage to the leaching bed or impair the operation of the leaching bed.

ON Full: A building classified as Group A, Division 2 is permitted to conform to Sentence (2) provided, except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.7.(1), the building is sprinklered, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than, 4 800 m2 if 1 storey in building height, or 2 400 m2 if 2 storeys in building height.
ON Variations: A building classified as Group A, Division 2 is permitted to conform to Sentence (2) provided, except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.7.(1), the building is sprinklered, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than, 4 800 m2 if 1 storey in building height, or 2 400 m2 if 2 storeys in building height.

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) shall be of noncombustible construction, and, except as permitted by Sentence (3), floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) shall be of noncombustible construction, and, except as permitted by Sentence (3), floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.

ON Full: Where make-up air facilities are intended to introduce air directly from the outdoors to occupied parts of the building in winter, they shall incorporate means of tempering that air to maintain the indoor design temperature.
ON Variations: Where make-up air facilities are intended to introduce air directly from the outdoors to occupied parts of the building in winter, they shall incorporate means of tempering that air to maintain the indoor design temperature.

ON Full: Resistance to forced entry into dwelling units shall conform to the applicable requirements in Articles 9.7.5.2. and 9.7.5.3.
ON Variations: Resistance to forced entry into dwelling units shall conform to the applicable requirements in Articles 9.7.5.2. and 9.7.5.3.

ON Full: The clearance between sprinkler head deflectors and the top of any storage shall not be less than 457 mm.
ON Variations: The clearance between sprinkler head deflectors and the top of any storage shall not be less than 457 mm.

ON Full: Except as required in Article 3.5.1.8., where a municipal hydrant system exists and is adjacent to the yard, the hydrant system shall be extended into the yard area so that all parts of the salvage yard can be reached by using not more than 60 m of hose.
ON Variations: Except as required in Article 3.5.1.8., where a municipal hydrant system exists and is adjacent to the yard, the hydrant system shall be extended into the yard area so that all parts of the salvage yard can be reached by using not more than 60 m of hose.

ON Full: The deflections described in Sentence (10) shall be used to calculate the largest interstorey deflection, which shall not exceed, (a) 0.01hs for post-disaster buildings, (b) 0.02hs for High Importance Category buildings, and (c) 0.025hs for all other buildings, where hs is the interstorey height as defined in Article 4.1.8.2.
ON Variations: The deflections described in Sentence (10) shall be used to calculate the largest interstorey deflection, which shall not exceed, (a) 0.01hs for post-disaster buildings, (b) 0.02hs for High Importance Category buildings, and (c) 0.025hs for all other buildings, where hs is the interstorey height as defined in Article 4.1.8.2.

ON Full: Gypsum products shall conform to,(a) CAN/CSA-A82.27-M, "Gypsum Board", (b) ASTM C1178 / C1178M, "Coated Glass Mat Water-Resistant Gypsum Backing Panel", or (c) ASTM C1396 / C1396M, "Gypsum Board".
ON Variations: Gypsum products shall conform to,(a) CAN/CSA-A82.27-M, "Gypsum Board", (b) ASTM C1178 / C1178M, "Coated Glass Mat Water-Resistant Gypsum Backing Panel", or (c) ASTM C1396 / C1396M, "Gypsum Board".

ON Full: A leaching bed shall not be covered with any material having a hydraulic conductivity less than 0.01 m/day.
ON Variations: A leaching bed shall not be covered with any material having a hydraulic conductivity less than 0.01 m/day.

ON Full: Where floor framing is designed in accordance with Clause (1)(b) or (c) and where supporting wall framing and fastenings, or footings, are designed according to Clause (1)(a), the specified live load on the floor according to Table 4.1.5.3. shall not exceed 2.4 kPa.
ON Variations: Where floor framing is designed in accordance with Clause (1)(b) or (c) and where supporting wall framing and fastenings, or footings, are designed according to Clause (1)(a), the specified live load on the floor according to Table 4.1.5.3. shall not exceed 2.4 kPa.

ON Full: Exits are not required directly from rooftop enclosures that are provided with access to exits in conformance with Sentences 3.3.1.3.(5) and (6).
ON Variations: Exits are not required directly from rooftop enclosures that are provided with access to exits in conformance with Sentences 3.3.1.3.(5) and (6).

ON Full: Rib lath or expanded metal stucco mesh shall be,(a) copper-alloy steel coated with rust-inhibitive paint after fabrication, or (b) galvanized.
ON Variations: Rib lath or expanded metal stucco mesh shall be,(a) copper-alloy steel coated with rust-inhibitive paint after fabrication, or (b) galvanized.

ON Full: Except within the floor area of a storage garage, the minimum headroom clearance in every access to exit shall conform to the requirements of Article 3.4.3.5. for exits.
ON Variations: Except within the floor area of a storage garage, the minimum headroom clearance in every access to exit shall conform to the requirements of Article 3.4.3.5. for exits.

ON Full: The requirements of Section 2.8 shall apply to buildings and open areas where the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids exceeds 500 L in total or exceeds 250 L of Class I liquids.
ON Variations: The requirements of Section 2.8 shall apply to buildings and open areas where the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids exceeds 500 L in total or exceeds 250 L of Class I liquids.

ON Full: The revised fire safety plan prepared under Sentence (4) or (5) shall be implemented.
ON Variations: The revised fire safety plan prepared under Sentence (4) or (5) shall be implemented.

ON Full: Devices having open flames shall be securely supported in noncombustible holders and located or protected so as to prevent accidental contact of the flame with combustible materials.
ON Variations: Devices having open flames shall be securely supported in noncombustible holders and located or protected so as to prevent accidental contact of the flame with combustible materials.

ON Full: In applying Sentence (2), the thickness of cavity walls shall be taken as the greater of,(a) two-thirds of the sum of the thicknesses of the wythes, or (b) the thickness of the thicker wythe.
ON Variations: In applying Sentence (2), the thickness of cavity walls shall be taken as the greater of,(a) two-thirds of the sum of the thicknesses of the wythes, or (b) the thickness of the thicker wythe.

ON Full: Fire pumps shall be operated at least once per week at rated speed.
ON Variations: Fire pumps shall be operated at least once per week at rated speed.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), fire blocks shall be constructed of materials that will remain in place and prevent the passage of flames for not less than 15 min when subjected to the standard fire exposure in CAN/ULC-S101, "Fire Endurance Tests of Building Construction and Materials".
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), fire blocks shall be constructed of materials that will remain in place and prevent the passage of flames for not less than 15 min when subjected to the standard fire exposure in CAN/ULC-S101, "Fire Endurance Tests of Building Construction and Materials".

ON Full: No openings shall occur within 1.2 m of interior and exterior corners of exterior non-loadbearing flat insulating concrete form walls.
ON Variations: No openings shall occur within 1.2 m of interior and exterior corners of exterior non-loadbearing flat insulating concrete form walls.

ON Full: The design of deep foundations shall be determined on the basis of geotechnical considerations taking into account, (a) the method of installation, (b) the degree of inspection, (c) the spacing of foundation units and group effects, (d) other requirements of this Subsection, and (e) the appropriate structural requirements of Section 4.1. and Subsections 4.3.1., 4.3.3. and 4.3.4.
ON Variations: The design of deep foundations shall be determined on the basis of geotechnical considerations taking into account, (a) the method of installation, (b) the degree of inspection, (c) the spacing of foundation units and group effects, (d) other requirements of this Subsection, and (e) the appropriate structural requirements of Section 4.1. and Subsections 4.3.1., 4.3.3. and 4.3.4.

ON Full: Firebrick liners shall be laid with high temperature cement mortar conforming to CAN/CGSB-10.3, "Air Setting Refractory Mortar".
ON Variations: Firebrick liners shall be laid with high temperature cement mortar conforming to CAN/CGSB-10.3, "Air Setting Refractory Mortar".

ON Full: Metal siding consisting of sheets of metal is considered to meet the requirements of Sentence (1) where the joints between sheets are of the locked-seam type.
ON Variations: Metal siding consisting of sheets of metal is considered to meet the requirements of Sentence (1) where the joints between sheets are of the locked-seam type.

ON Full: Windows need not be protected in accordance with Sentence (5), where,(a) the window serves a dwelling unit that is not located above another suite, (b) the only opening having greater dimensions than those allowed by Clause (5)(b) is a horizontal opening at the top of the window, (c) the top surface of the window sill is located more than 480 mm above the finished floor on one side of the window, or (d) the window is located in a room or space with the finished floor described in Clause (c) located less than 1 800 mm above the floor or ground on the other side of the window.
ON Variations: Windows need not be protected in accordance with Sentence (5), where,(a) the window serves a dwelling unit that is not located above another suite, (b) the only opening having greater dimensions than those allowed by Clause (5)(b) is a horizontal opening at the top of the window, (c) the top surface of the window sill is located more than 480 mm above the finished floor on one side of the window, or (d) the window is located in a room or space with the finished floor described in Clause (c) located less than 1 800 mm above the floor or ground on the other side of the window.

ON Full: Areas where unstable liquids are handled or where small-scale unit chemical processes are carried out shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.
ON Variations: Areas where unstable liquids are handled or where small-scale unit chemical processes are carried out shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), door release hardware shall be operable by one hand and the door shall be openable with not more than one releasing operation.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), door release hardware shall be operable by one hand and the door shall be openable with not more than one releasing operation.

ON Full: Despite Sentence (1), existing ventilation systems need not conform with Articles 4.1.7.3., 4.1.7.4. and 4.12.8.2. to 4.12.8.5.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence (1), existing ventilation systems need not conform with Articles 4.1.7.3., 4.1.7.4. and 4.12.8.2. to 4.12.8.5.

ON Full: Lettering on warning signs shall be red or white letters 114 mm high with a 19 mm stroke on a contrasting background.
ON Variations: Lettering on warning signs shall be red or white letters 114 mm high with a 19 mm stroke on a contrasting background.

ON Full: Combustible roof covering that has an A, B or C classification determined in conformance with Subsection 3.1.15. is permitted on a building required to be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Combustible roof covering that has an A, B or C classification determined in conformance with Subsection 3.1.15. is permitted on a building required to be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Portable extinguishers provided in conformance with Sentence (3) shall be in addition to those provided on board the marine vessels.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers provided in conformance with Sentence (3) shall be in addition to those provided on board the marine vessels.

ON Full: Except as otherwise specified in this Part, the areas, dimensions and heights of rooms or spaces shall be measured between finished wall surfaces and between finished floor and ceiling surfaces.
ON Variations: Except as otherwise specified in this Part, the areas, dimensions and heights of rooms or spaces shall be measured between finished wall surfaces and between finished floor and ceiling surfaces.

ON Full: Dip tanks of over 2300 L liquid capacity shall be equipped with bottom drains capable of being operated both automatically and manually to drain the tank quickly in the event of fire.
ON Variations: Dip tanks of over 2300 L liquid capacity shall be equipped with bottom drains capable of being operated both automatically and manually to drain the tank quickly in the event of fire.

ON Full: The number of water closets required for establishments used primarily for the consumption of alcoholic beverages that provide limited or no food service shall conform to Table 3.7.4.3.E.
ON Variations: The number of water closets required for establishments used primarily for the consumption of alcoholic beverages that provide limited or no food service shall conform to Table 3.7.4.3.E.

ON Full: Fixture drains from fixtures that are listed in Subclauses 7.4.2.1.(1)(d)(iii) to (vi) may be directly connected to a pipe that,(a) is terminated to form an air break above the flood level rim of a fixture that is directly connected to a storm drainage system, and (b) is extended through the roof when fixtures that are on 3 or more storeys are connected to it.
ON Variations: Fixture drains from fixtures that are listed in Subclauses 7.4.2.1.(1)(d)(iii) to (vi) may be directly connected to a pipe that,(a) is terminated to form an air break above the flood level rim of a fixture that is directly connected to a storm drainage system, and (b) is extended through the roof when fixtures that are on 3 or more storeys are connected to it.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), oil interceptors shall be provided as follows:(a) service stations, repair shops and garages or any establishment where motor vehicles are repaired, lubricated or maintained shall be provided with an oil interceptor, and (b) establishments which use oily or flammable liquids or have such wastes as a result of an industrial process shall be provided with an engineered oil interceptor.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), oil interceptors shall be provided as follows:(a) service stations, repair shops and garages or any establishment where motor vehicles are repaired, lubricated or maintained shall be provided with an oil interceptor, and (b) establishments which use oily or flammable liquids or have such wastes as a result of an industrial process shall be provided with an engineered oil interceptor.

ON Full: The specified live load due to possible concentrations of load resulting from the use of an area of floor or roof shall not be less than that listed in Table 4.1.5.9. applied over the loaded area noted in Table 4.1.5.9. and located so as to cause maximum effects, except that for occupancies not listed in Table 4.1.5.9., the concentrations of load shall be determined in accordance with Article 4.1.5.2.
ON Variations: The specified live load due to possible concentrations of load resulting from the use of an area of floor or roof shall not be less than that listed in Table 4.1.5.9. applied over the loaded area noted in Table 4.1.5.9. and located so as to cause maximum effects, except that for occupancies not listed in Table 4.1.5.9., the concentrations of load shall be determined in accordance with Article 4.1.5.2.

ON Full: Containers of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be kept closed when not in use.
ON Variations: Containers of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be kept closed when not in use.

ON Full: This Section applies to the fumigation or thermal fogging of buildings where this activity creates a fire or explosion hazard, including the fumigation of equipment or commodities within structures, tanks or bins or under tarpaulins.
ON Variations: This Section applies to the fumigation or thermal fogging of buildings where this activity creates a fire or explosion hazard, including the fumigation of equipment or commodities within structures, tanks or bins or under tarpaulins.

ON Full: A receptacle conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3) shall be provided for all waste rags and materials used in operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the contents shall be removed daily and disposed of in a manner that will not create a fire hazard.
ON Variations: A receptacle conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3) shall be provided for all waste rags and materials used in operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids, and the contents shall be removed daily and disposed of in a manner that will not create a fire hazard.

ON Full: An exit stair serving a building more than 6 storeys in building height shall be clearly marked by signs indicating that it does not lead to an exit at the roof level. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: An exit stair serving a building more than 6 storeys in building height shall be clearly marked by signs indicating that it does not lead to an exit at the roof level. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Subject to the requirements of this Section, an exit from any floor area shall be one of the following, used singly or in combination: an exterior doorway, an exterior passageway, an exterior ramp, an exterior stairway, a fire escape (conforming to Subsection 3.4.7.), a horizontal exit, an interior passageway, an interior ramp, or an interior stairway.
ON Variations: Subject to the requirements of this Section, an exit from any floor area shall be one of the following, used singly or in combination: an exterior doorway, an exterior passageway, an exterior ramp, an exterior stairway, a fire escape (conforming to Subsection 3.4.7.), a horizontal exit, an interior passageway, an interior ramp, or an interior stairway.

ON Full: Glass in guards shall be,(a) safety glass of the laminated or tempered type conforming to CAN/CGSB-12.1-M, "Tempered or Laminated Safety Glass", or (b) wired glass conforming to CAN/CGSB-12.11-M, "Wired Safety Glass".
ON Variations: Glass in guards shall be,(a) safety glass of the laminated or tempered type conforming to CAN/CGSB-12.1-M, "Tempered or Laminated Safety Glass", or (b) wired glass conforming to CAN/CGSB-12.11-M, "Wired Safety Glass".

ON Full: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.2.30. to 3.2.2.34., a building classified as Group A, Division 3 shall conform to Sentences (2) and (3).
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.2.30. to 3.2.2.34., a building classified as Group A, Division 3 shall conform to Sentences (2) and (3).

ON Full: Where electrically operated gates or turnstiles used for fare collection are intended to be used as part of a required means of egress from a rapid transit station, provision shall be made to release the gates or turnstiles in accordance with Sentence (4) to allow them to operate freely in the direction of egress travel.
ON Variations: Where electrically operated gates or turnstiles used for fare collection are intended to be used as part of a required means of egress from a rapid transit station, provision shall be made to release the gates or turnstiles in accordance with Sentence (4) to allow them to operate freely in the direction of egress travel.

ON Full: Every sanitary building drain shall be provided with at least one vent that is not less than 3 in. in size.
ON Variations: Every sanitary building drain shall be provided with at least one vent that is not less than 3 in. in size.

ON Full: Where it is not possible to comply with Sentence (1), a lesser slope may be used if it will produce a gravity flow of not less than 0.6 m per second.
ON Variations: Where it is not possible to comply with Sentence (1), a lesser slope may be used if it will produce a gravity flow of not less than 0.6 m per second.

ON Full: Where a building or structural member can be expected to be subjected to loads, forces or other effects not listed in Article 4.1.2.1., such effects shall be taken into account in the design based on the most appropriate information available.
ON Variations: Where a building or structural member can be expected to be subjected to loads, forces or other effects not listed in Article 4.1.2.1., such effects shall be taken into account in the design based on the most appropriate information available.

ON Full: Where a garage is detached from the house or the individual dwelling unit it serves but attached to another garage on the adjacent property, the party wall so formed shall be constructed as a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 min.
ON Variations: Where a garage is detached from the house or the individual dwelling unit it serves but attached to another garage on the adjacent property, the party wall so formed shall be constructed as a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 min.

ON Full: Where a doorway or stair empties onto a ramp through a side wall, there shall be a level area extending across the full width of the ramp, and for a distance of 300 mm on either side of the wall opening, except one side if it abuts on an end wall.
ON Variations: Where a doorway or stair empties onto a ramp through a side wall, there shall be a level area extending across the full width of the ramp, and for a distance of 300 mm on either side of the wall opening, except one side if it abuts on an end wall.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), if a fire alarm system is required in any portion of a building, it shall be installed throughout the building.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), if a fire alarm system is required in any portion of a building, it shall be installed throughout the building.

ON Full: Required exit stairs serving a house or an individual dwelling unit shall have a width of not less than 860 mm.
ON Variations: Required exit stairs serving a house or an individual dwelling unit shall have a width of not less than 860 mm.

ON Full: An individual storage area shall not exceed 1000 m2 in sprinklered buildings.
ON Variations: An individual storage area shall not exceed 1000 m2 in sprinklered buildings.

ON Full: For buildings constructed with more than 4 storeys of continuous wood construction and where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, timber SFRS of shear walls with wood-based panels, braced frames or moment-resisting frames as defined in Table 4.1.8.9. within the continuous wood construction shall not have irregularities of Type 4 or 5 as described in Table 4.1.8.6. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: For buildings constructed with more than 4 storeys of continuous wood construction and where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, timber SFRS of shear walls with wood-based panels, braced frames or moment-resisting frames as defined in Table 4.1.8.9. within the continuous wood construction shall not have irregularities of Type 4 or 5 as described in Table 4.1.8.6. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Every storage room, dressing room, sanitary facility, service area and corridor serving the areas in Sentence (7) shall be equipped to provide illumination to a level of not less than 300 lx measured at the floor level.
ON Variations: Every storage room, dressing room, sanitary facility, service area and corridor serving the areas in Sentence (7) shall be equipped to provide illumination to a level of not less than 300 lx measured at the floor level.

ON Full: Individual storage piles of tires or shredded tires in a storage yard shall not be more than 3 m in height and 100 m2 in area.
ON Variations: Individual storage piles of tires or shredded tires in a storage yard shall not be more than 3 m in height and 100 m2 in area.

ON Full: Standpipe and hose systems shall be maintained in operating condition.
ON Variations: Standpipe and hose systems shall be maintained in operating condition.

ON Full: The calculation of water velocities for the purposes of Clause (8)(b) and Sentences (11) and (12) and the calculation of water flow rates for the purposes of Sentence (9) shall be based on the assumption that all possible sources of suction flow are present at the same time.
ON Variations: The calculation of water velocities for the purposes of Clause (8)(b) and Sentences (11) and (12) and the calculation of water flow rates for the purposes of Sentence (9) shall be based on the assumption that all possible sources of suction flow are present at the same time.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), a repair garage shall be separated from other occupancies by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), a repair garage shall be separated from other occupancies by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.

ON Full: The cesspool shall be constructed in such a manner as to prevent the collapse of its sidewalls.
ON Variations: The cesspool shall be constructed in such a manner as to prevent the collapse of its sidewalls.

ON Full: No horizontal sanitary drainage pipe of less than 3 in. size shall have a fixture loading in excess of that permitted by Table 7.4.10.7.
ON Variations: No horizontal sanitary drainage pipe of less than 3 in. size shall have a fixture loading in excess of that permitted by Table 7.4.10.7.

ON Full: In this Section: Ancillary space means the rooms or spaces in the station used only by the transit agency to house or contain operating, maintenance or support equipment and functions, but does not include booths and kiosks used by the transit agency or service rooms. Central supervising station means the operations centre where the transit agency controls and co-ordinates the system-wide movement of passengers and vehicles and from which communication is maintained with supervisory and operating personnel of the transit agency and with participating agencies when required. Crush load means the total of the seating capacity and the standing capacity of a car where, the seating capacity is the number of seats in a car, and the standing capacity is 0.2 m2 per person for the standing area which is measured 300 mm in front of the seats.Egress capacity means the number of people able to travel from or through a type of egress facility in a specified period of time. Entraining load means the number of passengers boarding the train at a station. Fare-paid area means that portion of a rapid transit station to which access is gained by a pass or by paying a fare. Fare-paid area control means the point where passengers enter or leave the fare-paid area. Link load means the number of passengers on board the train(s) travelling between two stations. Maximum calculated train load means the crush load per car multiplied by the maximum number of cars per train in the peak period. Peak direction means, for each route, the direction of train travel having the largest passenger flow volume based on the sum of the incoming link load plus the entraining load per peak hour. Protected route means that portion of a means of egress that starts at the point where passengers would not be vulnerable to exposure from a train fire and that leads to the exterior of the station or through an exit to an adjacent building. Public area means the public circulation areas in a rapid transit station providing pedestrian access to and from trains. Rapid transit station means a building or part of a building used for the purpose of loading and unloading passengers of a rapid transit system but does not include open air shelters at street level. Rapid transit system means an electrified transportation system, utilizing guidance methods involving positive mechanical contact with the fixed way operating on a right-of-way for the mass movement of passengers.
ON Variations: In this Section: Ancillary space means the rooms or spaces in the station used only by the transit agency to house or contain operating, maintenance or support equipment and functions, but does not include booths and kiosks used by the transit agency or service rooms. Central supervising station means the operations centre where the transit agency controls and co-ordinates the system-wide movement of passengers and vehicles and from which communication is maintained with supervisory and operating personnel of the transit agency and with participating agencies when required. Crush load means the total of the seating capacity and the standing capacity of a car where, the seating capacity is the number of seats in a car, and the standing capacity is 0.2 m2 per person for the standing area which is measured 300 mm in front of the seats.Egress capacity means the number of people able to travel from or through a type of egress facility in a specified period of time. Entraining load means the number of passengers boarding the train at a station. Fare-paid area means that portion of a rapid transit station to which access is gained by a pass or by paying a fare. Fare-paid area control means the point where passengers enter or leave the fare-paid area. Link load means the number of passengers on board the train(s) travelling between two stations. Maximum calculated train load means the crush load per car multiplied by the maximum number of cars per train in the peak period. Peak direction means, for each route, the direction of train travel having the largest passenger flow volume based on the sum of the incoming link load plus the entraining load per peak hour. Protected route means that portion of a means of egress that starts at the point where passengers would not be vulnerable to exposure from a train fire and that leads to the exterior of the station or through an exit to an adjacent building. Public area means the public circulation areas in a rapid transit station providing pedestrian access to and from trains. Rapid transit station means a building or part of a building used for the purpose of loading and unloading passengers of a rapid transit system but does not include open air shelters at street level. Rapid transit system means an electrified transportation system, utilizing guidance methods involving positive mechanical contact with the fixed way operating on a right-of-way for the mass movement of passengers.

ON Full: Stairs within houses and individual dwelling units may consist of,(a) flights with rectangular treads and winders provided winders as described in Article 9.8.4.5. are installed between floor levels, or (b) flights with a mix of rectangular and tapered treads provided all tapered treads within a flight turn in the same direction.
ON Variations: Stairs within houses and individual dwelling units may consist of,(a) flights with rectangular treads and winders provided winders as described in Article 9.8.4.5. are installed between floor levels, or (b) flights with a mix of rectangular and tapered treads provided all tapered treads within a flight turn in the same direction.

ON Full: Porcelain enamelled steel fixtures shall conform to ASME A112.19.1 / CSA B45.2, "Enamelled Cast Iron and Enamelled Steel Plumbing Fixtures".
ON Variations: Porcelain enamelled steel fixtures shall conform to ASME A112.19.1 / CSA B45.2, "Enamelled Cast Iron and Enamelled Steel Plumbing Fixtures".

ON Full: Fire blocks conforming to Sentence (1) are not required provided, the wall space is filled with insulation, the exposed construction materials and any insulation within the wall space are noncombustible, the exposed materials within the wall space, including insulation but not including wiring, piping or similar services, have a flame-spread rating not more than 25 on any exposed surface, or on any surface that would be exposed by cutting through the material in any direction, and fire blocks are installed so that the vertical distance between them is not more than 10 m, or the insulated wall assembly contains not more than one concealed air space and the horizontal thickness of that air space is not more than 25 mm.
ON Variations: Fire blocks conforming to Sentence (1) are not required provided, the wall space is filled with insulation, the exposed construction materials and any insulation within the wall space are noncombustible, the exposed materials within the wall space, including insulation but not including wiring, piping or similar services, have a flame-spread rating not more than 25 on any exposed surface, or on any surface that would be exposed by cutting through the material in any direction, and fire blocks are installed so that the vertical distance between them is not more than 10 m, or the insulated wall assembly contains not more than one concealed air space and the horizontal thickness of that air space is not more than 25 mm.

ON Full: Smoke alarms required in Sentence (1) shall be installed on or near the ceiling.
ON Variations: Smoke alarms required in Sentence (1) shall be installed on or near the ceiling.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to laboratories intended as a location where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are used in normal laboratory operations in quantities or in a manner that create a fire or explosion hazard.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to laboratories intended as a location where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are used in normal laboratory operations in quantities or in a manner that create a fire or explosion hazard.

ON Full: Buildings or parts thereof used for storage of closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols shall be classified as medium hazard industrial occupancies.
ON Variations: Buildings or parts thereof used for storage of closed containers of distilled beverage alcohols shall be classified as medium hazard industrial occupancies.

ON Full: The installation, operation and maintenance of hot work equipment shall be carried out in accordance with Section 5.17.
ON Variations: The installation, operation and maintenance of hot work equipment shall be carried out in accordance with Section 5.17.

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 4.2.7.10., main aisles, access aisles and aisles defining individual storage areas shall be in conformance with Articles 3.3.2.5. and 3.3.2.6.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 4.2.7.10., main aisles, access aisles and aisles defining individual storage areas shall be in conformance with Articles 3.3.2.5. and 3.3.2.6.

ON Full: Normal and emergency vents shall be provided on storage tanks in conformance with good engineering practice.
ON Variations: Normal and emergency vents shall be provided on storage tanks in conformance with good engineering practice.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), when Class I liquids are transferred into a storage tank through the top of the tank, the fill pipe shall terminate within 150 mm of the bottom of the tank.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), when Class I liquids are transferred into a storage tank through the top of the tank, the fill pipe shall terminate within 150 mm of the bottom of the tank.

ON Full: Brass or bronze threaded water fittings shall not be used in a drainage system.
ON Variations: Brass or bronze threaded water fittings shall not be used in a drainage system.

ON Full: Vinyl siding, including flashing and trim accessories, shall conform to CAN/CGSB-41.24, "Rigid Vinyl Siding, Soffits and Fascia".
ON Variations: Vinyl siding, including flashing and trim accessories, shall conform to CAN/CGSB-41.24, "Rigid Vinyl Siding, Soffits and Fascia".

ON Full: Where a roof is intended for an occupant load of more than 60 persons, at least two separate means of egress shall be provided from the roof to stairs designed in conformance with the requirements for exit stairs and located remote from each other.
ON Variations: Where a roof is intended for an occupant load of more than 60 persons, at least two separate means of egress shall be provided from the roof to stairs designed in conformance with the requirements for exit stairs and located remote from each other.

ON Full: Fireplace inserts and hearth mounted stoves vented through the throat of a fireplace described in Sentence (1) may be installed in existing fireplaces only if a minimum thickness of 190 mm of solid masonry is provided between the smoke chamber and any existing combustible materials, unless the insert is listed for lesser clearances.
ON Variations: Fireplace inserts and hearth mounted stoves vented through the throat of a fireplace described in Sentence (1) may be installed in existing fireplaces only if a minimum thickness of 190 mm of solid masonry is provided between the smoke chamber and any existing combustible materials, unless the insert is listed for lesser clearances.

ON Full: Except as provided in Articles 9.27.3.4. to 9.27.3.6., at least one layer of sheathing membrane shall be applied beneath siding, stucco or masonry veneer.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Articles 9.27.3.4. to 9.27.3.6., at least one layer of sheathing membrane shall be applied beneath siding, stucco or masonry veneer.

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, roof assemblies shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, except that the fire-resistance rating is permitted to be waived provided the roof assembly is constructed as a fire-retardant treated wood roof system conforming to Article 3.1.14.1., and the building area is not more than, 1 200 m2 if facing one street, 1 500 m2 if facing two streets, or 1 800 m2 if facing three streets, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, roof assemblies shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, except that the fire-resistance rating is permitted to be waived provided the roof assembly is constructed as a fire-retardant treated wood roof system conforming to Article 3.1.14.1., and the building area is not more than, 1 200 m2 if facing one street, 1 500 m2 if facing two streets, or 1 800 m2 if facing three streets, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Aboveground storage tanks located in an area that may be subject to flooding shall be securely anchored.
ON Variations: Aboveground storage tanks located in an area that may be subject to flooding shall be securely anchored.

ON Full: Exposed slabs shall be sloped to effectively shed water away from the exterior wall.
ON Variations: Exposed slabs shall be sloped to effectively shed water away from the exterior wall.

ON Full: The method of connection required in Sentence (1) shall take into account the mass, stiffness, strength, ductility and anticipated motion of the connected buildings and the character of the connection.
ON Variations: The method of connection required in Sentence (1) shall take into account the mass, stiffness, strength, ductility and anticipated motion of the connected buildings and the character of the connection.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), the minimum thickness of O-2 grade OSB used as an interior finish shall conform to that shown for plywood in Table 9.29.6.1.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), the minimum thickness of O-2 grade OSB used as an interior finish shall conform to that shown for plywood in Table 9.29.6.1.

ON Full: Ventilation of rooms and spaces in other than residential occupancies shall conform to Part 6.
ON Variations: Ventilation of rooms and spaces in other than residential occupancies shall conform to Part 6.

ON Full: Where wood shingles or shakes are applied to sheathing that is not suitable for attaching the shingles or shakes, the shingles or shakes may be attached to a wood lath not less than 38 mm by 9.5 mm thick securely nailed to the framing and applied as described in Article 9.27.7.5.
ON Variations: Where wood shingles or shakes are applied to sheathing that is not suitable for attaching the shingles or shakes, the shingles or shakes may be attached to a wood lath not less than 38 mm by 9.5 mm thick securely nailed to the framing and applied as described in Article 9.27.7.5.

ON Full: Storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be ventilated in conformance with Subsection 4.1.7.
ON Variations: Storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be ventilated in conformance with Subsection 4.1.7.

ON Full: Where asphalt shingles are installed as cladding on wood frame walls exposed to precipitation, the cladding assembly shall comply with,(a) Subsections 9.26.7. and 9.27.2. to 9.27.4., or (b) Part 5.
ON Variations: Where asphalt shingles are installed as cladding on wood frame walls exposed to precipitation, the cladding assembly shall comply with,(a) Subsections 9.26.7. and 9.27.2. to 9.27.4., or (b) Part 5.

ON Full: Combustible materials shall not be accumulated in any part of an elevator shaft, ventilation shaft, means of egress, service room or service space, unless the location, room or space is designed for those materials.
ON Variations: Combustible materials shall not be accumulated in any part of an elevator shaft, ventilation shaft, means of egress, service room or service space, unless the location, room or space is designed for those materials.

ON Full: The earth around the perimeter of the pit shall be raised or mounded to a height of at least 150 mm above ground level.
ON Variations: The earth around the perimeter of the pit shall be raised or mounded to a height of at least 150 mm above ground level.

ON Full: Transfer operations shall be carried out only under the continuous supervision of a person qualified to supervise such operations.
ON Variations: Transfer operations shall be carried out only under the continuous supervision of a person qualified to supervise such operations.

ON Full: Dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from containers having a capacity of more than 30 L shall be by pumps or through self-closing valves, designed in conformance with good engineering practice.
ON Variations: Dispensing of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from containers having a capacity of more than 30 L shall be by pumps or through self-closing valves, designed in conformance with good engineering practice.

ON Full: Heating equipment shall be separated from any storage area in conformance with the requirements of the Building Code.
ON Variations: Heating equipment shall be separated from any storage area in conformance with the requirements of the Building Code.

ON Full: The manufacture, storage, handling, transportation, sale and use of explosives shall meet the requirements of the Act and the Regulations.
ON Variations: The manufacture, storage, handling, transportation, sale and use of explosives shall meet the requirements of the Act and the Regulations.

ON Full: Storage yards shall comply with the requirements of Section 2.8.
ON Variations: Storage yards shall comply with the requirements of Section 2.8.

ON Full: Piles of salvage material shall be separated by a clear space of 3 m that is kept clear of grass and weeds.
ON Variations: Piles of salvage material shall be separated by a clear space of 3 m that is kept clear of grass and weeds.

ON Full: In this Part,Soil means in-situ, naturally occurring, unconsolidated mineral or organic material, at the earth's surface that is at least 100 mm thick and capable of supporting plant growth, and includes material compacted or cemented by soil forming processes, but does not include displaced materials such as gravel dumps, mine spoils, or like deposits.
ON Variations: In this Part,Soil means in-situ, naturally occurring, unconsolidated mineral or organic material, at the earth's surface that is at least 100 mm thick and capable of supporting plant growth, and includes material compacted or cemented by soil forming processes, but does not include displaced materials such as gravel dumps, mine spoils, or like deposits.

ON Full: Fire blocks shall be provided at the top and bottom of each stair where the stair passes through a floor containing concealed space in which the exposed construction materials within the space have a surface flame-spread rating greater than 25.
ON Variations: Fire blocks shall be provided at the top and bottom of each stair where the stair passes through a floor containing concealed space in which the exposed construction materials within the space have a surface flame-spread rating greater than 25.

ON Full: A section of a horizontal branch may be circuit vented provided,(a) a circuit vent is connected to it, (b) all fixtures served by the circuit vent are located in the same storey and located at the most distant upstream section of the horizontal branch, and (c) no soil or waste stack is connected to it upstream of a circuit vented fixture.
ON Variations: A section of a horizontal branch may be circuit vented provided,(a) a circuit vent is connected to it, (b) all fixtures served by the circuit vent are located in the same storey and located at the most distant upstream section of the horizontal branch, and (c) no soil or waste stack is connected to it upstream of a circuit vented fixture.

ON Full: OSB and waferboard cladding shall conform to CSA O437.0, "OSB and Waferboard".
ON Variations: OSB and waferboard cladding shall conform to CSA O437.0, "OSB and Waferboard".

ON Full: Wood screws specified in this Section shall conform to ANSI/ASME B18.6.1., "Wood Screws (Inch Series)". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Wood screws specified in this Section shall conform to ANSI/ASME B18.6.1., "Wood Screws (Inch Series)". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where a Class 5 sewage system is installed, a written agreement for the disposal of sanitary sewage from the sewage system shall be entered into with a hauled sewage system operator.
ON Variations: Where a Class 5 sewage system is installed, a written agreement for the disposal of sanitary sewage from the sewage system shall be entered into with a hauled sewage system operator.

ON Full: Table 4.3.12.A. does not apply to the storage of distilled beverage alcohol.
ON Variations: Table 4.3.12.A. does not apply to the storage of distilled beverage alcohol.

ON Full: Open flames shall not be used in a salvage yard, except for the purposes of heating, operating machinery or performing hot works.
ON Variations: Open flames shall not be used in a salvage yard, except for the purposes of heating, operating machinery or performing hot works.

ON Full: Glued-laminated members shall be fabricated in plants conforming to CSA O177, "Qualification Code for Manufacturers of Structural Glued-Laminated Timber".
ON Variations: Glued-laminated members shall be fabricated in plants conforming to CSA O177, "Qualification Code for Manufacturers of Structural Glued-Laminated Timber".

ON Full: Manual pull stations need not be installed in a rapid transit station.
ON Variations: Manual pull stations need not be installed in a rapid transit station.

ON Full: If a spillage occurs involving an underground storage tank, the escaped liquid and all soil contaminated by the spill shall be removed in accordance with Subsection 4.1.6.
ON Variations: If a spillage occurs involving an underground storage tank, the escaped liquid and all soil contaminated by the spill shall be removed in accordance with Subsection 4.1.6.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), all exposed or underground piping, valves, couplings, flanges and bolts that are fabricated of any ferrous substance shall be thoroughly coated with a rust-resistant compatible material.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), all exposed or underground piping, valves, couplings, flanges and bolts that are fabricated of any ferrous substance shall be thoroughly coated with a rust-resistant compatible material.

ON Full: Bonding wires for tank vehicles shall be provided with a pull-off connector attached so as to be in electrical contact with the cargo tank of the tank vehicle.
ON Variations: Bonding wires for tank vehicles shall be provided with a pull-off connector attached so as to be in electrical contact with the cargo tank of the tank vehicle.

ON Full: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred by water pressure as a result of displacement, such system shall not be used for liquids that are miscible in water.
ON Variations: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred by water pressure as a result of displacement, such system shall not be used for liquids that are miscible in water.

ON Full: Fabrics used as part of an awning, canopy or marquee that is located within or attached to a building of any type of construction shall conform to CAN/ULC-S109, "Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films".
ON Variations: Fabrics used as part of an awning, canopy or marquee that is located within or attached to a building of any type of construction shall conform to CAN/ULC-S109, "Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films".

ON Full: If there is a conflict between the requirements in this Section and other requirements in this Part, the requirements in this Section shall prevail.
ON Variations: If there is a conflict between the requirements in this Section and other requirements in this Part, the requirements in this Section shall prevail.

ON Full: Cables on the ground in areas used by the public in a tent shall be placed in trenches or protected by covers to prevent damage from traffic.
ON Variations: Cables on the ground in areas used by the public in a tent shall be placed in trenches or protected by covers to prevent damage from traffic.

ON Full: Every structure with a supplemental energy dissipation system and every portion thereof shall be designed and constructed in accordance with, (a) the loads and requirements prescribed in this Article and Article 4.1.8.22., (b) other applicable requirements of this Subsection, and (c) appropriate engineering principles and current engineering practice. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Every structure with a supplemental energy dissipation system and every portion thereof shall be designed and constructed in accordance with, (a) the loads and requirements prescribed in this Article and Article 4.1.8.22., (b) other applicable requirements of this Subsection, and (c) appropriate engineering principles and current engineering practice. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Every doorway that is located in a barrier-free path of travel shall have a clear width of not less than 860 mm when the door is in the open position. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Every doorway that is located in a barrier-free path of travel shall have a clear width of not less than 860 mm when the door is in the open position. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where test pressures exceed the design pressures for pumps or similar components included in the piping system being tested, such pumps or components shall be isolated from the remainder of the system.
ON Variations: Where test pressures exceed the design pressures for pumps or similar components included in the piping system being tested, such pumps or components shall be isolated from the remainder of the system.

ON Full: Except as provided by Sentences (2) to (5), major occupancies shall be separated from adjoining major occupancies by fire separations having fire-resistance ratings conforming to Table 3.1.3.1.
ON Variations: Except as provided by Sentences (2) to (5), major occupancies shall be separated from adjoining major occupancies by fire separations having fire-resistance ratings conforming to Table 3.1.3.1.

ON Full: The structural design of air barrier systems installed in assemblies subject to air pressure loads shall comply with Article 5.1.4.1. and Subsection 5.2.2.
ON Variations: The structural design of air barrier systems installed in assemblies subject to air pressure loads shall comply with Article 5.1.4.1. and Subsection 5.2.2.

ON Full: Where a pneumatic leakage test is performed on an underground storage tank, the tank shall be considered to be leaking when the test indicates a pressure drop within a 2 h period after steady temperature conditions have been established and the source of pressure has been removed.
ON Variations: Where a pneumatic leakage test is performed on an underground storage tank, the tank shall be considered to be leaking when the test indicates a pressure drop within a 2 h period after steady temperature conditions have been established and the source of pressure has been removed.
