ON Full: This Article does not apply to, (a) a building or part of a building of residential occupancy that is within the scope of Part 9 and is intended for occupancy on a continuing basis during the winter months, (b) a farm building, (c) a building that does not use electrical power or fossil fuel, (d) a manufactured building described in Article 9.1.1.9., or (e) a seasonal recreational building described in Section 9.36. or 9.38.
ON Variations: This Article does not apply to, (a) a building or part of a building of residential occupancy that is within the scope of Part 9 and is intended for occupancy on a continuing basis during the winter months, (b) a farm building, (c) a building that does not use electrical power or fossil fuel, (d) a manufactured building described in Article 9.1.1.9., or (e) a seasonal recreational building described in Section 9.36. or 9.38.

ON Full: Where equipment is provided to melt snow or ice on exterior passageways, exterior stairways and fire escapes in an occupied building, the equipment shall be maintained in working order or alternative measures shall be taken as specified in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Where equipment is provided to melt snow or ice on exterior passageways, exterior stairways and fire escapes in an occupied building, the equipment shall be maintained in working order or alternative measures shall be taken as specified in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 3.6.3.5., all commercial cooking equipment shall be provided with ventilation systems designed, constructed and installed to conform to NFPA 96, "Ventilation Control and Fire Protection of Commercial Cooking Operations".
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 3.6.3.5., all commercial cooking equipment shall be provided with ventilation systems designed, constructed and installed to conform to NFPA 96, "Ventilation Control and Fire Protection of Commercial Cooking Operations".

ON Full: Where the insulation effectively limits the passage of water vapour and is applied by a waterproof adhesive or by mortar directly to the masonry, the requirements for sheathing paper do not apply. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where the insulation effectively limits the passage of water vapour and is applied by a waterproof adhesive or by mortar directly to the masonry, the requirements for sheathing paper do not apply. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where a pump or siphon is required, the pump or siphon shall be designed to discharge a dose of at least 75% of the internal volume of the distribution pipe within a time period not exceeding fifteen minutes.
ON Variations: Where a pump or siphon is required, the pump or siphon shall be designed to discharge a dose of at least 75% of the internal volume of the distribution pipe within a time period not exceeding fifteen minutes.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), wind tunnel tests on scale models to determine wind loads on buildings shall be conducted in accordance with ASCE/SEI 49, "Wind Tunnel Testing for Buildings and Other Structures".
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), wind tunnel tests on scale models to determine wind loads on buildings shall be conducted in accordance with ASCE/SEI 49, "Wind Tunnel Testing for Buildings and Other Structures".

ON Full: Private sewers shall be designed and installed according to MOE PIBS 6879, "Design Guidelines for Sewage Works".
ON Variations: Private sewers shall be designed and installed according to MOE PIBS 6879, "Design Guidelines for Sewage Works".

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Articles 9.10.10.5. and 9.10.10.6., service rooms shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h when the floor area containing the service room is not sprinklered.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Articles 9.10.10.5. and 9.10.10.6., service rooms shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h when the floor area containing the service room is not sprinklered.

ON Full: Every public or service area in buildings, including a recreational camp and a camp for housing of workers, shall have lighting outlets with fixtures controlled by a wall switch or panel to illuminate such areas.
ON Variations: Every public or service area in buildings, including a recreational camp and a camp for housing of workers, shall have lighting outlets with fixtures controlled by a wall switch or panel to illuminate such areas.

ON Full: Air admittance valves shall conform to ASSE 1051, "Individual and Branch Type Air Admittance Valves for Sanitary Drainage Systems". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Air admittance valves shall conform to ASSE 1051, "Individual and Branch Type Air Admittance Valves for Sanitary Drainage Systems". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Exhaust outlets shall be designed to prevent back draft under wind conditions.
ON Variations: Exhaust outlets shall be designed to prevent back draft under wind conditions.

ON Full: Except as provided in this Subsection, the requirements of this Division apply to air-supported structures.
ON Variations: Except as provided in this Subsection, the requirements of this Division apply to air-supported structures.

ON Full: Exterior openings for outdoor air intakes and exhaust outlets shall be shielded from the entry of snow and rain and shall be fitted with corrosion-resistant screens of mesh having openings not larger than 15 mm, except where climatic conditions may require larger openings.
ON Variations: Exterior openings for outdoor air intakes and exhaust outlets shall be shielded from the entry of snow and rain and shall be fitted with corrosion-resistant screens of mesh having openings not larger than 15 mm, except where climatic conditions may require larger openings.

ON Full: Where a pipe carrying steam or hot water at a temperature above 120°C passes through a combustible floor, ceiling or wall, the construction shall be protected by a sleeve of metal or other noncombustible material not less than 50 mm larger in diameter than the pipe.
ON Variations: Where a pipe carrying steam or hot water at a temperature above 120°C passes through a combustible floor, ceiling or wall, the construction shall be protected by a sleeve of metal or other noncombustible material not less than 50 mm larger in diameter than the pipe.

ON Full: Every barrier-free path of travel less than 1 600 mm in width shall be provided with an unobstructed space not less than 1 800 mm in width and 1 800 mm in length located not more than 30 m apart. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Every barrier-free path of travel less than 1 600 mm in width shall be provided with an unobstructed space not less than 1 800 mm in width and 1 800 mm in length located not more than 30 m apart. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (3), underground storage tanks subject to vehicular traffic shall be installed not less than 1 m below finished ground level.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (3), underground storage tanks subject to vehicular traffic shall be installed not less than 1 m below finished ground level.

ON Full: Tents and air-supported structures shall be in conformance with the Building Code.
ON Variations: Tents and air-supported structures shall be in conformance with the Building Code.

ON Full: Quench tanks shall be located as far as practical from annealing, hardening and tempering furnaces.
ON Variations: Quench tanks shall be located as far as practical from annealing, hardening and tempering furnaces.

ON Full: Exhaust ducts directly connected to laundry drying equipment shall be independent of other exhaust ducts.
ON Variations: Exhaust ducts directly connected to laundry drying equipment shall be independent of other exhaust ducts.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (4), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.3. shall apply.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (4), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.3. shall apply.

ON Full: Oil or grease shall not be used for lubrication of hot work equipment.
ON Variations: Oil or grease shall not be used for lubrication of hot work equipment.

ON Full: In a building containing more than 1 major occupancy, where the aggregate area of all major occupancies in a particular group or division does not exceed 10% of the floor area on the storey on which they are located, they need not be considered as major occupancies for the purposes of Articles 9.10.2.3. and 9.10.8.1. provided they are not classified as Group F, Division 2 occupancies.
ON Variations: In a building containing more than 1 major occupancy, where the aggregate area of all major occupancies in a particular group or division does not exceed 10% of the floor area on the storey on which they are located, they need not be considered as major occupancies for the purposes of Articles 9.10.2.3. and 9.10.8.1. provided they are not classified as Group F, Division 2 occupancies.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to design and fire protection requirements for buildings or parts of buildings intended for the storage, handling, use and processing of, dangerous goods, materials that involve a risk of explosion or high flammability, and materials that are highly reactive.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to design and fire protection requirements for buildings or parts of buildings intended for the storage, handling, use and processing of, dangerous goods, materials that involve a risk of explosion or high flammability, and materials that are highly reactive.

ON Full: The area of an exposing building face shall be,(a) taken as the exterior wall area facing in one direction on any side of a building, and (b) calculated as, (i) the total area measured from the finished ground level to the uppermost ceiling, or (ii) the area for each fire compartment, where a building is divided into fire compartments by fire separations with fire-resistance ratings not less than 45 min.
ON Variations: The area of an exposing building face shall be,(a) taken as the exterior wall area facing in one direction on any side of a building, and (b) calculated as, (i) the total area measured from the finished ground level to the uppermost ceiling, or (ii) the area for each fire compartment, where a building is divided into fire compartments by fire separations with fire-resistance ratings not less than 45 min.

ON Full: Absorption trenches constructed as a shallow buried trench shall be,(a) approximately the same length and not more than 30 m in length, (b) not less than 300 mm and not more than 600 mm in width, (c) not less than 300 mm and not more than 600 mm in depth, (d) centred not less than 2 000 mm apart, (e) not less than 900 mm at all points on the bottom of the absorption trench above the high ground water table or rock, and (f) backfilled, after the installation of the distribution pipe with leaching bed fill, so as to ensure that after the leaching bed fill settles, the surface of the leaching bed will not form any depressions.
ON Variations: Absorption trenches constructed as a shallow buried trench shall be,(a) approximately the same length and not more than 30 m in length, (b) not less than 300 mm and not more than 600 mm in width, (c) not less than 300 mm and not more than 600 mm in depth, (d) centred not less than 2 000 mm apart, (e) not less than 900 mm at all points on the bottom of the absorption trench above the high ground water table or rock, and (f) backfilled, after the installation of the distribution pipe with leaching bed fill, so as to ensure that after the leaching bed fill settles, the surface of the leaching bed will not form any depressions.

ON Full: Public pools shall conform to the requirements of 3.11. and public spas shall conform to the requirements of Section 3.12.
ON Variations: Public pools shall conform to the requirements of 3.11. and public spas shall conform to the requirements of Section 3.12.

ON Full: A copy of the fire emergency procedures and other duties for supervisory staff as laid down in the fire safety plan shall be given to all supervisory staff.
ON Variations: A copy of the fire emergency procedures and other duties for supervisory staff as laid down in the fire safety plan shall be given to all supervisory staff.

ON Full: The ground surface between piles shall be kept free of combustible materials.
ON Variations: The ground surface between piles shall be kept free of combustible materials.

ON Full: Where a storage tank has been out of service for more than 12 months, the tank and piping shall be tested for leakage in conformance with Subsections 4.3.15. and 4.4.6.
ON Variations: Where a storage tank has been out of service for more than 12 months, the tank and piping shall be tested for leakage in conformance with Subsections 4.3.15. and 4.4.6.

ON Full: Except as provided by Sentences (2) to (4), an automatic sprinkler system shall be designed, constructed, installed and tested in conformance with NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided by Sentences (2) to (4), an automatic sprinkler system shall be designed, constructed, installed and tested in conformance with NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Each segment of a tie between elements that is required by Clause (6)(a) or (8)(b) shall be designed to carry by tension or compression a horizontal force at least equal to the greatest factored pile cap or column vertical load in the elements it connects, multiplied by a factor of 0.10 IEFaSa(0.2), unless it can be demonstrated that equivalent restraints can be provided by other means. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Each segment of a tie between elements that is required by Clause (6)(a) or (8)(b) shall be designed to carry by tension or compression a horizontal force at least equal to the greatest factored pile cap or column vertical load in the elements it connects, multiplied by a factor of 0.10 IEFaSa(0.2), unless it can be demonstrated that equivalent restraints can be provided by other means. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: In making a water test,(a) every opening except the highest shall be tightly closed with a testing plug or a test cap, and (b) the system or the section shall be kept filled with water for 15 min.
ON Variations: In making a water test,(a) every opening except the highest shall be tightly closed with a testing plug or a test cap, and (b) the system or the section shall be kept filled with water for 15 min.

ON Full: Other anchor systems may be used where such systems provide an equal level of safety.
ON Variations: Other anchor systems may be used where such systems provide an equal level of safety.

ON Full: This Article does not apply where the existing situation is approved and does not endanger life safety, or approved alternative measures to the requirements set out in this Article are taken to provide life safety.
ON Variations: This Article does not apply where the existing situation is approved and does not endanger life safety, or approved alternative measures to the requirements set out in this Article are taken to provide life safety.

ON Full: Where fire protection and life safety systems, and systems with fire protection and life safety functions, are integrated with each other, the systems shall be tested as a whole in accordance with CAN/ULC-S1001, "Integrated Systems Testing of Fire Protection and Life Safety Systems", to verify that the systems have been properly integrated. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where fire protection and life safety systems, and systems with fire protection and life safety functions, are integrated with each other, the systems shall be tested as a whole in accordance with CAN/ULC-S1001, "Integrated Systems Testing of Fire Protection and Life Safety Systems", to verify that the systems have been properly integrated. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where a covered mall is used for merchandising or public activities, the activities shall be arranged so that access to fire protection equipment, including sprinkler control valves, fire hose stations, portable extinguishers and fire alarm stations, is not restricted.
ON Variations: Where a covered mall is used for merchandising or public activities, the activities shall be arranged so that access to fire protection equipment, including sprinkler control valves, fire hose stations, portable extinguishers and fire alarm stations, is not restricted.

ON Full: Damage to underground storage tank shells shall not be repaired on site.
ON Variations: Damage to underground storage tank shells shall not be repaired on site.

ON Full: The storage site shall be well drained and be level, solid ground or paved with asphalt, concrete or other hard surface material.
ON Variations: The storage site shall be well drained and be level, solid ground or paved with asphalt, concrete or other hard surface material.

ON Full: The exposure factor for internal pressure, Cei, shall be determined as follows: (a) for buildings whose height is greater than 20 m and that have a dominant opening, Cei shall be equal to the exposure factor for external pressures, Ce, calculated at the mid-height of the dominant opening, and (b) for other buildings, Cei shall be the same as the exposure factor for external pressures, Ce, calculated for a reference height, h, equal to the mid-height of the building or 6 m, whichever is greater.
ON Variations: The exposure factor for internal pressure, Cei, shall be determined as follows: (a) for buildings whose height is greater than 20 m and that have a dominant opening, Cei shall be equal to the exposure factor for external pressures, Ce, calculated at the mid-height of the dominant opening, and (b) for other buildings, Cei shall be the same as the exposure factor for external pressures, Ce, calculated for a reference height, h, equal to the mid-height of the building or 6 m, whichever is greater.

ON Full: Provision shall be made to ensure adequate stability of the structure as a whole and adequate lateral, torsional and local stability of all structural parts.
ON Variations: Provision shall be made to ensure adequate stability of the structure as a whole and adequate lateral, torsional and local stability of all structural parts.

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 8.8.1.2., a Class 5 sewage system shall not be installed.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 8.8.1.2., a Class 5 sewage system shall not be installed.

ON Full: Where vibration effects, such as resonance and fatigue resulting from machinery and equipment, are likely to be significant, a dynamic analysis shall be carried out. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where vibration effects, such as resonance and fatigue resulting from machinery and equipment, are likely to be significant, a dynamic analysis shall be carried out. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as required in Article 9.9.10.1. and Sentence (3), the minimum window glass area for rooms in buildings of residential occupancy or rooms that are used for sleeping shall conform to Table 9.7.2.3.
ON Variations: Except as required in Article 9.9.10.1. and Sentence (3), the minimum window glass area for rooms in buildings of residential occupancy or rooms that are used for sleeping shall conform to Table 9.7.2.3.

ON Full: Elevator shafts are permitted to penetrate the fire separations required in Sentences (2) to (6) provided they are enclosed by, a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or wired glass assemblies conforming to MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings".
ON Variations: Elevator shafts are permitted to penetrate the fire separations required in Sentences (2) to (6) provided they are enclosed by, a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or wired glass assemblies conforming to MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings".

ON Full: Existing foundations may be used to support new or altered buildings provided they comply with all pertinent requirements of this Section.
ON Variations: Existing foundations may be used to support new or altered buildings provided they comply with all pertinent requirements of this Section.

ON Full: Fasteners referred to in Sentences (1) and (2) shall be located 25 mm to 40 mm from each end of each strip shingle with other fasteners equally spaced between them.
ON Variations: Fasteners referred to in Sentences (1) and (2) shall be located 25 mm to 40 mm from each end of each strip shingle with other fasteners equally spaced between them.

ON Full: Where a stone layer is used, the effluent shall be evenly distributed within the stone layer to within 600 mm of the perimeter of the stone layer. (See Appendix A.) (8.1) Where leaching chambers are used, the effluent shall be evenly distributed within the area over which the leaching chambers are spaced to within 600 mm of the perimeter of that area.
ON Variations: Where a stone layer is used, the effluent shall be evenly distributed within the stone layer to within 600 mm of the perimeter of the stone layer. (See Appendix A.) (8.1) Where leaching chambers are used, the effluent shall be evenly distributed within the area over which the leaching chambers are spaced to within 600 mm of the perimeter of that area.

ON Full: The design temperature and design pressure of a CPVC piping system shall conform to Table 7.2.5.9.
ON Variations: The design temperature and design pressure of a CPVC piping system shall conform to Table 7.2.5.9.

ON Full: Where a coating is applied to gypsum board to function as the vapour barrier, the permeance of the coating shall be determined in accordance with CAN/CGSB-1.501-M, "Method for Permeance of Coated Wallboard".
ON Variations: Where a coating is applied to gypsum board to function as the vapour barrier, the permeance of the coating shall be determined in accordance with CAN/CGSB-1.501-M, "Method for Permeance of Coated Wallboard".

ON Full: The wall described in Sentence (1) shall provide continuous protection from the top of the footings to the underside of the roof deck.
ON Variations: The wall described in Sentence (1) shall provide continuous protection from the top of the footings to the underside of the roof deck.

ON Full: The fire-resistance rating of the fire separation required by Sentence (2) is permitted to be less than 1 h but not less than 45 min provided the fire-resistance rating required by Subsection 3.2.2. is permitted to be less than 1 h for, the floor assembly above the floor area, or the floor assembly below the floor area, if there is no floor assembly above.
ON Variations: The fire-resistance rating of the fire separation required by Sentence (2) is permitted to be less than 1 h but not less than 45 min provided the fire-resistance rating required by Subsection 3.2.2. is permitted to be less than 1 h for, the floor assembly above the floor area, or the floor assembly below the floor area, if there is no floor assembly above.

ON Full: Conductors leading from a distribution panel referred to in Sentence (8) to emergency lighting units in the same storey need not conform to Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Conductors leading from a distribution panel referred to in Sentence (8) to emergency lighting units in the same storey need not conform to Sentence (2).

ON Full: The cumulative width of openings in non-loadbearing flat insulating concrete form walls shall be not more than 70% of the length of any wall.
ON Variations: The cumulative width of openings in non-loadbearing flat insulating concrete form walls shall be not more than 70% of the length of any wall.

ON Full: Framing above doors with steel door frames in non-loadbearing fire separations required to have a fire-resistance rating shall consist of two runners on the flat fastened back to back. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Framing above doors with steel door frames in non-loadbearing fire separations required to have a fire-resistance rating shall consist of two runners on the flat fastened back to back. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Spans for roof ridge beams shall conform to the spans in Table A-12 for the uniform snow load shown.
ON Variations: Spans for roof ridge beams shall conform to the spans in Table A-12 for the uniform snow load shown.

ON Full: Except as required by Article 3.2.7.7., an emergency electrical power system for emergency equipment required by this Part for health care facilities shall be installed in conformance with CSA Z32, "Electrical Safety and Essential Electrical Systems in Health Care Facilities". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as required by Article 3.2.7.7., an emergency electrical power system for emergency equipment required by this Part for health care facilities shall be installed in conformance with CSA Z32, "Electrical Safety and Essential Electrical Systems in Health Care Facilities". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A building that is not sprinklered shall be designed in accordance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-4, "Measures for Fire Safety in High Buildings", to limit the danger to occupants and firefighters from exposure to smoke in a building fire.
ON Variations: A building that is not sprinklered shall be designed in accordance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-4, "Measures for Fire Safety in High Buildings", to limit the danger to occupants and firefighters from exposure to smoke in a building fire.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), framing members shall be connected by gusset plates or nailing at the peak in conformance with Table 9.23.3.4.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), framing members shall be connected by gusset plates or nailing at the peak in conformance with Table 9.23.3.4.

ON Full: Where a stair, ramp or landing forms part of an exit, the appropriate requirements in Sections 9.9. and 9.10. shall also apply.
ON Variations: Where a stair, ramp or landing forms part of an exit, the appropriate requirements in Sections 9.9. and 9.10. shall also apply.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.11.6.1.(7) for a modified pool, all fittings below the water surface that provide suction or gravity flow in a public pool shall, be provided with a minimum of two suction or gravity outlets interconnected to a full size manifold, and be separated by a clear distance of not less than 1 200 mm.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.11.6.1.(7) for a modified pool, all fittings below the water surface that provide suction or gravity flow in a public pool shall, be provided with a minimum of two suction or gravity outlets interconnected to a full size manifold, and be separated by a clear distance of not less than 1 200 mm.

ON Full: For the design of buildings with a height, H, that is less than or equal to 20 m and less than the smaller plan dimension, the values of the product of the pressure coefficient and gust factor, CpCg, provided in Sentences (2) to (9) are permitted to be used.
ON Variations: For the design of buildings with a height, H, that is less than or equal to 20 m and less than the smaller plan dimension, the values of the product of the pressure coefficient and gust factor, CpCg, provided in Sentences (2) to (9) are permitted to be used.

ON Full: In clay-type soils subject to significant movement with a change in soil moisture content, the foundation depth of carports or garages connected to a house or an individual dwelling unit directly or by a breezeway shall be approximately the same depth as the foundation of the main building.
ON Variations: In clay-type soils subject to significant movement with a change in soil moisture content, the foundation depth of carports or garages connected to a house or an individual dwelling unit directly or by a breezeway shall be approximately the same depth as the foundation of the main building.

ON Full: The cavities or air spaces described in Sentence (1) shall include those above lintels over window and door openings required to be flashed in conformance with Article 9.20.13.3.
ON Variations: The cavities or air spaces described in Sentence (1) shall include those above lintels over window and door openings required to be flashed in conformance with Article 9.20.13.3.

ON Full: Cellulose nitrate motion picture film shall not be used, stored or handled in a place of public assembly.
ON Variations: Cellulose nitrate motion picture film shall not be used, stored or handled in a place of public assembly.

ON Full: Where a building is refurbished or redecorated, interior finish materials used shall be in conformance with the Building Code.
ON Variations: Where a building is refurbished or redecorated, interior finish materials used shall be in conformance with the Building Code.

ON Full: Where industrial process waste water is treated to the contaminant levels found in domestic sanitary sewage, it may discharge to a leaching bed provided the treatment unit and sewage system are designed in accordance with good engineering practice. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where industrial process waste water is treated to the contaminant levels found in domestic sanitary sewage, it may discharge to a leaching bed provided the treatment unit and sewage system are designed in accordance with good engineering practice. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The requirements in Sentence (1) are waived in a building, reserved that has an aggregate area for all storeys of not more than 2 000 m2, and that is not more than 3 storeys in building height.
ON Variations: The requirements in Sentence (1) are waived in a building, reserved that has an aggregate area for all storeys of not more than 2 000 m2, and that is not more than 3 storeys in building height.

ON Full: Supports, foundations and anchorage of storage tanks shall comply with Subsection 4.3.3., except that timber supports shall be permitted.
ON Variations: Supports, foundations and anchorage of storage tanks shall comply with Subsection 4.3.3., except that timber supports shall be permitted.

ON Full: Combustible materials, other than those used for the packaging of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, shall not be stored in the same individual storage area with such liquids.
ON Variations: Combustible materials, other than those used for the packaging of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, shall not be stored in the same individual storage area with such liquids.

ON Full: Unit masonry walls that are to be waterproofed shall be parged on exterior surfaces below ground level with not less than 6 mm of mortar conforming to Section 9.20. coved over the footing.
ON Variations: Unit masonry walls that are to be waterproofed shall be parged on exterior surfaces below ground level with not less than 6 mm of mortar conforming to Section 9.20. coved over the footing.

ON Full: A building control valve shall be provided,(a) on every water service pipe at the location where the water service pipe enters the building, or (b) on the water distribution system at a location immediately downstream of the point of entry treatment unit, where the building is served by a point of entry treatment unit located in the building.
ON Variations: A building control valve shall be provided,(a) on every water service pipe at the location where the water service pipe enters the building, or (b) on the water distribution system at a location immediately downstream of the point of entry treatment unit, where the building is served by a point of entry treatment unit located in the building.

ON Full: Individual storage areas of bagged ammonium nitrate shall not exceed 1500 m2 in area and 9 m in height.
ON Variations: Individual storage areas of bagged ammonium nitrate shall not exceed 1500 m2 in area and 9 m in height.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences 8.2.1.4.(1) and (2), the centreline of a distribution pipe or leaching chamber shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.B. and these distances shall be increased when required by Sentence 8.7.4.2.(11).
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 8.2.1.4.(1) and (2), the centreline of a distribution pipe or leaching chamber shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.B. and these distances shall be increased when required by Sentence 8.7.4.2.(11).

ON Full: A structure that cannot be identified with the characteristics of a building in Articles 3.2.2.20. to 3.2.2.83. shall be protected against fire spread and collapse in conformance with good fire protection engineering practice. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A structure that cannot be identified with the characteristics of a building in Articles 3.2.2.20. to 3.2.2.83. shall be protected against fire spread and collapse in conformance with good fire protection engineering practice. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The area described in Sentence 8.7.4.2.(1) shall be designed such that the loading rate does not exceed, for soil having a percolation time set out in Column 1 of Table 8.7.4.1., the maximum value set out opposite it in Column 2 of Table 8.7.4.1.
ON Variations: The area described in Sentence 8.7.4.2.(1) shall be designed such that the loading rate does not exceed, for soil having a percolation time set out in Column 1 of Table 8.7.4.1., the maximum value set out opposite it in Column 2 of Table 8.7.4.1.

ON Full: Facilities to control possible spills of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be provided at loading and unloading points in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
ON Variations: Facilities to control possible spills of flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be provided at loading and unloading points in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.

ON Full: A relief valve with a slightly higher setting than the pressure required in Sentence (2) shall be provided on the downstream side of the regulator or on the tank.
ON Variations: A relief valve with a slightly higher setting than the pressure required in Sentence (2) shall be provided on the downstream side of the regulator or on the tank.

ON Full: One 75 m length of 65 mm hose and two portable extinguishers having a 2A or higher rating and conforming to Section 6.2 shall be installed in each hose house or cabinet.
ON Variations: One 75 m length of 65 mm hose and two portable extinguishers having a 2A or higher rating and conforming to Section 6.2 shall be installed in each hose house or cabinet.

ON Full: Roof and ceiling framing members shall be doubled on each side of openings greater than two rafter or joist spacings wide.
ON Variations: Roof and ceiling framing members shall be doubled on each side of openings greater than two rafter or joist spacings wide.

ON Full: Adequate access for fire fighting purposes shall be provided and maintained to all portions of the premises, in conformance with Sentences (2) to (6).
ON Variations: Adequate access for fire fighting purposes shall be provided and maintained to all portions of the premises, in conformance with Sentences (2) to (6).

ON Full: Spark arresters installed in conformance with Article 2.6.3.1. shall be inspected and cleaned at intervals not greater than 12 months or more frequently where accumulations of debris will adversely affect operations.
ON Variations: Spark arresters installed in conformance with Article 2.6.3.1. shall be inspected and cleaned at intervals not greater than 12 months or more frequently where accumulations of debris will adversely affect operations.

ON Full: The tires and shredded tires shall be stored in a group of no more than 16 individual storage piles.
ON Variations: The tires and shredded tires shall be stored in a group of no more than 16 individual storage piles.

ON Full: In a storage area with an aggregate volume of piles of stored matches that exceeds 3 m3, shipping cartons containing matches shall be arranged in piles not exceeding 3 m in height or 40 m3 in volume, with each pile separated by aisles at least 2.4 m wide.
ON Variations: In a storage area with an aggregate volume of piles of stored matches that exceeds 3 m3, shipping cartons containing matches shall be arranged in piles not exceeding 3 m in height or 40 m3 in volume, with each pile separated by aisles at least 2.4 m wide.

ON Full: Electrostatic spraying shall have an exhaust air velocity of at least 18 m/min at any opening in a spray booth.
ON Variations: Electrostatic spraying shall have an exhaust air velocity of at least 18 m/min at any opening in a spray booth.

ON Full: Identification tags or labels of metal or other material impervious to water and to the flammable liquids or combustible liquids being transferred shall be attached to and maintained on all pipelines and control valves to designate their use.
ON Variations: Identification tags or labels of metal or other material impervious to water and to the flammable liquids or combustible liquids being transferred shall be attached to and maintained on all pipelines and control valves to designate their use.

ON Full: Except when in use or being inspected in accordance with Sentence (2), hydrants shall be equipped with port caps that are secured wrench-tight.
ON Variations: Except when in use or being inspected in accordance with Sentence (2), hydrants shall be equipped with port caps that are secured wrench-tight.

ON Full: The fire separation referred to in Sentence (1) shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h, where, (a) the building is not more than one storey in building height, (b) the building is operated as a single suite, and (c) the only occupancy other than the repair garage is a mercantile occupancy.
ON Variations: The fire separation referred to in Sentence (1) shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h, where, (a) the building is not more than one storey in building height, (b) the building is operated as a single suite, and (c) the only occupancy other than the repair garage is a mercantile occupancy.

ON Full: Where 2 or more pumps are employed within a dosing tank, the pumps shall be designed such that the pumps alternate dosing, and dosing shall continue in the event that one pump fails.
ON Variations: Where 2 or more pumps are employed within a dosing tank, the pumps shall be designed such that the pumps alternate dosing, and dosing shall continue in the event that one pump fails.

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (2), before demolition of a building or part of a building is commenced, building services other than water supply for fire fighting shall be terminated at a point located outside the building or part under demolition.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (2), before demolition of a building or part of a building is commenced, building services other than water supply for fire fighting shall be terminated at a point located outside the building or part under demolition.

ON Full: The provisions of Sentence (1) apply whether or not the surface is provided with a means of drainage, such as rainwater leaders.
ON Variations: The provisions of Sentence (1) apply whether or not the surface is provided with a means of drainage, such as rainwater leaders.

ON Full: Every vent pipe that serves an oil or grease interceptor and is located outside a building shall be not less than 3 in. in size in areas where it may be subject to frost closure.
ON Variations: Every vent pipe that serves an oil or grease interceptor and is located outside a building shall be not less than 3 in. in size in areas where it may be subject to frost closure.

ON Full: A system capable of deactivating the wave-making equipment shall be installed with readily accessible push buttons located on the pool deck not more than 30 m apart, adjacent to each side and the deep end of the pool.
ON Variations: A system capable of deactivating the wave-making equipment shall be installed with readily accessible push buttons located on the pool deck not more than 30 m apart, adjacent to each side and the deep end of the pool.

ON Full: Sprinklers in elevator machine rooms shall have a temperature rating not less than that required for an intermediate temperature classification and shall be protected against physical damage. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Sprinklers in elevator machine rooms shall have a temperature rating not less than that required for an intermediate temperature classification and shall be protected against physical damage. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: In applying Table 9.32.3.4.B.,(a) where there is more than one exhaust air inlet duct connected directly to the fan, the diameter of the inlet ducts may be decreased by 25 mm, and (b) where the exhaust duct is connected to the duct system of a forced air heating system, the duct diameter shall be increased by 25 mm.
ON Variations: In applying Table 9.32.3.4.B.,(a) where there is more than one exhaust air inlet duct connected directly to the fan, the diameter of the inlet ducts may be decreased by 25 mm, and (b) where the exhaust duct is connected to the duct system of a forced air heating system, the duct diameter shall be increased by 25 mm.

ON Full: Signs indicating the location of valves used for the operation of fire protection equipment and manual emergency shut-off valves shall be posted in conspicuous locations.
ON Variations: Signs indicating the location of valves used for the operation of fire protection equipment and manual emergency shut-off valves shall be posted in conspicuous locations.

ON Full: An exit, a public corridor, a corridor providing access to exit for the public, a corridor serving patients or residents in a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, a corridor serving classrooms, an electrical equipment room, a transformer vault and a hoistway pit shall be equipped to provide illumination to an average level not less than 50 lx at floor or tread level and at all points such as angles and intersections at changes of level where there are stairs or ramps.
ON Variations: An exit, a public corridor, a corridor providing access to exit for the public, a corridor serving patients or residents in a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, a corridor serving classrooms, an electrical equipment room, a transformer vault and a hoistway pit shall be equipped to provide illumination to an average level not less than 50 lx at floor or tread level and at all points such as angles and intersections at changes of level where there are stairs or ramps.

ON Full: Overspray collection filters shall be readily removable or accessible for cleaning or replacement.
ON Variations: Overspray collection filters shall be readily removable or accessible for cleaning or replacement.

ON Full: Spray booths and spray rooms shall have walls and ceilings that consist of steel frames covered with sheet steel having a minimum thickness of 1.14 mm or be of equivalent noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Spray booths and spray rooms shall have walls and ceilings that consist of steel frames covered with sheet steel having a minimum thickness of 1.14 mm or be of equivalent noncombustible construction.

ON Full: The minimum clear width of each aisle shall be measured at the point in the aisle furthest from, an egress doorway referred to in Clause (15)(a), an exit referred to in Clause (15)(b), or an exit referred to in Sentence (16).
ON Variations: The minimum clear width of each aisle shall be measured at the point in the aisle furthest from, an egress doorway referred to in Clause (15)(a), an exit referred to in Clause (15)(b), or an exit referred to in Sentence (16).

ON Full: The roof of a building located in a salvage yard shall not be used for storage purposes.
ON Variations: The roof of a building located in a salvage yard shall not be used for storage purposes.

ON Full: At least 90% of the total wall surface in any unsprinklered public corridor shall have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 75, or at least 90% of the upper half of such walls shall have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 25.
ON Variations: At least 90% of the total wall surface in any unsprinklered public corridor shall have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 75, or at least 90% of the upper half of such walls shall have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 25.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to bowling alleys.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to bowling alleys.

ON Full: Cylinders containing compressed gas which are in storage shall be protected against valve damage.
ON Variations: Cylinders containing compressed gas which are in storage shall be protected against valve damage.

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting a fire separation shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the fire separation.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting a fire separation shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the fire separation.

ON Full: The clear width may be less than that required by Sentences (2) and (3) if an alternative means of egress is adjacent to and plainly visible from the restricted egress.
ON Variations: The clear width may be less than that required by Sentences (2) and (3) if an alternative means of egress is adjacent to and plainly visible from the restricted egress.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (19), all fittings at or below the water surface that allow water and/or air to be passed to or from the public pool shall, have a maximum opening of 7 mm in one direction, and be securely held in place by corrosion resistance fastening that require a tool for removal and are galvanically compatible with the fittings and grilles or covers.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (19), all fittings at or below the water surface that allow water and/or air to be passed to or from the public pool shall, have a maximum opening of 7 mm in one direction, and be securely held in place by corrosion resistance fastening that require a tool for removal and are galvanically compatible with the fittings and grilles or covers.

ON Full: Nails used for roofing shall be corrosion-resistant roofing or shingle nails conforming to,(a) ASTM F1667, "Driven Fasteners: Nails, Spikes, and Staples", or (b) CSA B111, "Wire Nails, Spikes and Staples".
ON Variations: Nails used for roofing shall be corrosion-resistant roofing or shingle nails conforming to,(a) ASTM F1667, "Driven Fasteners: Nails, Spikes, and Staples", or (b) CSA B111, "Wire Nails, Spikes and Staples".

ON Full: Underground storage tanks shall be lowered into the excavation by the use of lifting lugs and hooks and, where necessary, spreader bars to prevent damage to the tank shell, protective coating, fittings or anodes.
ON Variations: Underground storage tanks shall be lowered into the excavation by the use of lifting lugs and hooks and, where necessary, spreader bars to prevent damage to the tank shell, protective coating, fittings or anodes.

ON Full: Where more than one urinal is provided in a washroom described in Sentence 3.8.2.3.(3) or (4), at least one urinal shall, be mounted with the rim located not more than 430 mm above the finished floor, have a clear floor space at least 800 mm wide that is perpendicular to, and centred on, the urinal and is unobstructed by privacy screens, and have no step in front of it.
ON Variations: Where more than one urinal is provided in a washroom described in Sentence 3.8.2.3.(3) or (4), at least one urinal shall, be mounted with the rim located not more than 430 mm above the finished floor, have a clear floor space at least 800 mm wide that is perpendicular to, and centred on, the urinal and is unobstructed by privacy screens, and have no step in front of it.

ON Full: Cold joints in flat insulating concrete form foundation walls shall be reinforced with at least one 15M bar spaced not more than 600 mm o.c. and embedded not less than 300 mm on both sides of the joint.
ON Variations: Cold joints in flat insulating concrete form foundation walls shall be reinforced with at least one 15M bar spaced not more than 600 mm o.c. and embedded not less than 300 mm on both sides of the joint.

ON Full: Separators shall be used to prevent tramp iron or other spark-producing materials from being introduced into the powders being applied.
ON Variations: Separators shall be used to prevent tramp iron or other spark-producing materials from being introduced into the powders being applied.

ON Full: A cleanout shall be provided to permit the cleaning of the piping immediately downstream of an interceptor.
ON Variations: A cleanout shall be provided to permit the cleaning of the piping immediately downstream of an interceptor.

ON Full: Signs prohibiting smoking that conform to Article 2.4.3.2. shall be posted at the outer limits of the work area.
ON Variations: Signs prohibiting smoking that conform to Article 2.4.3.2. shall be posted at the outer limits of the work area.

ON Full: Despite Sentence (1), merchandising or public activities or both may be carried on within the 9 m width where they are approved and they do not endanger life safety or alternative measures are taken to provide life safety.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence (1), merchandising or public activities or both may be carried on within the 9 m width where they are approved and they do not endanger life safety or alternative measures are taken to provide life safety.

ON Full: Natural or mechanical ventilation shall be provided for all areas where alcohol vapours are released from storage tanks or process equipment under normal operating conditions, to prevent the concentration of vapours from exceeding 25% of the lower explosive limit, measured 1.5 m from any equipment or from any opening subject to vapour release.
ON Variations: Natural or mechanical ventilation shall be provided for all areas where alcohol vapours are released from storage tanks or process equipment under normal operating conditions, to prevent the concentration of vapours from exceeding 25% of the lower explosive limit, measured 1.5 m from any equipment or from any opening subject to vapour release.

ON Full: The thickness of loadbearing interior walls shall be determined on the basis of the maximum lateral support spacing as provided in Sentences 9.20.10.1.(2) and (3).
ON Variations: The thickness of loadbearing interior walls shall be determined on the basis of the maximum lateral support spacing as provided in Sentences 9.20.10.1.(2) and (3).

ON Full: Copper pipe shall conform to ASTM B42, "Seamless Copper Pipe, Standard Sizes".
ON Variations: Copper pipe shall conform to ASTM B42, "Seamless Copper Pipe, Standard Sizes".

ON Full: Organic peroxide pressure tank inserts shall be constructed of stainless steel, polyethylene or a material that is equally inert to organic peroxide.
ON Variations: Organic peroxide pressure tank inserts shall be constructed of stainless steel, polyethylene or a material that is equally inert to organic peroxide.

ON Full: For a parking lot that is part of a restaurant where patrons are intended to eat in vehicles parked on the lot, the number of water closets required shall conform to, Table 3.7.4.3.G. where food service by employees is not provided on the parking lot, or Table 3.7.4.3.H. where employees serve food on the parking lot.
ON Variations: For a parking lot that is part of a restaurant where patrons are intended to eat in vehicles parked on the lot, the number of water closets required shall conform to, Table 3.7.4.3.G. where food service by employees is not provided on the parking lot, or Table 3.7.4.3.H. where employees serve food on the parking lot.

ON Full: Shut-off valves shall be installed in every suite in a building of residential occupancy as may be necessary to ensure that when the supply to one suite is shut off the supply to the remainder of the building is not interrupted. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Shut-off valves shall be installed in every suite in a building of residential occupancy as may be necessary to ensure that when the supply to one suite is shut off the supply to the remainder of the building is not interrupted. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The width of a converging aisle shall be not less than the required width of the widest aisle plus 50% of the total required width of the remaining aisles that it serves.
ON Variations: The width of a converging aisle shall be not less than the required width of the widest aisle plus 50% of the total required width of the remaining aisles that it serves.

ON Full: Spraying operations involving the use of organic peroxides and other dual component coatings shall be conducted in sprinklered spray booths as described in Sentence 5.12.8.2.(1).
ON Variations: Spraying operations involving the use of organic peroxides and other dual component coatings shall be conducted in sprinklered spray booths as described in Sentence 5.12.8.2.(1).

ON Full: If a demolition involves a building that is required to have a fire safety plan that complies with Section 2.8, the fire safety plan shall take into account changes to the building arising from the demolition in accordance with Sentences 2.8.2.1.(4) and (5).
ON Variations: If a demolition involves a building that is required to have a fire safety plan that complies with Section 2.8, the fire safety plan shall take into account changes to the building arising from the demolition in accordance with Sentences 2.8.2.1.(4) and (5).

ON Full: Stainless steel threaded fittings shall be made of a material that matches the grade of the pipe material used.
ON Variations: Stainless steel threaded fittings shall be made of a material that matches the grade of the pipe material used.

ON Full: Brass floor flanges shall be certified to CSA B158.1, "Cast Brass Solder Joint Drainage, Waste and Vent Fittings".
ON Variations: Brass floor flanges shall be certified to CSA B158.1, "Cast Brass Solder Joint Drainage, Waste and Vent Fittings".

ON Full: Steel angle lintels supporting masonry shall be primed or painted or otherwise protected from corrosion.
ON Variations: Steel angle lintels supporting masonry shall be primed or painted or otherwise protected from corrosion.

ON Full: Except as otherwise required by this Section, aisles shall be provided in conformance with the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.
ON Variations: Except as otherwise required by this Section, aisles shall be provided in conformance with the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.

ON Full: In calculating the required width of egress routes, one escalator at each level in a rapid transit station is deemed to be out of service and not available for egress purposes.
ON Variations: In calculating the required width of egress routes, one escalator at each level in a rapid transit station is deemed to be out of service and not available for egress purposes.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), every walkway or platform level shall be provided with no fewer than two exits conforming to Section 3.4.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), every walkway or platform level shall be provided with no fewer than two exits conforming to Section 3.4.

ON Full: In a child care facility the maximum number of children per water closet and lavatory shall conform to Table 3.7.4.3.I.
ON Variations: In a child care facility the maximum number of children per water closet and lavatory shall conform to Table 3.7.4.3.I.

ON Full: Gravity tank expansion joints shall be repacked and adjusted if binding or leaks develop.
ON Variations: Gravity tank expansion joints shall be repacked and adjusted if binding or leaks develop.

ON Full: The inspections and tests established under Sentence (3) shall be implemented.
ON Variations: The inspections and tests established under Sentence (3) shall be implemented.

ON Full: Smoke alarms required in suites in a retirement home or smoke detectors permitted to be installed in lieu of smoke alarms as provided in Sentence (6) shall upon actuation provide an audible and visual signal to staff serving those suites, so that the suite containing the actuated smoke alarm or smoke detector can be easily identified.
ON Variations: Smoke alarms required in suites in a retirement home or smoke detectors permitted to be installed in lieu of smoke alarms as provided in Sentence (6) shall upon actuation provide an audible and visual signal to staff serving those suites, so that the suite containing the actuated smoke alarm or smoke detector can be easily identified.

ON Full: The depth of the water in any portion of a modified pool shall not be more than 1 800 mm.
ON Variations: The depth of the water in any portion of a modified pool shall not be more than 1 800 mm.

ON Full: Combustible plumbing fixtures are permitted in a building required to be of noncombustible construction if they are constructed of material having a flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification permitted in Subsection 3.1.13.
ON Variations: Combustible plumbing fixtures are permitted in a building required to be of noncombustible construction if they are constructed of material having a flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification permitted in Subsection 3.1.13.

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 9.8.4.5A., required exit stairs and public stairs serving buildings of other than residential occupancy shall have a width of not less than the greater of, (a) 900 mm, or (b) 8 mm per person based on the occupant load limits specified in Table 3.1.17.1.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 9.8.4.5A., required exit stairs and public stairs serving buildings of other than residential occupancy shall have a width of not less than the greater of, (a) 900 mm, or (b) 8 mm per person based on the occupant load limits specified in Table 3.1.17.1.

ON Full: For the purpose of applying this Code, a building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy by the Chief Fire Official in conformance with the Building Code.
ON Variations: For the purpose of applying this Code, a building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy by the Chief Fire Official in conformance with the Building Code.

ON Full: The requirements in this Subsection apply to a shelf and rack storage system intended for the storage of Group A, B and C plastics and rubber tires as defined in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems".
ON Variations: The requirements in this Subsection apply to a shelf and rack storage system intended for the storage of Group A, B and C plastics and rubber tires as defined in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems".

ON Full: Butt fusion fittings for polyethylene pipe shall conform to ASTM D3261, "Butt Heat Fusion Polyethylene (PE) Plastic Fittings for Polyethylene (PE) Plastic Pipe and Tubing".
ON Variations: Butt fusion fittings for polyethylene pipe shall conform to ASTM D3261, "Butt Heat Fusion Polyethylene (PE) Plastic Fittings for Polyethylene (PE) Plastic Pipe and Tubing".

ON Full: The performance level of an existing building is reduced where proposed construction will increase the occupant load by 15% or less and the new occupant load will be more than 15% above the occupant load for which a fire alarm system is required under Sentence 3.2.4.1.(2).
ON Variations: The performance level of an existing building is reduced where proposed construction will increase the occupant load by 15% or less and the new occupant load will be more than 15% above the occupant load for which a fire alarm system is required under Sentence 3.2.4.1.(2).

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (5), the wind uplift resistance of membrane roofing assemblies shall be determined in accordance with the requirements of CSA A123.21, "Dynamic Wind Uplift Resistance of Membrane-Roofing Systems". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (5), the wind uplift resistance of membrane roofing assemblies shall be determined in accordance with the requirements of CSA A123.21, "Dynamic Wind Uplift Resistance of Membrane-Roofing Systems". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Despite Subsections 11.3.1. to 11.3.3., when an existing building is extended or subject to material alteration or repair, Part 7 applies,(a) to the design and construction of plumbing in the extensions and those parts of the building subject to material alteration and repair, and (b) to plumbing which is adversely affected by the extension, alteration or repair.
ON Variations: Despite Subsections 11.3.1. to 11.3.3., when an existing building is extended or subject to material alteration or repair, Part 7 applies,(a) to the design and construction of plumbing in the extensions and those parts of the building subject to material alteration and repair, and (b) to plumbing which is adversely affected by the extension, alteration or repair.

ON Full: Where a fire-resistance rating or a fire-protection rating is required in this Section for an element of a building, such rating shall be determined in conformance with the test methods described in Part 3, or in accordance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", or MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-3, "Fire and Sound Resistance of Building Assemblies". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where a fire-resistance rating or a fire-protection rating is required in this Section for an element of a building, such rating shall be determined in conformance with the test methods described in Part 3, or in accordance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", or MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-3, "Fire and Sound Resistance of Building Assemblies". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where pockets for the support of beams or joists are formed in a masonry or concrete fire separation, the remaining total thickness of solid masonry and/or grout and/or concrete shall be not less than the required equivalent thickness shown for Type S monolithic concrete in Table 2.1.1. of MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", for the required fire-resistance rating.
ON Variations: Where pockets for the support of beams or joists are formed in a masonry or concrete fire separation, the remaining total thickness of solid masonry and/or grout and/or concrete shall be not less than the required equivalent thickness shown for Type S monolithic concrete in Table 2.1.1. of MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", for the required fire-resistance rating.

ON Full: Where storage areas are fenced or otherwise enclosed, gateways having a clear width of at least 3.5 m shall be provided to permit entry of fire department vehicles.
ON Variations: Where storage areas are fenced or otherwise enclosed, gateways having a clear width of at least 3.5 m shall be provided to permit entry of fire department vehicles.

ON Full: No paint, varnish or other coating shall be applied on the lead until after the joint has been tested.
ON Variations: No paint, varnish or other coating shall be applied on the lead until after the joint has been tested.

ON Full: A shallow buried trench shall not be constructed unless the soil or leaching bed fill is sufficiently dry to resist compaction and smearing during excavation.
ON Variations: A shallow buried trench shall not be constructed unless the soil or leaching bed fill is sufficiently dry to resist compaction and smearing during excavation.

ON Full: For flat insulating concrete form walls described in Clause 9.15.1.1.(1)(c) or 9.20.1.1.(1)(b), the concrete and reinforcing shall comply with Part 4 or,(a) the concrete shall conform to CSA A23.1, "Concrete Materials and Methods of Concrete Construction", with a maximum aggregate size of 19 mm, and (b) the reinforcing shall, (i) conform to CSA G30.18, "Carbon Steel Bars for Concrete Reinforcement", (ii) have a minimum specified yield strength of 400 MPa, and (iii) be lapped a minimum of 450 mm for 10M bars and 650 mm for 15M bars.
ON Variations: For flat insulating concrete form walls described in Clause 9.15.1.1.(1)(c) or 9.20.1.1.(1)(b), the concrete and reinforcing shall comply with Part 4 or,(a) the concrete shall conform to CSA A23.1, "Concrete Materials and Methods of Concrete Construction", with a maximum aggregate size of 19 mm, and (b) the reinforcing shall, (i) conform to CSA G30.18, "Carbon Steel Bars for Concrete Reinforcement", (ii) have a minimum specified yield strength of 400 MPa, and (iii) be lapped a minimum of 450 mm for 10M bars and 650 mm for 15M bars.

ON Full: Where a fuel-burning appliance is installed in a service room that is not in a suite of residential occupancy, a carbon monoxide alarm shall be installed,(a) adjacent to each sleeping area in every suite of residential occupancy that is adjacent to the service room, and (b) in the service room.
ON Variations: Where a fuel-burning appliance is installed in a service room that is not in a suite of residential occupancy, a carbon monoxide alarm shall be installed,(a) adjacent to each sleeping area in every suite of residential occupancy that is adjacent to the service room, and (b) in the service room.

ON Full: Sliding glass partitions that separate a public corridor from an adjacent occupancy and that are open during normal working hours need not conform to Sentences (2), (3) and (5), except that such partitions shall be suitably marked to indicate their existence and position.
ON Variations: Sliding glass partitions that separate a public corridor from an adjacent occupancy and that are open during normal working hours need not conform to Sentences (2), (3) and (5), except that such partitions shall be suitably marked to indicate their existence and position.

ON Full: A dead end corridor is permitted in a high hazard industrial occupancy where there is a second and separate egress doorway from each room or suite not leading into a dead end corridor.
ON Variations: A dead end corridor is permitted in a high hazard industrial occupancy where there is a second and separate egress doorway from each room or suite not leading into a dead end corridor.

ON Full: Chutes and shafts shall conform to Subsection 3.6.3. except where they are contained entirely within a dwelling unit.
ON Variations: Chutes and shafts shall conform to Subsection 3.6.3. except where they are contained entirely within a dwelling unit.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), a lighting outlet with fixture controlled by a wall switch shall be provided in kitchens, bedrooms, living rooms, utility rooms, laundry rooms, dining rooms, bathrooms, water closet rooms, vestibules and hallways in a house or an individual dwelling unit.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), a lighting outlet with fixture controlled by a wall switch shall be provided in kitchens, bedrooms, living rooms, utility rooms, laundry rooms, dining rooms, bathrooms, water closet rooms, vestibules and hallways in a house or an individual dwelling unit.

ON Full: Tapered treads in a curved flight that is not required as an exit shall have, a minimum run of 150 mm, a run not less than 280 mm when measured at a point 300 mm from the centre line of the inside handrail, and a riser conforming to Sentence 3.4.6.8.(2).
ON Variations: Tapered treads in a curved flight that is not required as an exit shall have, a minimum run of 150 mm, a run not less than 280 mm when measured at a point 300 mm from the centre line of the inside handrail, and a riser conforming to Sentence 3.4.6.8.(2).

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (3), a building classified as Group A, Division 4 shall be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (3), a building classified as Group A, Division 4 shall be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: The tests described in Sentence (2) shall be performed when hydrostatic pressure testing can be performed without danger of freezing, and when there is danger of freezing, the sprinkler system shall be pressure tested with air at 350 kPa (gauge) for 2 h without loss of pressure.
ON Variations: The tests described in Sentence (2) shall be performed when hydrostatic pressure testing can be performed without danger of freezing, and when there is danger of freezing, the sprinkler system shall be pressure tested with air at 350 kPa (gauge) for 2 h without loss of pressure.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (12), where a barrier-free entrance required by Article 3.8.1.2. incorporates a vestibule, a door leading from the vestibule into the floor area shall be equipped with a power door operator in a building containing a Group A, Group B, Division 2 or 3, Group C, Group D of Group E occupancy.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (12), where a barrier-free entrance required by Article 3.8.1.2. incorporates a vestibule, a door leading from the vestibule into the floor area shall be equipped with a power door operator in a building containing a Group A, Group B, Division 2 or 3, Group C, Group D of Group E occupancy.

ON Full: Where more than one set of winders described in Sentence (1) is provided in a single stairway between adjacent floor levels, such winders shall be separated in plan by at least 1 200 mm.
ON Variations: Where more than one set of winders described in Sentence (1) is provided in a single stairway between adjacent floor levels, such winders shall be separated in plan by at least 1 200 mm.

ON Full: Piping under concrete ceilings shall be suspended with the use of through bolts or expansion shields.
ON Variations: Piping under concrete ceilings shall be suspended with the use of through bolts or expansion shields.

ON Full: Columns in excess of the height limitations of Clauses (2)(a) to (c) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4.
ON Variations: Columns in excess of the height limitations of Clauses (2)(a) to (c) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4.

ON Full: At bulk plant rail loading and unloading facilities, the minimum distance from a loading structure to a railway line shall be in conformance with Flammable Liquids Bulk Storage Regulations made under the Canada Transportation Act.
ON Variations: At bulk plant rail loading and unloading facilities, the minimum distance from a loading structure to a railway line shall be in conformance with Flammable Liquids Bulk Storage Regulations made under the Canada Transportation Act.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), loadbearing walls of hollow masonry units supporting roof or floor framing members shall be capped with not less than 50 mm of solid masonry or have the top course filled with concrete.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), loadbearing walls of hollow masonry units supporting roof or floor framing members shall be capped with not less than 50 mm of solid masonry or have the top course filled with concrete.

ON Full: Pile heights for randomly stacked or unranked piles shall not exceed 6 m unless special fire suppression equipment, such as portable turrets, deluge sets and monitor towers, is installed.
ON Variations: Pile heights for randomly stacked or unranked piles shall not exceed 6 m unless special fire suppression equipment, such as portable turrets, deluge sets and monitor towers, is installed.

ON Full: Seats may be arranged in a manner that does not meet the requirements of Sentence (7) where the aisle widths are increased by 50% above the requirements set out in Sentences (2) to (6), and where the maximum occupant load of the space is based on not less than 1.2 m2 of floor space per person.
ON Variations: Seats may be arranged in a manner that does not meet the requirements of Sentence (7) where the aisle widths are increased by 50% above the requirements set out in Sentences (2) to (6), and where the maximum occupant load of the space is based on not less than 1.2 m2 of floor space per person.

ON Full: Exits need not comply with Sentence (1) where, the floor area is divided so that not less than one-third of the floor area is on each side of the fire separation, and it is necessary to pass through the fire separation to travel from one exit to another exit.
ON Variations: Exits need not comply with Sentence (1) where, the floor area is divided so that not less than one-third of the floor area is on each side of the fire separation, and it is necessary to pass through the fire separation to travel from one exit to another exit.

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply where a permanent record of the test is kept and is available to the fire department.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply where a permanent record of the test is kept and is available to the fire department.

ON Full: Where an elevator is used to comply with the requirements of Article 3.3.1.7., the provisions of Clause 3.3.1.7.(1)(a) do not apply where the elevator system complies with Article 3.13.8.3.
ON Variations: Where an elevator is used to comply with the requirements of Article 3.3.1.7., the provisions of Clause 3.3.1.7.(1)(a) do not apply where the elevator system complies with Article 3.13.8.3.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are stored in a room required in this Part, the storage densities averaged over the total room area and the total quantities of such liquids shall conform to Table 4.2.9.A.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are stored in a room required in this Part, the storage densities averaged over the total room area and the total quantities of such liquids shall conform to Table 4.2.9.A.

ON Full: Rungs for external ladders shall begin at not less than 2 500 mm from ground level.
ON Variations: Rungs for external ladders shall begin at not less than 2 500 mm from ground level.

ON Full: Where underground piping systems have no secondary containment, mechanical connections shall be readily accessible for inspection and maintenance, and not be in direct contact with the soil.
ON Variations: Where underground piping systems have no secondary containment, mechanical connections shall be readily accessible for inspection and maintenance, and not be in direct contact with the soil.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), where a building component or assembly will be subjected to an intended temperature differential, the component or assembly shall include materials to resist heat transfer or means to dissipate transferred heat in accordance with this Subsection.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), where a building component or assembly will be subjected to an intended temperature differential, the component or assembly shall include materials to resist heat transfer or means to dissipate transferred heat in accordance with this Subsection.

ON Full: Every individual work area in a business and personal services occupancy shall be located adjacent to an aisle or subsidiary aisle.
ON Variations: Every individual work area in a business and personal services occupancy shall be located adjacent to an aisle or subsidiary aisle.

ON Full: Electrical wires or other similar wiring enclosed in noncombustible totally enclosed raceways are permitted to partly or wholly penetrate an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating without being incorporated in the assembly at the time of testing as required in Sentence (3).
ON Variations: Electrical wires or other similar wiring enclosed in noncombustible totally enclosed raceways are permitted to partly or wholly penetrate an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating without being incorporated in the assembly at the time of testing as required in Sentence (3).

ON Full: Dry-pipe valves shall be trip tested annually.
ON Variations: Dry-pipe valves shall be trip tested annually.

ON Full: A dead end corridor is permitted in an assembly occupancy where there is a second and separate egress doorway from each room or suite not leading into a dead end corridor.
ON Variations: A dead end corridor is permitted in an assembly occupancy where there is a second and separate egress doorway from each room or suite not leading into a dead end corridor.

ON Full: Walls may be built of natural or manufactured logs.
ON Variations: Walls may be built of natural or manufactured logs.

ON Full: Submerged skimmer equalizer fittings and vacuum fittings are not permitted in public pools.
ON Variations: Submerged skimmer equalizer fittings and vacuum fittings are not permitted in public pools.

ON Full: Hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence (1) shall be arranged so that there is no water pressure on the system except when liquid is being discharged.
ON Variations: Hydraulic transfer systems referred to in Sentence (1) shall be arranged so that there is no water pressure on the system except when liquid is being discharged.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (11), a manually operated silencing device shall be incorporated within the circuitry of a smoke alarm installed in a dwelling unit so that it will silence the signal emitted by the smoke alarm for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the smoke alarm will reset and again sound the alarm if the level of smoke in the vicinity is sufficient to reactuate the smoke alarm.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (11), a manually operated silencing device shall be incorporated within the circuitry of a smoke alarm installed in a dwelling unit so that it will silence the signal emitted by the smoke alarm for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the smoke alarm will reset and again sound the alarm if the level of smoke in the vicinity is sufficient to reactuate the smoke alarm.

ON Full: Nails used with wood shingles or shakes shall have a head diameter of not less than 4.8 mm and a shank thickness of not less than 2.0 mm and shall be stainless steel, aluminum or hot-dipped galvanized. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Nails used with wood shingles or shakes shall have a head diameter of not less than 4.8 mm and a shank thickness of not less than 2.0 mm and shall be stainless steel, aluminum or hot-dipped galvanized. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The capacity of stairs in an access to exit shall conform to the requirements for stairs in Sentences 3.4.3.2.(1) to (3).
