ON Variations: The capacity of stairs in an access to exit shall conform to the requirements for stairs in Sentences 3.4.3.2.(1) to (3).

ON Full: In elementary and secondary schools, a door assembly conforming to Articles 9.10.13.2. and 9.10.13.3. is permitted to be used as a closure in a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of 30 min.
ON Variations: In elementary and secondary schools, a door assembly conforming to Articles 9.10.13.2. and 9.10.13.3. is permitted to be used as a closure in a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of 30 min.

ON Full: Compliance with the required ASTC ratings shall be demonstrated through,(a) measurements or calculations carried out in accordance with Sentence 5.8.1.2.(2), or (b) the construction of separating assemblies conforming to Table 1 or 2 of MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-3, "Fire and Sound Resistance of Building Assemblies", as applicable, that have an STC rating not less than 50 in conjunction with flanking assemblies constructed in accordance with Article 9.11.1.4.
ON Variations: Compliance with the required ASTC ratings shall be demonstrated through,(a) measurements or calculations carried out in accordance with Sentence 5.8.1.2.(2), or (b) the construction of separating assemblies conforming to Table 1 or 2 of MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-3, "Fire and Sound Resistance of Building Assemblies", as applicable, that have an STC rating not less than 50 in conjunction with flanking assemblies constructed in accordance with Article 9.11.1.4.

ON Full: Gypsum board supporting insulation shall be at least 12.7 mm thick.
ON Variations: Gypsum board supporting insulation shall be at least 12.7 mm thick.

ON Full: Masonry veneer resting on a bearing support shall not project more than 25 mm beyond the supporting base where the veneer is at least 90 mm thick, and 12 mm beyond the supporting base where the veneer is less than 90 mm thick.
ON Variations: Masonry veneer resting on a bearing support shall not project more than 25 mm beyond the supporting base where the veneer is at least 90 mm thick, and 12 mm beyond the supporting base where the veneer is less than 90 mm thick.

ON Full: Ventilation ducts shall conform to the requirements of Part 6 for supply ducts, except that exhaust ducts that serve only a bathroom or water closet room may be of combustible material provided the duct is reasonably airtight and constructed of a material impervious to water.
ON Variations: Ventilation ducts shall conform to the requirements of Part 6 for supply ducts, except that exhaust ducts that serve only a bathroom or water closet room may be of combustible material provided the duct is reasonably airtight and constructed of a material impervious to water.

ON Full: Dip tanks containing either a flammable liquid or combustible liquid with a flash point less than 43°C or a heated combustible liquid giving off flammable vapours shall conform to Article 5.13.6.2. when the capacity exceeds 45 L or when the liquid surface area exceeds 0.4 m2.
ON Variations: Dip tanks containing either a flammable liquid or combustible liquid with a flash point less than 43°C or a heated combustible liquid giving off flammable vapours shall conform to Article 5.13.6.2. when the capacity exceeds 45 L or when the liquid surface area exceeds 0.4 m2.

ON Full: Piping systems that contain flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be made of materials that are suitable for the maximum anticipated working pressures and operating temperatures and for the chemical properties of the contained liquid.
ON Variations: Piping systems that contain flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be made of materials that are suitable for the maximum anticipated working pressures and operating temperatures and for the chemical properties of the contained liquid.

ON Full: Fire dampers shall conform to the requirements of Subsection 3.1.8.
ON Variations: Fire dampers shall conform to the requirements of Subsection 3.1.8.

ON Full: The interior surface of foundation walls below ground level shall be protected by means that minimize the ingress of moisture from the foundation wall into interior spaces where,(a) a separate interior finish is applied to a concrete or unit masonry wall that is in contact with the soil, or (b) wood members are placed in contact with such walls for the installation of insulation or finish.
ON Variations: The interior surface of foundation walls below ground level shall be protected by means that minimize the ingress of moisture from the foundation wall into interior spaces where,(a) a separate interior finish is applied to a concrete or unit masonry wall that is in contact with the soil, or (b) wood members are placed in contact with such walls for the installation of insulation or finish.

ON Full: No running trap shall be installed in a plumbing system unless an accessible handhole is provided for cleaning of the trap, and where the trap is too small to accommodate a handhole, a cleanout shall be provided.
ON Variations: No running trap shall be installed in a plumbing system unless an accessible handhole is provided for cleaning of the trap, and where the trap is too small to accommodate a handhole, a cleanout shall be provided.

ON Full: Flashing shall be installed over exterior wall openings where the vertical distance from the bottom of the eave to the top of the trim is more than one-quarter of the horizontal overhang of the eave. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Flashing shall be installed over exterior wall openings where the vertical distance from the bottom of the eave to the top of the trim is more than one-quarter of the horizontal overhang of the eave. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The surface required to be dampproofed shall be clean and dry and free of ice, snow, frost, dust, dirt, oil, grease, cracks, projections, depressions, loose particles and debris that could be detrimental to the performance of the membrane to be applied.
ON Variations: The surface required to be dampproofed shall be clean and dry and free of ice, snow, frost, dust, dirt, oil, grease, cracks, projections, depressions, loose particles and debris that could be detrimental to the performance of the membrane to be applied.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the quantities and clearances for flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in containers in outdoor storage areas shall conform to Table 4.2.11.A.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the quantities and clearances for flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in containers in outdoor storage areas shall conform to Table 4.2.11.A.

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply to tinting operations for paints that involve containers of up to 25 L in capacity.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply to tinting operations for paints that involve containers of up to 25 L in capacity.

ON Full: Ventilation shall be provided for hazardous locations and processes in conformance with the Building Code and the requirements of this Part.
ON Variations: Ventilation shall be provided for hazardous locations and processes in conformance with the Building Code and the requirements of this Part.

ON Full: At bulk plant rail loading and unloading facilities, the minimum distance from a storage tank to a railway line shall be in conformance with Flammable Liquids Bulk Storage Regulations made under the Canada Transportation Act.
ON Variations: At bulk plant rail loading and unloading facilities, the minimum distance from a storage tank to a railway line shall be in conformance with Flammable Liquids Bulk Storage Regulations made under the Canada Transportation Act.

ON Full: Cladding on exposing building faces and exterior walls located above exposing building faces need not conform to the type of cladding required by Table 9.10.14.5. where,(a) the exposing building face is constructed with no unprotected openings, (b) the limiting distance is not less than 0.6 m, and (c) the cladding, (i) conforms to Subsection 9.27.12., (ii) is installed without furring members over not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum sheathing or over masonry, (iii) has a flame-spread rating not more than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), and (iv) is not more than 2 mm in thickness exclusive of fasteners, joints and local reinforcements.
ON Variations: Cladding on exposing building faces and exterior walls located above exposing building faces need not conform to the type of cladding required by Table 9.10.14.5. where,(a) the exposing building face is constructed with no unprotected openings, (b) the limiting distance is not less than 0.6 m, and (c) the cladding, (i) conforms to Subsection 9.27.12., (ii) is installed without furring members over not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum sheathing or over masonry, (iii) has a flame-spread rating not more than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), and (iv) is not more than 2 mm in thickness exclusive of fasteners, joints and local reinforcements.

ON Full: A wave action pool is exempt from Sentences 3.11.3.1.(4) to (9), (12), (13), (14), (17), (18) and (23), Sentence 3.11.8.1.(12) and Article 3.11.3.3.
ON Variations: A wave action pool is exempt from Sentences 3.11.3.1.(4) to (9), (12), (13), (14), (17), (18) and (23), Sentence 3.11.8.1.(12) and Article 3.11.3.3.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (12), the minimum lateral earthquake force, V, shall be calculated using the following formula:V = S (Ta) MvIEW/ (RdRo) except, (a) for walls, coupled walls and wall-frame systems, V shall not be less than, S (4.0) Mv IEW/ (RdRo) (b) for moment-resisting frames, braced frames and other systems, V shall not be less than, S (2.0) Mv IEW/ (RdRo) (c) for buildings located on a site other than Class F and having an SFRS with an Rd equal to or greater than 1.5, V need not be greater than the larger of, 2/3 S (0.2) IEW / (RdRo) and S (0.5) IEW/ (RdRo)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (12), the minimum lateral earthquake force, V, shall be calculated using the following formula:V = S (Ta) MvIEW/ (RdRo) except, (a) for walls, coupled walls and wall-frame systems, V shall not be less than, S (4.0) Mv IEW/ (RdRo) (b) for moment-resisting frames, braced frames and other systems, V shall not be less than, S (2.0) Mv IEW/ (RdRo) (c) for buildings located on a site other than Class F and having an SFRS with an Rd equal to or greater than 1.5, V need not be greater than the larger of, 2/3 S (0.2) IEW / (RdRo) and S (0.5) IEW/ (RdRo)

ON Full: This Article applies to the determination of wind load to be used in the design of materials, components and assemblies, including their connections, that separate dissimilar environments or are exposed to the exterior, where these are,(a) subject to wind load, and (b) required to be designed to resist wind load.
ON Variations: This Article applies to the determination of wind load to be used in the design of materials, components and assemblies, including their connections, that separate dissimilar environments or are exposed to the exterior, where these are,(a) subject to wind load, and (b) required to be designed to resist wind load.

ON Full: Travel distance to an exit shall be not more than 50 m from any point in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9).
ON Variations: Travel distance to an exit shall be not more than 50 m from any point in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9).

ON Full: Exposed sprinkler piping hangers shall be checked yearly to ensure that they are kept in good repair.
ON Variations: Exposed sprinkler piping hangers shall be checked yearly to ensure that they are kept in good repair.

ON Full: The upper end of every vent pipe that is terminated in open air, other than a vent pipe that serves an oil interceptor or a fresh air inlet, shall be extended above the roof.
ON Variations: The upper end of every vent pipe that is terminated in open air, other than a vent pipe that serves an oil interceptor or a fresh air inlet, shall be extended above the roof.

ON Full: Where a supply or return duct is not protected by an insulated exterior wall or where the duct is exposed to an unheated space it shall be insulated to prevent condensation.
ON Variations: Where a supply or return duct is not protected by an insulated exterior wall or where the duct is exposed to an unheated space it shall be insulated to prevent condensation.

ON Full: The spacing between manholes serving a building sewer,(a) 24 in. or less in size shall not exceed 90 m, and (b) over 24 in. in size shall not exceed 150 m.
ON Variations: The spacing between manholes serving a building sewer,(a) 24 in. or less in size shall not exceed 90 m, and (b) over 24 in. in size shall not exceed 150 m.

ON Full: In a building that contains dwelling units that have more than 1 storey, subject to the requirements of Sentence 3.3.4.2.(3), the floor assemblies, including floors over basements, which are entirely contained within these dwelling units, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h but need not be constructed as fire separations.
ON Variations: In a building that contains dwelling units that have more than 1 storey, subject to the requirements of Sentence 3.3.4.2.(3), the floor assemblies, including floors over basements, which are entirely contained within these dwelling units, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h but need not be constructed as fire separations.

ON Full: Where an exhaust air intake for the principal exhaust fan is connected directly to the duct system of a forced air heating system or other central air circulating system, it shall,(a) be connected to the return air side of the system, and (b) be connected not less than 1 000 mm upstream from any outdoor air supply duct.
ON Variations: Where an exhaust air intake for the principal exhaust fan is connected directly to the duct system of a forced air heating system or other central air circulating system, it shall,(a) be connected to the return air side of the system, and (b) be connected not less than 1 000 mm upstream from any outdoor air supply duct.

ON Full: Free-standing steel pallet storage racks are permitted to be designed to resist earthquake effects using rational analysis, provided the design achieves the minimum performance level required by this Subsection. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Free-standing steel pallet storage racks are permitted to be designed to resist earthquake effects using rational analysis, provided the design achieves the minimum performance level required by this Subsection. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: For the purposes of this Subsection, a dwelling unit shall be categorized as,(a) Type I when, (i) all fuel-fired combustion appliances serving the dwelling unit are direct vented or, except for fireplaces, are mechanically vented induced draft, and (ii) the dwelling unit is not served by a solid fuel-fired combustion appliance, (b) Type II when a solid fuel-fired combustion appliance serves a Type I dwelling unit, (c) Type III when a mechanically vented induced draft non-solid fuel-fired fireplace or a natural draft appliance is present, or (d) Type IV when electric space heating is present.
ON Variations: For the purposes of this Subsection, a dwelling unit shall be categorized as,(a) Type I when, (i) all fuel-fired combustion appliances serving the dwelling unit are direct vented or, except for fireplaces, are mechanically vented induced draft, and (ii) the dwelling unit is not served by a solid fuel-fired combustion appliance, (b) Type II when a solid fuel-fired combustion appliance serves a Type I dwelling unit, (c) Type III when a mechanically vented induced draft non-solid fuel-fired fireplace or a natural draft appliance is present, or (d) Type IV when electric space heating is present.

ON Full: Unless otherwise prescribed in this Part, tests shall be carried out at intervals of not more than three months.
ON Variations: Unless otherwise prescribed in this Part, tests shall be carried out at intervals of not more than three months.

ON Full: Except for a house containing not more than one dwelling unit, every riser shall be provided with a shut-off valve at the source of supply.
ON Variations: Except for a house containing not more than one dwelling unit, every riser shall be provided with a shut-off valve at the source of supply.

ON Full: Smoking shall not take place in indoor storage areas, except as provided in Subsection 2.4.3.
ON Variations: Smoking shall not take place in indoor storage areas, except as provided in Subsection 2.4.3.

ON Full: A firewall that separates two buildings with roofs at different elevations need not extend above the upper roof surface to form a parapet, provided the difference in elevation between the roofs is more than 3 m.
ON Variations: A firewall that separates two buildings with roofs at different elevations need not extend above the upper roof surface to form a parapet, provided the difference in elevation between the roofs is more than 3 m.

ON Full: An automatic sprinkler system shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices and, if an annunciator is required by Article 3.2.4.9., shall be installed so that each device serves, not more than 1 storey, and an area on each storey that is not more than the system area limits as specified in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems".
ON Variations: An automatic sprinkler system shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices and, if an annunciator is required by Article 3.2.4.9., shall be installed so that each device serves, not more than 1 storey, and an area on each storey that is not more than the system area limits as specified in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems".

ON Full: Ammonium nitrate storage shall be identified by signs of contrasting colours indicating the contents with letters 50 mm high.
ON Variations: Ammonium nitrate storage shall be identified by signs of contrasting colours indicating the contents with letters 50 mm high.

ON Full: Sawdust, chips and other waste material shall not be accumulated in piling areas in storage yards.
ON Variations: Sawdust, chips and other waste material shall not be accumulated in piling areas in storage yards.

ON Full: Where the critical level is not marked on an atmospheric vacuum breaker, pressure vacuum breaker or spill-resistant pressure vacuum breaker, the critical level shall be taken as the lowest point on the device.
ON Variations: Where the critical level is not marked on an atmospheric vacuum breaker, pressure vacuum breaker or spill-resistant pressure vacuum breaker, the critical level shall be taken as the lowest point on the device.

ON Full: The carbon monoxide alarms required by Article 6.2.12.2. shall,(a) except as permitted in Sentence (2), be permanently connected to an electrical circuit and shall have no disconnect switch between the overcurrent device and the carbon monoxide alarm, (b) be wired so that its activation will activate all carbon monoxide alarms within the suite, where located within a suite of residential occupancy, (c) be equipped with an alarm that is audible within bedrooms when the intervening doors are closed, where located in a suite of residential occupancy, and (d) conform to, (i) CAN/CSA-6.19, "Residential Carbon Monoxide Alarming Devices", or (ii) UL 2034, "Single and Multiple Station Carbon Monoxide Alarms".
ON Variations: The carbon monoxide alarms required by Article 6.2.12.2. shall,(a) except as permitted in Sentence (2), be permanently connected to an electrical circuit and shall have no disconnect switch between the overcurrent device and the carbon monoxide alarm, (b) be wired so that its activation will activate all carbon monoxide alarms within the suite, where located within a suite of residential occupancy, (c) be equipped with an alarm that is audible within bedrooms when the intervening doors are closed, where located in a suite of residential occupancy, and (d) conform to, (i) CAN/CSA-6.19, "Residential Carbon Monoxide Alarming Devices", or (ii) UL 2034, "Single and Multiple Station Carbon Monoxide Alarms".

ON Full: A building classified as Group A, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentences (2) and (3) provided, it is not more than 1 storey in building height, and it has a building area not more than, 2 400 m2 if facing one street, 3 000 m2 if facing two streets, or 3 600 m2 if facing three streets.
ON Variations: A building classified as Group A, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentences (2) and (3) provided, it is not more than 1 storey in building height, and it has a building area not more than, 2 400 m2 if facing one street, 3 000 m2 if facing two streets, or 3 600 m2 if facing three streets.

ON Full: High voltage circuits shall be designed so that any discharge will not ignite vapour-air mixtures or create a shock hazard.
ON Variations: High voltage circuits shall be designed so that any discharge will not ignite vapour-air mixtures or create a shock hazard.

ON Full: Permanent signs shall be posted in conspicuous locations with, the words NO SMOKING in black lettering not less than 50 mm high with a stroke not less than 12 mm on a yellow background, or a non-smoking symbol having a size not less than 150 mm by 150 mm.
ON Variations: Permanent signs shall be posted in conspicuous locations with, the words NO SMOKING in black lettering not less than 50 mm high with a stroke not less than 12 mm on a yellow background, or a non-smoking symbol having a size not less than 150 mm by 150 mm.

ON Full: Despite Sentence (1) and subject to Article 5.14.10.2., flammable liquids shall not be used for any purpose in drycleaning and dyeing plants.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence (1) and subject to Article 5.14.10.2., flammable liquids shall not be used for any purpose in drycleaning and dyeing plants.

ON Full: Where a prefabricated system is installed as part of a water system,(a) all other plumbing work shall be tested and inspected, and (b) the complete system shall be pressure tested.
ON Variations: Where a prefabricated system is installed as part of a water system,(a) all other plumbing work shall be tested and inspected, and (b) the complete system shall be pressure tested.

ON Full: Ties required in Sentence (4) are permitted to consist of tie rods or ceiling joists forming a continuous tie for opposing rafters and nailed in accordance with Table 9.23.13.8.
ON Variations: Ties required in Sentence (4) are permitted to consist of tie rods or ceiling joists forming a continuous tie for opposing rafters and nailed in accordance with Table 9.23.13.8.

ON Full: Where downspouts are provided and are not connected to a sewer, extensions shall be provided to carry rainwater away from the building in a manner that will prevent soil erosion.
ON Variations: Where downspouts are provided and are not connected to a sewer, extensions shall be provided to carry rainwater away from the building in a manner that will prevent soil erosion.

ON Full: Buildings containing dwelling units shall be constructed so that airborne noise is controlled in conformance with Section 5.8.
ON Variations: Buildings containing dwelling units shall be constructed so that airborne noise is controlled in conformance with Section 5.8.

ON Full: Cast iron frames and covers for maintenance holes and catch basins shall conform to CAN/CSA-B70.1, "Frames and Covers for Maintenance Holes and Catchbasins".
ON Variations: Cast iron frames and covers for maintenance holes and catch basins shall conform to CAN/CSA-B70.1, "Frames and Covers for Maintenance Holes and Catchbasins".

ON Full: The area of a Type B dispersal bed shall not be less than the minimum area determined in accordance with Clause (2)(a) or (b).
ON Variations: The area of a Type B dispersal bed shall not be less than the minimum area determined in accordance with Clause (2)(a) or (b).

ON Full: Where two egress doorways are required by Sentence (1), they shall be placed at a distance from one another equal to or greater than one-third of the maximum overall diagonal dimension of the room or suite to be served, measured as the shortest distance that smoke would have to travel between the nearest required egress doors.
ON Variations: Where two egress doorways are required by Sentence (1), they shall be placed at a distance from one another equal to or greater than one-third of the maximum overall diagonal dimension of the room or suite to be served, measured as the shortest distance that smoke would have to travel between the nearest required egress doors.

ON Full: Upon completion of the assessment described in Sentence (2), written procedures for periodic inspections and tests shall be established.
ON Variations: Upon completion of the assessment described in Sentence (2), written procedures for periodic inspections and tests shall be established.

ON Full: Battery charging installations for battery-powered industrial trucks shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2A:30B:C.
ON Variations: Battery charging installations for battery-powered industrial trucks shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2A:30B:C.

ON Full: Combustible artwork and teaching materials that are attached to walls shall not exceed 20% of the area of the walls.
ON Variations: Combustible artwork and teaching materials that are attached to walls shall not exceed 20% of the area of the walls.

ON Full: Cargo shall not be transferred to or from the tank of a marine vessel unless sufficient personnel are on board to control the operation.
ON Variations: Cargo shall not be transferred to or from the tank of a marine vessel unless sufficient personnel are on board to control the operation.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (5), the sand layer shall,(a) be comprised of sand that has, (i) a percolation time of at least 6 and not more than 10 min, and (ii) not more than 5% fines passing through a 0.074 mm (No. sieve, (b) have a minimum thickness of 300 mm, and (c) have an area that is not less than the lesser of, (i) the area of the stone layer determined in accordance with Sentence (6) or, if leaching chambers are used, the area over which the leaching chambers are spaced determined in accordance with Sentence (6.1), and (ii) the value determined by the formula, where, A = the area of contact in square metres between the base of the sand and the underlying soil, Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres, and T = the lesser of 50 and the percolation time of the underlying soil.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (5), the sand layer shall,(a) be comprised of sand that has, (i) a percolation time of at least 6 and not more than 10 min, and (ii) not more than 5% fines passing through a 0.074 mm (No. sieve, (b) have a minimum thickness of 300 mm, and (c) have an area that is not less than the lesser of, (i) the area of the stone layer determined in accordance with Sentence (6) or, if leaching chambers are used, the area over which the leaching chambers are spaced determined in accordance with Sentence (6.1), and (ii) the value determined by the formula, where, A = the area of contact in square metres between the base of the sand and the underlying soil, Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres, and T = the lesser of 50 and the percolation time of the underlying soil.

ON Full: A passenger elevating device referred to in Article 3.8.2.1. shall conform to CSA B355, "Lifts for Persons with Physical Disabilities".
ON Variations: A passenger elevating device referred to in Article 3.8.2.1. shall conform to CSA B355, "Lifts for Persons with Physical Disabilities".

ON Full: Oil or grease shall not be used for the lubrication of valves or fittings on oxygen cylinders.
ON Variations: Oil or grease shall not be used for the lubrication of valves or fittings on oxygen cylinders.

ON Full: If a building described in Article 3.2.6.1. is connected to any other building, measures shall be taken to limit movement of contaminated air from one building into another during a fire.
ON Variations: If a building described in Article 3.2.6.1. is connected to any other building, measures shall be taken to limit movement of contaminated air from one building into another during a fire.

ON Full: Where a single stage fire alarm system is installed in a building that is not sprinklered, and Sentence (1) does not apply, a legible notice, that is not easily removed, shall be affixed to the wall near each manual pull station stating, that the fire department is to be notified in the event of a fire emergency, and the emergency telephone number for the municipality or the telephone number of the fire department. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where a single stage fire alarm system is installed in a building that is not sprinklered, and Sentence (1) does not apply, a legible notice, that is not easily removed, shall be affixed to the wall near each manual pull station stating, that the fire department is to be notified in the event of a fire emergency, and the emergency telephone number for the municipality or the telephone number of the fire department. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Supports for the roof deck assembly referred to in Sentence (1) shall consist of, fire-retardant treated wood, heavy timber construction, noncombustible construction, or a combination of the items described in Clauses (a) to (c).
ON Variations: Supports for the roof deck assembly referred to in Sentence (1) shall consist of, fire-retardant treated wood, heavy timber construction, noncombustible construction, or a combination of the items described in Clauses (a) to (c).

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply to a building that contains only dwelling units and has no dwelling unit above another dwelling unit.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply to a building that contains only dwelling units and has no dwelling unit above another dwelling unit.

ON Full: The hydraulic load on a circuit vent shall include the hydraulic load from fixtures connected to the branch served by the circuit vent, but shall not include the hydraulic load from fixtures permitted by Sentences (3), (4) and (5).
ON Variations: The hydraulic load on a circuit vent shall include the hydraulic load from fixtures connected to the branch served by the circuit vent, but shall not include the hydraulic load from fixtures permitted by Sentences (3), (4) and (5).

ON Full: Primary and secondary power supplies that serve smoke alarms shall be maintained in operating condition.
ON Variations: Primary and secondary power supplies that serve smoke alarms shall be maintained in operating condition.

ON Full: Adjacent compartments within every oil interceptor shall be connected to each other by a vent opening.
ON Variations: Adjacent compartments within every oil interceptor shall be connected to each other by a vent opening.

ON Full: Where materials, components or assemblies that separate dissimilar environments or are exposed to the exterior, or their connections, are required to be designed for structural loads, these loads shall be determined in accordance with Part 4.
ON Variations: Where materials, components or assemblies that separate dissimilar environments or are exposed to the exterior, or their connections, are required to be designed for structural loads, these loads shall be determined in accordance with Part 4.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the topographic factor, Ct, shall be taken as 1.0.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the topographic factor, Ct, shall be taken as 1.0.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (3), a fire alarm system shall be designed so that when an alarm signal is actuated it cannot be silenced automatically before a period of time has elapsed that is not less than, 5 min for a building not required to be equipped with an annunciator, and 20 min for any other building.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (3), a fire alarm system shall be designed so that when an alarm signal is actuated it cannot be silenced automatically before a period of time has elapsed that is not less than, 5 min for a building not required to be equipped with an annunciator, and 20 min for any other building.

ON Full: Floor joists described in Sentence (1) shall not project into the cavity.
ON Variations: Floor joists described in Sentence (1) shall not project into the cavity.

ON Full: A window in a public area that extends to less than 1 070 mm above the floor and is located above the second storey in a building of residential occupancy, shall be protected by a barrier or railing from the floor to not less than 1 070 mm above the floor, or the window shall be non-openable and designed to withstand the lateral design loads for balcony guards required by Article 4.1.5.14.
ON Variations: A window in a public area that extends to less than 1 070 mm above the floor and is located above the second storey in a building of residential occupancy, shall be protected by a barrier or railing from the floor to not less than 1 070 mm above the floor, or the window shall be non-openable and designed to withstand the lateral design loads for balcony guards required by Article 4.1.5.14.

ON Full: Alternative methods to prevent freezing of sprinkler piping may be used where approved.
ON Variations: Alternative methods to prevent freezing of sprinkler piping may be used where approved.

ON Full: For stairs or ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, at least one required handrail shall be continuous throughout the length of the stair or ramp, except where interrupted by,(a) doorways, (b) landings, or (c) newel posts at changes in direction. (See A-3.4.6.5.(10) in Appendix A.)
ON Variations: For stairs or ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, at least one required handrail shall be continuous throughout the length of the stair or ramp, except where interrupted by,(a) doorways, (b) landings, or (c) newel posts at changes in direction. (See A-3.4.6.5.(10) in Appendix A.)

ON Full: When earthquake forces are calculated using Rs = 1.5, the following elements in the SFRS shall have their design forces due to earthquake effects increased by 33%: (a) diaphragms and their chords, connections, struts and collectors, (b) tie downs in wood or drywall shear walls, (c) connections and anchor bolts in steel- and wood-braced frames, (d) connections in precast concrete, and (e) connections in steel moment frames.
ON Variations: When earthquake forces are calculated using Rs = 1.5, the following elements in the SFRS shall have their design forces due to earthquake effects increased by 33%: (a) diaphragms and their chords, connections, struts and collectors, (b) tie downs in wood or drywall shear walls, (c) connections and anchor bolts in steel- and wood-braced frames, (d) connections in precast concrete, and (e) connections in steel moment frames.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to electrostatic detearing processes involving the use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to electrostatic detearing processes involving the use of flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

ON Full: The heating system used in drying operations shall be interlocked so that it cannot be started until the associated ventilation system is in operation.
ON Variations: The heating system used in drying operations shall be interlocked so that it cannot be started until the associated ventilation system is in operation.

ON Full: Ammonium nitrate shall not be stored in an area where the ambient temperature is such that it can become unstable or susceptible to undesirable reactions.
ON Variations: Ammonium nitrate shall not be stored in an area where the ambient temperature is such that it can become unstable or susceptible to undesirable reactions.

ON Full: Every oil interceptor shall be provided with 2 vent pipes that,(a) connect to the interceptor at opposite ends, (b) extend independently to open air, (c) terminate not less than 2 000 mm above ground and at elevations differing by at least 300 mm, and (d) do not connect to each other or any other vent pipe.
ON Variations: Every oil interceptor shall be provided with 2 vent pipes that,(a) connect to the interceptor at opposite ends, (b) extend independently to open air, (c) terminate not less than 2 000 mm above ground and at elevations differing by at least 300 mm, and (d) do not connect to each other or any other vent pipe.

ON Full: Where a cleanout is required on a building sewer 8 in. or larger in size, it shall be a manhole.
ON Variations: Where a cleanout is required on a building sewer 8 in. or larger in size, it shall be a manhole.

ON Full: A voice communication system conforming to Article 3.2.4.23. shall be provided in a retirement home.
ON Variations: A voice communication system conforming to Article 3.2.4.23. shall be provided in a retirement home.

ON Full: Where access to a floor area is required by Sentence (1), access through unlocked doors to the floor area from at least one other exit shall also be provided.
ON Variations: Where access to a floor area is required by Sentence (1), access through unlocked doors to the floor area from at least one other exit shall also be provided.

ON Full: Where a fixture discharges sand, grit or similar materials, an interceptor designed for the purpose of intercepting such discharges shall be installed.
ON Variations: Where a fixture discharges sand, grit or similar materials, an interceptor designed for the purpose of intercepting such discharges shall be installed.

ON Full: Where an air barrier system consisting of flexible sheet material is installed at locations where it is not supported by an interior finish, such as a behind a bath tub, shower enclosure or fireplace, the continuity of the air barrier shall be maintained by sealing its joints.
ON Variations: Where an air barrier system consisting of flexible sheet material is installed at locations where it is not supported by an interior finish, such as a behind a bath tub, shower enclosure or fireplace, the continuity of the air barrier shall be maintained by sealing its joints.

ON Full: Where applied beneath stucco, sheathing shall conform to Subsection 9.23.16.
ON Variations: Where applied beneath stucco, sheathing shall conform to Subsection 9.23.16.

ON Full: Aluminum sheet cladding shall conform to CAN/CGSB-93.1-M, "Sheet, Aluminum Alloy, Prefinished, Residential" and shall have a thickness of not less than 0.58 mm, except that siding supported by backing or sheathing shall have a thickness of not less than 0.46 mm. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Aluminum sheet cladding shall conform to CAN/CGSB-93.1-M, "Sheet, Aluminum Alloy, Prefinished, Residential" and shall have a thickness of not less than 0.58 mm, except that siding supported by backing or sheathing shall have a thickness of not less than 0.46 mm. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of heavy timber construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of heavy timber construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.

ON Full: Above ground climatic loads shall be determined according to MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-1, "Climatic and Seismic Data".
ON Variations: Above ground climatic loads shall be determined according to MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-1, "Climatic and Seismic Data".

ON Full: A trap that serves a floor drain or hub drain need not be protected by a vent pipe separately where,(a) the size of the trap is not less than 3 in., (b) the length of the fixture drain is not less than 450 mm, (c) the fall on the fixture drain does not exceed its size, and (d) the trap is connected to a horizontal drainage pipe that terminates at its upstream end in a 3 in. stack.
ON Variations: A trap that serves a floor drain or hub drain need not be protected by a vent pipe separately where,(a) the size of the trap is not less than 3 in., (b) the length of the fixture drain is not less than 450 mm, (c) the fall on the fixture drain does not exceed its size, and (d) the trap is connected to a horizontal drainage pipe that terminates at its upstream end in a 3 in. stack.

ON Full: Infiltration due to corridor pressurization is permitted into a residential occupancy from a public corridor.
ON Variations: Infiltration due to corridor pressurization is permitted into a residential occupancy from a public corridor.

ON Full: Where multiple shower heads installed in a public showering facility are served by one temperature control, each shower head shall be equipped with a device capable of automatically shutting off the flow of water when the shower head is not in use. (See Appendix Note A-7.6.4.1.(3))
ON Variations: Where multiple shower heads installed in a public showering facility are served by one temperature control, each shower head shall be equipped with a device capable of automatically shutting off the flow of water when the shower head is not in use. (See Appendix Note A-7.6.4.1.(3))

ON Full: Diaphragm valves shall have no direct connections between the liquid and air sections that might permit leakage of the liquid past the packing into the air lines.
ON Variations: Diaphragm valves shall have no direct connections between the liquid and air sections that might permit leakage of the liquid past the packing into the air lines.

ON Full: Footings shall be provided under walls, pilasters, columns, piers, fireplaces and chimneys that bear on soil or rock, except that footings are permitted to be omitted under piers or monolithic concrete walls if the safe loadbearing capacity of the soil or rock is not exceeded.
ON Variations: Footings shall be provided under walls, pilasters, columns, piers, fireplaces and chimneys that bear on soil or rock, except that footings are permitted to be omitted under piers or monolithic concrete walls if the safe loadbearing capacity of the soil or rock is not exceeded.

ON Full: Equipment shall be installed to continuously disinfect the water in a public spa by means of a chlorination, hypochlorination or bromination system that is capable of regulating the dosage of chlorine or bromine.
ON Variations: Equipment shall be installed to continuously disinfect the water in a public spa by means of a chlorination, hypochlorination or bromination system that is capable of regulating the dosage of chlorine or bromine.

ON Full: Where the performance level is reduced under Sentence 11.4.2.3.(6), the storey subject to the change shall be sprinklered.
ON Variations: Where the performance level is reduced under Sentence 11.4.2.3.(6), the storey subject to the change shall be sprinklered.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), the clear opening height of doorways shall be not less than 2 030 mm high at,(a) exit doors, (b) doors that open into or are located within a public corridor, and (c) doors that open into or are located within another facility that provides access to exit from a suite.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), the clear opening height of doorways shall be not less than 2 030 mm high at,(a) exit doors, (b) doors that open into or are located within a public corridor, and (c) doors that open into or are located within another facility that provides access to exit from a suite.

ON Full: All walls, ceilings and floors separating conditioned space from unconditioned space, the exterior air or the ground shall be,(a) provided with, (i) thermal insulation conforming to Subsection 9.25.2., (ii) an air barrier system conforming to Subsection 9.25.3., and (iii) a vapour barrier conforming to Subsection 9.25.4., and (b) constructed in such a way that the properties and relative position of all materials conform to Subsection 9.25.5.
ON Variations: All walls, ceilings and floors separating conditioned space from unconditioned space, the exterior air or the ground shall be,(a) provided with, (i) thermal insulation conforming to Subsection 9.25.2., (ii) an air barrier system conforming to Subsection 9.25.3., and (iii) a vapour barrier conforming to Subsection 9.25.4., and (b) constructed in such a way that the properties and relative position of all materials conform to Subsection 9.25.5.

ON Full: The changing of movable parts of signs that are designed for changes, or the repainting of display matter shall not be deemed to be alterations.
ON Variations: The changing of movable parts of signs that are designed for changes, or the repainting of display matter shall not be deemed to be alterations.

ON Full: Dip tank covers shall overlap the sides of the tank by 25 mm and shall have a recess or flange extending down around the tank.
ON Variations: Dip tank covers shall overlap the sides of the tank by 25 mm and shall have a recess or flange extending down around the tank.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to all exits except those serving a house or an individual dwelling unit.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to all exits except those serving a house or an individual dwelling unit.

ON Full: Except as otherwise stated in this Section, unit masonry shall conform to Section 9.20. and concrete to Section 9.3.
ON Variations: Except as otherwise stated in this Section, unit masonry shall conform to Section 9.20. and concrete to Section 9.3.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), fire alarm, fire detection and smoke detection devices and systems, and their installation, shall conform to Subsection 3.2.4. and Articles 3.2.7.8. and 3.2.7.10. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), fire alarm, fire detection and smoke detection devices and systems, and their installation, shall conform to Subsection 3.2.4. and Articles 3.2.7.8. and 3.2.7.10. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where a vision panel is provided in a door in a barrier-free path of travel, such panel shall be at least 75 mm in width and be located so that, the bottom of the panel is not more than 900 mm above the finished floor, and the edge of the panel closest to the latch is not more than 250 mm from the latch side of the door.
ON Variations: Where a vision panel is provided in a door in a barrier-free path of travel, such panel shall be at least 75 mm in width and be located so that, the bottom of the panel is not more than 900 mm above the finished floor, and the edge of the panel closest to the latch is not more than 250 mm from the latch side of the door.

ON Full: Sill plates shall be,(a) levelled by setting them on a full bed of mortar, or (b) laid directly on the foundation where the top of the foundation is level.
ON Variations: Sill plates shall be,(a) levelled by setting them on a full bed of mortar, or (b) laid directly on the foundation where the top of the foundation is level.

ON Full: Doors referred to in Sentence (1) are permitted to be equipped with electromagnetic locks provided they comply with Sentences 3.4.6.16.(4) and (5).
ON Variations: Doors referred to in Sentence (1) are permitted to be equipped with electromagnetic locks provided they comply with Sentences 3.4.6.16.(4) and (5).

ON Full: Key switch activated pull stations are permitted in an impeded egress zone and a contained use area in Group B, Division 1 and 2 occupancies.
ON Variations: Key switch activated pull stations are permitted in an impeded egress zone and a contained use area in Group B, Division 1 and 2 occupancies.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.2.68. to 3.2.2.72., a building classified as Group F, Division 2 shall conform to Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.2.68. to 3.2.2.72., a building classified as Group F, Division 2 shall conform to Sentence (2).

ON Full: Where approved, manual pull stations for a fire alarm system in a building may be relocated if there is a high incidence of false alarms in the building.
ON Variations: Where approved, manual pull stations for a fire alarm system in a building may be relocated if there is a high incidence of false alarms in the building.

ON Full: The access routes required in Sentence (2) shall conform to the requirements in Sentence 3.2.5.6.(1).
ON Variations: The access routes required in Sentence (2) shall conform to the requirements in Sentence 3.2.5.6.(1).

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2), (3) and (4), cladding shall be fastened to the framing members or furring members, or to blocking between the framing members.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2), (3) and (4), cladding shall be fastened to the framing members or furring members, or to blocking between the framing members.

ON Full: Floor drains that conform to Sentence 7.4.5.1.(3) are not required to be separately trapped and vented, and may be gang trapped when discharging through an oil interceptor.
ON Variations: Floor drains that conform to Sentence 7.4.5.1.(3) are not required to be separately trapped and vented, and may be gang trapped when discharging through an oil interceptor.

ON Full: If only two water closets are required for males, one urinal is permitted to be substituted for one of the water closets.
ON Variations: If only two water closets are required for males, one urinal is permitted to be substituted for one of the water closets.

ON Full: Extinguisher shells, cartridges or cylinders that show leakage or permanent distortion in excess of specified limits or that rupture shall be removed from service.
ON Variations: Extinguisher shells, cartridges or cylinders that show leakage or permanent distortion in excess of specified limits or that rupture shall be removed from service.

ON Full: Where it can be shown by test or analysis that a material, component, assembly or connection described in Sentence (1) will be subject to less than 100% of the specified wind load, the wind load referred to in Sentence (1) shall be not less than the load determined by test or analysis.
ON Variations: Where it can be shown by test or analysis that a material, component, assembly or connection described in Sentence (1) will be subject to less than 100% of the specified wind load, the wind load referred to in Sentence (1) shall be not less than the load determined by test or analysis.

ON Full: Hangers for objects being coated shall be kept clean and have sharp points or edges at areas of contact.
ON Variations: Hangers for objects being coated shall be kept clean and have sharp points or edges at areas of contact.

ON Full: Hose stations complying with Article 6.2.6.6. are permitted to be installed in lieu of portable extinguishers at locations required in Sentence (2), and spaced so that the distance travelled to the nearest hose is not greater than 25 m.
ON Variations: Hose stations complying with Article 6.2.6.6. are permitted to be installed in lieu of portable extinguishers at locations required in Sentence (2), and spaced so that the distance travelled to the nearest hose is not greater than 25 m.

ON Full: For the purpose of determining the type of construction and cladding and the fire-resistance rating of an exterior wall, the exposing building face shall be taken as the projection of the exterior wall onto a vertical plane located so that no portion of the exterior wall of the building or of a fire compartment, if the fire compartment complies with the requirements of Article 3.2.3.2., is between the vertical plane and the line to which the limiting distance is measured, and the area of unprotected openings shall be determined from Table 3.2.3.1.B., Table 3.2.3.1.C., Table 3.2.3.1.D. or Table 3.2.3.1.E.
ON Variations: For the purpose of determining the type of construction and cladding and the fire-resistance rating of an exterior wall, the exposing building face shall be taken as the projection of the exterior wall onto a vertical plane located so that no portion of the exterior wall of the building or of a fire compartment, if the fire compartment complies with the requirements of Article 3.2.3.2., is between the vertical plane and the line to which the limiting distance is measured, and the area of unprotected openings shall be determined from Table 3.2.3.1.B., Table 3.2.3.1.C., Table 3.2.3.1.D. or Table 3.2.3.1.E.

ON Full: Where a sprinkler system is installed, the system shall conform to the requirements in Articles 3.2.5.13., 3.2.5.16. and 3.2.5.18.
ON Variations: Where a sprinkler system is installed, the system shall conform to the requirements in Articles 3.2.5.13., 3.2.5.16. and 3.2.5.18.

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (2), open flames shall not be used as a heat source to heat piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (2), open flames shall not be used as a heat source to heat piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

ON Full: Globe valves shall be arranged so that the packing is on the low pressure side.
ON Variations: Globe valves shall be arranged so that the packing is on the low pressure side.

ON Full: Wall and floor surfaces below the uppermost surfaces of urinals shall be protected from deterioration by impervious and durable material for a distance from the urinal to a point not less than 900 mm from the projected outline of the urinal on to the wall or floor.
ON Variations: Wall and floor surfaces below the uppermost surfaces of urinals shall be protected from deterioration by impervious and durable material for a distance from the urinal to a point not less than 900 mm from the projected outline of the urinal on to the wall or floor.

ON Full: Each log in a wall built of vertical logs shall be scribed to fit as closely as possible to the adjacent logs.
ON Variations: Each log in a wall built of vertical logs shall be scribed to fit as closely as possible to the adjacent logs.

ON Full: At a loading or unloading facility for tank vehicles or tank cars, the horizontal distance from the fill stem to an aboveground storage tank, a building or a property line shall be not less than 7.5 m for Class I liquids, and 4.5 m for Class II and IIIA liquids.
ON Variations: At a loading or unloading facility for tank vehicles or tank cars, the horizontal distance from the fill stem to an aboveground storage tank, a building or a property line shall be not less than 7.5 m for Class I liquids, and 4.5 m for Class II and IIIA liquids.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), a room containing elevator machinery shall be separated from all other parts of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the vertical service space containing the elevator hoistway.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), a room containing elevator machinery shall be separated from all other parts of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the vertical service space containing the elevator hoistway.

ON Full: Hydrants shall be located within 90 m horizontally of any portion of a building perimeter that is required to face a street in Subsection 3.2.2.
ON Variations: Hydrants shall be located within 90 m horizontally of any portion of a building perimeter that is required to face a street in Subsection 3.2.2.

ON Full: This Part applies to materials, processes and operations that involve a risk from explosion or high flammability, or otherwise create a hazard to life safety or health.
ON Variations: This Part applies to materials, processes and operations that involve a risk from explosion or high flammability, or otherwise create a hazard to life safety or health.

ON Full: If a room contains not more than 1 water closet, the doorway to the room shall be provided with a full height door that is capable of being locked from the inside.
ON Variations: If a room contains not more than 1 water closet, the doorway to the room shall be provided with a full height door that is capable of being locked from the inside.

ON Full: The requirements for fire-resistance rating, type of construction and type of cladding need not apply to the exposing building faces of a house and a detached garage or accessory building that face each other, where,(a) the detached garage or accessory building serves the house or an individual dwelling unit in the house, (b) the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as the house, and (c) the house is the only major occupancy on the property.
ON Variations: The requirements for fire-resistance rating, type of construction and type of cladding need not apply to the exposing building faces of a house and a detached garage or accessory building that face each other, where,(a) the detached garage or accessory building serves the house or an individual dwelling unit in the house, (b) the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as the house, and (c) the house is the only major occupancy on the property.

ON Full: Vertically applied metal siding and wood shingles and shakes are permitted to be attached to the sheathing only where the sheathing consists of not less than,(a) 14.3 mm lumber, (b) 7.5 mm plywood, or (c) 7.5 mm OSB or waferboard.
ON Variations: Vertically applied metal siding and wood shingles and shakes are permitted to be attached to the sheathing only where the sheathing consists of not less than,(a) 14.3 mm lumber, (b) 7.5 mm plywood, or (c) 7.5 mm OSB or waferboard.

ON Full: A furnace serving a house or an individual dwelling unit shall be equipped with a brushless direct current motor. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A furnace serving a house or an individual dwelling unit shall be equipped with a brushless direct current motor. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The ASTC rating shall be calculated in accordance with ASTM E413, "Classification for Rating Sound Insulation", using the apparent sound reduction index determined in Sentence (7), which shall be treated as equivalent to the values of apparent sound transmission loss measured in accordance with ASTM E336, "Measurement of Airborne Sound Attenuation between Rooms in Buildings".
ON Variations: The ASTC rating shall be calculated in accordance with ASTM E413, "Classification for Rating Sound Insulation", using the apparent sound reduction index determined in Sentence (7), which shall be treated as equivalent to the values of apparent sound transmission loss measured in accordance with ASTM E336, "Measurement of Airborne Sound Attenuation between Rooms in Buildings".

ON Full: Where applied directly to framing or over furring strips, OSB conforming to O-1 grade and waferboard conforming to R-1 grade shall be not less than,(a) 9.5 mm thick on supports spaced not more than 406 mm o.c., and (b) 12.7 mm thick on supports spaced not more than 610 mm o.c.
ON Variations: Where applied directly to framing or over furring strips, OSB conforming to O-1 grade and waferboard conforming to R-1 grade shall be not less than,(a) 9.5 mm thick on supports spaced not more than 406 mm o.c., and (b) 12.7 mm thick on supports spaced not more than 610 mm o.c.

ON Full: Air admittance valves shall only be used to vent,(a) fixtures in buildings undergoing renovation, and (b) installations where connection to a vent may not be practical.
ON Variations: Air admittance valves shall only be used to vent,(a) fixtures in buildings undergoing renovation, and (b) installations where connection to a vent may not be practical.

ON Full: The smoke referred to in Clauses (1)(c) and (d) may be omitted provided the roof terminals are closed and the system is subjected to an air pressure equivalent to a 25 mm water column maintained for 15 min without the addition of more air.
ON Variations: The smoke referred to in Clauses (1)(c) and (d) may be omitted provided the roof terminals are closed and the system is subjected to an air pressure equivalent to a 25 mm water column maintained for 15 min without the addition of more air.

ON Full: A tank shall not be covered by soil or leaching bed fill having a depth greater than the maximum depth of burial that the tank is designed to withstand.
ON Variations: A tank shall not be covered by soil or leaching bed fill having a depth greater than the maximum depth of burial that the tank is designed to withstand.

ON Full: Air duct systems shall have,(a) tight-fitting connections throughout, and (b) no openings other than those required for proper operation, inspection and maintenance of the system.
ON Variations: Air duct systems shall have,(a) tight-fitting connections throughout, and (b) no openings other than those required for proper operation, inspection and maintenance of the system.

ON Full: Where salvage tanks are used, pumping arrangements shall be provided for the transfer of their contents for disposal.
ON Variations: Where salvage tanks are used, pumping arrangements shall be provided for the transfer of their contents for disposal.

ON Full: The distances set out in Column 2 of Table 8.2.1.6.B. shall be increased by twice the height that the leaching bed is raised above the original grade.
ON Variations: The distances set out in Column 2 of Table 8.2.1.6.B. shall be increased by twice the height that the leaching bed is raised above the original grade.

ON Full: In floor areas where the manual pull stations are located in dwelling units, a legible sign stating FIRE ALARM PULL STATIONS LOCATED IN APARTMENT UNITS shall be posted near every exit in a public corridor.
ON Variations: In floor areas where the manual pull stations are located in dwelling units, a legible sign stating FIRE ALARM PULL STATIONS LOCATED IN APARTMENT UNITS shall be posted near every exit in a public corridor.

ON Full: Not less than a 2 mm gap shall be provided between panels referred to in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Not less than a 2 mm gap shall be provided between panels referred to in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Reference shall be made to Parts 2, 3, 4 and 5 for requirements of portable extinguishers for flammable liquids and combustible liquids, hazardous materials, processes and operations.
ON Variations: Reference shall be made to Parts 2, 3, 4 and 5 for requirements of portable extinguishers for flammable liquids and combustible liquids, hazardous materials, processes and operations.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and 7.6.5.3.(1), the maximum temperature of hot water supplied by fittings to fixtures in a residential occupancy shall not exceed 49°C.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and 7.6.5.3.(1), the maximum temperature of hot water supplied by fittings to fixtures in a residential occupancy shall not exceed 49°C.

ON Full: Except for a high hazard industrial occupancy, Sentence (1) need not apply if exits are placed along the perimeter of the floor area and are not more than 60 m apart, measured along the perimeter, provided each main aisle in the floor area leads directly to an exit.
ON Variations: Except for a high hazard industrial occupancy, Sentence (1) need not apply if exits are placed along the perimeter of the floor area and are not more than 60 m apart, measured along the perimeter, provided each main aisle in the floor area leads directly to an exit.

ON Full: Underground piping systems shall be of double-walled construction.
ON Variations: Underground piping systems shall be of double-walled construction.

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply to the storage of distilled beverage alcohol.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply to the storage of distilled beverage alcohol.

ON Full: Open flames and spark-producing devices shall not be used for leakage detection referred to in Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Open flames and spark-producing devices shall not be used for leakage detection referred to in Sentence (2).

ON Full: Liquid fuel storage tanks shall be drained and refilled with fresh fuel at intervals not greater than 12 months.
ON Variations: Liquid fuel storage tanks shall be drained and refilled with fresh fuel at intervals not greater than 12 months.

ON Full: Every employee in a hotel establishment shall take part in at least one fire drill during each 12-month period.
ON Variations: Every employee in a hotel establishment shall take part in at least one fire drill during each 12-month period.

ON Full: Underground piping systems referred to in Sentence (1) shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.
ON Variations: Underground piping systems referred to in Sentence (1) shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months.

ON Full: Except as required by Sentence 3.8.3.3.(7), every exit door shall be designed and installed so that, when the latch is released, the door will open under a force of not more than 90 N, applied at the knob or other latch releasing device.
ON Variations: Except as required by Sentence 3.8.3.3.(7), every exit door shall be designed and installed so that, when the latch is released, the door will open under a force of not more than 90 N, applied at the knob or other latch releasing device.

ON Full: In a dwelling unit with a water distribution system, a hot water supply shall be provided.
ON Variations: In a dwelling unit with a water distribution system, a hot water supply shall be provided.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), every drainage pipe that has a size of 3 in. or less shall have a downward slope in the direction of flow of at least 1 in 50.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), every drainage pipe that has a size of 3 in. or less shall have a downward slope in the direction of flow of at least 1 in 50.

ON Full: Nails for fastening gypsum board to wood supports shall conform to,(a) ASTM F1667, "Driven Fasteners: Nails, Spikes and Staples", or (b) CSA B111, "Wire Nails, Spikes and Staples".
ON Variations: Nails for fastening gypsum board to wood supports shall conform to,(a) ASTM F1667, "Driven Fasteners: Nails, Spikes and Staples", or (b) CSA B111, "Wire Nails, Spikes and Staples".

ON Full: Except for masonry veneer where each masonry unit is supported individually by the structural backing, masonry veneer shall consist of solid masonry units not less than 70 mm thick.
ON Variations: Except for masonry veneer where each masonry unit is supported individually by the structural backing, masonry veneer shall consist of solid masonry units not less than 70 mm thick.

ON Full: Where portable extinguishers have been tested and are rated as being acceptable for fighting more than one class of fire, each class of fire for which they are acceptable shall be designated on each extinguisher.
ON Variations: Where portable extinguishers have been tested and are rated as being acceptable for fighting more than one class of fire, each class of fire for which they are acceptable shall be designated on each extinguisher.

ON Full: An emergency telephone directly connected to an emergency service or to the local telephone utility shall be installed adjacent to the pool deck of every Class A pool.
ON Variations: An emergency telephone directly connected to an emergency service or to the local telephone utility shall be installed adjacent to the pool deck of every Class A pool.

ON Full: Concrete roof tiles shall be installed according to CAN/CSA-A220.1-M, "Installation of Concrete Roof Tiles". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Concrete roof tiles shall be installed according to CAN/CSA-A220.1-M, "Installation of Concrete Roof Tiles". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: This Section applies to the construction of a Class 1 sewage system.
ON Variations: This Section applies to the construction of a Class 1 sewage system.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.3.3.(1), a dead end corridor shall conform to Sentences (8) to (14).
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.3.3.(1), a dead end corridor shall conform to Sentences (8) to (14).

ON Full: For vertical variations of RdRo, excluding rooftop structures not exceeding two storeys in height whose weight is less than the greater of 10% of W and 30% of Wi of the level below, the value of RdRo used in the design of any storey shall be less than or equal to the lowest value of RdRo used in the given direction for the storeys above, and the requirements of Sentence 4.1.8.15.(5) must be satisfied. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: For vertical variations of RdRo, excluding rooftop structures not exceeding two storeys in height whose weight is less than the greater of 10% of W and 30% of Wi of the level below, the value of RdRo used in the design of any storey shall be less than or equal to the lowest value of RdRo used in the given direction for the storeys above, and the requirements of Sentence 4.1.8.15.(5) must be satisfied. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where the elevator described in Sentence (2) has doors opening into storeys above or below the interconnected floor space it shall be protected by vestibules conforming to the requirements of Sentence 3.2.8.5.(1).
ON Variations: Where the elevator described in Sentence (2) has doors opening into storeys above or below the interconnected floor space it shall be protected by vestibules conforming to the requirements of Sentence 3.2.8.5.(1).

ON Full: Except where located within a dwelling unit, a room intended for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids required by the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997 shall not be located above or below the first storey of the building.
ON Variations: Except where located within a dwelling unit, a room intended for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids required by the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997 shall not be located above or below the first storey of the building.

ON Full: Where problems of corrosion, contamination or sanitation or standards of purity require special materials, it is permitted to use non-metallic materials for piping, valves and fittings in conformance with Article 4.1.1.4.
ON Variations: Where problems of corrosion, contamination or sanitation or standards of purity require special materials, it is permitted to use non-metallic materials for piping, valves and fittings in conformance with Article 4.1.1.4.

ON Full: Hose houses or cabinets shall be provided around the perimeter of chip piles at intervals not exceeding 120 m.
ON Variations: Hose houses or cabinets shall be provided around the perimeter of chip piles at intervals not exceeding 120 m.

ON Full: The travel limit from a floor level in a dwelling unit to an exit or egress door is permitted to exceed 1 storey where that floor level has direct access to a balcony.
ON Variations: The travel limit from a floor level in a dwelling unit to an exit or egress door is permitted to exceed 1 storey where that floor level has direct access to a balcony.

ON Full: Where a shallow foundation unit is damaged, (a) it shall be repaired, or (b) the design of the foundation unit shall be recalculated for the damaged condition by the designer.
ON Variations: Where a shallow foundation unit is damaged, (a) it shall be repaired, or (b) the design of the foundation unit shall be recalculated for the damaged condition by the designer.

ON Full: All holding tanks shall be of such design and construction as will allow the complete removal of solid matter that can be expected to settle in the holding tank through an apparatus or device suitable for allowing the contents of the holding tank to be removed from the holding tank.
ON Variations: All holding tanks shall be of such design and construction as will allow the complete removal of solid matter that can be expected to settle in the holding tank through an apparatus or device suitable for allowing the contents of the holding tank to be removed from the holding tank.

ON Full: Where a canopy is provided to protect outdoor storage in Sentence (1), the canopy shall be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Where a canopy is provided to protect outdoor storage in Sentence (1), the canopy shall be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: All fire alarm, fire detectors, valve switches and water flow indicator signals when activated in a rapid transit station shall be indicated on the annunciator at the station.
ON Variations: All fire alarm, fire detectors, valve switches and water flow indicator signals when activated in a rapid transit station shall be indicated on the annunciator at the station.

ON Full: In automotive shop or industrial arts areas of an educational facility, storage of up to 75 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, including not more than 25 L of Class I liquid, shall be permitted outside of a cabinet or room as specified in Article 4.2.6.2.
ON Variations: In automotive shop or industrial arts areas of an educational facility, storage of up to 75 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, including not more than 25 L of Class I liquid, shall be permitted outside of a cabinet or room as specified in Article 4.2.6.2.

ON Full: Loads on exterior guards serving a single dwelling unit shall comply with Part 4.
ON Variations: Loads on exterior guards serving a single dwelling unit shall comply with Part 4.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (5) and (6), lateral deflections of a structure shall be calculated in accordance with the loads and requirements defined in this Subsection.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (5) and (6), lateral deflections of a structure shall be calculated in accordance with the loads and requirements defined in this Subsection.

ON Full: Aisles separating individual storage areas described in Article 3.3.2.2. shall be at least 2.4 m wide.
ON Variations: Aisles separating individual storage areas described in Article 3.3.2.2. shall be at least 2.4 m wide.

ON Full: The minimum size of a vent pipe that serves a manhole within a building shall be 2 in.
ON Variations: The minimum size of a vent pipe that serves a manhole within a building shall be 2 in.

ON Full: If the hose is replaced on the rack, reel or storage area, it shall be reracked, rereeled or rerolled so that any folds do not occur at the same position they were previously on the hose.
ON Variations: If the hose is replaced on the rack, reel or storage area, it shall be reracked, rereeled or rerolled so that any folds do not occur at the same position they were previously on the hose.

ON Full: Fire exposure to the yard areas from the mill operations and other structures shall be limited by providing clear space.
ON Variations: Fire exposure to the yard areas from the mill operations and other structures shall be limited by providing clear space.

ON Full: Sprinkler system water supply pressure shall be tested with the main drain valve fully open to ensure that there are no obstructions in the water supply piping to the sprinkler system.
ON Variations: Sprinkler system water supply pressure shall be tested with the main drain valve fully open to ensure that there are no obstructions in the water supply piping to the sprinkler system.

ON Full: Adjustable steel columns other than those described in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4.
ON Variations: Adjustable steel columns other than those described in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4.

ON Full: An approved record shall be kept of inspections of each system.
ON Variations: An approved record shall be kept of inspections of each system.

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply if the building opening is into a room that conforms to Sentence 5.6.2.4.(1).
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply if the building opening is into a room that conforms to Sentence 5.6.2.4.(1).

ON Full: Except where an attic or roof space contains a fuel-fired appliance, the hatch required in Sentence (1) shall be not less than 550 mm by 900 mm except that, where the hatch serves a house or an individual dwelling unit in a house, the hatch may be reduced to,(a) 0.32 m2 in area with no dimension less than 545 mm, or (b) 500 mm by 700 mm. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except where an attic or roof space contains a fuel-fired appliance, the hatch required in Sentence (1) shall be not less than 550 mm by 900 mm except that, where the hatch serves a house or an individual dwelling unit in a house, the hatch may be reduced to,(a) 0.32 m2 in area with no dimension less than 545 mm, or (b) 500 mm by 700 mm. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A water service pipe intended to serve a mobile home shall,(a) be not less than ¾ in. in size, (b) be terminated above ground, and (c) be provided with, (i) a tamperproof terminal connection that is capable of being repeatedly connected, disconnected and sealed, (ii) a protective concrete pad, (iii) a means to protect it from frost heave, and (iv) a curb stop and a means of draining that part of the pipe located above the frost line when not in use.
ON Variations: A water service pipe intended to serve a mobile home shall,(a) be not less than ¾ in. in size, (b) be terminated above ground, and (c) be provided with, (i) a tamperproof terminal connection that is capable of being repeatedly connected, disconnected and sealed, (ii) a protective concrete pad, (iii) a means to protect it from frost heave, and (iv) a curb stop and a means of draining that part of the pipe located above the frost line when not in use.

ON Full: A public spa shall be constructed to have a water depth of not more than 1 200 mm.
ON Variations: A public spa shall be constructed to have a water depth of not more than 1 200 mm.

ON Full: The number of water closets required for drive-in theatres shall conform to Table 3.7.4.3.H.
ON Variations: The number of water closets required for drive-in theatres shall conform to Table 3.7.4.3.H.

ON Full: In every dwelling unit an enclosed space of sufficient size shall be provided to accommodate a water closet, lavatory and bathtub or shower stall.
ON Variations: In every dwelling unit an enclosed space of sufficient size shall be provided to accommodate a water closet, lavatory and bathtub or shower stall.

ON Full: The design and installation of every piping system shall, where necessary, include means to accommodate expansion and contraction of the piping system caused by temperature change or building shrinkage. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The design and installation of every piping system shall, where necessary, include means to accommodate expansion and contraction of the piping system caused by temperature change or building shrinkage. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except for dwelling units and as provided in Sentence (2), the number of water closets required for residential occupancies shall conform to Table 3.7.4.6.
ON Variations: Except for dwelling units and as provided in Sentence (2), the number of water closets required for residential occupancies shall conform to Table 3.7.4.6.

ON Full: Portable extinguishers shall be installed near spraying areas in conformance with Section 6.2.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers shall be installed near spraying areas in conformance with Section 6.2.
