ON Full: The height of a parapet wall above the adjacent roof surface shall be not more than three times the parapet wall thickness.
ON Variations: The height of a parapet wall above the adjacent roof surface shall be not more than three times the parapet wall thickness.

ON Full: One trap may serve a group of floor drains and hub drains, a group of shower drains, a group of washing machines or a group of laboratory sinks if the fixtures,(a) are in the same room, and (b) are not located where they can receive food or other organic matter.
ON Variations: One trap may serve a group of floor drains and hub drains, a group of shower drains, a group of washing machines or a group of laboratory sinks if the fixtures,(a) are in the same room, and (b) are not located where they can receive food or other organic matter.

ON Full: The heating system capacity shall be based on the heating load calculated in accordance with Sentence 6.2.1.1.(1).
ON Variations: The heating system capacity shall be based on the heating load calculated in accordance with Sentence 6.2.1.1.(1).

ON Full: Existing valves are deemed to comply with Sentences (1), (2) and (3), provided they are not leaking, and constructed of material that is in conformance with Article 4.4.2.1.
ON Variations: Existing valves are deemed to comply with Sentences (1), (2) and (3), provided they are not leaking, and constructed of material that is in conformance with Article 4.4.2.1.

ON Full: Where barriers required in Sentence (1) are provided to contain accidental spillage from aboveground storage tanks, they shall conform to the requirements for secondary containment in Subsection 4.3.7.
ON Variations: Where barriers required in Sentence (1) are provided to contain accidental spillage from aboveground storage tanks, they shall conform to the requirements for secondary containment in Subsection 4.3.7.

ON Full: Every steam or hot water radiator and convector shall be installed to conform to the clearance requirements of Table 6.2.9.3.
ON Variations: Every steam or hot water radiator and convector shall be installed to conform to the clearance requirements of Table 6.2.9.3.

ON Full: For stairs serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, where risers support the front portion of the tread, the space between stringers shall be not more than 1 200 mm.
ON Variations: For stairs serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, where risers support the front portion of the tread, the space between stringers shall be not more than 1 200 mm.

ON Full: Flights used as an exit shall consist solely of, straight flights, or curved flights complying with Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Flights used as an exit shall consist solely of, straight flights, or curved flights complying with Sentence (2).

ON Full: The force-deformation characteristics and damping value of a representative sample of the isolator units installed in the building shall be validated by tests prior to their installation.
ON Variations: The force-deformation characteristics and damping value of a representative sample of the isolator units installed in the building shall be validated by tests prior to their installation.

ON Full: If the checkout counters or control posts exceed 914 mm in height, there shall be a clear width of at least 550 mm.
ON Variations: If the checkout counters or control posts exceed 914 mm in height, there shall be a clear width of at least 550 mm.

ON Full: In buildings of assembly occupancy, all classrooms, auditoria, meeting rooms and theatres with an area of more than 100 m2 and an occupant load of more than 75 shall be equipped with assistive listening systems encompassing the entire seating area. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: In buildings of assembly occupancy, all classrooms, auditoria, meeting rooms and theatres with an area of more than 100 m2 and an occupant load of more than 75 shall be equipped with assistive listening systems encompassing the entire seating area. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Plumbing facilities shall be provided in accordance with Subsection 3.7.4. and Section 9.31.
ON Variations: Plumbing facilities shall be provided in accordance with Subsection 3.7.4. and Section 9.31.

ON Full: All round duct joints shall be tight-fitting and lapped not less than 25 mm.
ON Variations: All round duct joints shall be tight-fitting and lapped not less than 25 mm.

ON Full: Water supply pressure and system air or water pressure shall be checked weekly by using gauges to ensure that the system is maintained at the required operating pressure.
ON Variations: Water supply pressure and system air or water pressure shall be checked weekly by using gauges to ensure that the system is maintained at the required operating pressure.

ON Full: Sprinkler systems shall not be used to support anything that will interfere with effective sprinkler system performance.
ON Variations: Sprinkler systems shall not be used to support anything that will interfere with effective sprinkler system performance.

ON Full: Manufactured and pre-assembled windows, doors and skylights and their installation shall conform to,(a) AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440, "NAFS - North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights", (b) CSA A440S1, "Canadian Supplement to AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11, NAFS - North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights", (c) this Subsection, and (d) the applicable requirements in Subsection 9.7.6. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Manufactured and pre-assembled windows, doors and skylights and their installation shall conform to,(a) AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440, "NAFS - North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights", (b) CSA A440S1, "Canadian Supplement to AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11, NAFS - North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights", (c) this Subsection, and (d) the applicable requirements in Subsection 9.7.6. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except for a building containing one or two dwelling units only, combustible projections on the exterior of a wall that could expose an adjacent building to fire spread and are more than 1 m above ground level, including balconies, platforms, canopies and stairs, shall not be permitted within, 1.2 m of a property line or the centre line of a public way, or 2.4 m of a combustible projection on another building on the same property.
ON Variations: Except for a building containing one or two dwelling units only, combustible projections on the exterior of a wall that could expose an adjacent building to fire spread and are more than 1 m above ground level, including balconies, platforms, canopies and stairs, shall not be permitted within, 1.2 m of a property line or the centre line of a public way, or 2.4 m of a combustible projection on another building on the same property.

ON Full: Article 3.7.4.17. applies to sanitary facilities in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Article 3.7.4.17. applies to sanitary facilities in Sentence (1).

ON Full: A restaurant is permitted to be classified as a Group E major occupancy provided the restaurant is designed to accommodate not more than 30 persons consuming food or drink.
ON Variations: A restaurant is permitted to be classified as a Group E major occupancy provided the restaurant is designed to accommodate not more than 30 persons consuming food or drink.

ON Full: Handrails and construction below handrails, including handrail supports and stair stringers, are permitted to project into the required width of means of egress but the projections shall be not more than 100 mm on each side of the required width.
ON Variations: Handrails and construction below handrails, including handrail supports and stair stringers, are permitted to project into the required width of means of egress but the projections shall be not more than 100 mm on each side of the required width.

ON Full: The maximum quantities and densities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shown in Table 4.2.9.A. are permitted to be doubled provided the storage room is protected by an automatic fire suppression system conforming to Article 4.2.7.7.
ON Variations: The maximum quantities and densities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids shown in Table 4.2.9.A. are permitted to be doubled provided the storage room is protected by an automatic fire suppression system conforming to Article 4.2.7.7.

ON Full: Foamed plastic insulation shall conform to Article 3.1.5.12A.
ON Variations: Foamed plastic insulation shall conform to Article 3.1.5.12A.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the unobstructed vent area shall be not less than 1/300 of the insulated ceiling area.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the unobstructed vent area shall be not less than 1/300 of the insulated ceiling area.

ON Full: Drainage of the ground cover or floor-on-ground in the crawl space shall conform to Subsection 9.16.3.
ON Variations: Drainage of the ground cover or floor-on-ground in the crawl space shall conform to Subsection 9.16.3.

ON Full: The power-ventilated enclosure referred to in Article 6.2.13.3. and its exhaust duct system shall,(a) except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), be constructed of noncombustible materials compatible with and chemically resistant to the flammable vapours and particles being exhausted, and (b) be provided with access doors to permit inspection and maintenance of the fan assembly and exhaust ducts.
ON Variations: The power-ventilated enclosure referred to in Article 6.2.13.3. and its exhaust duct system shall,(a) except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), be constructed of noncombustible materials compatible with and chemically resistant to the flammable vapours and particles being exhausted, and (b) be provided with access doors to permit inspection and maintenance of the fan assembly and exhaust ducts.

ON Full: Foundations of wood frame construction shall conform to,(a) CSA S406, "Permanent Wood Foundations for Housing and Small Buildings", or (b) Part 4. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Foundations of wood frame construction shall conform to,(a) CSA S406, "Permanent Wood Foundations for Housing and Small Buildings", or (b) Part 4. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A dispensing room shall have at least two egress doorways that are at least three-quarters of the maximum diagonal dimension of the room from each other.
ON Variations: A dispensing room shall have at least two egress doorways that are at least three-quarters of the maximum diagonal dimension of the room from each other.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Article 3.3.1.11., a door that opens into a corridor or other facility providing access to exit from a room or suite shall swing in the direction of travel to the exit if the room or suite is used or intended for, an occupant load more than 60, a high hazard industrial occupancy, or a hazardous classroom in an elementary or secondary school.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Article 3.3.1.11., a door that opens into a corridor or other facility providing access to exit from a room or suite shall swing in the direction of travel to the exit if the room or suite is used or intended for, an occupant load more than 60, a high hazard industrial occupancy, or a hazardous classroom in an elementary or secondary school.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (5), the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in mercantile occupancies shall not exceed those in Sentences (2) to (4).
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (5), the quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in mercantile occupancies shall not exceed those in Sentences (2) to (4).

ON Full: Flanged joints for piping shall be provided in welded systems at intervals that will facilitate dismantling and avoid subsequent in place hot work operations.
ON Variations: Flanged joints for piping shall be provided in welded systems at intervals that will facilitate dismantling and avoid subsequent in place hot work operations.

ON Full: Electrical equipment that is required to be located in a service room by a regulation made under the Electricity Act, 1998, shall be installed in a service room separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Electrical equipment that is required to be located in a service room by a regulation made under the Electricity Act, 1998, shall be installed in a service room separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Operating personnel shall be trained in how to summon the nearest fire department in the event of fire.
ON Variations: Operating personnel shall be trained in how to summon the nearest fire department in the event of fire.

ON Full: Where a building is required to be sprinklered, the electrical equipment vault described in Sentence (1) need not be sprinklered provided, the vault is designed for no purpose other than to contain the electrical equipment, and a smoke detector is provided in the vault that will actuate the building fire alarm system in the event of a fire in the vault.
ON Variations: Where a building is required to be sprinklered, the electrical equipment vault described in Sentence (1) need not be sprinklered provided, the vault is designed for no purpose other than to contain the electrical equipment, and a smoke detector is provided in the vault that will actuate the building fire alarm system in the event of a fire in the vault.

ON Full: Waterproofing is not required where it can be shown that,(a) a building is designed to accommodate the ingress or accumulation of ground water, or (b) the ingress or accumulation of ground water will not adversely affect any of, (i) the health or safety of building users, (ii) the intended use of the building, or (iii) the operation of building services.
ON Variations: Waterproofing is not required where it can be shown that,(a) a building is designed to accommodate the ingress or accumulation of ground water, or (b) the ingress or accumulation of ground water will not adversely affect any of, (i) the health or safety of building users, (ii) the intended use of the building, or (iii) the operation of building services.

ON Full: The clear width of an exit stair shall be not less than 1 100 mm.
ON Variations: The clear width of an exit stair shall be not less than 1 100 mm.

ON Full: This Section does not apply to tents that have an area of 30 m2 or less and that are used for camping, personal or other non-commercial uses.
ON Variations: This Section does not apply to tents that have an area of 30 m2 or less and that are used for camping, personal or other non-commercial uses.

ON Full: The top edge of each strip referred to in Sentence (1) shall be fastened with sufficient roofing nails to hold it in place until the shingles are applied.
ON Variations: The top edge of each strip referred to in Sentence (1) shall be fastened with sufficient roofing nails to hold it in place until the shingles are applied.

ON Full: The rating referred to in Sentence (2) shall be based on CAN/ULC-S115, "Fire Tests of Firestop Systems", with a pressure differential of 50 Pa between the exposed and unexposed sides, with the higher pressure on the exposed side.
ON Variations: The rating referred to in Sentence (2) shall be based on CAN/ULC-S115, "Fire Tests of Firestop Systems", with a pressure differential of 50 Pa between the exposed and unexposed sides, with the higher pressure on the exposed side.

ON Full: No fewer than two plies of the roofing membrane shall be carried over the top of the cant strip.
ON Variations: No fewer than two plies of the roofing membrane shall be carried over the top of the cant strip.

ON Full: Sprinkler control valves and sprinkler water supplies shall not be shut down, disconnected or otherwise impaired for more than 24 h without notifying the Chief Fire Official.
ON Variations: Sprinkler control valves and sprinkler water supplies shall not be shut down, disconnected or otherwise impaired for more than 24 h without notifying the Chief Fire Official.

ON Full: Telescopic bleachers shall be provided with locking devices to ensure stability while in use.
ON Variations: Telescopic bleachers shall be provided with locking devices to ensure stability while in use.

ON Full: In locations where the seismic spectral response acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.55, loadbearing elements of masonry buildings more than 1 storey in building height shall be reinforced with not less than the minimum amount of reinforcement as required in Subsection 9.20.15.
ON Variations: In locations where the seismic spectral response acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.55, loadbearing elements of masonry buildings more than 1 storey in building height shall be reinforced with not less than the minimum amount of reinforcement as required in Subsection 9.20.15.

ON Full: A Type B dispersal bed shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.B. and these distances shall be increased when required by Sentence 8.7.4.2.(11).
ON Variations: A Type B dispersal bed shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.B. and these distances shall be increased when required by Sentence 8.7.4.2.(11).

ON Full: Roof framing supported on the top of flat insulating concrete form walls shall be fixed to the top plates, which shall be anchored to the wall with anchor bolts,(a) not less than 12.7 mm in diameter, and (b) spaced not more than 1.2 m o.c.
ON Variations: Roof framing supported on the top of flat insulating concrete form walls shall be fixed to the top plates, which shall be anchored to the wall with anchor bolts,(a) not less than 12.7 mm in diameter, and (b) spaced not more than 1.2 m o.c.

ON Full: Ovens containing or processing sufficient combustible materials to sustain a fire shall be protected by an automatic sprinkler system or other fixed extinguishing systems.
ON Variations: Ovens containing or processing sufficient combustible materials to sustain a fire shall be protected by an automatic sprinkler system or other fixed extinguishing systems.

ON Full: Dust-collecting systems shall be of a design which will prevent sparks due to physical contact in the fan assembly.
ON Variations: Dust-collecting systems shall be of a design which will prevent sparks due to physical contact in the fan assembly.

ON Full: A fire alarm system is not required in a storage garage conforming to Article 3.2.2.83. provided there are no other occupancies in the building.
ON Variations: A fire alarm system is not required in a storage garage conforming to Article 3.2.2.83. provided there are no other occupancies in the building.

ON Full: Except where zoned mechanical exhaust described in Sentence (4) has been activated, upon automatic detection of smoke within the volume of the interconnected floor space, the mechanical exhaust described in Sentence (6) shall be automatically activated and supply air shall be provided in sufficient quantity and at appropriate locations to allow a consistent rate of removal of smoke throughout the volume of the interconnected floor space.
ON Variations: Except where zoned mechanical exhaust described in Sentence (4) has been activated, upon automatic detection of smoke within the volume of the interconnected floor space, the mechanical exhaust described in Sentence (6) shall be automatically activated and supply air shall be provided in sufficient quantity and at appropriate locations to allow a consistent rate of removal of smoke throughout the volume of the interconnected floor space.

ON Full: Connections for all openings in underground storage tanks shall be liquid and vapour tight.
ON Variations: Connections for all openings in underground storage tanks shall be liquid and vapour tight.

ON Full: Portable extinguishers on a tank vehicle shall be readily accessible.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers on a tank vehicle shall be readily accessible.

ON Full: Where wythes are bonded together with masonry units, the bonding units shall comprise not less than 4 percent of the wall surface area.
ON Variations: Where wythes are bonded together with masonry units, the bonding units shall comprise not less than 4 percent of the wall surface area.

ON Full: A kitchen shall not be located within the fire compartment required in Sentence (8).
ON Variations: A kitchen shall not be located within the fire compartment required in Sentence (8).

ON Full: Except as permitted in Article 9.10.9.3., a wall or floor assembly required to be a fire separation shall be constructed as a continuous barrier against the spread of fire.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Article 9.10.9.3., a wall or floor assembly required to be a fire separation shall be constructed as a continuous barrier against the spread of fire.

ON Full: A floor area containing sleeping rooms in a building of Group B, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy shall not be constructed as part of an interconnected floor space.
ON Variations: A floor area containing sleeping rooms in a building of Group B, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy shall not be constructed as part of an interconnected floor space.

ON Full: This Section applies where proposed construction, in respect of an existing building will result in any of the following changes of use of all or part of the building: a change of the major occupancy of all or part of a building that is designated with a "Y" in Table 1.3.1.4. of Division C, a suite of a Group C major occupancy is converted into more than one suite of a Group C major occupancy, a suite or part of a suite of a Group A, Division 2 or a Group A, Division 4 major occupancy is converted to a gaming premises, a farm building or part of a farm building is changed to a major occupancy, a building or part of a building is changed to a post-disaster building, a building or part of a building is changed to a retirement home, or the use of a building or part of a building is changed and the previous major occupancy of the building or part of the building cannot be determined, or in respect of an existing building of combustible construction will extend the building by adding a storey or storeys such that the extended building will be more than four storeys in building height.
ON Variations: This Section applies where proposed construction, in respect of an existing building will result in any of the following changes of use of all or part of the building: a change of the major occupancy of all or part of a building that is designated with a "Y" in Table 1.3.1.4. of Division C, a suite of a Group C major occupancy is converted into more than one suite of a Group C major occupancy, a suite or part of a suite of a Group A, Division 2 or a Group A, Division 4 major occupancy is converted to a gaming premises, a farm building or part of a farm building is changed to a major occupancy, a building or part of a building is changed to a post-disaster building, a building or part of a building is changed to a retirement home, or the use of a building or part of a building is changed and the previous major occupancy of the building or part of the building cannot be determined, or in respect of an existing building of combustible construction will extend the building by adding a storey or storeys such that the extended building will be more than four storeys in building height.

ON Full: In buildings classified as Group C occupancy, the flush cycle for each fixture that is a water closet or urinal shall not exceed the maximum water consumption per flush cycle listed for that fixture in Table 7.6.4.2.B.
ON Variations: In buildings classified as Group C occupancy, the flush cycle for each fixture that is a water closet or urinal shall not exceed the maximum water consumption per flush cycle listed for that fixture in Table 7.6.4.2.B.

ON Full: Standard procedures for normal operations and for emergencies shall be given in printed form to all employees engaged in the operation of equipment for the transfer of flammable liquids and combustible liquids and shall be posted or readily available for convenient reference.
ON Variations: Standard procedures for normal operations and for emergencies shall be given in printed form to all employees engaged in the operation of equipment for the transfer of flammable liquids and combustible liquids and shall be posted or readily available for convenient reference.

ON Full: Where a public pool is equipped with a diving board or a diving platform not more than 3 m in height above the water surface, the pool shall be designed and constructed in conformance with Sentences (6) to (15).
ON Variations: Where a public pool is equipped with a diving board or a diving platform not more than 3 m in height above the water surface, the pool shall be designed and constructed in conformance with Sentences (6) to (15).

ON Full: Conveyors, trolleys, tracks or any other similar mode of product transportation within the aisle or walkway shall not reduce the clear-aisle width required in Sentence (9).
ON Variations: Conveyors, trolleys, tracks or any other similar mode of product transportation within the aisle or walkway shall not reduce the clear-aisle width required in Sentence (9).

ON Full: The water in a public pool and its recirculation system shall be separated from the potable water supply and from the sewer or drainage system into which it drains by air gaps or other devices that prevent, the water in the pool or its recirculation system from flowing back into the potable water supply, and the water in the sewer or drainage system from flowing back into the pool or its recirculation system.
ON Variations: The water in a public pool and its recirculation system shall be separated from the potable water supply and from the sewer or drainage system into which it drains by air gaps or other devices that prevent, the water in the pool or its recirculation system from flowing back into the potable water supply, and the water in the sewer or drainage system from flowing back into the pool or its recirculation system.

ON Full: Where a room or suite is separated from the remainder of the floor area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 45 min, or in a sprinklered building, by a fire separation that is not required to have a fire-resistance rating, the travel distance is permitted to be measured from an egress door of the room or suite to the nearest exit.
ON Variations: Where a room or suite is separated from the remainder of the floor area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 45 min, or in a sprinklered building, by a fire separation that is not required to have a fire-resistance rating, the travel distance is permitted to be measured from an egress door of the room or suite to the nearest exit.

ON Full: The design of the smoke control system shall assume an outdoor temperature equal to the January design temperature on a 2.5% basis.
ON Variations: The design of the smoke control system shall assume an outdoor temperature equal to the January design temperature on a 2.5% basis.

ON Full: Except for suite doors opening directly to the exterior, every exit serving a hotel shall have an exit sign placed over it or adjacent to it.
ON Variations: Except for suite doors opening directly to the exterior, every exit serving a hotel shall have an exit sign placed over it or adjacent to it.

ON Full: The level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than seven days, except that at fuel dispensing stations, the measurement shall be taken each day the station is in operation.
ON Variations: The level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than seven days, except that at fuel dispensing stations, the measurement shall be taken each day the station is in operation.

ON Full: Except at recessed steps or ladders, the pool deck along each side of a wave action pool adjacent to which the water depth is 2 300 mm or less shall be equipped with a barrier supported by posts or a wall that, is 1 000 mm in height, is located 1 000 mm or less from the side of the pool, and has warning notices affixed to the barrier or wall at intervals not exceeding 7.5 m signifying clearly that jumping and diving are prohibited along the sides of the pool.
ON Variations: Except at recessed steps or ladders, the pool deck along each side of a wave action pool adjacent to which the water depth is 2 300 mm or less shall be equipped with a barrier supported by posts or a wall that, is 1 000 mm in height, is located 1 000 mm or less from the side of the pool, and has warning notices affixed to the barrier or wall at intervals not exceeding 7.5 m signifying clearly that jumping and diving are prohibited along the sides of the pool.

ON Full: Cladding consisting of sheets of plywood, hardboard, OSB, waferboard or fibre cement is considered to meet the requirements of Sentence (1), provided the cladding is applied so that,(a) all edges are directly supported by framing, (b) the vertical joints between adjacent sheets are sealed and, (i) covered with battens, (ii) shiplapped, or (iii) otherwise matched to provide weathertight joints, and (c) the horizontal joints between adjacent sheets are sealed and, (i) shiplapped, or (ii) otherwise matched to provide weathertight joints.
ON Variations: Cladding consisting of sheets of plywood, hardboard, OSB, waferboard or fibre cement is considered to meet the requirements of Sentence (1), provided the cladding is applied so that,(a) all edges are directly supported by framing, (b) the vertical joints between adjacent sheets are sealed and, (i) covered with battens, (ii) shiplapped, or (iii) otherwise matched to provide weathertight joints, and (c) the horizontal joints between adjacent sheets are sealed and, (i) shiplapped, or (ii) otherwise matched to provide weathertight joints.

ON Full: A double sanitary T fitting shall not be used to connect the fixture drains of two urinals where no cleanout fitting is provided above the connection.
ON Variations: A double sanitary T fitting shall not be used to connect the fixture drains of two urinals where no cleanout fitting is provided above the connection.

ON Full: Where wall sheathing is required for the purpose of complying with this Section, it shall conform to Table 9.23.16.2.A. or Table 9.23.16.2.B.
ON Variations: Where wall sheathing is required for the purpose of complying with this Section, it shall conform to TableÃ 9.23.16.2.A. or Table 9.23.16.2.B.

ON Full: The ground motion histories used in Sentence (3) shall be, (a) appropriately selected and scaled following good engineering practice, (b) compatible with, (i) a response spectrum derived from the design spectral acceleration values, S(T), defined in Sentence 4.1.8.4.(9) for ground conditions of Site Classes A, B and C, and (ii) a 5% damped response spectrum based on a site-specific evaluation for ground conditions of Site Classes D, E and F, and (c) amplitude-scaled in an appropriate manner over the period range of 0.2 T1 to 1.5 T1, where T1 is the period of the isolated structure determined using the post-yield stiffness of the isolation system in the horizontal direction under consideration, or the period specified in Sentence 4.1.8.20.(1) if the post-yield stiffness of the isolation system is not well defined. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The ground motion histories used in Sentence (3) shall be, (a) appropriately selected and scaled following good engineering practice, (b) compatible with, (i) a response spectrum derived from the design spectral acceleration values, S(T), defined in Sentence 4.1.8.4.(9) for ground conditions of Site Classes A, B and C, and (ii) a 5% damped response spectrum based on a site-specific evaluation for ground conditions of Site Classes D, E and F, and (c) amplitude-scaled in an appropriate manner over the period range of 0.2 T1 to 1.5 T1, where T1 is the period of the isolated structure determined using the post-yield stiffness of the isolation system in the horizontal direction under consideration, or the period specified in Sentence 4.1.8.20.(1) if the post-yield stiffness of the isolation system is not well defined. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Insulation in contact with the ground shall be inert to the action of soil and water and be such that its insulative properties are not significantly reduced by moisture.
ON Variations: Insulation in contact with the ground shall be inert to the action of soil and water and be such that its insulative properties are not significantly reduced by moisture.

ON Full: Guards and toe-boards shall be provided in accordance with Articles 3.3.1.17. and 3.3.5.8.
ON Variations: Guards and toe-boards shall be provided in accordance with Articles 3.3.1.17. and 3.3.5.8.

ON Full: The slope of the bottom of any portion of a modified pool shall not exceed 1 in 12.
ON Variations: The slope of the bottom of any portion of a modified pool shall not exceed 1 in 12.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (9), all suction or gravity fittings installed at or below the water line of a public spa shall, have a maximum opening of 7 mm in one direction, and be designed so that the flow of water through the openings does not exceed 0.45 m/s.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (9), all suction or gravity fittings installed at or below the water line of a public spa shall, have a maximum opening of 7 mm in one direction, and be designed so that the flow of water through the openings does not exceed 0.45 m/s.

ON Full: Where the fundamental vibration frequency of a structural system supporting an assembly occupancy used for rhythmic activities, such as dancing, concerts, jumping exercises or gymnastics, is less than 6 Hz, the effects of resonance shall be investigated by means of a dynamic analysis. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where the fundamental vibration frequency of a structural system supporting an assembly occupancy used for rhythmic activities, such as dancing, concerts, jumping exercises or gymnastics, is less than 6 Hz, the effects of resonance shall be investigated by means of a dynamic analysis. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where an assembly is required to be of noncombustible construction and to have a fire-resistance rating, it shall be supported by noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Where an assembly is required to be of noncombustible construction and to have a fire-resistance rating, it shall be supported by noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Except as provided in this Subsection, tents are exempted from complying with the requirements of this Division.
ON Variations: Except as provided in this Subsection, tents are exempted from complying with the requirements of this Division.

ON Full: Where two platforms are considered as one platform as provided in Sentence 3.13.4.3.(2), the required egress capacity for each platform shall be determined separately.
ON Variations: Where two platforms are considered as one platform as provided in Sentence 3.13.4.3.(2), the required egress capacity for each platform shall be determined separately.

ON Full: Except as provided in this Subsection, Subsection 3.7.4. applies to a rapid transit station.
ON Variations: Except as provided in this Subsection, Subsection 3.7.4. applies to a rapid transit station.

ON Full: Where the building is not supplied with electrical power, carbon monoxide alarms are permitted to be battery operated.
ON Variations: Where the building is not supplied with electrical power, carbon monoxide alarms are permitted to be battery operated.

ON Full: Footing sizes for shallow foundations shall be, (a) determined in accordance with Section 9.15., or (b) designed in accordance with 4.2. using, (i) the maximum allowable bearing pressures in Table 9.4.4.1., or (ii) allowable bearing pressures determined from subsurface investigation.
ON Variations: Footing sizes for shallow foundations shall be, (a) determined in accordance with Section 9.15., or (b) designed in accordance with 4.2. using, (i) the maximum allowable bearing pressures in Table 9.4.4.1., or (ii) allowable bearing pressures determined from subsurface investigation.

ON Full: An exterior passageway leading to a required exit shall conform to the requirements of Section 3.4. for exterior exit passageways.
ON Variations: An exterior passageway leading to a required exit shall conform to the requirements of Section 3.4. for exterior exit passageways.

ON Full: Fire pumps shall be installed in conformance with Articles 3.2.5.18. and 3.2.5.19.
ON Variations: Fire pumps shall be installed in conformance with Articles 3.2.5.18. and 3.2.5.19.

ON Full: Where a means of egress from a rapid transit station leads through an adjoining building, any alarm signal originating in the building within 2 storeys above a connection to the station shall, be indicated on the rapid transit station annunciator, and cause a message to flash a warning on a sign located in conformance with Sentence (4), that the means of egress shall not be used as an exit from the station.
ON Variations: Where a means of egress from a rapid transit station leads through an adjoining building, any alarm signal originating in the building within 2 storeys above a connection to the station shall, be indicated on the rapid transit station annunciator, and cause a message to flash a warning on a sign located in conformance with Sentence (4), that the means of egress shall not be used as an exit from the station.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the maximum travel distance from any point on a mezzanine to the nearest exit shall be not more than, (a) 40 m in a business and personal services occupancy, (b) 45 m in a floor area that is sprinklered provided it does not contain a high hazard industrial occupancy, or (c) 30 m in any floor area not referred to in Clause (a) or (b).
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the maximum travel distance from any point on a mezzanine to the nearest exit shall be not more than, (a) 40 m in a business and personal services occupancy, (b) 45 m in a floor area that is sprinklered provided it does not contain a high hazard industrial occupancy, or (c) 30 m in any floor area not referred to in Clause (a) or (b).

ON Full: Every indirect service water heater shall be equipped with, (a) a pressure relief valve, and (b) a temperature relief valve on every storage tank that forms part of the system.
ON Variations: Every indirect service water heater shall be equipped with, (a) a pressure relief valve, and (b) a temperature relief valve on every storage tank that forms part of the system.

ON Full: The size of every vent pipe shall conform to Table 7.5.7.1.
ON Variations: The size of every vent pipe shall conform to Table 7.5.7.1.

ON Full: Machinery and metal parts of the equipment in Article 5.10.1.12. and related conveying systems shall be electrically grounded.
ON Variations: Machinery and metal parts of the equipment in Article 5.10.1.12. and related conveying systems shall be electrically grounded.

ON Full: A pressure vacuum breaker or spill-resistant pressure vacuum breaker shall be installed with its critical level at least 300 mm above,(a) the flood level rim of a fixture or tank, or (b) the highest point open to atmosphere in an irrigation system.
ON Variations: A pressure vacuum breaker or spill-resistant pressure vacuum breaker shall be installed with its critical level at least 300 mm above,(a) the flood level rim of a fixture or tank, or (b) the highest point open to atmosphere in an irrigation system.

ON Full: Horizontal sanitary drainage pipe shall be designed to carry no more than 65% of its full capacity.
ON Variations: Horizontal sanitary drainage pipe shall be designed to carry no more than 65% of its full capacity.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (6), ticket and attendant booths of storage garages shall be pressurized with a supply of outdoor air.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (6), ticket and attendant booths of storage garages shall be pressurized with a supply of outdoor air.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (6), loose-fill insulation shall be used on horizontal surfaces only.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (6), loose-fill insulation shall be used on horizontal surfaces only.

ON Full: Combustible totally enclosed raceways that are embedded in a concrete floor slab are permitted in an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating without being incorporated in the assembly at the time of testing as required in Sentence (3), where the concrete provides at least 50 mm of cover between the raceway and the bottom of the slab.
ON Variations: Combustible totally enclosed raceways that are embedded in a concrete floor slab are permitted in an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating without being incorporated in the assembly at the time of testing as required in Sentence (3), where the concrete provides at least 50 mm of cover between the raceway and the bottom of the slab.

ON Full: Service spaces referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9) shall not open directly into an exit.
ON Variations: Service spaces referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9) shall not open directly into an exit.

ON Full: Where storage tanks for service water heaters are steel, they shall be coated with zinc, vitreous enamel (glass lined), hydraulic cement or other corrosion-resistant material.
ON Variations: Where storage tanks for service water heaters are steel, they shall be coated with zinc, vitreous enamel (glass lined), hydraulic cement or other corrosion-resistant material.

ON Full: In a building more than 2 storeys in building height, any part of an exit ramp or stair that continues up or down past the lowest exit level shall be clearly marked by a sign indicating that it does not lead to an exit.
ON Variations: In a building more than 2 storeys in building height, any part of an exit ramp or stair that continues up or down past the lowest exit level shall be clearly marked by a sign indicating that it does not lead to an exit.

ON Full: Air filters for air duct systems shall conform to the requirements for Class 2 air filter units as described in CAN/ULC-S111, "Fire Tests for Air Filter Units".
ON Variations: Air filters for air duct systems shall conform to the requirements for Class 2 air filter units as described in CAN/ULC-S111, "Fire Tests for Air Filter Units".

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), doors need not conform to Sentence (1) provided they have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 200.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), doors need not conform to Sentence (1) provided they have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 200.

ON Full: Columns need not be provided with lateral support as described in Sentence (2) where,(a) the length of the columns are not more than 600 mm measured from the finished ground to the underside of the supported member, and (b) the columns support a deck with no superstructure.
ON Variations: Columns need not be provided with lateral support as described in Sentence (2) where,(a) the length of the columns are not more than 600 mm measured from the finished ground to the underside of the supported member, and (b) the columns support a deck with no superstructure.

ON Full: Adjacent structures shall be, (a) separated by a distance equal to at least the square root of the sum of the squares of their individual deflections calculated in Sentence 4.1.8.13.(2), or (b) connected to each other.
ON Variations: Adjacent structures shall be, (a) separated by a distance equal to at least the square root of the sum of the squares of their individual deflections calculated in Sentence 4.1.8.13.(2), or (b) connected to each other.

ON Full: Except where the insulation provides the principal resistance to air leakage, thermal insulation shall be installed so that at least one face is in full and continuous contact with an element with low air permeance. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except where the insulation provides the principal resistance to air leakage, thermal insulation shall be installed so that at least one face is in full and continuous contact with an element with low air permeance. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Any material used to support or form the sidewalls of the pit shall be an open jointed material of a type that will permit leaching from the pit.
ON Variations: Any material used to support or form the sidewalls of the pit shall be an open jointed material of a type that will permit leaching from the pit.

ON Full: This Article does not apply to a retail food premises described in Sentence 3.7.6.4.(3).
ON Variations: This Article does not apply to a retail food premises described in Sentence 3.7.6.4.(3).

ON Full: A Class B pool is a public pool that is, operated in conjunction with six or more dwelling units, suites, single family residences, or any combination of them for the use of occupants or residents and their visitors, operated in conjunction with a mobile home park for the use of residents or occupants and their visitors, operated on the premises of a hotel for the use of its guests and their visitors, operated on the premises of a campground for the use of its tenants and their visitors, operated in conjunction with a club for the use of its members and their visitors, or operated in conjunction with an establishment or institution classified in Table 3.1.2.1. as, Group B, Division 1, major occupancy, or Group B, Division 2 or 3, major occupancy, for the use of residents or occupants and their visitors.
ON Variations: A Class B pool is a public pool that is, operated in conjunction with six or more dwelling units, suites, single family residences, or any combination of them for the use of occupants or residents and their visitors, operated in conjunction with a mobile home park for the use of residents or occupants and their visitors, operated on the premises of a hotel for the use of its guests and their visitors, operated on the premises of a campground for the use of its tenants and their visitors, operated in conjunction with a club for the use of its members and their visitors, or operated in conjunction with an establishment or institution classified in Table 3.1.2.1. as, Group B, Division 1, major occupancy, or Group B, Division 2 or 3, major occupancy, for the use of residents or occupants and their visitors.

ON Full: Single wall metal smoke stacks shall be designed and installed in conformance with NFPA 211, "Chimneys, Fireplaces, Vents and Solid Fuel-Burning Appliances".
ON Variations: Single wall metal smoke stacks shall be designed and installed in conformance with NFPA 211, "Chimneys, Fireplaces, Vents and Solid Fuel-Burning Appliances".

ON Full: Where filters are used as for overspray collection, supports and holders for the filters shall be constructed of noncombustible materials.
ON Variations: Where filters are used as for overspray collection, supports and holders for the filters shall be constructed of noncombustible materials.

ON Full: The water velocity in a pressure pipe shall not exceed, 3.0 m/s for plastic piping, and 1.8 m/s for copper piping.
ON Variations: The water velocity in a pressure pipe shall not exceed, 3.0 m/s for plastic piping, and 1.8 m/s for copper piping.

ON Full: A slip joint shall not be used,(a) in a venting system, or (b) in a drainage system, except to connect a fixture trap to a fixture drain in an accessible location.
ON Variations: A slip joint shall not be used,(a) in a venting system, or (b) in a drainage system, except to connect a fixture trap to a fixture drain in an accessible location.

ON Full: Where exhaust ducts pass through combustible roofs or partitions, metal collars shall provide not less than a 100 mm clearance between the duct and combustible material.
ON Variations: Where exhaust ducts pass through combustible roofs or partitions, metal collars shall provide not less than a 100 mm clearance between the duct and combustible material.

ON Full: A clothes dryer exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 9.32.1.4. or Part 6.
ON Variations: A clothes dryer exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 9.32.1.4. or Part 6.

ON Full: Dip tank covers as required in Articles 5.13.6.2. and 5.13.6.3. shall be of noncombustible materials.
ON Variations: Dip tank covers as required in Articles 5.13.6.2. and 5.13.6.3. shall be of noncombustible materials.

ON Full: Mortar mix proportions shall conform to Table 9.20.3.2.B., with sufficient water to bring the mixture to a consistency adequate for laying masonry units.
ON Variations: Mortar mix proportions shall conform to Table 9.20.3.2.B., with sufficient water to bring the mixture to a consistency adequate for laying masonry units.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), mortar joint thickness for burned clay brick and concrete masonry units shall be 10 mm.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), mortar joint thickness for burned clay brick and concrete masonry units shall be 10 mm.

ON Full: Self-closing devices need not be provided on doors to freight elevators and dumbwaiters.
ON Variations: Self-closing devices need not be provided on doors to freight elevators and dumbwaiters.

ON Full: Electrically-conducting parts of duct systems, dust collectors and the machines they serve shall be grounded.
ON Variations: Electrically-conducting parts of duct systems, dust collectors and the machines they serve shall be grounded.

ON Full: Fire compartments regulated by this Subsection shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.
ON Variations: Fire compartments regulated by this Subsection shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (2), the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from or into containers shall take place in a storage room that complies with Subsection 4.2.9.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (2), the transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids from or into containers shall take place in a storage room that complies with Subsection 4.2.9.

ON Full: Radioactive nuclear substances and equipment shall be returned to storage after use.
ON Variations: Radioactive nuclear substances and equipment shall be returned to storage after use.

ON Full: Ties described in Sentence (5) shall be, (a) located within 300 mm of openings and spaced not more than 900 mm apart around openings, and (b) spaced not more than 900 mm apart horizontally and 460 mm apart vertically at other locations.
ON Variations: Ties described in Sentence (5) shall be, (a) located within 300 mm of openings and spaced not more than 900 mm apart around openings, and (b) spaced not more than 900 mm apart horizontally and 460 mm apart vertically at other locations.

ON Full: Combustible salvage, waste material and rubbish shall not be accumulated on site in such quantity or such location as to cause a fire hazard.
ON Variations: Combustible salvage, waste material and rubbish shall not be accumulated on site in such quantity or such location as to cause a fire hazard.

ON Full: Where foundations below ground level and concrete floors on ground are used, they shall comply with Section 9.13.
ON Variations: Where foundations below ground level and concrete floors on ground are used, they shall comply with Section 9.13.

ON Full: A septic tank shall be of such design and construction as will permit the collection and holding of sanitary sewage in it to a depth of not less than 1 000 mm, except that a depth of not less than 900 mm is permitted where the excavation is in rock, or to avoid rupture or displacement of the tank due to ground water pressure.
ON Variations: A septic tank shall be of such design and construction as will permit the collection and holding of sanitary sewage in it to a depth of not less than 1 000 mm, except that a depth of not less than 900 mm is permitted where the excavation is in rock, or to avoid rupture or displacement of the tank due to ground water pressure.

ON Full: Tanks referred to in Sentences (1) and (2) are not required to conform to the requirements of Clause 10.2.(j) of CSA B66 "Design, Material, and Manufacturing Requirements for Prefabricated Septic Tanks and Sewage Holding Tanks".
ON Variations: Tanks referred to in Sentences (1) and (2) are not required to conform to the requirements of Clause 10.2.(j) of CSA B66 "Design, Material, and Manufacturing Requirements for Prefabricated Septic Tanks and Sewage Holding Tanks".

ON Full: Visual signal devices are permitted to be installed in lieu of audible signal devices in the compartments referred to in Article 3.3.3.6.
ON Variations: Visual signal devices are permitted to be installed in lieu of audible signal devices in the compartments referred to in Article 3.3.3.6.

ON Full: Except as provided in this Subsection, a fire alarm system conforming to Subsection 3.2.4. shall be installed in a rapid transit station.
ON Variations: Except as provided in this Subsection, a fire alarm system conforming to Subsection 3.2.4. shall be installed in a rapid transit station.

ON Full: Perimeter drainage shall be provided where necessary to prevent surface run-off from draining onto the pool deck.
ON Variations: Perimeter drainage shall be provided where necessary to prevent surface run-off from draining onto the pool deck.

ON Full: An emergency power supply for the emergency lighting system required in Sentence (4) shall comply with Sentences 3.2.7.4.(1) and 3.2.7.7.(1) and Article 3.2.7.5.
ON Variations: An emergency power supply for the emergency lighting system required in Sentence (4) shall comply with Sentences 3.2.7.4.(1) and 3.2.7.7.(1) and Article 3.2.7.5.

ON Full: Where the headroom of an area in a barrier-free path of travel is reduced to less than 1 980 mm, a guardrail or other barrier with its leading edge at or below 680 mm from the finished floor shall be provided. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where the headroom of an area in a barrier-free path of travel is reduced to less than 1 980 mm, a guardrail or other barrier with its leading edge at or below 680 mm from the finished floor shall be provided. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except for corridors conforming to Sentence 3.3.1.4.(4) or as permitted in Sentences (5) and (6), a public corridor or corridor serving the public shall not be used as a portion of a supply, return or exhaust air system serving adjoining areas, other than as part of a supply air system serving toilet rooms, bathrooms, shower rooms and similar auxiliary spaces opening directly to the public corridor or corridor used by the public.
ON Variations: Except for corridors conforming to Sentence 3.3.1.4.(4) or as permitted in Sentences (5) and (6), a public corridor or corridor serving the public shall not be used as a portion of a supply, return or exhaust air system serving adjoining areas, other than as part of a supply air system serving toilet rooms, bathrooms, shower rooms and similar auxiliary spaces opening directly to the public corridor or corridor used by the public.

ON Full: Waste fittings shall conform to ASME A112.18.2 / CSA B125.2, "Plumbing Waste Fittings".
ON Variations: Waste fittings shall conform to ASME A112.18.2 / CSA B125.2, "Plumbing Waste Fittings".

ON Full: Standpipe and hose systems shall be installed in accordance with the Building Code.
ON Variations: Standpipe and hose systems shall be installed in accordance with the Building Code.

ON Full: Every sump or tank that receives sanitary sewage shall be provided with a vent pipe that is connected to the top of the sump or tank.
ON Variations: Every sump or tank that receives sanitary sewage shall be provided with a vent pipe that is connected to the top of the sump or tank.

ON Full: Except for a modified pool, one or more hose bibbs shall be installed near the perimeter of the pool deck in locations convenient for flushing the pool deck.
ON Variations: Except for a modified pool, one or more hose bibbs shall be installed near the perimeter of the pool deck in locations convenient for flushing the pool deck.

ON Full: Where a pneumatic leakage test is performed on a completely buried storage tank, the test pressure shall be not less than 35 and not more than 70 kPa (gauge).
ON Variations: Where a pneumatic leakage test is performed on a completely buried storage tank, the test pressure shall be not less than 35 and not more than 70 kPa (gauge).

ON Full: A public spa equipped with hydro-massage jet fittings shall be provided with a timing device, that controls the period of operation of the jet pump, and that is placed in a location where the user must exit the public spa to reset the timer.
ON Variations: A public spa equipped with hydro-massage jet fittings shall be provided with a timing device, that controls the period of operation of the jet pump, and that is placed in a location where the user must exit the public spa to reset the timer.

ON Full: Quantities of loose combustible fibres exceeding 15 m3 but not exceeding 30 m3 shall be stored in rooms separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation that has a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.
ON Variations: Quantities of loose combustible fibres exceeding 15 m3 but not exceeding 30 m3 shall be stored in rooms separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation that has a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.

ON Full: Where the Chief Fire Official determines that it is impractical to remove underground piping described in Sentence 4.3.17.4.(1), such piping shall have the ends permanently sealed by capping or plugging.
ON Variations: Where the Chief Fire Official determines that it is impractical to remove underground piping described in Sentence 4.3.17.4.(1), such piping shall have the ends permanently sealed by capping or plugging.

ON Full: A building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A. shall have no portion of the required access route more than 20 m below the floor level of the uppermost storey or mezzanine that is not a rooftop enclosure, provided for elevator machinery, a stairway or a service room used for no purpose other than for service to the building.
ON Variations: A building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A. shall have no portion of the required access route more than 20 m below the floor level of the uppermost storey or mezzanine that is not a rooftop enclosure, provided for elevator machinery, a stairway or a service room used for no purpose other than for service to the building.

ON Full: For the purposes of this Article, mezzanines, tiers and balconies shall be regarded as part of the floor area.
ON Variations: For the purposes of this Article, mezzanines, tiers and balconies shall be regarded as part of the floor area.

ON Full: A requirement of this Section is deemed to be complied with if alternative protection measures are approved that, in the opinion of the Chief Fire Official, will provide protection for life safety and health similar to the protection provided by compliance with the requirement.
ON Variations: A requirement of this Section is deemed to be complied with if alternative protection measures are approved that, in the opinion of the Chief Fire Official, will provide protection for life safety and health similar to the protection provided by compliance with the requirement.

ON Full: Hazardous materials, processes and operations shall be located and the premises maintained so that the means of egress will not be obstructed in any manner that would interfere with evacuation of the floor area in the event of a fire.
ON Variations: Hazardous materials, processes and operations shall be located and the premises maintained so that the means of egress will not be obstructed in any manner that would interfere with evacuation of the floor area in the event of a fire.

ON Full: Where a stone layer is used, the stone layer shall,(a) be rectangular in shape with the long dimension parallel to the site contours, (b) have a minimum thickness of 200 mm, (c) be protected in the manner described in Sentence 8.7.3.3.(2), and (d) be constructed such that the bottom of the stone layer is at least 600 mm above the high ground water table, rock or soil with a percolation time of 1 min or less or greater than 50 min. (e) have a minimum area not less than the value determined by the formula, A = Q/B where, A = the area of the stone layer in square metres, B = the following amount, (i) 50, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow exceeds 3 000 litres, or (ii) 75, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow does not exceed 3 000 litres, and Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres. (6.1) Where leaching chambers are used, (a) the Type A dispersal bed shall be rectangular in shape with the long dimension parallel to the site contours, and (b) the leaching chambers shall, (i) be evenly spaced over the area calculated in Subclause (iv), with a maximum distance of 200 mm between the exterior edges of the lines of leaching chamber, (ii) be protected in the manner described in Clause 8.7.3.4.(1)(f), (iii) be constructed such that the bottom of the leaching chambers is at least 600 mm above the high ground water table, rock or soil with a percolation time of 1 min or less or greater than 50 min, and (iv) have a minimum area not less than the value determined by the formula, A = Q/B where, A = the area over which the leaching chambers are spaced, in square metres, B = the following amount, (i) 50, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow exceeds 3 000 litres, or (ii) 75, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow does not exceed 3 000 litres, and Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres.
ON Variations: Where a stone layer is used, the stone layer shall,(a) be rectangular in shape with the long dimension parallel to the site contours, (b) have a minimum thickness of 200 mm, (c) be protected in the manner described in Sentence 8.7.3.3.(2), and (d) be constructed such that the bottom of the stone layer is at least 600 mm above the high ground water table, rock or soil with a percolation time of 1 min or less or greater than 50 min. (e) have a minimum area not less than the value determined by the formula, A = Q/B where, A = the area of the stone layer in square metres, B = the following amount, (i) 50, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow exceeds 3 000 litres, or (ii) 75, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow does not exceed 3 000 litres, and Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres. (6.1) Where leaching chambers are used, (a) the Type A dispersal bed shall be rectangular in shape with the long dimension parallel to the site contours, and (b) the leaching chambers shall, (i) be evenly spaced over the area calculated in Subclause (iv), with a maximum distance of 200 mm between the exterior edges of the lines of leaching chamber, (ii) be protected in the manner described in Clause 8.7.3.4.(1)(f), (iii) be constructed such that the bottom of the leaching chambers is at least 600 mm above the high ground water table, rock or soil with a percolation time of 1 min or less or greater than 50 min, and (iv) have a minimum area not less than the value determined by the formula, A = Q/B where, A = the area over which the leaching chambers are spaced, in square metres, B = the following amount, (i) 50, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow exceeds 3 000 litres, or (ii) 75, if the total daily design sanitary sewage flow does not exceed 3 000 litres, and Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres.

ON Full: Required vents are permitted to be roof type, eave type, gable-end type or any combination of them, and shall be distributed, (a) uniformly on opposite sides of the building, (b) with not less than 25% of the required openings located at the top of the space, and (c) with not less than 25% of the required openings located at the bottom of the space.
ON Variations: Required vents are permitted to be roof type, eave type, gable-end type or any combination of them, and shall be distributed, (a) uniformly on opposite sides of the building, (b) with not less than 25% of the required openings located at the top of the space, and (c) with not less than 25% of the required openings located at the bottom of the space.

ON Full: For the purpose of applying Sentence (1) and Categories 11 and 12 of Table 4.1.8.18., elements or components shall be assumed to be flexible or flexibly connected unless it can be shown that the fundamental period of the element or component and its connection is less than or equal to 0.06 s, in which case the element or component is classified as being rigid or rigidly connected.
ON Variations: For the purpose of applying Sentence (1) and Categories 11 and 12 of Table 4.1.8.18., elements or components shall be assumed to be flexible or flexibly connected unless it can be shown that the fundamental period of the element or component and its connection is less than or equal to 0.06 s, in which case the element or component is classified as being rigid or rigidly connected.

ON Full: The intersection of the saddle and the chimney shall be flashed and counterflashed as required in Article 9.26.4.4.
ON Variations: The intersection of the saddle and the chimney shall be flashed and counterflashed as required in Article 9.26.4.4.

ON Full: The a.m. and the p.m. peak period occupant loads for each platform shall be based on the simultaneous evacuation of the entraining load and the link load for that platform.
ON Variations: The a.m. and the p.m. peak period occupant loads for each platform shall be based on the simultaneous evacuation of the entraining load and the link load for that platform.

ON Full: The minimum unobstructed width of platforms measured from the platform edge shall be 2.5 m.
ON Variations: The minimum unobstructed width of platforms measured from the platform edge shall be 2.5 m.

ON Full: For the purposes of Sentences (1) and (2), a retirement home is deemed to be a separate major occupancy.
ON Variations: For the purposes of Sentences (1) and (2), a retirement home is deemed to be a separate major occupancy.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (5), where the leased area on any floor level exceeds 15% of the public area on that level, the public area shall be sprinklered.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (5), where the leased area on any floor level exceeds 15% of the public area on that level, the public area shall be sprinklered.

ON Full: A room intended for the storage of solid and liquid dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.
ON Variations: A room intended for the storage of solid and liquid dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h.

ON Full: Vertical joints in cladding described in Sentence (1) shall be protected with batten strips or caulking when the joints are not matched.
ON Variations: Vertical joints in cladding described in Sentence (1) shall be protected with batten strips or caulking when the joints are not matched.

ON Full: A minimum clear space of 550 mm shall be maintained between the walls of a room described in Article 4.3.13.1. and the sides of any storage tanks within the room.
ON Variations: A minimum clear space of 550 mm shall be maintained between the walls of a room described in Article 4.3.13.1. and the sides of any storage tanks within the room.

ON Full: Horizontal joints in cladding described in Sentence (1) shall be lapped not less than 25 mm or shall be suitably flashed.
ON Variations: Horizontal joints in cladding described in Sentence (1) shall be lapped not less than 25 mm or shall be suitably flashed.

ON Full: Mortar and grout containing a set-control admixture shall be manufactured off-site in a batching plant and shall be used and placed in final position within a time not exceeding the useful life as stipulated by the manufacturer.
ON Variations: Mortar and grout containing a set-control admixture shall be manufactured off-site in a batching plant and shall be used and placed in final position within a time not exceeding the useful life as stipulated by the manufacturer.

ON Full: Except for basement areas, the window required in Sentence (1) shall have a maximum sill height of 1 000 mm above the floor. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except for basement areas, the window required in Sentence (1) shall have a maximum sill height of 1 000 mm above the floor. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Doors or other means of access shall be provided in ovens and associated ductwork so that portable extinguishers or hose streams may be used in all parts of the equipment.
ON Variations: Doors or other means of access shall be provided in ovens and associated ductwork so that portable extinguishers or hose streams may be used in all parts of the equipment.

ON Full: Every potable water system shall be capable of,(a) withstanding without leakage a water pressure that is at least 1 000 kPa for at least 1 h, or (b) withstanding for at least 2 h without a drop in pressure an air pressure that is at least 700 kPa.
ON Variations: Every potable water system shall be capable of,(a) withstanding without leakage a water pressure that is at least 1 000 kPa for at least 1 h, or (b) withstanding for at least 2 h without a drop in pressure an air pressure that is at least 700 kPa.

ON Full: Where protective materials described in Sentence (3) are part of a vegetative roofing system, they shall be resistant to root and rhizome penetration when tested in accordance with ANSI/GRHC/SPRI VR-1, "Procedure for Investigating Resistance to Root Penetration on Vegetative Roofs". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where protective materials described in Sentence (3) are part of a vegetative roofing system, they shall be resistant to root and rhizome penetration when tested in accordance with ANSI/GRHC/SPRI VR-1, "Procedure for Investigating Resistance to Root Penetration on Vegetative Roofs". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply in rapid transit stations that comply with the Building Code.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply in rapid transit stations that comply with the Building Code.

ON Full: The ground enclosed by a tent and for not less than 3 m outside of such structure shall be cleared of all flammable or combustible material or vegetation that will carry fire.
ON Variations: The ground enclosed by a tent and for not less than 3 m outside of such structure shall be cleared of all flammable or combustible material or vegetation that will carry fire.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4), other fenestration assemblies and their components shall resist water penetration when tested in accordance with,(a) ASTM E331, "Water Penetration of Exterior Windows, Skylights, Doors, and Curtain Walls by Uniform Static Air Pressure Difference", or (b) ASTM E547, "Water Penetration of Exterior Windows, Skylights, Doors, and Curtain Walls by Cyclic Static Air Pressure Difference".
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4), other fenestration assemblies and their components shall resist water penetration when tested in accordance with,(a) ASTM E331, "Water Penetration of Exterior Windows, Skylights, Doors, and Curtain Walls by Uniform Static Air Pressure Difference", or (b) ASTM E547, "Water Penetration of Exterior Windows, Skylights, Doors, and Curtain Walls by Cyclic Static Air Pressure Difference".

ON Full: The height of guards for flights shall be measured vertically from the top of the guard to a straight line tangent to tread nosings served by the guard.
ON Variations: The height of guards for flights shall be measured vertically from the top of the guard to a straight line tangent to tread nosings served by the guard.

ON Full: Raw materials used in the manufacture of cellulose nitrate plastics shall be stored only in areas reserved for that purpose.
ON Variations: Raw materials used in the manufacture of cellulose nitrate plastics shall be stored only in areas reserved for that purpose.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (8), and except for doors with power operators, closers for doors in a barrier-free path of travel shall be designed to permit doors to open when a force of not more than 38 N is applied to the handles, push plates or latch-releasing devices in the case of exterior doors and 22 N in the case of interior doors.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (8), and except for doors with power operators, closers for doors in a barrier-free path of travel shall be designed to permit doors to open when a force of not more than 38 N is applied to the handles, push plates or latch-releasing devices in the case of exterior doors and 22 N in the case of interior doors.

ON Full: Tents shall not be erected closer than 3 m to the property line.
ON Variations: Tents shall not be erected closer than 3 m to the property line.

ON Full: Except where the wind loads are derived from the combined CpCg values determined in accordance with Article 4.1.7.6., buildings and structural members shall be capable of withstanding the effects of, (a) the full wind loads acting along each of the two principal horizontal axes considered separately, (b) the wind loads as described in Clause (a) but with 100% of the load removed from any one portion of the area, (c) the wind loads as described in Clause (a) but with both axes considered simultaneously at 75% of their full value, and (d) the wind loads as described in Clause (c) but with 50% of these loads removed from any portion of the area. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except where the wind loads are derived from the combined CpCg values determined in accordance with Article 4.1.7.6., buildings and structural members shall be capable of withstanding the effects of, (a) the full wind loads acting along each of the two principal horizontal axes considered separately, (b) the wind loads as described in Clause (a) but with 100% of the load removed from any one portion of the area, (c) the wind loads as described in Clause (a) but with both axes considered simultaneously at 75% of their full value, and (d) the wind loads as described in Clause (c) but with 50% of these loads removed from any portion of the area. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The minimum value of the illumination required by Sentence (4) shall be not less than 1 1x.
ON Variations: The minimum value of the illumination required by Sentence (4) shall be not less than 1 1x.

ON Full: Openings more than 600 mm but not more than 3 m in width in non-loadbearing flat insulating concrete form walls shall be reinforced at the top and bottom with one 10M bar.
ON Variations: Openings more than 600 mm but not more than 3 m in width in non-loadbearing flat insulating concrete form walls shall be reinforced at the top and bottom with one 10M bar.

ON Full: Veneer described in Sentence (1) over wood frame walls shall have not less than a 25 mm air space behind the veneer.
ON Variations: Veneer described in Sentence (1) over wood frame walls shall have not less than a 25 mm air space behind the veneer.

ON Full: Sheet metal roofing shall be not less than,(a) 0.33 mm thick galvanized steel, (b) 0.46 mm thick copper, (c) 0.46 mm thick zinc, or (d) 0.48 mm thick aluminum.
ON Variations: Sheet metal roofing shall be not less than,(a) 0.33 mm thick galvanized steel, (b) 0.46 mm thick copper, (c) 0.46 mm thick zinc, or (d) 0.48 mm thick aluminum.

ON Full: Dampproofing in Sentence (1) is not required where the exterior surfaces of foundation walls below ground level are waterproofed.
ON Variations: Dampproofing in Sentence (1) is not required where the exterior surfaces of foundation walls below ground level are waterproofed.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (6), if there are openings through a firewall, other than those for piping, tubing, wiring and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways, the requirements in this Subsection shall apply to the floor areas on both sides of the firewall as if they were in the same building.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (6), if there are openings through a firewall, other than those for piping, tubing, wiring and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways, the requirements in this Subsection shall apply to the floor areas on both sides of the firewall as if they were in the same building.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (7), where combustible insulation and covering is used on piping in buildings described in Subsection 3.2.6., they shall have a smoke developed classification of not more than 100.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (7), where combustible insulation and covering is used on piping in buildings described in Subsection 3.2.6., they shall have a smoke developed classification of not more than 100.

ON Full: For the purpose of Sentence (6), "single room or space" means a room or space that, is not divided by a wall, is divided by, a wall that extends less than 1.5 m from the interior face of the exterior wall, or a partial height wall, or consists of two or more stacked spaces that are on the same storey.
ON Variations: For the purpose of Sentence (6), "single room or space" means a room or space that, is not divided by a wall, is divided by, a wall that extends less than 1.5 m from the interior face of the exterior wall, or a partial height wall, or consists of two or more stacked spaces that are on the same storey.

ON Full: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the performance grades selected under Sentence (2) when tested in accordance with the standard referenced in Clause (1)(a).
ON Variations: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the performance grades selected under Sentence (2) when tested in accordance with the standard referenced in Clause (1)(a).

ON Full: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.8. and Sentences 3.2.2.43A.(5) and 3.2.2.50A.(4), in a building in which one major occupancy is located entirely above another major occupancy, the requirements in this Subsection for each portion of the building containing a major occupancy shall apply to that portion as if the entire building was of that major occupancy.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.8. and Sentences 3.2.2.43A.(5) and 3.2.2.50A.(4), in a building in which one major occupancy is located entirely above another major occupancy, the requirements in this Subsection for each portion of the building containing a major occupancy shall apply to that portion as if the entire building was of that major occupancy.

ON Full: If the unsaturated soil or leaching bed fill described in Sentence (1) has a percolation time greater than 15 minutes, any additional leaching bed fill added to it to form the leaching bed shall have a percolation time not less than 75% of the percolation time of the unsaturated soil or leaching bed fill to which it is added.
