ON Variations: If the unsaturated soil or leaching bed fill described in Sentence (1) has a percolation time greater than 15 minutes, any additional leaching bed fill added to it to form the leaching bed shall have a percolation time not less than 75% of the percolation time of the unsaturated soil or leaching bed fill to which it is added.

ON Full: Individual fire compartments referred to in Sentence (1) shall not have fans that exhaust directly into the duct in the vertical service space.
ON Variations: Individual fire compartments referred to in Sentence (1) shall not have fans that exhaust directly into the duct in the vertical service space.

ON Full: Loadbearing interior walls at right angles to floor joists shall be located not more than 900 mm from the joist support when the wall does not support a floor, and not more than 600 mm from the joist support when the wall supports one or more floors, unless the joist size is designed to support such loads.
ON Variations: Loadbearing interior walls at right angles to floor joists shall be located not more than 900 mm from the joist support when the wall does not support a floor, and not more than 600 mm from the joist support when the wall supports one or more floors, unless the joist size is designed to support such loads.

ON Full: A diving board or a diving platform 600 mm or less in height above the water surface shall project over the water a horizontal distance of at least 900 mm from the vertical projection of a pool wall under it.
ON Variations: A diving board or a diving platform 600 mm or less in height above the water surface shall project over the water a horizontal distance of at least 900 mm from the vertical projection of a pool wall under it.

ON Full: The permission in Sentence (4) to consider separated portions of a building as separate buildings does not apply to service rooms and storage rooms.
ON Variations: The permission in Sentence (4) to consider separated portions of a building as separate buildings does not apply to service rooms and storage rooms.

ON Full: Hose valves shall be inspected annually to ensure that they are tight so that there is no water leakage into the hose.
ON Variations: Hose valves shall be inspected annually to ensure that they are tight so that there is no water leakage into the hose.

ON Full: The performance level of an existing dwelling unit is reduced where proposed construction that, (a) increases the number of bedrooms in the dwelling unit, (b) exceeds 15% of the finished area of the dwelling unit, or (c) adds new plumbing fixtures to the dwelling unit, will result in the total daily design sanitary sewage flow of the dwelling unit, calculated in accordance with Article 8.2.1.3., exceeding the capacity of any component of a sewage system serving the dwelling unit.
ON Variations: The performance level of an existing dwelling unit is reduced where proposed construction that, (a) increases the number of bedrooms in the dwelling unit, (b) exceeds 15% of the finished area of the dwelling unit, or (c) adds new plumbing fixtures to the dwelling unit, will result in the total daily design sanitary sewage flow of the dwelling unit, calculated in accordance with Article 8.2.1.3., exceeding the capacity of any component of a sewage system serving the dwelling unit.

ON Full: Steel deck roof diaphragms in buildings of less than 4 storeys or wood diaphragms that are designed and detailed according to the applicable referenced design standards to exhibit ductile behaviour shall meet the requirements of Sentence (1), except that they may yield and the forces shall be, (a) for wood diaphragms acting in combination with vertical wood shear walls, equal to the lateral earthquake design force, (b) for wood diaphragms acting in combination with other SFRS, not less than the force corresponding to RdRo = 2.0, and (c) for steel deck roof diaphragms, not less than the force corresponding to RdRo = 2.0.
ON Variations: Steel deck roof diaphragms in buildings of less than 4 storeys or wood diaphragms that are designed and detailed according to the applicable referenced design standards to exhibit ductile behaviour shall meet the requirements of Sentence (1), except that they may yield and the forces shall be, (a) for wood diaphragms acting in combination with vertical wood shear walls, equal to the lateral earthquake design force, (b) for wood diaphragms acting in combination with other SFRS, not less than the force corresponding to RdRo = 2.0, and (c) for steel deck roof diaphragms, not less than the force corresponding to RdRo = 2.0.

ON Full: Where a stair or ramp is wider than its required exit width, handrails shall be located along the most direct path of travel. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where a stair or ramp is wider than its required exit width, handrails shall be located along the most direct path of travel. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (7), where combustible insulation is used on piping in a horizontal or vertical service space, the insulation and coverings on such pipes shall have a flame-spread rating throughout the material of not more than 25 in buildings of noncombustible construction and not more than 75 in buildings of combustible construction.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (7), where combustible insulation is used on piping in a horizontal or vertical service space, the insulation and coverings on such pipes shall have a flame-spread rating throughout the material of not more than 25 in buildings of noncombustible construction and not more than 75 in buildings of combustible construction.

ON Full: Galvanized steel pipe and fittings shall conform to ASTM A53 / A53M, "Pipe, Steel, Black and Hot Dipped, Zinc-Coated Welded and Seamless".
ON Variations: Galvanized steel pipe and fittings shall conform to ASTM A53 / A53M, "Pipe, Steel, Black and Hot Dipped, Zinc-Coated Welded and Seamless".

ON Full: A means shall be provided that is capable of alerting persons throughout a building under demolition and the property on which the building is located of a fire emergency.
ON Variations: A means shall be provided that is capable of alerting persons throughout a building under demolition and the property on which the building is located of a fire emergency.

ON Full: The fire-resistance rating of a fire separation referred to in Sentence (4) is permitted to be less than 1 h but not less than 45 min provided the fire-resistance rating required by Subsection 3.2.2. is permitted to be less than 1 h for, the floor assembly above the floor area, or the floor assembly below the floor area, if there is no floor assembly above.
ON Variations: The fire-resistance rating of a fire separation referred to in Sentence (4) is permitted to be less than 1 h but not less than 45 min provided the fire-resistance rating required by Subsection 3.2.2. is permitted to be less than 1 h for, the floor assembly above the floor area, or the floor assembly below the floor area, if there is no floor assembly above.

ON Full: Unprotected steam or hot water pipes that pass through a storage space shall be covered with not less than 25 mm of noncombustible insulation to prevent direct contact with the material stored.
ON Variations: Unprotected steam or hot water pipes that pass through a storage space shall be covered with not less than 25 mm of noncombustible insulation to prevent direct contact with the material stored.

ON Full: The joints between wall tiles and a bathtub or shower shall be suitably caulked with material conforming to CAN/CGSB-19.22-M, "Mildew Resistant Sealing Compound for Tubs and Tile".
ON Variations: The joints between wall tiles and a bathtub or shower shall be suitably caulked with material conforming to CAN/CGSB-19.22-M, "Mildew Resistant Sealing Compound for Tubs and Tile".

ON Full: This Section applies to the design and construction of site-assembled public spas and factory-built public spas.
ON Variations: This Section applies to the design and construction of site-assembled public spas and factory-built public spas.

ON Full: A permanent sign shall be posted, at or near the sprinkler control valve, containing, the word NOTICE in contrasting letters, a description of the commodity class as defined in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems", and the sprinkler design criteria used for the shelf and rack storage system.
ON Variations: A permanent sign shall be posted, at or near the sprinkler control valve, containing, the word NOTICE in contrasting letters, a description of the commodity class as defined in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems", and the sprinkler design criteria used for the shelf and rack storage system.

ON Full: Every person operating a treatment unit that is used in conjunction with a leaching bed constructed as a shallow buried trench, Type A dispersal bed or Type B dispersal bed shall,(a) take a grab sample of the effluent to determine the level of CBOD5 and suspended solids in the effluent, (b) carry out the sampling required by Clause (1)(a) in accordance with the methods described in the APHA/AWWA/WEF, "Standard Methods for the Examination of Water and Wastewater", and (c) promptly submit the results of the sampling required by Clause (a) to the chief building official.
ON Variations: Every person operating a treatment unit that is used in conjunction with a leaching bed constructed as a shallow buried trench, Type A dispersal bed or Type B dispersal bed shall,(a) take a grab sample of the effluent to determine the level of CBOD5 and suspended solids in the effluent, (b) carry out the sampling required by Clause (1)(a) in accordance with the methods described in the APHA/AWWA/WEF, "Standard Methods for the Examination of Water and Wastewater", and (c) promptly submit the results of the sampling required by Clause (a) to the chief building official.

ON Full: Except where no space is provided between ladder treads and the pool wall, the space between the pool wall and submerged portions of any treads of a ladder for entry into and egress from the water shall be not more than 150 mm and not less than 75 mm.
ON Variations: Except where no space is provided between ladder treads and the pool wall, the space between the pool wall and submerged portions of any treads of a ladder for entry into and egress from the water shall be not more than 150 mm and not less than 75 mm.

ON Full: When two or more classes of liquids are stored in a single storage room referred to in Sentence 4.3.12.4.(1), the total quantities of stored liquids shall meet the requirements of the following equation:
ON Variations: When two or more classes of liquids are stored in a single storage room referred to in Sentence 4.3.12.4.(1), the total quantities of stored liquids shall meet the requirements of the following equation:

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (4) and in Article 3.6.4.3., all ducts, duct connectors, associated fittings and plenums used in air duct systems shall be constructed of steel, aluminum alloy, copper, clay or similar noncombustible material.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (4) and in Article 3.6.4.3., all ducts, duct connectors, associated fittings and plenums used in air duct systems shall be constructed of steel, aluminum alloy, copper, clay or similar noncombustible material.

ON Full: Fixed glass windows shall not be used for the venting required by Sentence (1) if the breaking of the windows could endanger pedestrians below.
ON Variations: Fixed glass windows shall not be used for the venting required by Sentence (1) if the breaking of the windows could endanger pedestrians below.

ON Full: Concrete block foundation walls shall be parged on the exterior face below ground level as required in Section 9.13.
ON Variations: Concrete block foundation walls shall be parged on the exterior face below ground level as required in Section 9.13.

ON Full: Every exit door shall be designed and installed so that, when the latch is released, the door will open in the direction of exit travel under a force of not more than 90 N, applied at the knob or other latch releasing device.
ON Variations: Every exit door shall be designed and installed so that, when the latch is released, the door will open in the direction of exit travel under a force of not more than 90 N, applied at the knob or other latch releasing device.

ON Full: For guards within dwelling units and in exterior guards serving not more than 2 dwelling units, where the width and spacing of pickets are such that three pickets can be engaged by a load imposed over a 300 mm width, the load shall be imposed so as to engage three pickets.
ON Variations: For guards within dwelling units and in exterior guards serving not more than 2 dwelling units, where the width and spacing of pickets are such that three pickets can be engaged by a load imposed over a 300 mm width, the load shall be imposed so as to engage three pickets.

ON Full: The stone layer containing the distribution pipes shall,(a) be comprised of washed septic stone, free of fine material, with gradation conforming to Table 8.7.3.3., (b) extend not less than 250 mm below the distribution pipe, and (c) extend not less than 50 mm above the distribution pipe.
ON Variations: The stone layer containing the distribution pipes shall,(a) be comprised of washed septic stone, free of fine material, with gradation conforming to Table 8.7.3.3., (b) extend not less than 250 mm below the distribution pipe, and (c) extend not less than 50 mm above the distribution pipe.

ON Full: If an annunciator is not installed as part of a fire alarm system in conformance with Sentence (1), a visual and audible trouble signal device shall be provided inside the main entrance of the building.
ON Variations: If an annunciator is not installed as part of a fire alarm system in conformance with Sentence (1), a visual and audible trouble signal device shall be provided inside the main entrance of the building.

ON Full: A floor drain shall be provided in a public laundry room, garbage room, incinerator room, boiler or heating room that is not located within a dwelling unit.
ON Variations: A floor drain shall be provided in a public laundry room, garbage room, incinerator room, boiler or heating room that is not located within a dwelling unit.

ON Full: Hydrants shall be located in the access routes required in Sentence (2) so that the locations conform to Sentence 3.10.3.4.(3).
ON Variations: Hydrants shall be located in the access routes required in Sentence (2) so that the locations conform to Sentence 3.10.3.4.(3).

ON Full: Flooring described in Sentence (1) shall be attached to the base with a suitable waterproof and alkali-resistant adhesive.
ON Variations: Flooring described in Sentence (1) shall be attached to the base with a suitable waterproof and alkali-resistant adhesive.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), fire escapes shall not be erected on a building.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), fire escapes shall not be erected on a building.

ON Full: At least one handrail shall be provided on straight flights that are less than 1 100 mm in width.
ON Variations: At least one handrail shall be provided on straight flights that are less than 1 100 mm in width.

ON Full: Wood decorative cladding is permitted to be used on exterior marquee fascias, of a storey having direct access to a street or access route, of a building required to be of noncombustible construction, provided the cladding is fire-retardant treated wood that, before testing to CAN/ULC-S102, "Test for Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials and Assemblies", has been conditioned in conformance with ASTM D2898, "Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing".
ON Variations: Wood decorative cladding is permitted to be used on exterior marquee fascias, of a storey having direct access to a street or access route, of a building required to be of noncombustible construction, provided the cladding is fire-retardant treated wood that, before testing to CAN/ULC-S102, "Test for Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials and Assemblies", has been conditioned in conformance with ASTM D2898, "Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing".

ON Full: The design, construction, installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the requirements of the Building Code.
ON Variations: The design, construction, installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the requirements of the Building Code.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), each building situated on property that abuts on a street in which a public or municipal water main is located shall be provided with or have accessible to its occupants a plumbing system including a potable water supply, a sanitary drainage system and plumbing fixtures.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), each building situated on property that abuts on a street in which a public or municipal water main is located shall be provided with or have accessible to its occupants a plumbing system including a potable water supply, a sanitary drainage system and plumbing fixtures.

ON Full: If mirrors are installed in a washroom described in Sentence 3.8.2.3.(2), (3) or (4), at least one mirror shall be, installed above a lavatory required by Sentence (1), and mounted with its bottom edge not more than 1 000 mm above the finished floor or inclined to the vertical to be usable by a person in a wheelchair.
ON Variations: If mirrors are installed in a washroom described in Sentence 3.8.2.3.(2), (3) or (4), at least one mirror shall be, installed above a lavatory required by Sentence (1), and mounted with its bottom edge not more than 1 000 mm above the finished floor or inclined to the vertical to be usable by a person in a wheelchair.

ON Full: A combustible solar collector system is permitted to be installed above the roof of a building required to be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: A combustible solar collector system is permitted to be installed above the roof of a building required to be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Couplings for corrugated steel pipe shall be constructed so that when installed they shall, (a) maintain the pipe alignment, (b) resist the separation of adjoining lengths of pipe, (c) prevent root penetration, and (d) prevent the infiltration of surrounding material.
ON Variations: Couplings for corrugated steel pipe shall be constructed so that when installed they shall, (a) maintain the pipe alignment, (b) resist the separation of adjoining lengths of pipe, (c) prevent root penetration, and (d) prevent the infiltration of surrounding material.

ON Full: Fittings returning water and/or air to the pool tank that are located within 300 mm of the water surface are permitted to have openings with one dimension more than 7 mm but shall contain no openings more than 25 mm in diameter.
ON Variations: Fittings returning water and/or air to the pool tank that are located within 300 mm of the water surface are permitted to have openings with one dimension more than 7 mm but shall contain no openings more than 25 mm in diameter.

ON Full: The first storey shall be subdivided into areas not more than 500 m2 by a masonry or reinforced concrete fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or it shall be sprinklered.
ON Variations: The first storey shall be subdivided into areas not more than 500 m2 by a masonry or reinforced concrete fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or it shall be sprinklered.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), openings through guards shall be of a size that prevents the passage of a spherical object having a diameter of 100 mm. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), openings through guards shall be of a size that prevents the passage of a spherical object having a diameter of 100 mm. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A wall assembly permitted by Sentence (1) that includes combustible cladding of fire-retardant treated wood shall be tested for fire exposure after the cladding has been subjected to an accelerated weathering test as specified in ASTM D2898, "Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing".
ON Variations: A wall assembly permitted by Sentence (1) that includes combustible cladding of fire-retardant treated wood shall be tested for fire exposure after the cladding has been subjected to an accelerated weathering test as specified in ASTM D2898, "Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing".

ON Full: A grab bar described in Clause (3)(a) or (c) or (4)(b) shall, be installed to resist a load of at least 1.3 kN applied vertically or horizontally, be not less than 30 mm and not more than 40 mm in diameter, have a clearance of not less than 38 mm and not more than 50 mm from the wall to the inside surface of the grab bar, and have a slip-resistant surface.
ON Variations: A grab bar described in Clause (3)(a) or (c) or (4)(b) shall, be installed to resist a load of at least 1.3 kN applied vertically or horizontally, be not less than 30 mm and not more than 40 mm in diameter, have a clearance of not less than 38 mm and not more than 50 mm from the wall to the inside surface of the grab bar, and have a slip-resistant surface.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences 8.2.1.4.(1) and (2), no Class 1, 2 or 3 sewage system shall have a horizontal distance of less than that permitted by Table 8.2.1.5.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 8.2.1.4.(1) and (2), no Class 1, 2 or 3 sewage system shall have a horizontal distance of less than that permitted by Table 8.2.1.5.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), no exit from a floor area above or below the first storey shall lead through a lobby.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), no exit from a floor area above or below the first storey shall lead through a lobby.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), all buildings shall be ventilated in accordance with this Part.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), all buildings shall be ventilated in accordance with this Part.

ON Full: Permanently installed access walkways at least 1.8 m wide and constructed of noncombustible material shall be provided so that hose streams may be directed on any part of the piles.
ON Variations: Permanently installed access walkways at least 1.8 m wide and constructed of noncombustible material shall be provided so that hose streams may be directed on any part of the piles.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.16., the building referred to in Sentence (1) shall be of noncombustible construction, and, except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.7.(1), the building shall be sprinklered, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less 1 h, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.16., the building referred to in Sentence (1) shall be of noncombustible construction, and, except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.7.(1), the building shall be sprinklered, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less 1 h, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.

ON Full: This Part applies to installation, checking, inspection, testing, maintenance and operation of fire protection equipment and life safety systems.
ON Variations: This Part applies to installation, checking, inspection, testing, maintenance and operation of fire protection equipment and life safety systems.

ON Full: Where a door is provided between a suite having a barrier-free path of travel required by Sentence (1) and an adjoining suite, the door shall conform to Sentences 3.8.3.3.(1) and (3).
ON Variations: Where a door is provided between a suite having a barrier-free path of travel required by Sentence (1) and an adjoining suite, the door shall conform to Sentences 3.8.3.3.(1) and (3).

ON Full: Any process or activity that produces flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres in quantities sufficient to create a fire or explosion hazard shall be interrupted and the hazardous conditions shall be removed before any hot work is carried out.
ON Variations: Any process or activity that produces flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres in quantities sufficient to create a fire or explosion hazard shall be interrupted and the hazardous conditions shall be removed before any hot work is carried out.

ON Full: Earthquake forces shall be assumed to act in any horizontal direction, except that the following shall be considered to provide adequate design force levels in the structure: (a) where components of the SFRS are oriented along a set of orthogonal axes, independent analyses about each of the principal axes of the structure shall be performed, (b) where the components of the SFRS are not oriented along a set of orthogonal axes and IEFaSa(0.2) is less than 0.35, independent analyses about any two orthogonal axes is permitted, or (c) where the components of the SFRS are not oriented along a set of orthogonal axes and IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, analysis of the structure independently in any two orthogonal directions for 100% of the prescribed earthquake loads applied in one direction plus 30% of the prescribed earthquake loads in the perpendicular direction, with the combination requiring the greater element strength being used in the design.
ON Variations: Earthquake forces shall be assumed to act in any horizontal direction, except that the following shall be considered to provide adequate design force levels in the structure: (a) where components of the SFRS are oriented along a set of orthogonal axes, independent analyses about each of the principal axes of the structure shall be performed, (b) where the components of the SFRS are not oriented along a set of orthogonal axes and IEFaSa(0.2) is less than 0.35, independent analyses about any two orthogonal axes is permitted, or (c) where the components of the SFRS are not oriented along a set of orthogonal axes and IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, analysis of the structure independently in any two orthogonal directions for 100% of the prescribed earthquake loads applied in one direction plus 30% of the prescribed earthquake loads in the perpendicular direction, with the combination requiring the greater element strength being used in the design.

ON Full: The automatic sprinkler system shall be electrically supervised to indicate a trouble signal on the building fire alarm system annunciator or where the building does not have a fire alarm system, to notify the person controlling the operation of the building for each of the situations listed in Sentence 3.2.4.10.(3).
ON Variations: The automatic sprinkler system shall be electrically supervised to indicate a trouble signal on the building fire alarm system annunciator or where the building does not have a fire alarm system, to notify the person controlling the operation of the building for each of the situations listed in Sentence 3.2.4.10.(3).

ON Full: Up to one half of the number of portable extinguishers required in Table 6.2.6.A. may be replaced by hose stations.
ON Variations: Up to one half of the number of portable extinguishers required in Table 6.2.6.A. may be replaced by hose stations.

ON Full: A refuse bin conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3) shall be provided at each boiler, furnace, incinerator and refuse burner referred to in Article 3.2.2.17.
ON Variations: A refuse bin conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3) shall be provided at each boiler, furnace, incinerator and refuse burner referred to in Article 3.2.2.17.

ON Full: The structural design of air-supported structures shall conform to CSA S367, "Air-, Cable-, and Frame-Supported Membrane Structures" using the loads stipulated in Section 4.1., in accordance with limit states design in Subsection 4.1.3.
ON Variations: The structural design of air-supported structures shall conform to CSA S367, "Air-, Cable-, and Frame-Supported Membrane Structures" using the loads stipulated in Section 4.1., in accordance with limit states design in Subsection 4.1.3.

ON Full: Required fans shall be installed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
ON Variations: Required fans shall be installed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

ON Full: At sites where IEFaSa(0.2) is greater than 0.75, the following requirements shall be satisfied: (a) piles, drilled piers, or caissons shall be designed and detailed to accommodate cyclic inelastic behaviour when the design moment in the element due to earthquake effects is greater than 75% of its moment capacity, and (See Appendix A.) (b) spread footings founded on soil defined as Site Class E or F shall be interconnected by continuous ties in no fewer than two directions.
ON Variations: At sites where IEFaSa(0.2) is greater than 0.75, the following requirements shall be satisfied: (a) piles, drilled piers, or caissons shall be designed and detailed to accommodate cyclic inelastic behaviour when the design moment in the element due to earthquake effects is greater than 75% of its moment capacity, and (See Appendix A.) (b) spread footings founded on soil defined as Site Class E or F shall be interconnected by continuous ties in no fewer than two directions.

ON Full: Where an access is provided between a rapid transit station and an adjacent building, the station and the building shall be separated by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.
ON Variations: Where an access is provided between a rapid transit station and an adjacent building, the station and the building shall be separated by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h.

ON Full: In-service underground storage tanks that do not comply with Sentence (1) may remain in-service if the tanks are not leaking and if the tanks met the requirements of this Code on December 31, 2014, as it read on that day.
ON Variations: In-service underground storage tanks that do not comply with Sentence (1) may remain in-service if the tanks are not leaking and if the tanks met the requirements of this Code on December 31, 2014, as it read on that day.

ON Full: Close spaced sprinkler protection shall be provided on each side of all vestibule doors.
ON Variations: Close spaced sprinkler protection shall be provided on each side of all vestibule doors.

ON Full: The outlet required in Sentence (1) nearest the stairs shall be controlled by a wall switch located at the head of the stairs.
ON Variations: The outlet required in Sentence (1) nearest the stairs shall be controlled by a wall switch located at the head of the stairs.

ON Full: Despite Clause (1)(a), the performance level of an existing building is reduced where proposed construction will result in the change of the major occupancy of all or part of an existing building to a Group C major occupancy in a building over 3 storeys in building height, except in a building conforming to Subclause 3.2.2.44.(1)(a)(ii) and having an egress facility conforming to Sentence 3.3.4.4.(8).
ON Variations: Despite Clause (1)(a), the performance level of an existing building is reduced where proposed construction will result in the change of the major occupancy of all or part of an existing building to a Group C major occupancy in a building over 3 storeys in building height, except in a building conforming to Subclause 3.2.2.44.(1)(a)(ii) and having an egress facility conforming to Sentence 3.3.4.4.(8).

ON Full: Every vent pipe shall be installed without depression in which moisture can collect.
ON Variations: Every vent pipe shall be installed without depression in which moisture can collect.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (3), in a building having elevators that serve storeys above the first storey and that are equipped with an automatic emergency recall feature, smoke detectors shall be installed in the elevator lobbies on the recall level so that when these smoke detectors are actuated, the elevators will automatically return directly to an alternate floor level.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (3), in a building having elevators that serve storeys above the first storey and that are equipped with an automatic emergency recall feature, smoke detectors shall be installed in the elevator lobbies on the recall level so that when these smoke detectors are actuated, the elevators will automatically return directly to an alternate floor level.

ON Full: Unless otherwise stated in this Subsection, the loading and unloading of tank vehicles shall be conducted in conformance with the applicable provisions in Subsection 4.6.4.
ON Variations: Unless otherwise stated in this Subsection, the loading and unloading of tank vehicles shall be conducted in conformance with the applicable provisions in Subsection 4.6.4.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4) and Article 9.13.3.1., where the exterior finished ground level is at a higher elevation than the ground level inside the foundation walls, exterior surfaces of foundation walls below ground level shall be dampproofed.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4) and Article 9.13.3.1., where the exterior finished ground level is at a higher elevation than the ground level inside the foundation walls, exterior surfaces of foundation walls below ground level shall be dampproofed.

ON Full: Groove and shoulder type mechanical pipe couplings shall conform to CSA B242, "Groove and Shoulder Type Mechanical Pipe Couplings".
ON Variations: Groove and shoulder type mechanical pipe couplings shall conform to CSA B242, "Groove and Shoulder Type Mechanical Pipe Couplings".

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.11.6.1.(7) for a modified pool, water in all public pools shall be capable of being emptied through the pool drains in 12 hours or less.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.11.6.1.(7) for a modified pool, water in all public pools shall be capable of being emptied through the pool drains in 12 hours or less.

ON Full: Where a receptacle controlled by a wall switch is provided in bedrooms or living rooms, such rooms need not conform to the requirements of Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Where a receptacle controlled by a wall switch is provided in bedrooms or living rooms, such rooms need not conform to the requirements of Sentence (1).

ON Full: The general ventilation system described in Sentence (8) shall be designed to, (a) operate continuously, or (b) be controlled automatically by carbon monoxide monitoring devices, located so as to provide full protection throughout the repair garage.
ON Variations: The general ventilation system described in Sentence (8) shall be designed to, (a) operate continuously, or (b) be controlled automatically by carbon monoxide monitoring devices, located so as to provide full protection throughout the repair garage.

ON Full: Where roof soffits project to less than 1.2 m from the centre line of a lane or public thoroughfare or from an imaginary line between two buildings or fire compartments on the same property, they shall, have no openings, and be protected by, not less than 0.38 mm thick sheet steel, unvented aluminum conforming to CAN/CGSB-93.2-M, "Prefinished Aluminum Siding, Soffits and Fascia, for Residential Use", not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum soffit board or gypsum ceiling board installed according to CSA A82.31 M, "Gypsum Board Application", not less than 11 mm thick plywood, not less than 12.5 mm thick OSB or waferboard, or not less than 11 mm thick lumber.
ON Variations: Where roof soffits project to less than 1.2 m from the centre line of a lane or public thoroughfare or from an imaginary line between two buildings or fire compartments on the same property, they shall, have no openings, and be protected by, not less than 0.38 mm thick sheet steel, unvented aluminum conforming to CAN/CGSB-93.2-M, "Prefinished Aluminum Siding, Soffits and Fascia, for Residential Use", not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum soffit board or gypsum ceiling board installed according to CSA A82.31 M, "Gypsum Board Application", not less than 11 mm thick plywood, not less than 12.5 mm thick OSB or waferboard, or not less than 11 mm thick lumber.

ON Full: The junction of door and window frames with masonry shall be caulked in conformance with Subsection 9.27.4.
ON Variations: The junction of door and window frames with masonry shall be caulked in conformance with Subsection 9.27.4.

ON Full: Every wave action pool shall have a communication system for the use of persons engaged in supervision or operation of the pool that shall be interconnected with each lifeguard control station, the first-aid room and the bather admission control centre.
ON Variations: Every wave action pool shall have a communication system for the use of persons engaged in supervision or operation of the pool that shall be interconnected with each lifeguard control station, the first-aid room and the bather admission control centre.

ON Full: All ductwork shall be permanently supported or clipped to prevent sagging, excessive movement and vibration.
ON Variations: All ductwork shall be permanently supported or clipped to prevent sagging, excessive movement and vibration.

ON Full: Despite Sentence (4), Articles 5.6.2.1. to 5.6.2.4. apply to any amount of poisonous or corrosive compressed gas.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence (4), Articles 5.6.2.1. to 5.6.2.4. apply to any amount of poisonous or corrosive compressed gas.

ON Full: Packaged systems for solar heating of potable water in residential occupancies shall be installed in conformance with CAN/CSA-F383, "Installation of Packaged Solar Domestic Hot Water Systems".
ON Variations: Packaged systems for solar heating of potable water in residential occupancies shall be installed in conformance with CAN/CSA-F383, "Installation of Packaged Solar Domestic Hot Water Systems".

ON Full: A 45 mm thick solid core wood door is permitted to be used where a minimum fire-protection rating of 20 min is permitted or between a public corridor and a suite provided the door conforms to CAN/ULC-S113, "Wood Core Doors Meeting the Performance Required by CAN/ULC-S104 for Twenty Minute Fire Rated Closure Assemblies". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A 45 mm thick solid core wood door is permitted to be used where a minimum fire-protection rating of 20 min is permitted or between a public corridor and a suite provided the door conforms to CAN/ULC-S113, "Wood Core Doors Meeting the Performance Required by CAN/ULC-S104 for Twenty Minute Fire Rated Closure Assemblies". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Vertical building assemblies that separate interior space from the ground are permitted to be dampproofed where,(a) the building assemblies are not subjected to hydrostatic pressure, (b) the substrate is cast-in-place concrete, and (c) a drainage layer is installed between the building assembly and the soil. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Vertical building assemblies that separate interior space from the ground are permitted to be dampproofed where,(a) the building assemblies are not subjected to hydrostatic pressure, (b) the substrate is cast-in-place concrete, and (c) a drainage layer is installed between the building assembly and the soil. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Joists or beams may be supported on masonry walls that enclose chimney flues provided the combustible members are separated from the flue by a minimum of 290 mm of solid masonry.
ON Variations: Joists or beams may be supported on masonry walls that enclose chimney flues provided the combustible members are separated from the flue by a minimum of 290 mm of solid masonry.

ON Full: Reserved
ON Variations: Reserved

ON Full: Where there is eccentricity or inclination of loading in foundation units, this effect shall be fully investigated and provided for in the design.
ON Variations: Where there is eccentricity or inclination of loading in foundation units, this effect shall be fully investigated and provided for in the design.

ON Full: Every pipe that is supplied with water from a tank on the property that is a gravity water tank or a tank of a drinking water system shall be provided with a shut-off valve located close to the tank.
ON Variations: Every pipe that is supplied with water from a tank on the property that is a gravity water tank or a tank of a drinking water system shall be provided with a shut-off valve located close to the tank.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (4) to (12) and Article 9.10.9.7., pipes, ducts, electrical outlet boxes, totally enclosed raceways or other similar service equipment that partly or wholly penetrate an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall be noncombustible unless the assembly has been tested incorporating such equipment.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (4) to (12) and Article 9.10.9.7., pipes, ducts, electrical outlet boxes, totally enclosed raceways or other similar service equipment that partly or wholly penetrate an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall be noncombustible unless the assembly has been tested incorporating such equipment.

ON Full: Flashing described in Sentences (1) and (3) shall, (a) extend not less that 50 mm upward inboard of the sheathing membrane or sheathing installed in lieu of the sheathing membrane, (b) have a slope of not less than 6% toward the exterior after the expected shrinkage of the building frame, (c) terminate at each end with an end-dam, (i) with a height in millimetres not less than 25 mm or 1/10 of the value of the 1 in 5 driving rain wind pressure in Pa, and (ii) at the height defined in Subclause (i), extending to the face of the adjacent cladding, (d) lap not less than 10 mm vertically over the building element below, and (e) terminate in a drip extending not less than 5 mm outward from the outer face of the building element below. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Flashing described in Sentences (1) and (3) shall, (a) extend not less that 50 mm upward inboard of the sheathing membrane or sheathing installed in lieu of the sheathing membrane, (b) have a slope of not less than 6% toward the exterior after the expected shrinkage of the building frame, (c) terminate at each end with an end-dam, (i) with a height in millimetres not less than 25 mm or 1/10 of the value of the 1 in 5 driving rain wind pressure in Pa, and (ii) at the height defined in Subclause (i), extending to the face of the adjacent cladding, (d) lap not less than 10 mm vertically over the building element below, and (e) terminate in a drip extending not less than 5 mm outward from the outer face of the building element below. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Combustible fittings and components in a public pool or public spa, including main drains, piping, skimmers, return inlets, steps, ladder rungs and liners, are permitted in a building required to be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Combustible fittings and components in a public pool or public spa, including main drains, piping, skimmers, return inlets, steps, ladder rungs and liners, are permitted in a building required to be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Access required in Sentence (1) is permitted to be provided by a door, window or other means that provides an opening not less than 1 100 mm high and 550 mm wide, the sill height of which shall not be more than 900 mm above the floor.
ON Variations: Access required in Sentence (1) is permitted to be provided by a door, window or other means that provides an opening not less than 1 100 mm high and 550 mm wide, the sill height of which shall not be more than 900 mm above the floor.

ON Full: Vitrified clay pipe and fittings shall be certified to CSA A60.1-M, "Vitrified Clay Pipe".
ON Variations: Vitrified clay pipe and fittings shall be certified to CSA A60.1-M, "Vitrified Clay Pipe".

ON Full: The weighted normalized flanking level difference shall be determined in accordance with ASTM E413, "Classification for Rating Sound Insulation", using the results from measurements carried out in accordance with Parts 1 to 4 of ISO 10848, "Acoustics - Laboratory Measurement of the Flanking Transmission of Airborne and Impact Sound Between Adjoining Rooms".
ON Variations: The weighted normalized flanking level difference shall be determined in accordance with ASTM E413, "Classification for Rating Sound Insulation", using the results from measurements carried out in accordance with Parts 1 to 4 of ISO 10848, "Acoustics - Laboratory Measurement of the Flanking Transmission of Airborne and Impact Sound Between Adjoining Rooms".

ON Full: Buildings and their structural members made of structural steel shall conform to CSA S16, "Design of Steel Structures". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Buildings and their structural members made of structural steel shall conform to CSA S16, "Design of Steel Structures". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in this Subsection, the requirements in Section 3.8. apply to rapid transit stations.
ON Variations: Except as provided in this Subsection, the requirements in Section 3.8. apply to rapid transit stations.

ON Full: If a public spa and public pool are located in the same room or space, the emergency stop buttons required in Sentences (3) and 3.11.10.1.(12) shall deactivate all pumps serving the public spa and public pool.
ON Variations: If a public spa and public pool are located in the same room or space, the emergency stop buttons required in Sentences (3) and 3.11.10.1.(12) shall deactivate all pumps serving the public spa and public pool.

ON Full: Control valves referred to in Sentence (1) shall be held open manually, except where automatic devices are provided for shutting off the flow in order to prevent the overfilling of tank vehicle or tank car compartments.
ON Variations: Control valves referred to in Sentence (1) shall be held open manually, except where automatic devices are provided for shutting off the flow in order to prevent the overfilling of tank vehicle or tank car compartments.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.3. shall apply.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.3. shall apply.

ON Full: In a building permitted to be of combustible construction, semi-rigid fibre insulation board produced from glass, rock or slag, is permitted to be used to block the vertical space in a double-frame wall assembly formed at the intersection of the floor assembly and the walls, provided the width of the vertical space is not more than 25 mm and the insulation board,(a) has a density not less than 45 kg/m3, (b) is securely fastened to one set of studs, (c) extends from below the bottom of the top plates in the lower storey to above the top of the bottom plate in the upper storey, and (d) completely fills the nominal gap of 25 mm between the headers and between the wall plates.
ON Variations: In a building permitted to be of combustible construction, semi-rigid fibre insulation board produced from glass, rock or slag, is permitted to be used to block the vertical space in a double-frame wall assembly formed at the intersection of the floor assembly and the walls, provided the width of the vertical space is not more than 25 mm and the insulation board,(a) has a density not less than 45 kg/m3, (b) is securely fastened to one set of studs, (c) extends from below the bottom of the top plates in the lower storey to above the top of the bottom plate in the upper storey, and (d) completely fills the nominal gap of 25 mm between the headers and between the wall plates.

ON Full: Where a roofed enclosure used for the storage or parking of motor vehicles has more than 60 percent of the total perimeter enclosed by walls, doors or windows, the enclosure shall be considered a garage.
ON Variations: Where a roofed enclosure used for the storage or parking of motor vehicles has more than 60 percent of the total perimeter enclosed by walls, doors or windows, the enclosure shall be considered a garage.

ON Full: At least one smoke alarm shall be installed on each storey and mezzanine of a dwelling unit.
ON Variations: At least one smoke alarm shall be installed on each storey and mezzanine of a dwelling unit.

ON Full: Tapered treads shall have a consistent angle and uniform run and rise dimensions in accordance with the construction tolerances described in Article 3.4.6.8. when measured at a point 300 mm from the centre line of the inside handrail.
ON Variations: Tapered treads shall have a consistent angle and uniform run and rise dimensions in accordance with the construction tolerances described in Article 3.4.6.8. when measured at a point 300 mm from the centre line of the inside handrail.

ON Full: Where required to receive lateral support, masonry walls shall be anchored to each floor or roof assembly at maximum intervals of 2 m, except that anchorage of floor joists not more than 1 m above grade may be omitted.
ON Variations: Where required to receive lateral support, masonry walls shall be anchored to each floor or roof assembly at maximum intervals of 2 m, except that anchorage of floor joists not more than 1 m above grade may be omitted.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), steel pipe columns shall have an outside diameter of not less than 73 mm and a wall thickness of not less than 4.76 mm.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), steel pipe columns shall have an outside diameter of not less than 73 mm and a wall thickness of not less than 4.76 mm.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (9), if a distribution panel supplies power to emergency lighting, the power supply conductors leading up to the distribution panel shall be protected in accordance with Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (9), if a distribution panel supplies power to emergency lighting, the power supply conductors leading up to the distribution panel shall be protected in accordance with Sentence (2).

ON Full: Standpipe systems that have been modified, extended or are being restored to service after a period of disuse exceeding one year shall be tested in conformance with Articles 6.4.3.2. to 6.4.3.5.
ON Variations: Standpipe systems that have been modified, extended or are being restored to service after a period of disuse exceeding one year shall be tested in conformance with Articles 6.4.3.2. to 6.4.3.5.

ON Full: Where the height of all vehicles using any private road or parking area is permanently restricted, the vertical distance in Sentence (2) may be reduced to the amount of the actual height restriction, for as long as the said height restriction is in existence on the premises.
ON Variations: Where the height of all vehicles using any private road or parking area is permanently restricted, the vertical distance in Sentence (2) may be reduced to the amount of the actual height restriction, for as long as the said height restriction is in existence on the premises.

ON Full: The height above grade of SFRS designed in accordance with CSA S136, "North American Specification for the Design of Cold-Formed Steel Structural Members", shall be less than 15 m.
ON Variations: The height above grade of SFRS designed in accordance with CSA S136, "North American Specification for the Design of Cold-Formed Steel Structural Members", shall be less than 15 m.

ON Full: Wired glass assemblies permitted by Sentence (1) and described in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", are permitted to be used as closures in vertical fire separations without being tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.8.4.(1).
ON Variations: Wired glass assemblies permitted by Sentence (1) and described in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", are permitted to be used as closures in vertical fire separations without being tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.8.4.(1).

ON Full: Group A, Division 2 major occupancies, Group E major occupancies and storage garages located in a building within the scope of this Article are permitted to be constructed in accordance with this Article provided they are located below the third storey of the building. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Group A, Division 2 major occupancies, Group E major occupancies and storage garages located in a building within the scope of this Article are permitted to be constructed in accordance with this Article provided they are located below the third storey of the building. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The elements or components shall be designed so as not to transfer to the structure any forces unaccounted for in the design, and rigid elements such as walls or panels shall satisfy the requirements of Sentence 4.1.8.3.(6).
ON Variations: The elements or components shall be designed so as not to transfer to the structure any forces unaccounted for in the design, and rigid elements such as walls or panels shall satisfy the requirements of Sentence 4.1.8.3.(6).

ON Full: Concrete in contact with sulfate soil, which is deleterious to normal cement, shall conform to the requirements in Clause 4.1.1.6. of CSA A23.1, "Concrete Materials and Methods of Concrete Construction".
ON Variations: Concrete in contact with sulfate soil, which is deleterious to normal cement, shall conform to the requirements in Clause 4.1.1.6. of CSA A23.1, "Concrete Materials and Methods of Concrete Construction".

ON Full: Except for appliances installed in dwelling units, fuel-fired heating appliances shall be located, enclosed or separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Section 3.6.
ON Variations: Except for appliances installed in dwelling units, fuel-fired heating appliances shall be located, enclosed or separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Section 3.6.

ON Full: For the purpose of using Table 9.10.14.5. to determine the required type of construction, cladding and fire-resistance rating for an irregularly-shaped or skewed exterior wall, (a) the exposing building face is permitted to be divided into any number of portions and the fire-resistance rating, type of cladding and percentage of unprotected openings limitations is permitted to be determined individually for each portion based on the limiting distance for each portion so divided, (b) the exposing building face shall be taken as the projection of the exterior wall onto a vertical plane located so that no portion of the exterior wall of the building is between the vertical plane and the line to which the limiting distance is established in Clause (a), and (c) for the purpose of determining the actual area of unprotected openings permitted in an exterior wall, the unprotected openings shall be projected onto the vertical plane established in Clause (b).
ON Variations: For the purpose of using Table 9.10.14.5. to determine the required type of construction, cladding and fire-resistance rating for an irregularly-shaped or skewed exterior wall, (a) the exposing building face is permitted to be divided into any number of portions and the fire-resistance rating, type of cladding and percentage of unprotected openings limitations is permitted to be determined individually for each portion based on the limiting distance for each portion so divided, (b) the exposing building face shall be taken as the projection of the exterior wall onto a vertical plane located so that no portion of the exterior wall of the building is between the vertical plane and the line to which the limiting distance is established in Clause (a), and (c) for the purpose of determining the actual area of unprotected openings permitted in an exterior wall, the unprotected openings shall be projected onto the vertical plane established in Clause (b).

ON Full: Hose stations shall be located, so that every portion of the building can be reached by a hose stream and is within 3 m of a nozzle attached to the hose required in Sentence (2), not more than 5 m from every required exit serving a floor area, except, for the first storey, or if additional hose stations are required to achieve full coverage of the floor area, and in a conspicuous location where they are not likely to be obstructed.
ON Variations: Hose stations shall be located, so that every portion of the building can be reached by a hose stream and is within 3 m of a nozzle attached to the hose required in Sentence (2), not more than 5 m from every required exit serving a floor area, except, for the first storey, or if additional hose stations are required to achieve full coverage of the floor area, and in a conspicuous location where they are not likely to be obstructed.

ON Full: Buildings used for the storage and handling of combustible fibres shall comply with the height and area limitations of the Building Code for medium hazard industrial occupancies.
ON Variations: Buildings used for the storage and handling of combustible fibres shall comply with the height and area limitations of the Building Code for medium hazard industrial occupancies.

ON Full: Elevators, slide escapes or windows shall not be considered as part of a required means of egress.
ON Variations: Elevators, slide escapes or windows shall not be considered as part of a required means of egress.

ON Full: The maximum aggregate area of unprotected openings in an exposing building face of a storey that faces a street and is the same level as the street need not comply with Sentence (1) where the limiting distance is not less than 9 m.
ON Variations: The maximum aggregate area of unprotected openings in an exposing building face of a storey that faces a street and is the same level as the street need not comply with Sentence (1) where the limiting distance is not less than 9 m.

ON Full: Within the first storey, manual pull stations are required only in corridors.
ON Variations: Within the first storey, manual pull stations are required only in corridors.

ON Full: Where fuel-fired appliances are installed on a roof, such appliances shall be installed in conformance with Part 6.
ON Variations: Where fuel-fired appliances are installed on a roof, such appliances shall be installed in conformance with Part 6.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), if more than one exit is required from a floor area, each exit shall be separate from every other exit leading from that floor area.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), if more than one exit is required from a floor area, each exit shall be separate from every other exit leading from that floor area.

ON Full: No person shall operate a treatment unit other than a septic tank unless the person has entered into an agreement whereby servicing and maintenance of the treatment unit and its related components will be carried out by a person who,(a) possesses a copy of the literature required by Sentence 8.6.2.2.(6), and (b) is authorized by the manufacturer to service and maintain that type of treatment unit.
ON Variations: No person shall operate a treatment unit other than a septic tank unless the person has entered into an agreement whereby servicing and maintenance of the treatment unit and its related components will be carried out by a person who,(a) possesses a copy of the literature required by Sentence 8.6.2.2.(6), and (b) is authorized by the manufacturer to service and maintain that type of treatment unit.

ON Full: Slabs for conditions other than described in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4.
ON Variations: Slabs for conditions other than described in Sentence (1) shall be designed in accordance with Part 4.

ON Full: If a fire hose station is located in a cabinet, an approved lockable, scored glass break-front cabinet may be used.
ON Variations: If a fire hose station is located in a cabinet, an approved lockable, scored glass break-front cabinet may be used.

ON Full: Sanitary units, bathtubs and shower baths shall not be installed adjacent to wall and floor surfaces that are pervious to water.
ON Variations: Sanitary units, bathtubs and shower baths shall not be installed adjacent to wall and floor surfaces that are pervious to water.

ON Full: A sign shall be conspicuously posted near the detearing area indicating the minimum clearance space required.
ON Variations: A sign shall be conspicuously posted near the detearing area indicating the minimum clearance space required.

ON Full: Ventilating systems shall be arranged so that the failure of any ventilation fan as sensed by air flow will automatically stop the dipping conveyor systems and sound an alarm.
ON Variations: Ventilating systems shall be arranged so that the failure of any ventilation fan as sensed by air flow will automatically stop the dipping conveyor systems and sound an alarm.

ON Full: Screwed cast iron water fittings used in a water system shall be cement-mortar lined or galvanized.
ON Variations: Screwed cast iron water fittings used in a water system shall be cement-mortar lined or galvanized.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) and Article 4.4.6.6., piping systems shall be pressure tested at pressures of not less than 350 kPa (gauge) or 1.5 times the maximum operating pressure, whichever is greater.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3) and Article 4.4.6.6., piping systems shall be pressure tested at pressures of not less than 350 kPa (gauge) or 1.5 times the maximum operating pressure, whichever is greater.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (6) and (7), where required by the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997, an area intended for the storage of cylinders containing compressed gases that may react with one another shall be divided into separate fire compartments having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (6) and (7), where required by the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997, an area intended for the storage of cylinders containing compressed gases that may react with one another shall be divided into separate fire compartments having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Despite the definition of owner in Article 1.4.1.2. of Division A, in the case of a rental suite, only the landlord shall be considered to be the owner for the purpose of applying Article 1.2.1.1. of Division A to this Subsection.
ON Variations: Despite the definition of owner in Article 1.4.1.2. of Division A, in the case of a rental suite, only the landlord shall be considered to be the owner for the purpose of applying Article 1.2.1.1. of Division A to this Subsection.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Sentence 3.10.4.2.(1), the requirements in Subsections 3.2.1. and 3.2.2. shall apply.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Sentence 3.10.4.2.(1), the requirements in Subsections 3.2.1. and 3.2.2. shall apply.

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 3.6.3.5., a horizontal service space that penetrates a required vertical fire separation shall be separated from the remainder of the building it serves in conformance with Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 3.6.3.5., a horizontal service space that penetrates a required vertical fire separation shall be separated from the remainder of the building it serves in conformance with Sentence (2).

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (8), where 38 mm members are laid on edge to form a built-up beam, individual members shall be nailed together with a double row of nails not less than 89 mm in length, spaced not more than 450 mm apart in each row with the end nails located 100 mm to 150 mm from the end of each piece.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (8), where 38 mm members are laid on edge to form a built-up beam, individual members shall be nailed together with a double row of nails not less than 89 mm in length, spaced not more than 450 mm apart in each row with the end nails located 100 mm to 150 mm from the end of each piece.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and in Articles 9.10.1.3. and 9.10.9.5., the portions of a floor area or mezzanine that do not terminate at an exterior wall, a firewall or a vertical shaft, shall terminate at a vertical fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the floor assembly that terminates at the separation.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and in Articles 9.10.1.3. and 9.10.9.5., the portions of a floor area or mezzanine that do not terminate at an exterior wall, a firewall or a vertical shaft, shall terminate at a vertical fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the floor assembly that terminates at the separation.

ON Full: Wall sheathing is permitted to be used in lieu of one layer of sheathing membrane required in Sentence (1), and the thickness need not conform to Table 9.23.16.2.A.
ON Variations: Wall sheathing is permitted to be used in lieu of one layer of sheathing membrane required in Sentence (1), and the thickness need not conform to Table 9.23.16.2.A.

ON Full: Where masonry serves as cladding on wood frame or masonry walls exposed to precipitation, the cladding assembly shall comply with,(a) Subsections 9.27.2. to 9.27.4., and Section 9.20., or (b) Part 5.
ON Variations: Where masonry serves as cladding on wood frame or masonry walls exposed to precipitation, the cladding assembly shall comply with,(a) Subsections 9.27.2. to 9.27.4., and Section 9.20., or (b) Part 5.

ON Full: Openings for natural ventilation other than windows shall be constructed to provide protection from the weather and insects.
ON Variations: Openings for natural ventilation other than windows shall be constructed to provide protection from the weather and insects.

ON Full: Visual signal devices required by Sentences 3.2.4.19.(4) and 3.2.4.20.(7) and (8) shall be installed so that the signal from at least one device is visible throughout the floor area or portion of it in which they are installed. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Visual signal devices required by Sentences 3.2.4.19.(4) and 3.2.4.20.(7) and (8) shall be installed so that the signal from at least one device is visible throughout the floor area or portion of it in which they are installed. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A clearance of at least 914 mm shall be maintained between the tops of piles and sprinkler head deflectors.
ON Variations: A clearance of at least 914 mm shall be maintained between the tops of piles and sprinkler head deflectors.

ON Full: Every flushing device that serves a water closet or one or more urinals shall have sufficient capacity and be adjusted to deliver at each operation a volume of water that will thoroughly flush the fixture or fixtures that it serves.
ON Variations: Every flushing device that serves a water closet or one or more urinals shall have sufficient capacity and be adjusted to deliver at each operation a volume of water that will thoroughly flush the fixture or fixtures that it serves.

ON Full: This Part applies to individual dwelling units in a supported group living residence or an intensive support residence regulated under the Services and Supports to Promote the Social Inclusion of Persons with Developmental Disabilities Act, 2008.
ON Variations: This Part applies to individual dwelling units in a supported group living residence or an intensive support residence regulated under the Services and Supports to Promote the Social Inclusion of Persons with Developmental Disabilities Act, 2008.

ON Full: Drain boards shall be arranged to drain back to the dip tank.
ON Variations: Drain boards shall be arranged to drain back to the dip tank.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the number of water closets and lavatories required for industrial occupancies shall conform to Table 3.7.4.9.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the number of water closets and lavatories required for industrial occupancies shall conform to Table 3.7.4.9.

ON Full: Up to 3 m3 of loose combustible fibres may be stored in a single fire compartment if they are kept in metal-lined bins equipped with self-closing metal-lined covers.
ON Variations: Up to 3 m3 of loose combustible fibres may be stored in a single fire compartment if they are kept in metal-lined bins equipped with self-closing metal-lined covers.

ON Full: The period of the isolated structure, determined using the post-yield stiffness of the isolation system in the horizontal direction under consideration, shall be greater than three times the period of the structure above the isolation interface calculated as a fixed base.
ON Variations: The period of the isolated structure, determined using the post-yield stiffness of the isolation system in the horizontal direction under consideration, shall be greater than three times the period of the structure above the isolation interface calculated as a fixed base.

ON Full: Throughwall flashing shall be provided in a masonry veneer wall such that any moisture that accumulates in the air space will be directed to the exterior of the building.
ON Variations: Throughwall flashing shall be provided in a masonry veneer wall such that any moisture that accumulates in the air space will be directed to the exterior of the building.

ON Full: The floor of the electrical equipment vault described in Sentences (1) and (2) may be provided with a floor drain connected to a covered sump capable of holding all of the liquid from the largest item of electrical equipment, and the connection shall have a noncombustible trap to prevent the spread of fire from the vault to the sump.
ON Variations: The floor of the electrical equipment vault described in Sentences (1) and (2) may be provided with a floor drain connected to a covered sump capable of holding all of the liquid from the largest item of electrical equipment, and the connection shall have a noncombustible trap to prevent the spread of fire from the vault to the sump.

ON Full: If a part to be coated is preheated prior to the application of the powder, the temperature of the part shall not exceed the ignition temperature of the powder being used.
ON Variations: If a part to be coated is preheated prior to the application of the powder, the temperature of the part shall not exceed the ignition temperature of the powder being used.

ON Full: Where climatic conditions permit, buildings containing occupancies other than residential occupancies, may be ventilated by natural ventilation methods in lieu of mechanical ventilation where engineering data demonstrates that such a method will provide the required ventilation for the type of occupancy.
ON Variations: Where climatic conditions permit, buildings containing occupancies other than residential occupancies, may be ventilated by natural ventilation methods in lieu of mechanical ventilation where engineering data demonstrates that such a method will provide the required ventilation for the type of occupancy.

ON Full: A soil or waste stack that has a nominally horizontal offset more than 1 500 mm long and above which the upper vertical portion of the stack passes through more than 2 storeys and receives a hydraulic load of more than 100 fixture units shall be vented by an offset relief vent connected to the vertical section immediately above the offset, and by another offset relief vent,(a) connected to the lower vertical section at or above the highest soil or waste pipe connection, or (b) extended as a vertical continuation of the lower section.
ON Variations: A soil or waste stack that has a nominally horizontal offset more than 1 500 mm long and above which the upper vertical portion of the stack passes through more than 2 storeys and receives a hydraulic load of more than 100 fixture units shall be vented by an offset relief vent connected to the vertical section immediately above the offset, and by another offset relief vent,(a) connected to the lower vertical section at or above the highest soil or waste pipe connection, or (b) extended as a vertical continuation of the lower section.

ON Full: Valves which are locked open or valves which are electrically supervised shall be inspected monthly.
ON Variations: Valves which are locked open or valves which are electrically supervised shall be inspected monthly.

ON Full: The net free area of an air intake or exhaust outlet shall be equal to or greater than the cross-sectional area of the duct served.
ON Variations: The net free area of an air intake or exhaust outlet shall be equal to or greater than the cross-sectional area of the duct served.

ON Full: If a building has any storey that is not sprinklered and firefighting facilities cannot reach it within 10 min of the alarm being received, the required limiting distance shall be doubled.
ON Variations: If a building has any storey that is not sprinklered and firefighting facilities cannot reach it within 10 min of the alarm being received, the required limiting distance shall be doubled.

ON Full: Combustible sprinkler piping shall be used only for sprinkler systems in residential occupancies and other light hazard occupancies. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Combustible sprinkler piping shall be used only for sprinkler systems in residential occupancies and other light hazard occupancies. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where rooms with different requirements for window glass area are combined as described in Sentence 9.5.1.4.(1), the more restrictive requirement shall govern
ON Variations: Where rooms with different requirements for window glass area are combined as described in Sentence 9.5.1.4.(1), the more restrictive requirement shall govern

ON Full: A water distribution system supplying hot water to plumbing fixtures shall conform to the requirements in Subsection 7.6.5.
ON Variations: A water distribution system supplying hot water to plumbing fixtures shall conform to the requirements in Subsection 7.6.5.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), a library book storage room that is not normally accessible to the public shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation with a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h if it, is more than 250 m2 in area, or contains book stacks that, are more than 10 m high, or penetrate more than one floor assembly.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), a library book storage room that is not normally accessible to the public shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation with a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h if it, is more than 250 m2 in area, or contains book stacks that, are more than 10 m high, or penetrate more than one floor assembly.

ON Full: Where an interior floor projects through an exterior wall to become an exterior floor, (a) the air barrier of the wall under the floor shall be continuous with or sealed to the subfloor or the air barrier on the underside of the floor, (b) the air barrier of the wall above the floor shall be continuous with or sealed to the subfloor or the air barrier on the top of the floor, and (c) the spaces between floor joists shall be blocked and sealed.
ON Variations: Where an interior floor projects through an exterior wall to become an exterior floor, (a) the air barrier of the wall under the floor shall be continuous with or sealed to the subfloor or the air barrier on the underside of the floor, (b) the air barrier of the wall above the floor shall be continuous with or sealed to the subfloor or the air barrier on the top of the floor, and (c) the spaces between floor joists shall be blocked and sealed.

ON Full: In-service fill piping systems that do not comply with Sentences (6) and (7) may remain in-service if the piping does not leak and if the fill piping system met the requirements of this Code on December 31, 2014, as it read on that day.
ON Variations: In-service fill piping systems that do not comply with Sentences (6) and (7) may remain in-service if the piping does not leak and if the fill piping system met the requirements of this Code on December 31, 2014, as it read on that day.

ON Full: Not more than one exit from a floor area is permitted to lead through a lobby.
ON Variations: Not more than one exit from a floor area is permitted to lead through a lobby.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), a Class 1 sewage system shall be designed to receive only human body waste for disposal.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), a Class 1 sewage system shall be designed to receive only human body waste for disposal.

ON Full: Gravity tanks shall be inspected annually to ensure that the tank roof is tight and in good repair, that hatches or doors are kept closed and properly secured and that the frost-proof casing of the tank riser makes a tight joint with the bottom of the tank.
ON Variations: Gravity tanks shall be inspected annually to ensure that the tank roof is tight and in good repair, that hatches or doors are kept closed and properly secured and that the frost-proof casing of the tank riser makes a tight joint with the bottom of the tank.

ON Full: A privy as described in Subsections 8.3.3. to 8.3.5. shall be enclosed with a superstructure that,(a) is constructed of strong durable weatherproof materials, (b) has a solid floor supported by a sill constructed of treated timber, masonry or other material of at least equal strength and durability, (c) is easily sanitized, (d) unless it is equipped solely as a urinal, is equipped with one or more seats each having a cover and being supported by an enclosed bench or riser that is lined with an impervious material on all interior vertical surfaces, (e) is equipped with a self-closing door, (f) has one or more openings for purposes of ventilation, all of which are screened, (g) has a ventilation duct that is screened at the top end and that extends from the underside of the bench or riser to a point above the roof of the superstructure, and (h) shall not have any openings for the reception of human body waste, other than urinals and those constructed in accordance with Clause (1)(d).
