ON Variations: Where existing interior walls or ceilings or floor assemblies or roof assemblies are substantially removed and new interior walls, ceilings, floor assemblies or roof assemblies are installed in an existing building or part of an existing building that is a retirement home, the following requirements apply: the retirement home shall be sprinklered, a voice communication system conforming to Article 3.2.4.23. shall be provided in the building, if Clause 3.2.6.8.(1)(b) or (c), as applicable, requires that such a voice communication system be provided in the building, and doors to suites and sleeping rooms not within suites in the retirement home, other than doors leading directly to the exterior, shall be equipped with self-closing devices.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences 9.9.7.3.(1) and 9.9.8.2.(2), from the point where a doorway described in Clause (1)(b) or (c) enters the public corridor or exterior passageway, it shall be possible to go in opposite directions to each of two separate exits.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 9.9.7.3.(1) and 9.9.8.2.(2), from the point where a doorway described in Clause (1)(b) or (c) enters the public corridor or exterior passageway, it shall be possible to go in opposite directions to each of two separate exits.

ON Full: The slope of the bottom of a public pool having a diving board or diving platform shall not change by more than 17% where the water depth is less than the applicable depth set out in Sentence (6) and greater than the depth set out in Sentence (7) or (8), as applicable.
ON Variations: The slope of the bottom of a public pool having a diving board or diving platform shall not change by more than 17% where the water depth is less than the applicable depth set out in Sentence (6) and greater than the depth set out in Sentence (7) or (8), as applicable.

ON Full: Where a flame-spread rating is required in this Section for an element of a building, such rating shall be determined in accordance with the test methods described in Part 3, or in accordance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings".
ON Variations: Where a flame-spread rating is required in this Section for an element of a building, such rating shall be determined in accordance with the test methods described in Part 3, or in accordance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings".

ON Full: All pumps used in a public spa shall be capable of being deactivated by an emergency stop button that is, clearly labelled, and located at a point that is, readily accessible to and within sight of persons using the public spa, and within 15 m of the public spa.
ON Variations: All pumps used in a public spa shall be capable of being deactivated by an emergency stop button that is, clearly labelled, and located at a point that is, readily accessible to and within sight of persons using the public spa, and within 15 m of the public spa.

ON Full: Fire protection systems for high efficiency, high temperature commercial cooking equipment using vegetable oil or animal fat shall conform to,(a) ANSI/UL 300, "Fire Extinguishing Systems for Protection of Commercial Cooking Equipment", or (b) ULC/ORD-C1254.6, "Fire Testing of Restaurant Cooking Area Fire Extinguishing System Units".
ON Variations: Fire protection systems for high efficiency, high temperature commercial cooking equipment using vegetable oil or animal fat shall conform to,(a) ANSI/UL 300, "Fire Extinguishing Systems for Protection of Commercial Cooking Equipment", or (b) ULC/ORD-C1254.6, "Fire Testing of Restaurant Cooking Area Fire Extinguishing System Units".

ON Full: A Class 3 sewage system shall not be constructed where the daily design sanitary sewage flow to the system exceeds 1 000 L/day.
ON Variations: A Class 3 sewage system shall not be constructed where the daily design sanitary sewage flow to the system exceeds 1 000 L/day.

ON Full: Wood-based sheathing materials not more than 12.5 mm thick and complying with Article 9.23.16.2. need not comply with Sentence (1). (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Wood-based sheathing materials not more than 12.5 mm thick and complying with Article 9.23.16.2. need not comply with Sentence (1). (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Explosion venting as outlined in Sentence 4.2.9.6.(1) is only required in the distillation areas of a distillery.
ON Variations: Explosion venting as outlined in Sentence 4.2.9.6.(1) is only required in the distillation areas of a distillery.

ON Full: The mechanical ventilation required in Sentence (2) shall be capable of exhausting at least 18 m3/h per square metre of the room area.
ON Variations: The mechanical ventilation required in Sentence (2) shall be capable of exhausting at least 18 m3/h per square metre of the room area.

ON Full: Except for joists, rafters, trusses and beams, visually graded lumber shall conform to the grades in Table 9.3.2.1.
ON Variations: Except for joists, rafters, trusses and beams, visually graded lumber shall conform to the grades in Table 9.3.2.1.

ON Full: Where Class I liquids are handled or used above grade within existing buildings that have basements or covered pits into which flammable vapours can travel and accumulate, such below grade areas shall be provided with mechanical ventilation designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours.
ON Variations: Where Class I liquids are handled or used above grade within existing buildings that have basements or covered pits into which flammable vapours can travel and accumulate, such below grade areas shall be provided with mechanical ventilation designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours.

ON Full: Every service water heater and its installation shall conform to Part 7.
ON Variations: Every service water heater and its installation shall conform to Part 7.

ON Full: All guards within dwelling units, other than guards serving spiral stairs, shall be not less than 900 mm high.
ON Variations: All guards within dwelling units, other than guards serving spiral stairs, shall be not less than 900 mm high.

ON Full: The flame-spread rating required in Sentence (2) is permitted to be greater than 25 if an automatic fire suppression system is provided inside the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system.
ON Variations: The flame-spread rating required in Sentence (2) is permitted to be greater than 25 if an automatic fire suppression system is provided inside the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system.

ON Full: For all gable roofs, the wind exposure factor, Cw, shall be, (a) as prescribed in Sentences 4.1.6.2.(3) and (4) for the full and partial load cases, and (b) 1.0 for the unbalanced load case referred to in Sentence (2).
ON Variations: For all gable roofs, the wind exposure factor, Cw, shall be, (a) as prescribed in Sentences 4.1.6.2.(3) and (4) for the full and partial load cases, and (b) 1.0 for the unbalanced load case referred to in Sentence (2).

ON Full: Piping shall be made from materials designed to withstand the effects of temperatures and pressures that may occur in the system.
ON Variations: Piping shall be made from materials designed to withstand the effects of temperatures and pressures that may occur in the system.

ON Full: In the design of piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids, provision shall be made for the expansion and contraction of the piping system and of the product it conveys.
ON Variations: In the design of piping systems for flammable liquids or combustible liquids, provision shall be made for the expansion and contraction of the piping system and of the product it conveys.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to fire separations required between rooms and spaces in buildings except between rooms and spaces within a dwelling unit.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to fire separations required between rooms and spaces in buildings except between rooms and spaces within a dwelling unit.

ON Full: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool, where access to the pool enclosure is over any surface that is not subject to regular cleaning and sanitizing, a foot spray to wash feet by means of a spray running freely to waste shall be provided at each such access.
ON Variations: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool, where access to the pool enclosure is over any surface that is not subject to regular cleaning and sanitizing, a foot spray to wash feet by means of a spray running freely to waste shall be provided at each such access.

ON Full: For the purposes of Table 7.5.8.4., the length of a stack vent or vent stack shall be its developed length from its lower end to open air.
ON Variations: For the purposes of Table 7.5.8.4., the length of a stack vent or vent stack shall be its developed length from its lower end to open air.

ON Full: In situations described in Sentence (1), flashing shall be provided where water will accumulate, to lead it to the exterior.
ON Variations: In situations described in Sentence (1), flashing shall be provided where water will accumulate, to lead it to the exterior.

ON Full: Structural wood elements shall be pressure-treated with a preservative to resist decay, where the vertical clearance between structural wood elements and the finished ground level is less than 150 mm. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Structural wood elements shall be pressure-treated with a preservative to resist decay, where the vertical clearance between structural wood elements and the finished ground level is less than 150 mm. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (5), fire separations separating fire compartments required by Sentence (2) shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (5), fire separations separating fire compartments required by Sentence (2) shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Articles 3.1.8.16. and 3.1.8.17. for the separation of exits, an opening in a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not more than 1 h is permitted to be protected with fixed wired glass assemblies or glass blocks installed in conformance with NFPA 80, "Fire Doors and Other Opening Protectives".
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Articles 3.1.8.16. and 3.1.8.17. for the separation of exits, an opening in a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not more than 1 h is permitted to be protected with fixed wired glass assemblies or glass blocks installed in conformance with NFPA 80, "Fire Doors and Other Opening Protectives".

ON Full: Portable extinguishers shall be kept in the pump house or other suitable location where they will be accessible in the event of an emergency, but not accessible to the public.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers shall be kept in the pump house or other suitable location where they will be accessible in the event of an emergency, but not accessible to the public.

ON Full: A leased area is permitted on a platform level provided it is, located not less than 5 m from the platform edge, located not less than 5 m from an egress facility, and not located in a dead end portion of the platform.
ON Variations: A leased area is permitted on a platform level provided it is, located not less than 5 m from the platform edge, located not less than 5 m from an egress facility, and not located in a dead end portion of the platform.

ON Full: Subject to Sentences (2) and (3), valves controlling sprinkler water supplies or alarms shall be sealed in the open position and inspected weekly.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentences (2) and (3), valves controlling sprinkler water supplies or alarms shall be sealed in the open position and inspected weekly.

ON Full: If a spray operation is a major occupancy in a building, the spray operation shall be separated from the remainder of the building in accordance with Article 3.1.3.1. of Division B of the Building Code.
ON Variations: If a spray operation is a major occupancy in a building, the spray operation shall be separated from the remainder of the building in accordance with Article 3.1.3.1. of Division B of the Building Code.

ON Full: Where practical, overhead piping referred to in Sentence (1) shall be supported from building framing members.
ON Variations: Where practical, overhead piping referred to in Sentence (1) shall be supported from building framing members.

ON Full: The transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids between tanks of marine vessels and piers or wharves shall be through flexible cargo hose designed in conformance with good engineering practice, or jointed tubing or piping suitable for the cargo to be transferred, and designed to withstand the maximum design working pressure.
ON Variations: The transfer of flammable liquids or combustible liquids between tanks of marine vessels and piers or wharves shall be through flexible cargo hose designed in conformance with good engineering practice, or jointed tubing or piping suitable for the cargo to be transferred, and designed to withstand the maximum design working pressure.

ON Full: A building used for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall have not less than 70 cm2 in vent area for each square metre of storage area unless mechanical ventilation is provided.
ON Variations: A building used for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall have not less than 70 cm2 in vent area for each square metre of storage area unless mechanical ventilation is provided.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (10), the top of the nosing of a stair tread shall have a rounded or bevelled edge extending not less than 6 mm and not more than 13 mm measured horizontally from the front of the nosing.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (10), the top of the nosing of a stair tread shall have a rounded or bevelled edge extending not less than 6 mm and not more than 13 mm measured horizontally from the front of the nosing.

ON Full: An annual inspection shall be made of tanks for fire protection, tank supporting structures and water supply systems, including piping, control valves, check valves, heating systems, mercury gauges and expansion joints, to ensure that they are in operating condition.
ON Variations: An annual inspection shall be made of tanks for fire protection, tank supporting structures and water supply systems, including piping, control valves, check valves, heating systems, mercury gauges and expansion joints, to ensure that they are in operating condition.

ON Full: The fire-resistance rating of the fire separation required by Sentence (1) is permitted to be not less than 45 min provided the fire-resistance rating required by Subsection 3.2.2. is permitted to be less than 1 h for, the floor assembly above the floor area, or the floor assembly below the floor area, if there is no floor assembly above.
ON Variations: The fire-resistance rating of the fire separation required by Sentence (1) is permitted to be not less than 45 min provided the fire-resistance rating required by Subsection 3.2.2. is permitted to be less than 1 h for, the floor assembly above the floor area, or the floor assembly below the floor area, if there is no floor assembly above.

ON Full: Hoods, ducts and filters subject to accumulations of combustible deposits shall be checked at intervals not greater than seven days, and shall be cleaned if the accumulation of combustible deposits creates a fire hazard.
ON Variations: Hoods, ducts and filters subject to accumulations of combustible deposits shall be checked at intervals not greater than seven days, and shall be cleaned if the accumulation of combustible deposits creates a fire hazard.

ON Full: Where cathodic protection equipment is installed to prevent corrosion of steel tanks, the equipment shall be inspected annually.
ON Variations: Where cathodic protection equipment is installed to prevent corrosion of steel tanks, the equipment shall be inspected annually.

ON Full: All exposed potable water piping and chlorine piping within a public pool water treatment service room shall be colour coded by means of, painting the entire outer surface of the piping, or coloured bands at least 25 mm in width that are spaced along the piping at intervals of not more than 1 200 mm.
ON Variations: All exposed potable water piping and chlorine piping within a public pool water treatment service room shall be colour coded by means of, painting the entire outer surface of the piping, or coloured bands at least 25 mm in width that are spaced along the piping at intervals of not more than 1 200 mm.

ON Full: A panel-type underlay shall be provided under resilient flooring, parquet flooring, felted-synthetic-fibre floor coverings or carpeting on panel-type subflooring whose edges are unsupported.
ON Variations: A panel-type underlay shall be provided under resilient flooring, parquet flooring, felted-synthetic-fibre floor coverings or carpeting on panel-type subflooring whose edges are unsupported.

ON Full: Asphalt-coated or asphalt-impregnated fibreboard not less than 11.1 mm thick conforming to CAN/ULC-S706.1, "Wood Fibre Insulating Boards for Buildings", is permitted to be used as a roof sheathing over supports spaced not more than 406 mm o.c., provided the roofing consists of,(a) a continuous sheet of galvanized steel not less than 0.33 mm in thickness, or (b) a continuous sheet of aluminum not less than 0.61 mm in thickness.
ON Variations: Asphalt-coated or asphalt-impregnated fibreboard not less than 11.1 mm thick conforming to CAN/ULC-S706.1, "Wood Fibre Insulating Boards for Buildings", is permitted to be used as a roof sheathing over supports spaced not more than 406 mm o.c., provided the roofing consists of,(a) a continuous sheet of galvanized steel not less than 0.33 mm in thickness, or (b) a continuous sheet of aluminum not less than 0.61 mm in thickness.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), the seating area of a Group A, Division 1 occupancy shall be separated from adjacent occupancies in the floor area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h if the occupant load in the seating area exceeds 200.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), the seating area of a Group A, Division 1 occupancy shall be separated from adjacent occupancies in the floor area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h if the occupant load in the seating area exceeds 200.

ON Full: The cylinder referred to in Sentence (1) shall have a cross-section that, where taken at a right angle to the longitudinal axis of such cylinder, is, a circle at least 9 m in diameter, or an ellipse at least 7 m wide along the minor axis and at least 65 m2 in area. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The cylinder referred to in Sentence (1) shall have a cross-section that, where taken at a right angle to the longitudinal axis of such cylinder, is, a circle at least 9 m in diameter, or an ellipse at least 7 m wide along the minor axis and at least 65 m2 in area. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The yoke vent shall connect to the vent stack at least 1 000 mm above the floor level of the lowest storey in the section described in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: The yoke vent shall connect to the vent stack at least 1 000 mm above the floor level of the lowest storey in the section described in Sentence (1).

ON Full: The performance level of an existing building is reduced where the early warning and evacuation systems requirements of other Parts for the proposed major occupancy exceed those of the existing building.
ON Variations: The performance level of an existing building is reduced where the early warning and evacuation systems requirements of other Parts for the proposed major occupancy exceed those of the existing building.

ON Full: Where two or more shower heads are served by a shower drain, the floor shall be sloped and the drain located so that water from one head cannot flow over the area that serves another head.
ON Variations: Where two or more shower heads are served by a shower drain, the floor shall be sloped and the drain located so that water from one head cannot flow over the area that serves another head.

ON Full: If a storey is sprinklered, no fire-resistance rating is required for a fire separation between a public corridor and the remainder of the storey provided the corridor does not serve a care, care and treatment, detention or residential occupancy.
ON Variations: If a storey is sprinklered, no fire-resistance rating is required for a fire separation between a public corridor and the remainder of the storey provided the corridor does not serve a care, care and treatment, detention or residential occupancy.

ON Full: In localities where termites are known to occur and where windows or other openings at or below grade contain wood elements, the bottom of window wells or adjacent ground shall be at least 150 mm below the nearest wood unless the wood is pressure-treated with a chemical toxic to termites. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: In localities where termites are known to occur and where windows or other openings at or below grade contain wood elements, the bottom of window wells or adjacent ground shall be at least 150 mm below the nearest wood unless the wood is pressure-treated with a chemical toxic to termites. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Closed drainage systems shall be equipped with a trap.
ON Variations: Closed drainage systems shall be equipped with a trap.

ON Full: Where a supply of combustion air is provided directly to the fire chamber of a fireplace, including a factory-built fireplace or a steel fireplace liner, the installation shall comply with the "Outdoor Air Supply" requirements provided in CAN/CSA-A405-M, "Design and Construction of Masonry Chimneys and Fireplaces".
ON Variations: Where a supply of combustion air is provided directly to the fire chamber of a fireplace, including a factory-built fireplace or a steel fireplace liner, the installation shall comply with the "Outdoor Air Supply" requirements provided in CAN/CSA-A405-M, "Design and Construction of Masonry Chimneys and Fireplaces".

ON Full: Not more than 9000 kg of cellulose nitrate plastics shall be stored in any vault.
ON Variations: Not more than 9000 kg of cellulose nitrate plastics shall be stored in any vault.

ON Full: When a carbon monoxide alarm is replaced in a suite of residential occupancy constructed before August 6, 2001, the replacement carbon monoxide alarm shall meet the requirements of Article 2.16.2.1.
ON Variations: When a carbon monoxide alarm is replaced in a suite of residential occupancy constructed before August 6, 2001, the replacement carbon monoxide alarm shall meet the requirements of Article 2.16.2.1.

ON Full: The cant strip required in Sentence (1) may be omitted where a gravel stop is provided at the edge of roofs.
ON Variations: The cant strip required in Sentence (1) may be omitted where a gravel stop is provided at the edge of roofs.

ON Full: Where the air barrier system consists of an air-impermeable panel-type material, all joints shall be sealed to minimize air leakage.
ON Variations: Where the air barrier system consists of an air-impermeable panel-type material, all joints shall be sealed to minimize air leakage.

ON Full: Access routes for fire department vehicles shall be provided and shall be not less than 9 m wide.
ON Variations: Access routes for fire department vehicles shall be provided and shall be not less than 9 m wide.

ON Full: Hydrants shall be readily available and unobstructed for use at all times.
ON Variations: Hydrants shall be readily available and unobstructed for use at all times.

ON Full: Sentence (4) does not apply to the water supply for a standpipe system.
ON Variations: Sentence (4) does not apply to the water supply for a standpipe system.

ON Full: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be maintained in operating condition.
ON Variations: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be maintained in operating condition.

ON Full: Steel and iron work, including the inside and outside of steel tanks and hoops and grillages for wooden tanks, shall be checked for corrosion at intervals not exceeding two years and scraped and repainted as required.
ON Variations: Steel and iron work, including the inside and outside of steel tanks and hoops and grillages for wooden tanks, shall be checked for corrosion at intervals not exceeding two years and scraped and repainted as required.

ON Full: For the purpose of determining the actual percentage of unprotected openings permitted in an exterior wall, the location of the exposing building face is permitted to be taken at a vertical plane located so that there are no unprotected openings between the vertical plane and the line to which the limiting distance is measured. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: For the purpose of determining the actual percentage of unprotected openings permitted in an exterior wall, the location of the exposing building face is permitted to be taken at a vertical plane located so that there are no unprotected openings between the vertical plane and the line to which the limiting distance is measured. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Fireplaces shall conform to the requirements of Section 9.22.
ON Variations: Fireplaces shall conform to the requirements of Section 9.22.

ON Full: The loads required in Sentence (3) need not be considered to act simultaneously with the loads provided for in Sentences (1), (2) and (6).
ON Variations: The loads required in Sentence (3) need not be considered to act simultaneously with the loads provided for in Sentences (1), (2) and (6).

ON Full: Plastic pipe, fittings and solvent cement used inside a building in a storm drainage system shall be certified to,(a) ASTM F628, "Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene (ABS) Schedule 40 Plastic Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe With a Cellular Core", (b) CAN/CSA-B181.1, "Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene (ABS) Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Pipe Fittings", (c) CAN/CSA-B181.2, "Polyvinylchloride (PVC) and Chlorinated Polyvinylchloride (CPVC) Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Pipe Fittings", (d) CAN/CSA-B182.1, "Plastic Drain and Sewer Pipe and Pipe Fittings", or (e) CAN/CSA-B182.2, "PSM Type Polyvinylchloride (PVC) Sewer Pipe and Fittings".
ON Variations: Plastic pipe, fittings and solvent cement used inside a building in a storm drainage system shall be certified to,(a) ASTM F628, "Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene (ABS) Schedule 40 Plastic Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe With a Cellular Core", (b) CAN/CSA-B181.1, "Acrylonitrile-Butadiene-Styrene (ABS) Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Pipe Fittings", (c) CAN/CSA-B181.2, "Polyvinylchloride (PVC) and Chlorinated Polyvinylchloride (CPVC) Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Pipe Fittings", (d) CAN/CSA-B182.1, "Plastic Drain and Sewer Pipe and Pipe Fittings", or (e) CAN/CSA-B182.2, "PSM Type Polyvinylchloride (PVC) Sewer Pipe and Fittings".

ON Full: Where risers are used they shall conform to the requirements of CSA B66, "Design, Material, and Manufacturing Requirements for Prefabricated Septic Tanks and Sewage Holding Tanks", and shall have adequate access openings to allow for regular maintenance of the septic tank.
ON Variations: Where risers are used they shall conform to the requirements of CSA B66, "Design, Material, and Manufacturing Requirements for Prefabricated Septic Tanks and Sewage Holding Tanks", and shall have adequate access openings to allow for regular maintenance of the septic tank.

ON Full: Insulating fibreboard tile shall be not less than 12.7 mm thick on supports spaced not more than 406 mm o.c.
ON Variations: Insulating fibreboard tile shall be not less than 12.7 mm thick on supports spaced not more than 406 mm o.c.

ON Full: If the flooring is end matched, it shall be laid so that no two adjoining strips break joints in the same space between supports and each strip bears on no fewer than two supports.
ON Variations: If the flooring is end matched, it shall be laid so that no two adjoining strips break joints in the same space between supports and each strip bears on no fewer than two supports.

ON Full: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool, where a pool deck projects over the water surface, the projection shall not exceed 50 mm.
ON Variations: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool, where a pool deck projects over the water surface, the projection shall not exceed 50 mm.

ON Full: Where a roof is required to support an additional uniform dead load from roofing materials such as concrete roofing tile, or materials other than as specified in Section 9.26., such as clay roofing tiles, the additional load shall be allowed for by reducing,(a) the spans for roof joists and rafters in Tables A-4 to A-7, or the spacing of the members, and (b) the spans for ridge beams and lintels in Tables A-12 to A-16.
ON Variations: Where a roof is required to support an additional uniform dead load from roofing materials such as concrete roofing tile, or materials other than as specified in Section 9.26., such as clay roofing tiles, the additional load shall be allowed for by reducing,(a) the spans for roof joists and rafters in Tables A-4 to A-7, or the spacing of the members, and (b) the spans for ridge beams and lintels in Tables A-12 to A-16.

ON Full: Wood columns shall be either solid, glue-laminated or built-up.
ON Variations: Wood columns shall be either solid, glue-laminated or built-up.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), in a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, if sleeping rooms or patient or resident services are provided on more than one floor level and the floor levels are not connected by ramps conforming to Article 3.8.3.4., such floor levels shall be served by at least one elevator that is large enough to accommodate a stretcher in a horizontal position.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), in a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, if sleeping rooms or patient or resident services are provided on more than one floor level and the floor levels are not connected by ramps conforming to Article 3.8.3.4., such floor levels shall be served by at least one elevator that is large enough to accommodate a stretcher in a horizontal position.

ON Full: All fittings at or below the water surface that allow water or air or both to be passed to or from the public spa shall be securely held in place by corrosion resistant fastening that requires a tool for removal and is galvanically compatible with the fittings and grilles or covers.
ON Variations: All fittings at or below the water surface that allow water or air or both to be passed to or from the public spa shall be securely held in place by corrosion resistant fastening that requires a tool for removal and is galvanically compatible with the fittings and grilles or covers.

ON Full: Audible signal devices shall be installed in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9) and shall be connected to the fire alarm system.
ON Variations: Audible signal devices shall be installed in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9) and shall be connected to the fire alarm system.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), doors providing access to floor areas from exit stairs shall not have locking devices to prevent entry into any floor area from which the travel distance up or down to an unlocked door is more than 2 storeys.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), doors providing access to floor areas from exit stairs shall not have locking devices to prevent entry into any floor area from which the travel distance up or down to an unlocked door is more than 2 storeys.

ON Full: A door in a fire separation shall be checked as frequently as necessary to ensure that the door remains closed.
ON Variations: A door in a fire separation shall be checked as frequently as necessary to ensure that the door remains closed.

ON Full: Where downspouts are provided and are not connected to a sewer, provisions shall be made to, (a) divert the water from the building, and (b) prevent soil erosion.
ON Variations: Where downspouts are provided and are not connected to a sewer, provisions shall be made to, (a) divert the water from the building, and (b) prevent soil erosion.

ON Full: The automatic emergency recall feature in Sentence (5) shall be actuated by, smoke detectors installed in each elevator lobby on each storey, or (See Appendix A.) the building fire alarm system.
ON Variations: The automatic emergency recall feature in Sentence (5) shall be actuated by, smoke detectors installed in each elevator lobby on each storey, or (See Appendix A.) the building fire alarm system.

ON Full: Where insulation functions as both moisture protection for interior finishes and as a vapour barrier in accordance with Subsection 9.25.4., it shall be applied over the entire interior surface of the foundation wall.
ON Variations: Where insulation functions as both moisture protection for interior finishes and as a vapour barrier in accordance with Subsection 9.25.4., it shall be applied over the entire interior surface of the foundation wall.

ON Full: Vehicle parking and equipment storage is permitted on one side of a fire access route provided the clear width of the access route, as required under Clause 3.2.2.12.(2)(a), is maintained.
ON Variations: Vehicle parking and equipment storage is permitted on one side of a fire access route provided the clear width of the access route, as required under Clause 3.2.2.12.(2)(a), is maintained.

ON Full: The number of water closets required for places of worship and undertaking premises shall be at least one fixture for each 150 persons of each sex.
ON Variations: The number of water closets required for places of worship and undertaking premises shall be at least one fixture for each 150 persons of each sex.

ON Full: A wrench suitable for replacing sprinkler heads shall be kept in the cabinet where the spare sprinkler heads are stored.
ON Variations: A wrench suitable for replacing sprinkler heads shall be kept in the cabinet where the spare sprinkler heads are stored.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.4. shall not apply.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.4. shall not apply.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (5), the fire separations referred to in Clause (1)(b) shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (5), the fire separations referred to in Clause (1)(b) shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Where hot and cold water are mixed and the temperature is regulated by a single, unmarked, manual control, a movement to the left shall increase the temperature and a movement to the right shall decrease the temperature.
ON Variations: Where hot and cold water are mixed and the temperature is regulated by a single, unmarked, manual control, a movement to the left shall increase the temperature and a movement to the right shall decrease the temperature.

ON Full: Sentences (2) to (4) apply to lateral support for walls described in Sentence 9.15.4.2.(1).
ON Variations: Sentences (2) to (4) apply to lateral support for walls described in Sentence 9.15.4.2.(1).

ON Full: The openings required between compartments referred to in Sentence (2) shall have a total cross-sectional area of at least three times the area of the inlet pipe and be located between the top and a level 150 mm above the liquid level at the outlet to provide for the free flow of air between compartments.
ON Variations: The openings required between compartments referred to in Sentence (2) shall have a total cross-sectional area of at least three times the area of the inlet pipe and be located between the top and a level 150 mm above the liquid level at the outlet to provide for the free flow of air between compartments.

ON Full: Openings above footboards and below the seats in rows of bleachers shall be of a size that will prevent the passage of a sphere having a diameter more than 100 mm.
ON Variations: Openings above footboards and below the seats in rows of bleachers shall be of a size that will prevent the passage of a sphere having a diameter more than 100 mm.

ON Full: The sound pressure level in a sleeping room from a fire alarm audible signal device shall be not less than 75 dBA in a building of residential occupancy when any intervening doors between the device and the sleeping room are closed. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The sound pressure level in a sleeping room from a fire alarm audible signal device shall be not less than 75 dBA in a building of residential occupancy when any intervening doors between the device and the sleeping room are closed. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Fireplace inserts and hearth mounted stoves vented through the throat of a fireplace shall conform to ULC-S628, "Fireplace Inserts".
ON Variations: Fireplace inserts and hearth mounted stoves vented through the throat of a fireplace shall conform to ULC-S628, "Fireplace Inserts".

ON Full: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard, fuel-fired appliances and electrical heating elements shall not be used in a storage area for combustible fibres.
ON Variations: Unless controlled in a manner that will not create a fire or explosion hazard, fuel-fired appliances and electrical heating elements shall not be used in a storage area for combustible fibres.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), foundation walls of hollow masonry units supporting floor joists shall be capped with,(a) not less than 50 mm of concrete, (b) solid masonry units that are 100% solid and not less than 50 mm high, or (c) semi-solid or hollow solid masonry units that have the top course completely filled with mortar, grout or concrete.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), foundation walls of hollow masonry units supporting floor joists shall be capped with,(a) not less than 50 mm of concrete, (b) solid masonry units that are 100% solid and not less than 50 mm high, or (c) semi-solid or hollow solid masonry units that have the top course completely filled with mortar, grout or concrete.

ON Full: The following changes of use are also deemed to be a change in major occupancy for the purposes of this Part: (a) a suite of a Group C major occupancy is converted into more than one suite of a Group C major occupancy, (b) a suite or part of a suite of a Group A, Division 2 or Group A, Division 4 major occupancy is converted to a gaming premises, (c) a farm building or part of a farm building is changed to a major occupancy, (d) a building or part of a building is changed to a post-disaster building, (e) a building or part of a building is changed to a retirement home, or (f) the use of a building or part of a building is changed and the previous major occupancy of the building or part of the building cannot be determined.
ON Variations: The following changes of use are also deemed to be a change in major occupancy for the purposes of this Part: (a) a suite of a Group C major occupancy is converted into more than one suite of a Group C major occupancy, (b) a suite or part of a suite of a Group A, Division 2 or Group A, Division 4 major occupancy is converted to a gaming premises, (c) a farm building or part of a farm building is changed to a major occupancy, (d) a building or part of a building is changed to a post-disaster building, (e) a building or part of a building is changed to a retirement home, or (f) the use of a building or part of a building is changed and the previous major occupancy of the building or part of the building cannot be determined.

ON Full: Every dwelling unit within the scope of this Section shall be provided with a smoke alarm in accordance with Subsection 9.10.19.
ON Variations: Every dwelling unit within the scope of this Section shall be provided with a smoke alarm in accordance with Subsection 9.10.19.

ON Full: Where dampproofing is installed below the floor, it shall consist of,(a) polyethylene not less than 0.15 mm thick with joints lapped not less than 100 mm, (b) Type S roll roofing with joints lapped not less than 100 mm, or (c) rigid extruded/expanded polystyrene with sealed or ship-lapped joints that has, (i) sufficient compressive strength to support the floor assembly, and (ii) a water vapour permeance complying with Clause 9.13.2.2.(2)(b). (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where dampproofing is installed below the floor, it shall consist of,(a) polyethylene not less than 0.15 mm thick with joints lapped not less than 100 mm, (b) Type S roll roofing with joints lapped not less than 100 mm, or (c) rigid extruded/expanded polystyrene with sealed or ship-lapped joints that has, (i) sufficient compressive strength to support the floor assembly, and (ii) a water vapour permeance complying with Clause 9.13.2.2.(2)(b). (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Joints with external elastomeric gaskets shall be made with corrosion resistant external band type flexible mechanical couplings that conform to CSA B602, "Mechanical Couplings for Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Sewer Pipe".
ON Variations: Joints with external elastomeric gaskets shall be made with corrosion resistant external band type flexible mechanical couplings that conform to CSA B602, "Mechanical Couplings for Drain, Waste, and Vent Pipe and Sewer Pipe".

ON Full: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool, the pool deck shall be separated from any adjacent spectator area or gallery and from any spectator access to such area or gallery by a gate or other barrier.
ON Variations: Except for a modified pool and wave action pool, the pool deck shall be separated from any adjacent spectator area or gallery and from any spectator access to such area or gallery by a gate or other barrier.

ON Full: Combustible flooring, subflooring and ceiling finishes shall have not less than a 12 mm clearance from masonry or concrete chimneys.
ON Variations: Combustible flooring, subflooring and ceiling finishes shall have not less than a 12 mm clearance from masonry or concrete chimneys.

ON Full: Noncombustible electrical outlet boxes that penetrate a fire separation or a membrane forming part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating need not meet the requirements of Article 3.1.9.1. provided, they do not exceed, 100 cm2 each in area, and an aggregate area of 650 cm2 in any 9.3 m2 of surface area, and the annular space between the membrane and the box does not exceed 3 mm.
ON Variations: Noncombustible electrical outlet boxes that penetrate a fire separation or a membrane forming part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating need not meet the requirements of Article 3.1.9.1. provided, they do not exceed, 100 cm2 each in area, and an aggregate area of 650 cm2 in any 9.3 m2 of surface area, and the annular space between the membrane and the box does not exceed 3 mm.

ON Full: Every emergency power supply shall be equipped with an emergency audible and visual trouble indication.
ON Variations: Every emergency power supply shall be equipped with an emergency audible and visual trouble indication.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (4) and (5), aisles shall be located so that there are not more than seven seats with backs or 20 seats without backs between any seat and the nearest aisle.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (4) and (5), aisles shall be located so that there are not more than seven seats with backs or 20 seats without backs between any seat and the nearest aisle.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.9. shall apply.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the requirements in Subsection 3.2.9. shall apply.

ON Full: Evaporative cooling towers, evaporative fluid coolers and evaporative condensers shall be provided with access ports, service platforms, fixed ladders and restraint connections to allow visual inspection, maintenance and testing.
ON Variations: Evaporative cooling towers, evaporative fluid coolers and evaporative condensers shall be provided with access ports, service platforms, fixed ladders and restraint connections to allow visual inspection, maintenance and testing.

ON Full: No pipe adaption shall be made by the use of a bushing that leaves a square edge or shoulder on the inside of the pipe or fitting.
ON Variations: No pipe adaption shall be made by the use of a bushing that leaves a square edge or shoulder on the inside of the pipe or fitting.

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (3), a tank that is used as a treatment unit in a Class 4 sewage system or a holding tank in a Class 5 sewage system shall conform to the requirements of CSA B66, "Design, Material, and Manufacturing Requirements for Prefabricated Septic Tanks and Sewage Holding Tanks".
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (3), a tank that is used as a treatment unit in a Class 4 sewage system or a holding tank in a Class 5 sewage system shall conform to the requirements of CSA B66, "Design, Material, and Manufacturing Requirements for Prefabricated Septic Tanks and Sewage Holding Tanks".

ON Full: The anchor bolts described in Sentence (1) shall be placed in the centre of the flat insulating concrete form wall and shall be embedded not less than 100 mm into the concrete.
ON Variations: The anchor bolts described in Sentence (1) shall be placed in the centre of the flat insulating concrete form wall and shall be embedded not less than 100 mm into the concrete.

ON Full: Plugs or caps shall be removed annually and the fire department connections inspected for wear, rust or obstruction and corrective action shall be taken as needed.
ON Variations: Plugs or caps shall be removed annually and the fire department connections inspected for wear, rust or obstruction and corrective action shall be taken as needed.

ON Full: Flue pipes serving solid fuel-burning stoves, cooktops and space heaters shall conform to CSA B365, "Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment".
ON Variations: Flue pipes serving solid fuel-burning stoves, cooktops and space heaters shall conform to CSA B365, "Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment".

ON Full: Where diaphragms are designed in accordance with Sentence (2), the struts shall be designed in accordance with Clause (1)(a) and the collectors, chords and connections between the diaphragms and the vertical elements of the SFRS shall be designed for forces corresponding to the capacity of the diaphragms in accordance with the applicable CSA standards. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where diaphragms are designed in accordance with Sentence (2), the struts shall be designed in accordance with Clause (1)(a) and the collectors, chords and connections between the diaphragms and the vertical elements of the SFRS shall be designed for forces corresponding to the capacity of the diaphragms in accordance with the applicable CSA standards. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: All pools shall be provided with automatic make-up water devices and provided with water meters to register the volume of all make-up water added to a public pool or its recirculation system.
ON Variations: All pools shall be provided with automatic make-up water devices and provided with water meters to register the volume of all make-up water added to a public pool or its recirculation system.

ON Full: Where a seating area is separated as required by Sentences 3.3.2.2.(1) and (2) or 3.3.2.2.(8), the length of travel by any aisle shall be not more than 45 m measured from the most remote point of the aisle to, an egress doorway in the required separation, or an exit leading directly from the seating area.
ON Variations: Where a seating area is separated as required by Sentences 3.3.2.2.(1) and (2) or 3.3.2.2.(8), the length of travel by any aisle shall be not more than 45 m measured from the most remote point of the aisle to, an egress doorway in the required separation, or an exit leading directly from the seating area.

ON Full: A water distributing pipe may be drilled or tapped to provide for a mechanically extracted T in copper tubing of Type L or K provided that all branch connections shall be notched and dimpled to limit depth of insertion and conform to the inner contour of the main.
ON Variations: A water distributing pipe may be drilled or tapped to provide for a mechanically extracted T in copper tubing of Type L or K provided that all branch connections shall be notched and dimpled to limit depth of insertion and conform to the inner contour of the main.

ON Full: The design of shallow foundations shall be in conformance with the requirements of Subsection 4.2.4. and this Subsection. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The design of shallow foundations shall be in conformance with the requirements of Subsection 4.2.4. and this Subsection. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (1), where a leaching bed receives effluent from a Level II, Level III or Level IV treatment unit as described in Table 8.6.2.2., the leaching bed may have a total length of distribution pipe not less than the value determined by the formula,where, L = total length of distribution pipe in metres, Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres, and T = the design percolation time.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (1), where a leaching bed receives effluent from a Level II, Level III or Level IV treatment unit as described in Table 8.6.2.2., the leaching bed may have a total length of distribution pipe not less than the value determined by the formula,where, L = total length of distribution pipe in metres, Q = the total daily design sanitary sewage flow in litres, and T = the design percolation time.

ON Full: Where an exterior air barrier is penetrated by doors, windows and other fenestration, the air barrier shall be sealed to the door frame or window frame with,(a) compatible flexible flashing material, (b) caulking, or (c) spray foam insulation.
ON Variations: Where an exterior air barrier is penetrated by doors, windows and other fenestration, the air barrier shall be sealed to the door frame or window frame with,(a) compatible flexible flashing material, (b) caulking, or (c) spray foam insulation.

ON Full: The stone layer or area over which the leaching chambers are spaced shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.B. and these distances shall be increased when required by Sentence 8.7.4.2.(11).
ON Variations: The stone layer or area over which the leaching chambers are spaced shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.B. and these distances shall be increased when required by Sentence 8.7.4.2.(11).

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 9.22.10.2.(3), metal liners referred to in Sentence (1) shall only be used in chimneys serving gas- or oil-burning appliances. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 9.22.10.2.(3), metal liners referred to in Sentence (1) shall only be used in chimneys serving gas- or oil-burning appliances. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The perimeter of the ground cover required in Sentence (1) shall be sealed to the foundation wall.
ON Variations: The perimeter of the ground cover required in Sentence (1) shall be sealed to the foundation wall.

ON Full: The telephone number of the fire department and location of the nearest telephone shall be posted conspicuously in attended locations.
ON Variations: The telephone number of the fire department and location of the nearest telephone shall be posted conspicuously in attended locations.

ON Full: Except as required in Sentence (2), thermal insulation shall conform to the requirements of,(a) ASTM C726, "Mineral Wool Roof Insulation Board," (b) CAN/CGSB-51.25-M, "Thermal Insulation, Phenolic, Faced", (c) CGSB 51-GP-27M, "Thermal Insulation, Polystyrene, Loose Fill", (d) CAN/ULC-S701.1, "Thermal Insulation, Polystyrene Boards", (e) CAN/ULC-S702 "Mineral Fibre Thermal Insulation for Buildings", (f) CAN/ULC-S703, "Cellulose Fibre Insulation for Buildings", (g) CAN/ULC-S704, "Thermal Insulation, Polyurethane and Polyisocyanurate, Boards, Faced", (h) CAN/ULC-S705.1, "Thermal Insulation - Spray Applied Rigid Polyurethane Foam, Medium Density - Material - Specification", or (i) CAN/ULC-S706.1, "Wood Fibre Insulating Boards for Buildings".
ON Variations: Except as required in Sentence (2), thermal insulation shall conform to the requirements of,(a) ASTM C726, "Mineral Wool Roof Insulation Board," (b) CAN/CGSB-51.25-M, "Thermal Insulation, Phenolic, Faced", (c) CGSB 51-GP-27M, "Thermal Insulation, Polystyrene, Loose Fill", (d) CAN/ULC-S701.1, "Thermal Insulation, Polystyrene Boards", (e) CAN/ULC-S702 "Mineral Fibre Thermal Insulation for Buildings", (f) CAN/ULC-S703, "Cellulose Fibre Insulation for Buildings", (g) CAN/ULC-S704, "Thermal Insulation, Polyurethane and Polyisocyanurate, Boards, Faced", (h) CAN/ULC-S705.1, "Thermal Insulation - Spray Applied Rigid Polyurethane Foam, Medium Density - Material - Specification", or (i) CAN/ULC-S706.1, "Wood Fibre Insulating Boards for Buildings".

ON Full: In recreational camps and camps for housing of workers, no fewer than two lavatories or provision for a pail or other portable container of sound construction shall be provided for each of the water closets or privies required in Sentence (2).
ON Variations: In recreational camps and camps for housing of workers, no fewer than two lavatories or provision for a pail or other portable container of sound construction shall be provided for each of the water closets or privies required in Sentence (2).

ON Full: The climatic and seismic values required for the design of buildings under this Code shall be in conformance with the values established by the climatic and seismic values provided in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-1, "Climatic and Seismic Data".
ON Variations: The climatic and seismic values required for the design of buildings under this Code shall be in conformance with the values established by the climatic and seismic values provided in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-1, "Climatic and Seismic Data".

ON Full: The size of a chimney flue serving a masonry fireplace shall be within the allowable range specified in Table 9.21.2.5.A. or Table 9.21.2.5.B.
ON Variations: The size of a chimney flue serving a masonry fireplace shall be within the allowable range specified in Table 9.21.2.5.A. or Table 9.21.2.5.B.

ON Full: Except as provided by Sentence (8) and Clause 3.8.3.4.(1)(e), the height of handrails on stairs, on aisles with steps and on ramps shall be, not less than 865 mm, and not more than 1070 mm.
ON Variations: Except as provided by Sentence (8) and Clause 3.8.3.4.(1)(e), the height of handrails on stairs, on aisles with steps and on ramps shall be, not less than 865 mm, and not more than 1070 mm.

ON Full: The notification to the person controlling the building and the fire department referred to in Sentences (5) and (6) shall be provided in accordance with Sentence 3.2.4.8.(4).
ON Variations: The notification to the person controlling the building and the fire department referred to in Sentences (5) and (6) shall be provided in accordance with Sentence 3.2.4.8.(4).

ON Full: Where a supply duct or return duct is not protected by an insulated exterior wall or where the duct is exposed to an unheated space it shall be insulated to provide a thermal resistance of not less than RSI 2.1.
ON Variations: Where a supply duct or return duct is not protected by an insulated exterior wall or where the duct is exposed to an unheated space it shall be insulated to provide a thermal resistance of not less than RSI 2.1.

ON Full: Electrical connections to tanks of marine vessels shall be maintained until the cargo hose has been disconnected and any spillage has been removed.
ON Variations: Electrical connections to tanks of marine vessels shall be maintained until the cargo hose has been disconnected and any spillage has been removed.

ON Full: The depth below ground level for foundations for exterior steps shall conform to the requirements in Section 9.12.
ON Variations: The depth below ground level for foundations for exterior steps shall conform to the requirements in Section 9.12.

ON Full: An interconnected floor space in a Group B, Division 1 occupancy need not conform to the requirements of Articles 3.2.8.3. to 3.2.8.11. provided the interconnected floor space does not interconnect more than 2 adjacent storeys.
ON Variations: An interconnected floor space in a Group B, Division 1 occupancy need not conform to the requirements of Articles 3.2.8.3. to 3.2.8.11. provided the interconnected floor space does not interconnect more than 2 adjacent storeys.

ON Full: In a building containing an interconnected floor space, storeys that are wholly or partially within an interconnected floor space and all storeys below an interconnected floor space shall be sprinklered.
ON Variations: In a building containing an interconnected floor space, storeys that are wholly or partially within an interconnected floor space and all storeys below an interconnected floor space shall be sprinklered.

ON Full: In localities where termites are known to occur and foundations are insulated or otherwise finished in a manner that could conceal a termite infestation,(a) a metal or plastic barrier shall be installed through the insulation and any other separation or finish materials above finished ground level to control the passage of termites behind or through the insulation, separation or finish materials, and (b) all sides of the finished supporting assembly shall be visible to permit inspection.
ON Variations: In localities where termites are known to occur and foundations are insulated or otherwise finished in a manner that could conceal a termite infestation,(a) a metal or plastic barrier shall be installed through the insulation and any other separation or finish materials above finished ground level to control the passage of termites behind or through the insulation, separation or finish materials, and (b) all sides of the finished supporting assembly shall be visible to permit inspection.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the elevator described in Article 3.13.8.2. shall be capable of providing transportation from each platform to a barrier-free entrance described in Article 3.8.1.2.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the elevator described in Article 3.13.8.2. shall be capable of providing transportation from each platform to a barrier-free entrance described in Article 3.8.1.2.

ON Full: Performance grades for windows, doors and skylights shall be selected according to the Canadian Supplement referenced in Clause (1)(b) so as to be appropriate for the conditions and geographic location in which the window, door or skylight will be installed.
ON Variations: Performance grades for windows, doors and skylights shall be selected according to the Canadian Supplement referenced in Clause (1)(b) so as to be appropriate for the conditions and geographic location in which the window, door or skylight will be installed.

ON Full: Cleaning rags shall be stored in receptacles conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3).
ON Variations: Cleaning rags shall be stored in receptacles conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3).

ON Full: Except as required by Article 4.1.8.10., in cases where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, structures designated as irregular must satisfy the provisions referenced in Table 4.1.8.6.
ON Variations: Except as required by Article 4.1.8.10., in cases where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, structures designated as irregular must satisfy the provisions referenced in Table 4.1.8.6.

ON Full: A fire damper shall be installed in the plane of the fire separation so as to stay in place should the duct be dislodged during a fire. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A fire damper shall be installed in the plane of the fire separation so as to stay in place should the duct be dislodged during a fire. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Panel-type sheathing board shall be applied so that joints perpendicular to the roof ridge are staggered where,(a) the sheathing is applied with the surface grain parallel to the roof ridge, and (b) the thickness of the sheathing is such that the edges are required to be supported.
ON Variations: Panel-type sheathing board shall be applied so that joints perpendicular to the roof ridge are staggered where,(a) the sheathing is applied with the surface grain parallel to the roof ridge, and (b) the thickness of the sheathing is such that the edges are required to be supported.

ON Full: Precast reinforced circular concrete manhole sections, catch basins and fittings shall conform to CSA A257.4, "Precast Reinforced Circular Concrete Manhole Sections, Catch Basins, and Fittings".
ON Variations: Precast reinforced circular concrete manhole sections, catch basins and fittings shall conform to CSA A257.4, "Precast Reinforced Circular Concrete Manhole Sections, Catch Basins, and Fittings".

ON Full: Joints required in Sentence (1) shall be designed to resist moisture penetration and shall be keyed to prevent relative displacement of the wall portions adjacent to the joint.
ON Variations: Joints required in Sentence (1) shall be designed to resist moisture penetration and shall be keyed to prevent relative displacement of the wall portions adjacent to the joint.

ON Full: Dip tank covers shall be maintained in good operating condition.
ON Variations: Dip tank covers shall be maintained in good operating condition.

ON Full: This Section applies to tank vehicles when located on a property to which this Code applies.
ON Variations: This Section applies to tank vehicles when located on a property to which this Code applies.

ON Full: Chimneys, flues and flue pipes shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them free from accumulations of combustible deposits.
ON Variations: Chimneys, flues and flue pipes shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them free from accumulations of combustible deposits.

ON Full: For concrete block walls required to be reinforced, continuous vertical reinforcement shall,(a) be provided at wall corners, wall ends, wall intersections, at changes in wall height, at the jambs of all openings and at movement joints, (b) extend from the top of the footing to the top of the foundation wall, and (c) where foundation walls are laterally supported at the top, have not less than 50 mm embedment into the footing, if the floor slab does not provide lateral support at the wall base.
ON Variations: For concrete block walls required to be reinforced, continuous vertical reinforcement shall,(a) be provided at wall corners, wall ends, wall intersections, at changes in wall height, at the jambs of all openings and at movement joints, (b) extend from the top of the footing to the top of the foundation wall, and (c) where foundation walls are laterally supported at the top, have not less than 50 mm embedment into the footing, if the floor slab does not provide lateral support at the wall base.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.4.20.(9) and 3.2.4.23.(2) and (3), a fire alarm system shall not incorporate manual silencing switches other than those installed inside the fire alarm control unit. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.4.20.(9) and 3.2.4.23.(2) and (3), a fire alarm system shall not incorporate manual silencing switches other than those installed inside the fire alarm control unit. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A holding tank shall have a working capacity of not less than 9 000 L.
ON Variations: A holding tank shall have a working capacity of not less than 9 000 L.

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (2), this Subsection applies to outdoor storage yards where lumber and forest products are stored.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (2), this Subsection applies to outdoor storage yards where lumber and forest products are stored.

ON Full: Service rooms and storage facilities for all public spas shall comply with the requirements of Article 3.11.11.1.
ON Variations: Service rooms and storage facilities for all public spas shall comply with the requirements of Article 3.11.11.1.

ON Full: Metal exposed to the interior of a fireplace such as the damper control mechanism shall have at least a 50 mm clearance from any combustible material on the face of the fireplace where such metal penetrates through the face of the fireplace.
ON Variations: Metal exposed to the interior of a fireplace such as the damper control mechanism shall have at least a 50 mm clearance from any combustible material on the face of the fireplace where such metal penetrates through the face of the fireplace.

ON Full: Pressure measurements referred to in Sentence (1) shall be obtained by using instruments calibrated in increments of not more than 4 kPa for test pressures up to 700 kPa (gauge), and 1% of the test pressure where it exceeds 700 kPa (gauge).
ON Variations: Pressure measurements referred to in Sentence (1) shall be obtained by using instruments calibrated in increments of not more than 4 kPa for test pressures up to 700 kPa (gauge), and 1% of the test pressure where it exceeds 700 kPa (gauge).

ON Full: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred into railway tank cars, railway tracks shall be bonded throughout their length and permanently grounded in conformance with Railway Prevention of Electric Sparks Regulations made under the Canada Transportation Act.
ON Variations: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are transferred into railway tank cars, railway tracks shall be bonded throughout their length and permanently grounded in conformance with Railway Prevention of Electric Sparks Regulations made under the Canada Transportation Act.

ON Full: This Part applies to the use, storage and handling of hazardous materials and combustible materials.
ON Variations: This Part applies to the use, storage and handling of hazardous materials and combustible materials.

ON Full: Buildings and their structural members made of wood shall conform to CSA O86, "Engineering Design in Wood".
ON Variations: Buildings and their structural members made of wood shall conform to CSA O86, "Engineering Design in Wood".

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (3) and (4), every trap shall be protected by a vent pipe.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (3) and (4), every trap shall be protected by a vent pipe.

ON Full: Where a washroom required by Subsection 3.7.4. is provided in a storey that is not required by Article 3.8.2.1. to have a barrier-free path of travel, the washroom shall, conform to Article 3.8.3.9. and Sentences 3.8.3.10.(4) and 3.8.3.11.(5), and be provided with at least one ambulatory water closet stall or enclosure conforming to Sentence 3.8.3.8.(10).
ON Variations: Where a washroom required by Subsection 3.7.4. is provided in a storey that is not required by Article 3.8.2.1. to have a barrier-free path of travel, the washroom shall, conform to Article 3.8.3.9. and Sentences 3.8.3.10.(4) and 3.8.3.11.(5), and be provided with at least one ambulatory water closet stall or enclosure conforming to Sentence 3.8.3.8.(10).

ON Full: Where installed, each manual pull station shall be tested to ensure activation of the interconnected smoke alarms on an annual basis.
ON Variations: Where installed, each manual pull station shall be tested to ensure activation of the interconnected smoke alarms on an annual basis.

ON Full: A comparison of the measurements described in Sentences (1) and (2) with meter readings and a computation of any gain or loss of liquid shall be done each time a required measurement is taken.
ON Variations: A comparison of the measurements described in Sentences (1) and (2) with meter readings and a computation of any gain or loss of liquid shall be done each time a required measurement is taken.

ON Full: Where a Level II, Level III or Level IV treatment unit as described in Table 8.6.2.2. is used in conjunction with a filter bed, the effective area shall be such that the loading on the surface of the filter medium does not exceed 100 L/m2 per day.
ON Variations: Where a Level II, Level III or Level IV treatment unit as described in Table 8.6.2.2. is used in conjunction with a filter bed, the effective area shall be such that the loading on the surface of the filter medium does not exceed 100 L/m2 per day.

ON Full: In buildings of steel frame construction, piping referred to in Sentence (1) shall be fastened to steel beams or columns by pipe hangers attached to the flanges.
ON Variations: In buildings of steel frame construction, piping referred to in Sentence (1) shall be fastened to steel beams or columns by pipe hangers attached to the flanges.

ON Full: The thickness and reinforcing of foundation walls made of reinforced concrete block and subject to lateral earth pressure shall conform to Table 9.15.4.2.B. and Sentences (5) to (8) where, (a) the walls are laterally supported at the top, (b) average stable soils are encountered, and (c) wind loads on the exposed portion of the foundation are no greater than 0.70 kPa.
ON Variations: The thickness and reinforcing of foundation walls made of reinforced concrete block and subject to lateral earth pressure shall conform to Table 9.15.4.2.B. and Sentences (5) to (8) where, (a) the walls are laterally supported at the top, (b) average stable soils are encountered, and (c) wind loads on the exposed portion of the foundation are no greater than 0.70 kPa.

ON Full: Where the performance level of an existing building is reduced under Sentence 11.4.2.4.(1), upgrading of plumbing in the existing building which is adversely affected by the extension, alteration or repair shall be required in conformance with Part 7.
ON Variations: Where the performance level of an existing building is reduced under Sentence 11.4.2.4.(1), upgrading of plumbing in the existing building which is adversely affected by the extension, alteration or repair shall be required in conformance with Part 7.

ON Full: The deflections calculated in Sentence (2) shall be used to account for sway effects as required by Sentence 4.1.3.2.(12). (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The deflections calculated in Sentence (2) shall be used to account for sway effects as required by Sentence 4.1.3.2.(12). (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), combustible pallets shall be stored outdoors in conformance with Section 2.4.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), combustible pallets shall be stored outdoors in conformance with Section 2.4.

ON Full: If a standpipe system is required in a building, hose stations shall be provided in each storey in the building.
ON Variations: If a standpipe system is required in a building, hose stations shall be provided in each storey in the building.

ON Full: For the application of the Dynamic Procedure, the provisions of Article 4.1.7.3. shall be followed, except that the exposure factor, Ce, shall be as prescribed in Sentences (2) and (3), and the gust effect factor, Cg, shall be as prescribed in Sentence (4), when determining the wind loads on the main structural system.
ON Variations: For the application of the Dynamic Procedure, the provisions of Article 4.1.7.3. shall be followed, except that the exposure factor, Ce, shall be as prescribed in Sentences (2) and (3), and the gust effect factor, Cg, shall be as prescribed in Sentence (4), when determining the wind loads on the main structural system.

ON Full: The size of every drainage pipe that serves a water closet shall be at least 3 in.
ON Variations: The size of every drainage pipe that serves a water closet shall be at least 3 in.

ON Full: Except for a shallow buried trench, a leaching bed comprised of absorption trenches may be constructed in leaching bed fill, if unsaturated soil or leaching bed fill complying with Subclause 8.7.2.1.(1)(b)(ii) extends,(a) to a depth of at least 250 mm over the area covered by the leaching bed fill, and (b) for at least 15 m beyond the centrelines of the outer distribution pipes or leaching chambers in any direction in which the effluent entering the soil or leaching bed fill will move horizontally. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except for a shallow buried trench, a leaching bed comprised of absorption trenches may be constructed in leaching bed fill, if unsaturated soil or leaching bed fill complying with Subclause 8.7.2.1.(1)(b)(ii) extends,(a) to a depth of at least 250 mm over the area covered by the leaching bed fill, and (b) for at least 15 m beyond the centrelines of the outer distribution pipes or leaching chambers in any direction in which the effluent entering the soil or leaching bed fill will move horizontally. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Bevel siding shall be,(a) not less than 5 mm thick at the top, and (b) not less than, (i) 12 mm thick at the butt for sidings 184 mm or less in width, and (ii) 14.3 mm thick at the butt for sidings wider than 184 mm.
ON Variations: Bevel siding shall be,(a) not less than 5 mm thick at the top, and (b) not less than, (i) 12 mm thick at the butt for sidings 184 mm or less in width, and (ii) 14.3 mm thick at the butt for sidings wider than 184 mm.

ON Full: The vent stack required by Sentence (1) shall be connected to a vertical section of the soil or waste stack at or immediately below the lowest soil or waste pipe connected to the soil or waste stack.
ON Variations: The vent stack required by Sentence (1) shall be connected to a vertical section of the soil or waste stack at or immediately below the lowest soil or waste pipe connected to the soil or waste stack.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), subfloors shall conform to Table 9.23.14.5.A. or 9.23.14.5.B.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), subfloors shall conform to Table 9.23.14.5.A. or 9.23.14.5.B.

ON Full: Eave protection shall be laid beneath the starter strip and shall consist of,(a) No. 15 asphalt-saturated felt laid in two plies lapped 480 mm and cemented together with lap cement, (b) Type M or S roll roofing laid with not less than 100 mm head and end laps cemented together with lap cement, (c) glass fibre or polyester fibre coated base sheets, or (d) self-sealing composite membranes consisting of modified bituminous coated material.
ON Variations: Eave protection shall be laid beneath the starter strip and shall consist of,(a) No. 15 asphalt-saturated felt laid in two plies lapped 480 mm and cemented together with lap cement, (b) Type M or S roll roofing laid with not less than 100 mm head and end laps cemented together with lap cement, (c) glass fibre or polyester fibre coated base sheets, or (d) self-sealing composite membranes consisting of modified bituminous coated material.

ON Full: The provisions of this Section apply to horizontal service spaces, vertical service spaces, attic or roof spaces, ducts, crawl spaces, shaft spaces, service rooms, and mechanical penthouses, and facilities contained in any of them.
ON Variations: The provisions of this Section apply to horizontal service spaces, vertical service spaces, attic or roof spaces, ducts, crawl spaces, shaft spaces, service rooms, and mechanical penthouses, and facilities contained in any of them.

ON Full: At least 75% of the wall surface of a lobby used as an exit in Article 9.9.8.5. shall have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 25.
ON Variations: At least 75% of the wall surface of a lobby used as an exit in Article 9.9.8.5. shall have a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 25.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (6), a stage for theatrical performances and ancillary spaces, including workshops, dressing rooms and storage areas, shall be separated from the seating area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, except for a proscenium opening protected with, a sprinkler deluge system conforming to the requirements of NFPA 13 "Installation of Sprinkler Systems", an unframed fire curtain if the opening is not more than 20 m wide, or a semi-rigid fire curtain if the opening is more than 20 m wide.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (6), a stage for theatrical performances and ancillary spaces, including workshops, dressing rooms and storage areas, shall be separated from the seating area by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, except for a proscenium opening protected with, a sprinkler deluge system conforming to the requirements of NFPA 13 "Installation of Sprinkler Systems", an unframed fire curtain if the opening is not more than 20 m wide, or a semi-rigid fire curtain if the opening is more than 20 m wide.

ON Full: A sprinkler protected glazed wall assembly shall be constructed in accordance with the requirements of ULC/ORD C263.1, "Sprinkler-Protected Windows Systems".
ON Variations: A sprinkler protected glazed wall assembly shall be constructed in accordance with the requirements of ULC/ORD C263.1, "Sprinkler-Protected Windows Systems".

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), every soil or waste stack draining fixtures from more than 4 storeys shall have a vent stack.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), every soil or waste stack draining fixtures from more than 4 storeys shall have a vent stack.

ON Full: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall meet the heat transfer performance requirements set out in Section 5.3.
ON Variations: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall meet the heat transfer performance requirements set out in Section 5.3.

ON Full: A tent need not conform to Article 3.4.6.12. except where swing type doors are provided.
ON Variations: A tent need not conform to Article 3.4.6.12. except where swing type doors are provided.

ON Full: Hose bibbs shall be provided in safe locations convenient for flushing down the walls and floors in washrooms, shower areas and passageways used by bathers.
ON Variations: Hose bibbs shall be provided in safe locations convenient for flushing down the walls and floors in washrooms, shower areas and passageways used by bathers.

ON Full: Outdoor air intakes and exhaust outlets at the building exterior shall be designed or located so that the air entering the building system will not contain more contaminants than the normal exterior air.
ON Variations: Outdoor air intakes and exhaust outlets at the building exterior shall be designed or located so that the air entering the building system will not contain more contaminants than the normal exterior air.

ON Full: Based on the lateral deflections calculated in Sentences (2), (5) and (6), the largest interstorey deflection at any level shall be limited to 0.01 hs for post-disaster buildings, 0.02 hs for High Importance Category buildings, and 0.025 hs for all other buildings.
ON Variations: Based on the lateral deflections calculated in Sentences (2), (5) and (6), the largest interstorey deflection at any level shall be limited to 0.01 hs for post-disaster buildings, 0.02 hs for High Importance Category buildings, and 0.025 hs for all other buildings.

ON Full: Nominally horizontal piping shall be supported so that,(a) galvanized iron or steel pipe is supported at intervals not exceeding, (i) 3.75 m if the pipe size is 6 in. or more, and (ii) 2 500
