ON Full: The ground motion histories used in the Numerical Integration Linear Time History Method shall be compatible with a response spectrum constructed from the design spectral acceleration values, S(T), defined in Sentence 4.1.8.4.(7). (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The ground motion histories used in the Numerical Integration Linear Time History Method shall be compatible with a response spectrum constructed from the design spectral acceleration values, S(T), defined in Sentence 4.1.8.4.(7). (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The checking, inspection and testing of fire safety devices shall be conducted in accordance with this Code.
ON Variations: The checking, inspection and testing of fire safety devices shall be conducted in accordance with this Code.

ON Full: Other fenestration assemblies that are metal-framed and separate interior conditioned space from interior unconditioned space or exterior space shall incorporate a thermal break to minimize condensation.
ON Variations: Other fenestration assemblies that are metal-framed and separate interior conditioned space from interior unconditioned space or exterior space shall incorporate a thermal break to minimize condensation.

ON Full: For the purposes of Table 7.5.8.3., the length of a branch vent shall be its developed length from the most distant soil or waste pipe connection to a vent stack, stack vent, header or open air.
ON Variations: For the purposes of Table 7.5.8.3., the length of a branch vent shall be its developed length from the most distant soil or waste pipe connection to a vent stack, stack vent, header or open air.

ON Full: Access openings shall be fitted with a door or hatch, except when the crawl space is heated and the access opening into the crawl space is from the adjacent heated space.
ON Variations: Access openings shall be fitted with a door or hatch, except when the crawl space is heated and the access opening into the crawl space is from the adjacent heated space.

ON Full: A hold-open device used on a door located between a corridor used by the public and an adjacent sleeping room in a care and treatment occupancy need not release automatically as described in Sentence (2).
ON Variations: A hold-open device used on a door located between a corridor used by the public and an adjacent sleeping room in a care and treatment occupancy need not release automatically as described in Sentence (2).

ON Full: A signal intended for the public to indicate the operation of a building security system that controls access to a building shall consist of an audible and visual signal.
ON Variations: A signal intended for the public to indicate the operation of a building security system that controls access to a building shall consist of an audible and visual signal.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to windows, doors and skylights, including their components, that separate,(a) interior space from exterior space, or (b) environmentally dissimilar interior spaces.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to windows, doors and skylights, including their components, that separate,(a) interior space from exterior space, or (b) environmentally dissimilar interior spaces.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets in a single fire compartment shall not exceed the quantity permitted in Article 4.2.10.2. for three cabinets.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), the total quantity of flammable liquids and combustible liquids stored in cabinets in a single fire compartment shall not exceed the quantity permitted in Article 4.2.10.2. for three cabinets.

ON Full: Galvanized steel pipe may be used in a drainage system or a venting system above ground inside a building.
ON Variations: Galvanized steel pipe may be used in a drainage system or a venting system above ground inside a building.

ON Full: Except for dwelling units and except as required in Sentence (2), optical fibre cables and electrical wires and cables installed in buildings permitted to be of combustible construction shall,(a) not convey flame or continue to burn for more than 1 min when tested in conformance with the Vertical Flame Test in Clause 4.11.1. of CSA C22.2 No. 0.3, "Test Methods for Electrical Wires and Cables", (FT1 Rating), or (b) be located in, (i) totally enclosed noncombustible raceways, (ii) masonry walls, (iii) concrete slabs, or (iv) totally enclosed non metallic raceways conforming to Clause 3.1.5.20.(1)(b).
ON Variations: Except for dwelling units and except as required in Sentence (2), optical fibre cables and electrical wires and cables installed in buildings permitted to be of combustible construction shall,(a) not convey flame or continue to burn for more than 1 min when tested in conformance with the Vertical Flame Test in Clause 4.11.1. of CSA C22.2 No. 0.3, "Test Methods for Electrical Wires and Cables", (FT1 Rating), or (b) be located in, (i) totally enclosed noncombustible raceways, (ii) masonry walls, (iii) concrete slabs, or (iv) totally enclosed non metallic raceways conforming to Clause 3.1.5.20.(1)(b).

ON Full: Where a portion of a floor area is not within an interconnected floor space, required access to exit from such portion of a floor area shall not lead through an interconnected floor space.
ON Variations: Where a portion of a floor area is not within an interconnected floor space, required access to exit from such portion of a floor area shall not lead through an interconnected floor space.

ON Full: In an aboveground unenclosed station, the protected route is permitted to begin at the point of leaving the platform.
ON Variations: In an aboveground unenclosed station, the protected route is permitted to begin at the point of leaving the platform.

ON Full: Where the swing of an above ground electrical conductor not owned or operated by an electrical supply authority is not known, a swing of not less than 1.8 m shall be used.
ON Variations: Where the swing of an above ground electrical conductor not owned or operated by an electrical supply authority is not known, a swing of not less than 1.8 m shall be used.

ON Full: If a portion of a building is completely cut off from the remainder of the building so that there is no access to the remainder of the building, the access routes required by Sentence (2) shall be located so that the unobstructed path of travel from the vehicle to one entrance of each portion of the building is not more than 45 m.
ON Variations: If a portion of a building is completely cut off from the remainder of the building so that there is no access to the remainder of the building, the access routes required by Sentence (2) shall be located so that the unobstructed path of travel from the vehicle to one entrance of each portion of the building is not more than 45 m.

ON Full: The developed length of a building sewer between the building and the first manhole to which the building sewer connects shall not exceed 30 m.
ON Variations: The developed length of a building sewer between the building and the first manhole to which the building sewer connects shall not exceed 30 m.

ON Full: The sprinkler system required by Sentence (1) shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices, with each device serving not more than 1 storey.
ON Variations: The sprinkler system required by Sentence (1) shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices, with each device serving not more than 1 storey.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), not less than 100 mm of coarse clean granular material containing not more than 10% of material that will pass a 4 mm sieve shall be placed beneath floors-on-ground.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), not less than 100 mm of coarse clean granular material containing not more than 10% of material that will pass a 4 mm sieve shall be placed beneath floors-on-ground.

ON Full: Sentence (4) does not apply where the building conforms to Subclause 3.2.2.44.(1)(a)(ii), and contains dwelling units having means of egress conforming to Sentence 3.3.4.4.(8).
ON Variations: Sentence (4) does not apply where the building conforms to Subclause 3.2.2.44.(1)(a)(ii), and contains dwelling units having means of egress conforming to Sentence 3.3.4.4.(8).

ON Full: Explosion-relief devices and vents or other protective measures shall be provided for every electrical equipment vault containing dielectric liquid filled electrical equipment in conformance with Sentence 3.3.1.19.(4).
ON Variations: Explosion-relief devices and vents or other protective measures shall be provided for every electrical equipment vault containing dielectric liquid filled electrical equipment in conformance with Sentence 3.3.1.19.(4).

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4), capacity ratings for required fans shall be determined in accordance with,(a) CAN/CSA-C260-M, "Rating the Performance of Residential Mechanical Ventilating Equipment", or (b) HVI 916, "Airflow Test Procedure".
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4), capacity ratings for required fans shall be determined in accordance with,(a) CAN/CSA-C260-M, "Rating the Performance of Residential Mechanical Ventilating Equipment", or (b) HVI 916, "Airflow Test Procedure".

ON Full: PE/AL/PE composite pipe and fittings used for potable water systems shall conform to CSA B137.9, "Polyethylene/Aluminum/Polyethylene (PE-AL-PE) Composite Pressure-Pipe Systems". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: PE/AL/PE composite pipe and fittings used for potable water systems shall conform to CSA B137.9, "Polyethylene/Aluminum/Polyethylene (PE-AL-PE) Composite Pressure-Pipe Systems". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4), all holding tanks shall be provided with a vent that,(a) is not less than 3 in. trade size, (b) terminates at least, (i) 300 mm above finished grade with a vent cap, or (ii) 600 mm above finished grade with a vent cap when the holding tank is located in an area subject to flooding, and (c) terminates at least 3.5 m away from any air inlet, window, or door.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4), all holding tanks shall be provided with a vent that,(a) is not less than 3 in. trade size, (b) terminates at least, (i) 300 mm above finished grade with a vent cap, or (ii) 600 mm above finished grade with a vent cap when the holding tank is located in an area subject to flooding, and (c) terminates at least 3.5 m away from any air inlet, window, or door.

ON Full: Access to windows and panels required to vent floor areas and vents to vestibules that are permitted to be manually openable shall be kept free of obstructions.
ON Variations: Access to windows and panels required to vent floor areas and vents to vestibules that are permitted to be manually openable shall be kept free of obstructions.

ON Full: Every public pool shall be equipped with a recirculation system.
ON Variations: Every public pool shall be equipped with a recirculation system.

ON Full: Where barrier-free access for entry into and egress from the water of a public pool is provided by a ramp as required by Clause 3.11.3.3.(1)(a), the pool shall be designed and constructed in accordance with Sentences (2) to (4).
ON Variations: Where barrier-free access for entry into and egress from the water of a public pool is provided by a ramp as required by Clause 3.11.3.3.(1)(a), the pool shall be designed and constructed in accordance with Sentences (2) to (4).

ON Full: This Section applies to the construction of a Class 3 sewage system.
ON Variations: This Section applies to the construction of a Class 3 sewage system.

ON Full: A shelf and rack storage system may be designed for the storage, accessing, retrieval, packing and distribution of commodities.
ON Variations: A shelf and rack storage system may be designed for the storage, accessing, retrieval, packing and distribution of commodities.

ON Full: The requirements of 3.8. need not be provided for houses, triplexes and boarding or rooming houses with fewer than eight boarders or roomers.
ON Variations: The requirements of 3.8. need not be provided for houses, triplexes and boarding or rooming houses with fewer than eight boarders or roomers.

ON Full: Every door that divides a corridor that is not wholly contained within a suite shall swing on a vertical axis in the direction of travel to the exit where the corridor provides access to exit for, an occupant load more than 60, a high hazard industrial occupancy, a hazardous classroom in an elementary or secondary school, a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, or a retirement home.
ON Variations: Every door that divides a corridor that is not wholly contained within a suite shall swing on a vertical axis in the direction of travel to the exit where the corridor provides access to exit for, an occupant load more than 60, a high hazard industrial occupancy, a hazardous classroom in an elementary or secondary school, a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, or a retirement home.

ON Full: A yoke vent need not be installed provided the soil or waste stack is interconnected with the vent stack in each storey of the section in which fixtures are located by means of a vent pipe equal in size to the branch or fixture drain or 2 in. in size, whichever is smaller.
ON Variations: A yoke vent need not be installed provided the soil or waste stack is interconnected with the vent stack in each storey of the section in which fixtures are located by means of a vent pipe equal in size to the branch or fixture drain or 2 in. in size, whichever is smaller.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), a window or access panel providing an opening not less than 1 100 mm high and 550 mm wide and having a sill height of not more than 900 mm above the floor shall be provided on the second and third storeys of every building in at least one wall facing on a street if such storeys are not sprinklered.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), a window or access panel providing an opening not less than 1 100 mm high and 550 mm wide and having a sill height of not more than 900 mm above the floor shall be provided on the second and third storeys of every building in at least one wall facing on a street if such storeys are not sprinklered.

ON Full: Provided the design is carried out by a person especially qualified in the specific methods applied and provided the design demonstrates a level of safety and performance in accordance with the requirements of this Part, buildings and their structural components falling within the scope of this Part that are not amenable to analysis using a generally established theory may be designed by, (a) evaluation of a full-scale structure or a prototype by a loading test, or (b) studies of model analogues. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Provided the design is carried out by a person especially qualified in the specific methods applied and provided the design demonstrates a level of safety and performance in accordance with the requirements of this Part, buildings and their structural components falling within the scope of this Part that are not amenable to analysis using a generally established theory may be designed by, (a) evaluation of a full-scale structure or a prototype by a loading test, or (b) studies of model analogues. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Unsalvageable material shall be removed by sweeping and burial.
ON Variations: Unsalvageable material shall be removed by sweeping and burial.

ON Full: The telephones in Sentence (2) shall be provided with connections to the central supervising station.
ON Variations: The telephones in Sentence (2) shall be provided with connections to the central supervising station.

ON Full: Non-potable water piping shall not be located,(a) where food is prepared in a food processing plant, (b) above food-handling equipment, (c) above a non-pressurized potable water tank, or (d) above a cover of a pressurized potable water tank.
ON Variations: Non-potable water piping shall not be located,(a) where food is prepared in a food processing plant, (b) above food-handling equipment, (c) above a non-pressurized potable water tank, or (d) above a cover of a pressurized potable water tank.

ON Full: The maximum travel distance on an elevated platform to an exit serving that platform shall not exceed 45 m.
ON Variations: The maximum travel distance on an elevated platform to an exit serving that platform shall not exceed 45 m.

ON Full: The instructions required in Sentence (1) shall be included in the fire safety plan where such a plan is required.
ON Variations: The instructions required in Sentence (1) shall be included in the fire safety plan where such a plan is required.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4), if material alterations or repairs concern any pool fitting that passes water or air, or both, in or out of the pool tank, the affected fitting shall comply with Sentences 3.11.8.1.(20) and 3.12.4.1.(4) to (10).
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4), if material alterations or repairs concern any pool fitting that passes water or air, or both, in or out of the pool tank, the affected fitting shall comply with Sentences 3.11.8.1.(20) and 3.12.4.1.(4) to (10).

ON Full: Polyethylene water pipe, tubing and fittings shall be certified to, and have a pressure rating meeting the requirements of, Series 160 or a higher series of CSA B137.1, "Polyethylene (PE) Pipe, Tubing and Fittings for Cold Water Pressure Services".
ON Variations: Polyethylene water pipe, tubing and fittings shall be certified to, and have a pressure rating meeting the requirements of, Series 160 or a higher series of CSA B137.1, "Polyethylene (PE) Pipe, Tubing and Fittings for Cold Water Pressure Services".

ON Full: Provision shall be made to protect the water distribution system from the adverse effects of water hammer. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Provision shall be made to protect the water distribution system from the adverse effects of water hammer. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Lighting installed to provide the minimum illumination levels required by this Code may be controlled by motion sensors except where the lighting,(a) is installed in an exit, (b) is installed in a corridor serving patients or residents in a Group B, Division 2 or Division 3 occupancy, or (c) is required to conform to Sentence 3.2.7.1.(6).
ON Variations: Lighting installed to provide the minimum illumination levels required by this Code may be controlled by motion sensors except where the lighting,(a) is installed in an exit, (b) is installed in a corridor serving patients or residents in a Group B, Division 2 or Division 3 occupancy, or (c) is required to conform to Sentence 3.2.7.1.(6).

ON Full: The gateways shall be high enough to permit the entry of fire department vehicles.
ON Variations: The gateways shall be high enough to permit the entry of fire department vehicles.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), backfill shall not contain pyritic material or material that is susceptible to ice lensing in concentrations that will damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies separating dissimilar environments. (See A-9.4.4.4.(1) in Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (3), backfill shall not contain pyritic material or material that is susceptible to ice lensing in concentrations that will damage the building to a degree that would adversely affect its stability or the performance of assemblies separating dissimilar environments. (See A-9.4.4.4.(1) in Appendix A.)

ON Full: The door in the fire-separation required in Sentence (4) is permitted to be equipped with a roller latch and need not be provided with a self-closing device.
ON Variations: The door in the fire-separation required in Sentence (4) is permitted to be equipped with a roller latch and need not be provided with a self-closing device.

ON Full: A public pool shall be constructed to have a water depth of not less than 750 mm except for, a modified pool, a wave action pool, a pool for therapeutic use, a beach entry ramp, and a pool described in Sentence 3.11.5.2.(1).
ON Variations: A public pool shall be constructed to have a water depth of not less than 750 mm except for, a modified pool, a wave action pool, a pool for therapeutic use, a beach entry ramp, and a pool described in Sentence 3.11.5.2.(1).

ON Full: No vent pipe shall be connected in such a manner that a blockage in a soil or waste pipe would cause waste to drain through the vent pipe to the drainage system.
ON Variations: No vent pipe shall be connected in such a manner that a blockage in a soil or waste pipe would cause waste to drain through the vent pipe to the drainage system.

ON Full: Storage piles of tires or shredded tires in storage yards shall not be located beneath electrical power lines with a voltage in excess of 750 volts or that supply power to fire emergency systems.
ON Variations: Storage piles of tires or shredded tires in storage yards shall not be located beneath electrical power lines with a voltage in excess of 750 volts or that supply power to fire emergency systems.

ON Full: A water distribution system shall be installed so that the system can be drained or blown out with air and outlets for this purpose shall be provided.
ON Variations: A water distribution system shall be installed so that the system can be drained or blown out with air and outlets for this purpose shall be provided.

ON Full: Minimum floor areas specified in this Section do not include closets or built-in bedroom cabinets unless otherwise indicated.
ON Variations: Minimum floor areas specified in this Section do not include closets or built-in bedroom cabinets unless otherwise indicated.

ON Full: Where field test methods are included in the tank construction standards referred to in Articles 4.3.1.2. and 4.3.1.3., such tests shall be permitted for storage tanks conforming to those standards.
ON Variations: Where field test methods are included in the tank construction standards referred to in Articles 4.3.1.2. and 4.3.1.3., such tests shall be permitted for storage tanks conforming to those standards.

ON Full: Where motion sensors are used to control minimum lighting in a public corridor or corridor providing access to exit for the public, the motion sensors shall be installed with switch controllers equipped for fail-safe operation and illumination timers set for a minimum 15-minute duration.
ON Variations: Where motion sensors are used to control minimum lighting in a public corridor or corridor providing access to exit for the public, the motion sensors shall be installed with switch controllers equipped for fail-safe operation and illumination timers set for a minimum 15-minute duration.

ON Full: Upon activation of the sprinkler system or automatic detection of smoke by at least two smoke detectors in a single zone within an interconnected floor space, the system shall, stop air moving fans that provide for the normal exhausting or re-circulating of air in an interconnected floor space, activate exit stairshaft protection required in Article 3.2.8.4., activate elevator protection required in Article 3.2.8.5., and activate the vestibule air supply required in Sentence 3.2.8.6.(1).
ON Variations: Upon activation of the sprinkler system or automatic detection of smoke by at least two smoke detectors in a single zone within an interconnected floor space, the system shall, stop air moving fans that provide for the normal exhausting or re-circulating of air in an interconnected floor space, activate exit stairshaft protection required in Article 3.2.8.4., activate elevator protection required in Article 3.2.8.5., and activate the vestibule air supply required in Sentence 3.2.8.6.(1).

ON Full: Subflooring described in Sentence (2) shall have its upper surface and all edges treated to restrict water absorption where the subfloor is used in bathrooms, kitchens, laundry rooms or other areas subject to periodic wetting. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Subflooring described in Sentence (2) shall have its upper surface and all edges treated to restrict water absorption where the subfloor is used in bathrooms, kitchens, laundry rooms or other areas subject to periodic wetting. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A combined building drain or a combined building sewer shall not be installed.
ON Variations: A combined building drain or a combined building sewer shall not be installed.

ON Full: Minimum specified values of the loads described in Sentence (1), as set forth in Subsections 4.1.4. to 4.1.8., shall be increased to account for dynamic effects where applicable.
ON Variations: Minimum specified values of the loads described in Sentence (1), as set forth in Subsections 4.1.4. to 4.1.8., shall be increased to account for dynamic effects where applicable.

ON Full: Threaded cast iron drainage fittings shall not be used in a water system.
ON Variations: Threaded cast iron drainage fittings shall not be used in a water system.

ON Full: Storm doors, sliding doors and their components shall be designed, constructed and installed so that, when in the closed position, they,(a) resist wind loads, (b) control air leakage to a minimum allowable 5 m3h/m and a maximum allowable 8.35 m3h/m, (c) resist the ingress of insects and vermin, and (d) are easily operable.
ON Variations: Storm doors, sliding doors and their components shall be designed, constructed and installed so that, when in the closed position, they,(a) resist wind loads, (b) control air leakage to a minimum allowable 5 m3h/m and a maximum allowable 8.35 m3h/m, (c) resist the ingress of insects and vermin, and (d) are easily operable.

ON Full: The maximum piling height of tires shall not exceed the height used for the design of the fixed extinguishing system installed as required in Article 3.3.1.8.
ON Variations: The maximum piling height of tires shall not exceed the height used for the design of the fixed extinguishing system installed as required in Article 3.3.1.8.

ON Full: Balconies, decks and other accessible exterior platforms intended for an occupancy and subject to snow loads shall be designed to carry the specified roof snow load or 1.9 kPa, whichever is greater, where the platform, or each segregated area of the platform, serves a house or an individual dwelling unit. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Balconies, decks and other accessible exterior platforms intended for an occupancy and subject to snow loads shall be designed to carry the specified roof snow load or 1.9 kPa, whichever is greater, where the platform, or each segregated area of the platform, serves a house or an individual dwelling unit. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where cantilevered floor joists described in Sentences (1) and (2) are at right angles to the main floor joists, the tail joists in the cantilevered portion shall, (a) extend inward away from the cantilever support a distance equal to not less than six times the length of the cantilever, and (b) shall be end nailed to an interior doubled header joist in conformance with Table 9.23.3.4.
ON Variations: Where cantilevered floor joists described in Sentences (1) and (2) are at right angles to the main floor joists, the tail joists in the cantilevered portion shall, (a) extend inward away from the cantilever support a distance equal to not less than six times the length of the cantilever, and (b) shall be end nailed to an interior doubled header joist in conformance with Table 9.23.3.4.

ON Full: The installation of materials to resist heat transfer in accordance with this Subsection is not required where it can be shown that uncontrolled heat transfer will not adversely affect any of,(a) the health or safety of building users, (b) the intended use of the building, or (c) the operation of building services.
ON Variations: The installation of materials to resist heat transfer in accordance with this Subsection is not required where it can be shown that uncontrolled heat transfer will not adversely affect any of,(a) the health or safety of building users, (b) the intended use of the building, or (c) the operation of building services.

ON Full: Where polyethylene sheet is used to provide the air-tightness in the air barrier system, it shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.34-M, "Vapour Barrier, Polyethylene Sheet for Use in Building Construction".
ON Variations: Where polyethylene sheet is used to provide the air-tightness in the air barrier system, it shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.34-M, "Vapour Barrier, Polyethylene Sheet for Use in Building Construction".

ON Full: Waste air-suspended powders shall be removed by exhaust ducts to a powder recovery system and shall not be released to the outside atmosphere.
ON Variations: Waste air-suspended powders shall be removed by exhaust ducts to a powder recovery system and shall not be released to the outside atmosphere.

ON Full: The height of handrails on stairs, on aisles with steps and on ramps shall be measured vertically from the top of the handrail to, a straight line drawn tangent to the tread nosings of the stair served by the handrail, or the surface of the ramp, floor or landing served by the handrail.
ON Variations: The height of handrails on stairs, on aisles with steps and on ramps shall be measured vertically from the top of the handrail to, a straight line drawn tangent to the tread nosings of the stair served by the handrail, or the surface of the ramp, floor or landing served by the handrail.

ON Full: Except for a modified pool, every public pool shall display on the deck clearly marked figures, not less than 100 mm high, that set out, the water depths indicating the deep points, the breaks between gentle and steep bottom slopes and the shallow points, the words SHALLOW AREA at one or more appropriate locations, and where the water depth exceeds 2 500 mm, the words DEEP AREA at one or more appropriate locations.
ON Variations: Except for a modified pool, every public pool shall display on the deck clearly marked figures, not less than 100 mm high, that set out, the water depths indicating the deep points, the breaks between gentle and steep bottom slopes and the shallow points, the words SHALLOW AREA at one or more appropriate locations, and where the water depth exceeds 2 500 mm, the words DEEP AREA at one or more appropriate locations.

ON Full: A record shall be prepared of every fire drill conducted under Article 2.8.3.2.
ON Variations: A record shall be prepared of every fire drill conducted under Article 2.8.3.2.

ON Full: Tank heating equipment and accessories shall be checked daily during freezing weather to ensure that they are in operating condition and that heater valves are open.
ON Variations: Tank heating equipment and accessories shall be checked daily during freezing weather to ensure that they are in operating condition and that heater valves are open.

ON Full: Drainage facilities shall be tested to ensure that the drains are capable of taking the full flow from the main drain pipe without overflowing.
ON Variations: Drainage facilities shall be tested to ensure that the drains are capable of taking the full flow from the main drain pipe without overflowing.

ON Full: Except in a dwelling unit, a floor assembly in a building in a camp for housing of workers separating the first storey and the second storey shall be constructed as a fire separation having not less than a 30 min fire-resistance rating.
ON Variations: Except in a dwelling unit, a floor assembly in a building in a camp for housing of workers separating the first storey and the second storey shall be constructed as a fire separation having not less than a 30 min fire-resistance rating.

ON Full: A cleanout shall not be located in a floor assembly in a manner that may constitute a hazard and shall not be used as a floor drain.
ON Variations: A cleanout shall not be located in a floor assembly in a manner that may constitute a hazard and shall not be used as a floor drain.

ON Full: Foundation walls shall be considered to be laterally supported at the top if,(a) such walls support solid masonry superstructure, (b) the floor joists are embedded in the top of the foundation walls, or (c) the floor system is anchored to the top of the foundation walls with anchor bolts, in which case the joists may run either parallel or perpendicular to the foundation walls.
ON Variations: Foundation walls shall be considered to be laterally supported at the top if,(a) such walls support solid masonry superstructure, (b) the floor joists are embedded in the top of the foundation walls, or (c) the floor system is anchored to the top of the foundation walls with anchor bolts, in which case the joists may run either parallel or perpendicular to the foundation walls.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), where columns or posts support balconies, decks, verandas and other exterior platforms, and the columns or posts extend not more than 600 mm above finished ground level, the supported joists or beams shall be,(a) anchored to a foundation to resist uplift and lateral movement, or (b) directly anchored to the ground to resist uplift.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), where columns or posts support balconies, decks, verandas and other exterior platforms, and the columns or posts extend not more than 600 mm above finished ground level, the supported joists or beams shall be,(a) anchored to a foundation to resist uplift and lateral movement, or (b) directly anchored to the ground to resist uplift.

ON Full: During the pin refinishing process, a receptacle that complies with Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3) shall be provided for waste rags and materials used in operations involving flammable finishes or solvents.
ON Variations: During the pin refinishing process, a receptacle that complies with Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3) shall be provided for waste rags and materials used in operations involving flammable finishes or solvents.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), no part of a secondary containment wall shall be less than 1.5 m from a storage tank shell.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), no part of a secondary containment wall shall be less than 1.5 m from a storage tank shell.

ON Full: Fire drills required in Subsection 2.8.3. shall be held at intervals not greater than six months in laboratories.
ON Variations: Fire drills required in Subsection 2.8.3. shall be held at intervals not greater than six months in laboratories.

ON Full: Where the superstructure of a detached building conforms to the requirements of the deformation resistance test in CSA Z240.2.1, "Structural Requirements for Manufactured Homes", the foundation shall be constructed in conformance with,(a) this Section, or (b) CSA Z240.10.1, "Site Preparation, Foundation, and Installation of Buildings".
ON Variations: Where the superstructure of a detached building conforms to the requirements of the deformation resistance test in CSA Z240.2.1, "Structural Requirements for Manufactured Homes", the foundation shall be constructed in conformance with,(a) this Section, or (b) CSA Z240.10.1, "Site Preparation, Foundation, and Installation of Buildings".

ON Full: Outdoor air shall be distributed by a ductwork system from the heat recovery ventilator required in Sentence (3) to each bedroom, to any storey without a bedroom and, if there is no storey without a bedroom, to the principal living area.
ON Variations: Outdoor air shall be distributed by a ductwork system from the heat recovery ventilator required in Sentence (3) to each bedroom, to any storey without a bedroom and, if there is no storey without a bedroom, to the principal living area.

ON Full: Where plain or reinforced masonry in foundations or in structures supporting soil or rock may be subject to conditions conducive to deterioration, protection shall be provided to prevent such deterioration.
ON Variations: Where plain or reinforced masonry in foundations or in structures supporting soil or rock may be subject to conditions conducive to deterioration, protection shall be provided to prevent such deterioration.

ON Full: Except as provided in Articles 4.1.8.19. and 4.1.8.21., the Dynamic Analysis Procedure shall be in accordance with one of the following methods: (a) Linear Dynamic Analysis by either the Modal Response Spectrum Method or the Numerical Integration Linear Time History Method using a structural model that complies with the requirements of Sentence 4.1.8.3.(8), or (See Appendix (b) Non-Linear Dynamic Analysis, in which case a special study shall be performed. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Articles 4.1.8.19. and 4.1.8.21., the Dynamic Analysis Procedure shall be in accordance with one of the following methods: (a) Linear Dynamic Analysis by either the Modal Response Spectrum Method or the Numerical Integration Linear Time History Method using a structural model that complies with the requirements of Sentence 4.1.8.3.(8), or (See Appendix (b) Non-Linear Dynamic Analysis, in which case a special study shall be performed. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Sound ratings for required fans shall be determined in accordance with,(a) CAN/CSA-C260-M, "Rating the Performance of Residential Mechanical Ventilating Equipment", or (b) HVI 915, "Loudness Testing and Rating Procedure".
ON Variations: Sound ratings for required fans shall be determined in accordance with,(a) CAN/CSA-C260-M, "Rating the Performance of Residential Mechanical Ventilating Equipment", or (b) HVI 915, "Loudness Testing and Rating Procedure".

ON Full: Where the fundamental lateral period, Ta, is determined in accordance with Clause (3)(d) and the building is constructed with more than 4 storeys of continuous wood construction and has a timber SFRS consisting of shear walls with wood-based panels, braced frames or moment-resisting frames as defined in Table 4.1.8.9., the lateral earthquake force, V, as determined in accordance with Sentence (2) shall be multiplied by 1.2 but need not exceed the value determined by using Clause (2)(c). (See Appendix Note A-4.1.8.10.(4))
ON Variations: Where the fundamental lateral period, Ta, is determined in accordance with Clause (3)(d) and the building is constructed with more than 4 storeys of continuous wood construction and has a timber SFRS consisting of shear walls with wood-based panels, braced frames or moment-resisting frames as defined in Table 4.1.8.9., the lateral earthquake force, V, as determined in accordance with Sentence (2) shall be multiplied by 1.2 but need not exceed the value determined by using Clause (2)(c). (See Appendix Note A-4.1.8.10.(4))

ON Full: The pool deck, the submerged parts of a public pool, the walls or partitions adjacent to a pool deck and the pavement or floor adjacent to a pool deck shall have surfaces that permit thorough cleaning.
ON Variations: The pool deck, the submerged parts of a public pool, the walls or partitions adjacent to a pool deck and the pavement or floor adjacent to a pool deck shall have surfaces that permit thorough cleaning.

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (3) and Subsection 4.12.10., no more than 300 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which no more than 50 L may be flammable liquids, shall be kept in the open area of a laboratory.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (3) and Subsection 4.12.10., no more than 300 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which no more than 50 L may be flammable liquids, shall be kept in the open area of a laboratory.

ON Full: Clearances between combustible material and bare pipes carrying steam or hot water shall conform to Table 6.2.9.3.
ON Variations: Clearances between combustible material and bare pipes carrying steam or hot water shall conform to Table 6.2.9.3.

ON Full: In a long-term care home, a remote audiovisual fire alarm trouble signal shall be located at the main nursing station.
ON Variations: In a long-term care home, a remote audiovisual fire alarm trouble signal shall be located at the main nursing station.

ON Full: A machine that produces sawdust, particles or shavings shall not be used in an operation that generates sparks or combustible vapours.
ON Variations: A machine that produces sawdust, particles or shavings shall not be used in an operation that generates sparks or combustible vapours.

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction, used singly or in combination, and, except as permitted by Sentence (3), floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, except as provided by Sentence (4), where the roof assembly has a height greater than 25 m measured from the floor level of the first storey to the highest point of the roof assembly, the roof assembly shall, be of noncombustible construction, or be constructed of fire-retardant treated wood conforming to Article 3.1.4.5., mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, the fire separation of exits described in Sentence 3.4.4.1.(3) shall be of noncombustible construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction, used singly or in combination, and, except as permitted by Sentence (3), floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, except as provided by Sentence (4), where the roof assembly has a height greater than 25 m measured from the floor level of the first storey to the highest point of the roof assembly, the roof assembly shall, be of noncombustible construction, or be constructed of fire-retardant treated wood conforming to Article 3.1.4.5., mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, the fire separation of exits described in Sentence 3.4.4.1.(3) shall be of noncombustible construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Clauses (c) and (d), the building referred to in Sentence (1) shall be of noncombustible construction, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of heavy timber construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly, except that arches and structural members within the storey immediately below a roof assembly are permitted to be of heavy timber construction.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Clauses (c) and (d), the building referred to in Sentence (1) shall be of noncombustible construction, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of heavy timber construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly, except that arches and structural members within the storey immediately below a roof assembly are permitted to be of heavy timber construction.

ON Full: The potential for liquefaction of the soil and its consequences, such as significant ground displacement and loss of soil strength and stiffness, shall be evaluated based on the ground motion parameters referenced in Subsection 1.1.2., as modified by Article 4.1.8.4., and shall be taken into account in the design of the structure and its foundations. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The potential for liquefaction of the soil and its consequences, such as significant ground displacement and loss of soil strength and stiffness, shall be evaluated based on the ground motion parameters referenced in Subsection 1.1.2., as modified by Article 4.1.8.4., and shall be taken into account in the design of the structure and its foundations. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), risers shall be of uniform height in any one flight with a maximum tolerance of,(a) 5 mm between adjacent treads or landings, and (b) 10 mm between the tallest and shortest risers in a flight.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), risers shall be of uniform height in any one flight with a maximum tolerance of,(a) 5 mm between adjacent treads or landings, and (b) 10 mm between the tallest and shortest risers in a flight.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), in a Group B, Division 3 occupancy, walls between sleeping rooms and adjacent rooms shall be constructed as fire separations having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, except that the fire-resistance rating need not be more than 45 min where the floor assembly is not required to be more than 45 min.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), in a Group B, Division 3 occupancy, walls between sleeping rooms and adjacent rooms shall be constructed as fire separations having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, except that the fire-resistance rating need not be more than 45 min where the floor assembly is not required to be more than 45 min.

ON Full: The contents of flammable liquids and combustible liquids storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be arranged to provide aisle widths of not less than 1 m.
ON Variations: The contents of flammable liquids and combustible liquids storage rooms referred to in Article 4.2.9.1. shall be arranged to provide aisle widths of not less than 1 m.

ON Full: Existing in-service underground storage tanks that do not comply with Sentence (1) may remain in-service if the tanks are not leaking and steel storage tanks and associated piping are protected from external corrosion in accordance with Subsection 4.3.9.
ON Variations: Existing in-service underground storage tanks that do not comply with Sentence (1) may remain in-service if the tanks are not leaking and steel storage tanks and associated piping are protected from external corrosion in accordance with Subsection 4.3.9.

ON Full: Where the building is sprinklered, doors in a public corridor do not require to be equipped with self-closing devices and latches provided that the travel distance is measured from inside the rental space to the nearest exit.
ON Variations: Where the building is sprinklered, doors in a public corridor do not require to be equipped with self-closing devices and latches provided that the travel distance is measured from inside the rental space to the nearest exit.

ON Full: Objects being coated shall be maintained in contact with the conveyor or other support.
ON Variations: Objects being coated shall be maintained in contact with the conveyor or other support.

ON Full: Except as required in Articles 9.8.9.4. and 9.8.9.5., stairs and ramps shall be designed for strength and rigidity under uniform loading criteria to support specified loads of,(a) 1.9 kPa for stairs and ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and (b) 4.8 kPa for other stairs and ramps.
ON Variations: Except as required in Articles 9.8.9.4. and 9.8.9.5., stairs and ramps shall be designed for strength and rigidity under uniform loading criteria to support specified loads of,(a) 1.9 kPa for stairs and ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and (b) 4.8 kPa for other stairs and ramps.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), the performance level of an existing building is reduced where proposed construction will increase the occupant load of an existing building, and the new occupant load will result in the total daily design sanitary sewage flow of the building, calculated in accordance with Article 8.2.1.3., exceeding the capacity of any component of a sewage system serving the building.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), the performance level of an existing building is reduced where proposed construction will increase the occupant load of an existing building, and the new occupant load will result in the total daily design sanitary sewage flow of the building, calculated in accordance with Article 8.2.1.3., exceeding the capacity of any component of a sewage system serving the building.

ON Full: Where standpipes are built in walls or partitions, the tests shall be made before the standpipes are concealed.
ON Variations: Where standpipes are built in walls or partitions, the tests shall be made before the standpipes are concealed.

ON Full: Every air gap shall be not less than 25 mm high and at least twice the diameter of the opening of the water supply outlet in height.
ON Variations: Every air gap shall be not less than 25 mm high and at least twice the diameter of the opening of the water supply outlet in height.

ON Full: The requirements of Sentences (1) to (5) shall not apply to open-air storeys in a storage garage.
ON Variations: The requirements of Sentences (1) to (5) shall not apply to open-air storeys in a storage garage.

ON Full: The pressure at the bottom of a storage tank shall not exceed 70 kPa (gauge) during the leakage test referred to in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: The pressure at the bottom of a storage tank shall not exceed 70 kPa (gauge) during the leakage test referred to in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Nailing patterns other than those required in Sentence (2) are permitted to be used provided there are not fewer than 20 fasteners per square metre of wall surface.
ON Variations: Nailing patterns other than those required in Sentence (2) are permitted to be used provided there are not fewer than 20 fasteners per square metre of wall surface.

ON Full: In a building in which a moving walk provides access between areas on the same floor level, a barrier-free path of travel shall be provided between the areas served by the moving walk.
ON Variations: In a building in which a moving walk provides access between areas on the same floor level, a barrier-free path of travel shall be provided between the areas served by the moving walk.

ON Full: The access in Sentence (1) shall be through a vestibule that is separated from the station and from the building, by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or by wired glass assemblies conforming to MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", with wired glass doors equipped with self-closing devices.
ON Variations: The access in Sentence (1) shall be through a vestibule that is separated from the station and from the building, by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or by wired glass assemblies conforming to MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-2, "Fire Performance Ratings", with wired glass doors equipped with self-closing devices.

ON Full: The ceiling height above and below a mezzanine floor assembly in all occupancies shall be not less than 2 100 mm.
ON Variations: The ceiling height above and below a mezzanine floor assembly in all occupancies shall be not less than 2 100 mm.

ON Full: Air admittance valves shall be rated for the size of vent pipe to which they are connected.
ON Variations: Air admittance valves shall be rated for the size of vent pipe to which they are connected.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (6), the sewage system shall be designed and constructed to receive only sanitary sewage of domestic origin. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (6), the sewage system shall be designed and constructed to receive only sanitary sewage of domestic origin. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Dressing rooms, locker rooms, shower rooms, washrooms and passageways shall have an illumination level of at least 200 lx at floor level.
ON Variations: Dressing rooms, locker rooms, shower rooms, washrooms and passageways shall have an illumination level of at least 200 lx at floor level.

ON Full: A Class 2 sewage system shall not be constructed where the daily design greywater flow to the system exceeds 1 000 L/day.
ON Variations: A Class 2 sewage system shall not be constructed where the daily design greywater flow to the system exceeds 1 000 L/day.

ON Full: Concrete pipe shall not be used above ground inside a building.
ON Variations: Concrete pipe shall not be used above ground inside a building.

ON Full: Principal entrance doors, exit doors and doors to suites, including exterior doors serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and other doors in an access to exit shall,(a) be openable from the inside or in travelling to an exit without requiring keys, special devices or specialized knowledge of the door opening mechanism, or (b) be controlled by electromagnetic locking mechanisms in accordance with Sentence 3.4.6.16.(4).
ON Variations: Principal entrance doors, exit doors and doors to suites, including exterior doors serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and other doors in an access to exit shall,(a) be openable from the inside or in travelling to an exit without requiring keys, special devices or specialized knowledge of the door opening mechanism, or (b) be controlled by electromagnetic locking mechanisms in accordance with Sentence 3.4.6.16.(4).

ON Full: Vitreous china fixtures shall conform to ASME A112.19.2 / CSA B45.1, "Ceramic Plumbing Fixtures".
ON Variations: Vitreous china fixtures shall conform to ASME A112.19.2 / CSA B45.1, "Ceramic Plumbing Fixtures".

ON Full: Except for wall openings located less than 150 mm above ground level, where a concealed flashing is not installed beneath window and door sills, such sills shall be provided with an outward slope and a drip located not less than 25 mm from the wall surface.
ON Variations: Except for wall openings located less than 150 mm above ground level, where a concealed flashing is not installed beneath window and door sills, such sills shall be provided with an outward slope and a drip located not less than 25 mm from the wall surface.

ON Full: When necessitated by possible contamination of the liquid to be stored or possible rapid corrosion of the tank, storage tanks need not conform to Sentence (1), provided that they are designed and built in conformance with good engineering practice for the material being used.
ON Variations: When necessitated by possible contamination of the liquid to be stored or possible rapid corrosion of the tank, storage tanks need not conform to Sentence (1), provided that they are designed and built in conformance with good engineering practice for the material being used.

ON Full: Combustible residue from cleaning operations shall, on the same day as the cleaning operations, be removed from the premises or placed in receptacles conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3).
ON Variations: Combustible residue from cleaning operations shall, on the same day as the cleaning operations, be removed from the premises or placed in receptacles conforming to Sentence 2.4.1.3.(3).

ON Full: Despite Sentence (1), existing drycleaning plants and dyeing plants may be approved if the Chief Fire Official is satisfied that the level of fire safety specified in Sentence (1) is provided.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence (1), existing drycleaning plants and dyeing plants may be approved if the Chief Fire Official is satisfied that the level of fire safety specified in Sentence (1) is provided.

ON Full: Where a rapid transit station is not staffed during operating hours, a washroom is not required in the station.
ON Variations: Where a rapid transit station is not staffed during operating hours, a washroom is not required in the station.

ON Full: Evaporative cooling sections shall comply with the requirements of NFPA 214, "Water-Cooling Towers".
ON Variations: Evaporative cooling sections shall comply with the requirements of NFPA 214, "Water-Cooling Towers".

ON Full: The clearance of combustible material above heat circulating duct openings from those openings shall be not less than,(a) 300 mm where the combustible material projects not less than 38 mm from the face, and (b) 150 mm where the projection is less than 38 mm.
ON Variations: The clearance of combustible material above heat circulating duct openings from those openings shall be not less than,(a) 300 mm where the combustible material projects not less than 38 mm from the face, and (b) 150 mm where the projection is less than 38 mm.

ON Full: The fence shall have gateways with a clear width of at least 3.5 m.
ON Variations: The fence shall have gateways with a clear width of at least 3.5 m.

ON Full: Hardboard applied in horizontal lapped strips shall have not less than a 5 mm gap provided at the butted ends, which shall be caulked or otherwise protected with suitable mouldings.
ON Variations: Hardboard applied in horizontal lapped strips shall have not less than a 5 mm gap provided at the butted ends, which shall be caulked or otherwise protected with suitable mouldings.

ON Full: Where tests, repairs or alterations are made to fire protection installations, including sprinkler and standpipe systems, a procedure of notification shall be established, and the procedure shall include notifying the fire department and the building occupants where necessary for safety in the event of a fire emergency.
ON Variations: Where tests, repairs or alterations are made to fire protection installations, including sprinkler and standpipe systems, a procedure of notification shall be established, and the procedure shall include notifying the fire department and the building occupants where necessary for safety in the event of a fire emergency.

ON Full: The direct weighted sound reduction index for the separating assembly shall be taken as equal to the STC rating, without correction.
ON Variations: The direct weighted sound reduction index for the separating assembly shall be taken as equal to the STC rating, without correction.

ON Full: Containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored outdoors shall be stored in conformance with Subsection 4.2.11., except that the distance between the piles and property lines and the distance between piles need not apply when the containers are stored in an area that does not present a hazard to neighbouring property.
ON Variations: Containers for flammable liquids or combustible liquids stored outdoors shall be stored in conformance with Subsection 4.2.11., except that the distance between the piles and property lines and the distance between piles need not apply when the containers are stored in an area that does not present a hazard to neighbouring property.

ON Full: In a building more than 3 storeys in building height, access through a fire separation between a storage garage and a Group A, Division 2, 3 or 4, or a Group C occupancy, shall be through a vestibule conforming to Sentence (3).
ON Variations: In a building more than 3 storeys in building height, access through a fire separation between a storage garage and a Group A, Division 2, 3 or 4, or a Group C occupancy, shall be through a vestibule conforming to Sentence (3).

ON Full: A mechanical ventilation system referred to in Article 4.1.7.2. that recirculates exhaust air shall be provided with a fail-safe vapour detection and alarm system to continuously monitor the flammable vapour concentration in the exhaust air.
ON Variations: A mechanical ventilation system referred to in Article 4.1.7.2. that recirculates exhaust air shall be provided with a fail-safe vapour detection and alarm system to continuously monitor the flammable vapour concentration in the exhaust air.

ON Full: Where a supplemental fan required by this Article is controlled by a dehumidistat or other automatic control device in addition to the manual switch required by Sentences (5) to (7), the manual switch shall be capable of activating the fan regardless of the setting of the automatic control.
ON Variations: Where a supplemental fan required by this Article is controlled by a dehumidistat or other automatic control device in addition to the manual switch required by Sentences (5) to (7), the manual switch shall be capable of activating the fan regardless of the setting of the automatic control.

ON Full: When piping referred to in Sentence (1) contains Class I liquids, the trench shall be provided with positive ventilation to the outdoors, or designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours.
ON Variations: When piping referred to in Sentence (1) contains Class I liquids, the trench shall be provided with positive ventilation to the outdoors, or designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours.

ON Full: Except as required in Sentence (4), heat detectors and smoke detectors described in Sentence (2), are not required in dwelling units or in sprinklered buildings in which the sprinkler system is electrically supervised and equipped with a water flow alarm.
ON Variations: Except as required in Sentence (4), heat detectors and smoke detectors described in Sentence (2), are not required in dwelling units or in sprinklered buildings in which the sprinkler system is electrically supervised and equipped with a water flow alarm.

ON Full: Unless it can be shown to be unnecessary, where the percolation time is 10 minutes or greater, the location of all components within a sewage system shall be in conformance with the clearances listed in Article 8.2.1.5. or 8.2.1.6.
ON Variations: Unless it can be shown to be unnecessary, where the percolation time is 10 minutes or greater, the location of all components within a sewage system shall be in conformance with the clearances listed in Article 8.2.1.5. or 8.2.1.6.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (3) and Clauses (4)(a) and (b), the fire separation between a public corridor and the remainder of the storey shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (3) and Clauses (4)(a) and (b), the fire separation between a public corridor and the remainder of the storey shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min.

ON Full: In addition to the fire protection requirements provided in Subsection 9.9.4., flame-spread ratings, fire-resistance ratings and fire-protection ratings for means of egress shall conform to Section 9.10.
ON Variations: In addition to the fire protection requirements provided in Subsection 9.9.4., flame-spread ratings, fire-resistance ratings and fire-protection ratings for means of egress shall conform to Section 9.10.

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations and, if of combustible construction, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less 45 min, roof assemblies shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, except that in a building not more than 1 storey in building height, the fire-resistance rating is permitted to be waived provided the roof assembly is constructed as a fire-retardant treated wood roof system conforming to Article 3.1.14.1., and the building area is not more than, 800 m2 if facing one street, 1 000 m2 if facing two streets, or 1 200 m2 if facing three streets, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations and, if of combustible construction, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less 45 min, roof assemblies shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, except that in a building not more than 1 storey in building height, the fire-resistance rating is permitted to be waived provided the roof assembly is constructed as a fire-retardant treated wood roof system conforming to Article 3.1.14.1., and the building area is not more than, 800 m2 if facing one street, 1 000 m2 if facing two streets, or 1 200 m2 if facing three streets, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: In the workrooms of factories where cellulose nitrate plastics are being processed, operators shall be stationed not closer than 1 m apart.
ON Variations: In the workrooms of factories where cellulose nitrate plastics are being processed, operators shall be stationed not closer than 1 m apart.

ON Full: The performance level of an existing building is reduced where the existing building is extended or subject to material alteration or repair and a sewage system serving the existing building is adversely affected by the extension, alteration or repair of the existing building.
ON Variations: The performance level of an existing building is reduced where the existing building is extended or subject to material alteration or repair and a sewage system serving the existing building is adversely affected by the extension, alteration or repair of the existing building.

ON Full: The clearance between the top of storage and the lowest structural members, sprinkler head deflectors or other overhead fire protection system components shall be not less than 450 mm.
ON Variations: The clearance between the top of storage and the lowest structural members, sprinkler head deflectors or other overhead fire protection system components shall be not less than 450 mm.

ON Full: Means shall be provided to prevent tramp iron or other spark-producing materials from being introduced into the powders being applied.
ON Variations: Means shall be provided to prevent tramp iron or other spark-producing materials from being introduced into the powders being applied.

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 9.8.4.5A., the rise, which is measured as the vertical nosing-to-nosing distance, shall conform to Table 9.8.4.1.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 9.8.4.5A., the rise, which is measured as the vertical nosing-to-nosing distance, shall conform to Table 9.8.4.1.

ON Full: The number of universal washrooms conforming to Article 3.8.3.12. provided in a building in which a washroom is required by Subsection 3.7.4. shall conform to Table 3.8.2.3.A. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The number of universal washrooms conforming to Article 3.8.3.12. provided in a building in which a washroom is required by Subsection 3.7.4. shall conform to Table 3.8.2.3.A. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), if Sentence (2) permits a single exit from a floor area classified as Group B or Group C occupancy, the exit shall be an exterior doorway not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), if Sentence (2) permits a single exit from a floor area classified as Group B or Group C occupancy, the exit shall be an exterior doorway not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level.

ON Full: Aggregates shall,(a) consist of sand, gravel, crushed rock, crushed air-cooled blast furnace slag, expanded shale or expanded clay conforming to CSA A23.1, "Concrete Materials and Methods of Concrete Construction", and (b) be clean, well-graded and free of injurious amounts of organic and other deleterious material.
ON Variations: Aggregates shall,(a) consist of sand, gravel, crushed rock, crushed air-cooled blast furnace slag, expanded shale or expanded clay conforming to CSA A23.1, "Concrete Materials and Methods of Concrete Construction", and (b) be clean, well-graded and free of injurious amounts of organic and other deleterious material.

ON Full: Vent piping for storage tanks for Class I liquids shall not be connected to vent piping for storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids unless an effective arrangement is provided to prevent the vapours from the Class I liquids from entering the other tanks.
ON Variations: Vent piping for storage tanks for Class I liquids shall not be connected to vent piping for storage tanks for Class II or IIIA liquids unless an effective arrangement is provided to prevent the vapours from the Class I liquids from entering the other tanks.

ON Full: Logs used in a vertical position shall have a plate at the top and a plate at the bottom and the plates shall be at least as wide as the largest end diameter of any of the logs.
ON Variations: Logs used in a vertical position shall have a plate at the top and a plate at the bottom and the plates shall be at least as wide as the largest end diameter of any of the logs.

ON Full: The power supply shall be checked weekly.
ON Variations: The power supply shall be checked weekly.

ON Full: Unused vent pipes installed for future connections shall be permanently capped with an end cleanout or an adapter and plug.
ON Variations: Unused vent pipes installed for future connections shall be permanently capped with an end cleanout or an adapter and plug.

ON Full: Provision shall be made for lifeguard control stations adjacent to the edge of the water at intervals of not more than 60 m.
ON Variations: Provision shall be made for lifeguard control stations adjacent to the edge of the water at intervals of not more than 60 m.

ON Full: Every fixture shall be directly connected to a sanitary drainage system, except that,(a) drinking fountains may be, (i) indirectly connected to a sanitary drainage system, or (ii) connected to a storm drainage system provided that where the system is subject to backflow, a check valve is installed in the fountain waste pipe, (b) laundry plumbing appliances may be indirectly connected to a sanitary drainage system, (c) fixtures or plumbing appliances, other than floor drains, except as provided in Sentence 7.1.4.2.(2), that discharge only clear water waste may be connected to a storm drainage system, (d) the following devices shall be indirectly connected to a drainage system: (i) a device for the display, storage, preparation or processing of food or drink, (ii) a sterilizer, (iii) a device that uses water as a cooling or heating medium, (iv) a water operated device, (v) a water treatment device, (vi) a drain or overflow from a water system or a heating system, or (vii) a drain line from an HVAC system or equipment, and (e) floor drains within walk-in coolers shall be connected to a sanitary drainage system, (i) indirectly with an air break, or (ii) directly with a backwater valve installed on the drainage system before connection to the sanitary building drain.
ON Variations: Every fixture shall be directly connected to a sanitary drainage system, except that,(a) drinking fountains may be, (i) indirectly connected to a sanitary drainage system, or (ii) connected to a storm drainage system provided that where the system is subject to backflow, a check valve is installed in the fountain waste pipe, (b) laundry plumbing appliances may be indirectly connected to a sanitary drainage system, (c) fixtures or plumbing appliances, other than floor drains, except as provided in Sentence 7.1.4.2.(2), that discharge only clear water waste may be connected to a storm drainage system, (d) the following devices shall be indirectly connected to a drainage system: (i) a device for the display, storage, preparation or processing of food or drink, (ii) a sterilizer, (iii) a device that uses water as a cooling or heating medium, (iv) a water operated device, (v) a water treatment device, (vi) a drain or overflow from a water system or a heating system, or (vii) a drain line from an HVAC system or equipment, and (e) floor drains within walk-in coolers shall be connected to a sanitary drainage system, (i) indirectly with an air break, or (ii) directly with a backwater valve installed on the drainage system before connection to the sanitary building drain.

ON Full: Water closets and urinals shall be certified to CAN/CSA-B45.0, "General Requirements for Plumbing Fixtures".
ON Variations: Water closets and urinals shall be certified to CAN/CSA-B45.0, "General Requirements for Plumbing Fixtures".

ON Full: A central vacuum cleaning system serving more than one suite or storey in a building equipped with a fire alarm system shall be designed to shut down upon activation of the fire alarm system.
ON Variations: A central vacuum cleaning system serving more than one suite or storey in a building equipped with a fire alarm system shall be designed to shut down upon activation of the fire alarm system.

ON Full: Stucco lath shall be fastened in conformance with Subsection 9.27.5.
ON Variations: Stucco lath shall be fastened in conformance with Subsection 9.27.5.

ON Full: Each dwelling unit in a building conforming to Subclause 3.2.2.44.(1)(a)(ii) shall be served by, a direct exit that is an exterior doorway located not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level, or a stairway that, leads to an exterior doorway not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level, has no access to another dwelling unit, and is separated from the remainder of the building with a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Each dwelling unit in a building conforming to Subclause 3.2.2.44.(1)(a)(ii) shall be served by, a direct exit that is an exterior doorway located not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level, or a stairway that, leads to an exterior doorway not more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level, has no access to another dwelling unit, and is separated from the remainder of the building with a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Temporary electrical wiring shall not be used where it presents a fire hazard.
ON Variations: Temporary electrical wiring shall not be used where it presents a fire hazard.

ON Full: The openings described in Sentence (1) shall be lined with a layer of gypsum board at least 12.7 mm thick fastened to stud and runner webs.
ON Variations: The openings described in Sentence (1) shall be lined with a layer of gypsum board at least 12.7 mm thick fastened to stud and runner webs.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (8), in a storey that is not sprinklered, a service room that contains service equipment other than that addressed by Sentences (1) to (6), shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (8), in a storey that is not sprinklered, a service room that contains service equipment other than that addressed by Sentences (1) to (6), shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

ON Full: The underlay referred to in Sentence (1) shall overlap the eave protection by not less than 100 mm.
ON Variations: The underlay referred to in Sentence (1) shall overlap the eave protection by not less than 100 mm.

ON Full: Where a storage garage serves only the house or the individual dwelling unit it is attached to or built into, it shall be considered as part of that house or dwelling unit and the fire separation required in Sentence (2) need not be provided between the garage and the house or dwelling unit.
ON Variations: Where a storage garage serves only the house or the individual dwelling unit it is attached to or built into, it shall be considered as part of that house or dwelling unit and the fire separation required in Sentence (2) need not be provided between the garage and the house or dwelling unit.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to the lighting of all means of egress except those within dwelling units.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to the lighting of all means of egress except those within dwelling units.

ON Full: Where more than one exit is required from a floor area, at least two exits shall be independent of each other and be placed remote from each other along the path of travel between them. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where more than one exit is required from a floor area, at least two exits shall be independent of each other and be placed remote from each other along the path of travel between them. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: For combinations of different types of SFRS acting in the same direction in the same storey, RdRo shall be taken as the lowest value of RdRo corresponding to these systems.
ON Variations: For combinations of different types of SFRS acting in the same direction in the same storey, RdRo shall be taken as the lowest value of RdRo corresponding to these systems.

ON Full: A portion of a roadway or yard provided as a required access route for fire department use shall, have a clear width not less than 6 m, unless it can be shown that lesser widths are satisfactory, have a centreline radius not less than 12 m, have an overhead clearance not less than 5 m, have a change of gradient not more than 1 in 12.5 over a minimum distance of 15 m, be designed to support the expected loads imposed by firefighting equipment and be surfaced with concrete, asphalt or other material designed to permit accessibility under all climatic conditions, have turnaround facilities for any dead-end portion of the access route more than 90 m long, and be connected with a public thoroughfare.
ON Variations: A portion of a roadway or yard provided as a required access route for fire department use shall, have a clear width not less than 6 m, unless it can be shown that lesser widths are satisfactory, have a centreline radius not less than 12 m, have an overhead clearance not less than 5 m, have a change of gradient not more than 1 in 12.5 over a minimum distance of 15 m, be designed to support the expected loads imposed by firefighting equipment and be surfaced with concrete, asphalt or other material designed to permit accessibility under all climatic conditions, have turnaround facilities for any dead-end portion of the access route more than 90 m long, and be connected with a public thoroughfare.

ON Full: For all gable roofs, the slope factor, Cs, shall be as prescribed in Sentences 4.1.6.2.(5) and (6).
ON Variations: For all gable roofs, the slope factor, Cs, shall be as prescribed in Sentences 4.1.6.2.(5) and (6).

ON Full: Where dynamic loading conditions apply, the effects shall be assessed by a special investigation of these conditions and provided for in the design.
ON Variations: Where dynamic loading conditions apply, the effects shall be assessed by a special investigation of these conditions and provided for in the design.

ON Full: Dampproofing and waterproofing shall conform to Section 9.13.
ON Variations: Dampproofing and waterproofing shall conform to Section 9.13.
