ON Full: The percolation time shall be determined by,(a) conducting percolation tests, or (b) classifying the soil according to one of the following methods, (i) the Unified Soil Classification System as described in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-6, "Percolation Time and Soil Descriptions", or (ii) the Soil Texture Classification as described in Chapter 3 of USDA, "Soil Survey Manual". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The percolation time shall be determined by,(a) conducting percolation tests, or (b) classifying the soil according to one of the following methods, (i) the Unified Soil Classification System as described in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-6, "Percolation Time and Soil Descriptions", or (ii) the Soil Texture Classification as described in Chapter 3 of USDA, "Soil Survey Manual". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Every public pool shall be designated as being either a Class A pool or a Class B pool in accordance with Sentence (2) or (3).
ON Variations: Every public pool shall be designated as being either a Class A pool or a Class B pool in accordance with Sentence (2) or (3).

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 5.10.1.8., an activity that creates an explosive atmosphere of combustible dusts shall be located only in a building provided with explosion venting to the outdoors.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 5.10.1.8., an activity that creates an explosive atmosphere of combustible dusts shall be located only in a building provided with explosion venting to the outdoors.

ON Full: Fabrics and films used to temporarily enclose buildings shall be securely fastened to prevent them from being blown against heaters or other ignition sources.
ON Variations: Fabrics and films used to temporarily enclose buildings shall be securely fastened to prevent them from being blown against heaters or other ignition sources.

ON Full: Where a storage garage is attached to or built into a building of residential occupancy,(a) an air barrier system conforming to Subsection 9.25.3. shall be installed between the garage and the remainder of the building to provide an effective barrier to gas and exhaust fumes, and (b) every door between the garage and the remainder of the building shall conform to Article 9.10.13.15. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where a storage garage is attached to or built into a building of residential occupancy,(a) an air barrier system conforming to Subsection 9.25.3. shall be installed between the garage and the remainder of the building to provide an effective barrier to gas and exhaust fumes, and (b) every door between the garage and the remainder of the building shall conform to Article 9.10.13.15. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Cementitious materials and aggregates for mortar and grout shall comply with CSA A179, "Mortar and Grout for Unit Masonry".
ON Variations: Cementitious materials and aggregates for mortar and grout shall comply with CSA A179, "Mortar and Grout for Unit Masonry".

ON Full: The finish for treads, landings and ramps within a house or an individual dwelling unit, including those from an attached garage serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, shall be deemed to comply with Sentence (1) where these treads, landings or ramps are finished with,(a) hardwood, (b) vertical grain softwood, (c) resilient flooring, (d) low-pile carpet, (e) mat finish ceramic tile, (f) concrete, or (g) for stairs to unfinished basements and to garages, plywood.
ON Variations: The finish for treads, landings and ramps within a house or an individual dwelling unit, including those from an attached garage serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, shall be deemed to comply with Sentence (1) where these treads, landings or ramps are finished with,(a) hardwood, (b) vertical grain softwood, (c) resilient flooring, (d) low-pile carpet, (e) mat finish ceramic tile, (f) concrete, or (g) for stairs to unfinished basements and to garages, plywood.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), every dwelling unit containing more than 1 storey shall have exits or egress doors located so that it shall not be necessary to travel up or down more than 1 storey to reach a level served by,(a) an egress door to a public corridor, enclosed exit stair or exterior passageway, or (b) an exit doorway not more than 1 500 mm above adjacent ground level.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), every dwelling unit containing more than 1 storey shall have exits or egress doors located so that it shall not be necessary to travel up or down more than 1 storey to reach a level served by,(a) an egress door to a public corridor, enclosed exit stair or exterior passageway, or (b) an exit doorway not more than 1 500 mm above adjacent ground level.

ON Full: Every sewage system shall be maintained so that,(a) the construction of the sewage system remains in accordance with, (i) the basis on which the construction and use of the sewage system was approved or required under the Act or predecessor legislation, as the case may be, and (ii) the requirements of the manufacturer of the sewage system, and (b) all components of the sewage system function in their intended manner.
ON Variations: Every sewage system shall be maintained so that,(a) the construction of the sewage system remains in accordance with, (i) the basis on which the construction and use of the sewage system was approved or required under the Act or predecessor legislation, as the case may be, and (ii) the requirements of the manufacturer of the sewage system, and (b) all components of the sewage system function in their intended manner.

ON Full: A potable water system shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform to good engineering practice appropriate to the circumstances, such as that described in the ASHRAE Handbooks and ASPE Data Books. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A potable water system shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform to good engineering practice appropriate to the circumstances, such as that described in the ASHRAE Handbooks and ASPE Data Books. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The sprinkler system described in Sentence (3) shall be provided with a minimum 20 min water supply when installed in a retirement home.
ON Variations: The sprinkler system described in Sentence (3) shall be provided with a minimum 20 min water supply when installed in a retirement home.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to obstructions and hazards in every means of egress except those within or serving an individual dwelling unit.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to obstructions and hazards in every means of egress except those within or serving an individual dwelling unit.

ON Full: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence (1) shall be designed so that visual signal devices are not interrupted while voice instructions are being transmitted.
ON Variations: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence (1) shall be designed so that visual signal devices are not interrupted while voice instructions are being transmitted.

ON Full: In a building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A., the fire-resistance rating of the fire separation referred to in Sentence (1) shall not be less than 1.5 h.
ON Variations: In a building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A., the fire-resistance rating of the fire separation referred to in Sentence (1) shall not be less than 1.5 h.

ON Full: Warning signs shall be posted in a conspicuous location near every entrance to the premises being fumigated.
ON Variations: Warning signs shall be posted in a conspicuous location near every entrance to the premises being fumigated.

ON Full: Polyethylene pipe used underground in a drainage system for rehabilitation of existing systems using trenchless technology shall conform to ASTM F714, "Polyethylene (PE) Plastic Pipe (DR-PR) Based on Outside Diameter" and shall be HDPE 3408, SDR 17 or heavier. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Polyethylene pipe used underground in a drainage system for rehabilitation of existing systems using trenchless technology shall conform to ASTM F714, "Polyethylene (PE) Plastic Pipe (DR-PR) Based on Outside Diameter" and shall be HDPE 3408, SDR 17 or heavier. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Concrete fittings field fabricated from lengths of pipe shall not be used. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Concrete fittings field fabricated from lengths of pipe shall not be used. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Built-up columns shall consist of not less than 38 mm thick full-length members,(a) bolted together with not less than 9.52 mm diam bolts spaced not more than 450 mm o.c., or (b) nailed together with not less than 76 mm nails spaced not more than 300 mm o.c.
ON Variations: Built-up columns shall consist of not less than 38 mm thick full-length members,(a) bolted together with not less than 9.52 mm diam bolts spaced not more than 450 mm o.c., or (b) nailed together with not less than 76 mm nails spaced not more than 300 mm o.c.

ON Full: The fire separation referred to in Sentence (3) is not required between a stage and a seating area in a floor area that is sprinklered, provided a sprinkler deluge system is installed at the boundary between the stage and the seating area.
ON Variations: The fire separation referred to in Sentence (3) is not required between a stage and a seating area in a floor area that is sprinklered, provided a sprinkler deluge system is installed at the boundary between the stage and the seating area.

ON Full: No diving board or diving platform shall be installed in a modified pool or a wave action pool.
ON Variations: No diving board or diving platform shall be installed in a modified pool or a wave action pool.

ON Full: A riveted storage tank shall not be relocated.
ON Variations: A riveted storage tank shall not be relocated.

ON Full: Despite Sentence 2.4.1.1.(2), corridors serving as access to exits for guest suites may contain solid wood or other approved furniture, provided the furniture does not create an obstruction to the egress route.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence 2.4.1.1.(2), corridors serving as access to exits for guest suites may contain solid wood or other approved furniture, provided the furniture does not create an obstruction to the egress route.

ON Full: If the building is 84 m or more high, measured between grade and the ceiling level of the top storey, the water supply required in Sentence (1) shall be provided by sufficient pumping capacity.
ON Variations: If the building is 84 m or more high, measured between grade and the ceiling level of the top storey, the water supply required in Sentence (1) shall be provided by sufficient pumping capacity.

ON Full: Except for a mezzanine which is not considered as a storey in calculating building height in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(4), where the space below a mezzanine is enclosed, an egress facility from the mezzanine shall not lead into the enclosed space.
ON Variations: Except for a mezzanine which is not considered as a storey in calculating building height in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(4), where the space below a mezzanine is enclosed, an egress facility from the mezzanine shall not lead into the enclosed space.

ON Full: For structures with a fundamental period of vibration equal to or less than 0.5 s that are built on liquefiable soils, Site Class and the corresponding values of F(T) may be determined as described in Tables 4.1.8.4.A., 4.1.8.4.B., and 4.1.8.4.C. by assuming that the soils are not liquefiable. (See Appendix Note A-4.1.8.4.(3))
ON Variations: For structures with a fundamental period of vibration equal to or less than 0.5 s that are built on liquefiable soils, Site Class and the corresponding values of F(T) may be determined as described in Tables 4.1.8.4.A., 4.1.8.4.B., and 4.1.8.4.C. by assuming that the soils are not liquefiable. (See Appendix Note A-4.1.8.4.(3))

ON Full: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.37., a building classified as Group B, Division 1 shall conform to Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.37., a building classified as Group B, Division 1 shall conform to Sentence (2).

ON Full: If a fire alarm system is installed in a building, a fire pump shall be electrically supervised in accordance with NFPA 20, "Installation of Stationary Pumps for Fire Protection".
ON Variations: If a fire alarm system is installed in a building, a fire pump shall be electrically supervised in accordance with NFPA 20, "Installation of Stationary Pumps for Fire Protection".

ON Full: In a house containing two dwelling units, combustible piping is permitted on one side of a horizontal fire separation.
ON Variations: In a house containing two dwelling units, combustible piping is permitted on one side of a horizontal fire separation.

ON Full: Panel-type subfloor to which ceramic tile is to be applied with adhesive shall have its edges supported according to Article 9.23.14.3.
ON Variations: Panel-type subfloor to which ceramic tile is to be applied with adhesive shall have its edges supported according to Article 9.23.14.3.

ON Full: The design, construction and installation, including the provision of combustion air, of solid-fuel burning appliances and equipment, including stoves, cooktops and space heaters, shall conform to CSA B365, "Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment". (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The design, construction and installation, including the provision of combustion air, of solid-fuel burning appliances and equipment, including stoves, cooktops and space heaters, shall conform to CSA B365, "Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment". (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A building sewer intended to serve a mobile home shall,(a) be not less than 4 in. in size, (b) be terminated above ground, (c) be provided with, (i) a tamperproof terminal connection that is capable of being repeatedly connected, disconnected and sealed, (ii) a protective concrete pad, and (iii) a means to protect it from frost heave, and (d) be designed and constructed in accordance with good engineering practice.
ON Variations: A building sewer intended to serve a mobile home shall,(a) be not less than 4 in. in size, (b) be terminated above ground, (c) be provided with, (i) a tamperproof terminal connection that is capable of being repeatedly connected, disconnected and sealed, (ii) a protective concrete pad, and (iii) a means to protect it from frost heave, and (d) be designed and constructed in accordance with good engineering practice.

ON Full: Water-miscible effluent from spills and fire fighting operations is permitted to be directed into a sewer system provided it does not create a fire hazard or any risk to public health or safety.
ON Variations: Water-miscible effluent from spills and fire fighting operations is permitted to be directed into a sewer system provided it does not create a fire hazard or any risk to public health or safety.

ON Full: Where an electrical equipment vault is required by the Electrical Safety Code adopted under Ontario Regulation 164/99 (Electrical Safety made under the Electricity Act, 1998, the electrical equipment vault shall be totally enclosed by a fire separation of solid masonry or concrete construction having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 3 h if the vault is not provided with an automatic fire extinguishing system and not less than 2 h if the vault is so protected.
ON Variations: Where an electrical equipment vault is required by the Electrical Safety Code adopted under Ontario Regulation 164/99 (Electrical Safety made under the Electricity Act, 1998, the electrical equipment vault shall be totally enclosed by a fire separation of solid masonry or concrete construction having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 3 h if the vault is not provided with an automatic fire extinguishing system and not less than 2 h if the vault is so protected.

ON Full: Except for column showers, when a battery of shower heads is installed, the horizontal distance between two adjacent shower heads shall be at least 750 mm.
ON Variations: Except for column showers, when a battery of shower heads is installed, the horizontal distance between two adjacent shower heads shall be at least 750 mm.

ON Full: Combustible sprinkler piping is permitted to be used within a sprinklered floor area in a building required to be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: Combustible sprinkler piping is permitted to be used within a sprinklered floor area in a building required to be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Despite Sentence (1), in an unoccupied warehouse equipped with a fixed fire protection system, provision shall be made for portable extinguishers to be available for use by responding personnel.
ON Variations: Despite Sentence (1), in an unoccupied warehouse equipped with a fixed fire protection system, provision shall be made for portable extinguishers to be available for use by responding personnel.

ON Full: All employees participating in transfer operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in the procedures referred to in Article 4.4.11.1., the importance of constant attendance during all loading or unloading operations, extinguishing procedures for fires involving flammable liquids and combustible liquids, and the flammable liquids and combustible liquid colour-coding and identification system required in Article 4.4.8.6.
ON Variations: All employees participating in transfer operations involving flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be trained in the procedures referred to in Article 4.4.11.1., the importance of constant attendance during all loading or unloading operations, extinguishing procedures for fires involving flammable liquids and combustible liquids, and the flammable liquids and combustible liquid colour-coding and identification system required in Article 4.4.8.6.

ON Full: Partitions separating the septic tank into compartments shall extend at least 150 mm above the liquid level at the outlet, and there shall be one or more openings through or above the partition.
ON Variations: Partitions separating the septic tank into compartments shall extend at least 150 mm above the liquid level at the outlet, and there shall be one or more openings through or above the partition.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4), an air-supported structure is permitted to be attached to another building provided the building to which it is attached, conforms to the requirements of other Parts of this Division based on the total building areas of the air-supported structure and the attached building, is sprinklered, and is separated from the air-supported structure by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4), an air-supported structure is permitted to be attached to another building provided the building to which it is attached, conforms to the requirements of other Parts of this Division based on the total building areas of the air-supported structure and the attached building, is sprinklered, and is separated from the air-supported structure by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Portable fire extinguishers shall be installed in all buildings, except within dwelling units, in conformance with the provisions of the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.
ON Variations: Portable fire extinguishers shall be installed in all buildings, except within dwelling units, in conformance with the provisions of the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.

ON Full: Ancillary spaces directly serving a repair garage, including waiting rooms, reception rooms, tool and parts storage areas and supervisory office space, need not be separated from the repair garage but shall be separated from other occupancies as required in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Ancillary spaces directly serving a repair garage, including waiting rooms, reception rooms, tool and parts storage areas and supervisory office space, need not be separated from the repair garage but shall be separated from other occupancies as required in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Bins used for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall not contain galvanized iron, copper, lead or zinc, or other materials that may contaminate or be corroded by ammonium nitrate.
ON Variations: Bins used for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall not contain galvanized iron, copper, lead or zinc, or other materials that may contaminate or be corroded by ammonium nitrate.

ON Full: A central alarm and control facility shall be provided on the storey containing the entrance for firefighter access referred to in Articles 3.2.5.4. and 3.2.5.5. in a location that, is readily accessible to firefighters entering the building, and takes into account the effect of background noise likely to occur under fire emergency conditions, so that the facility can properly perform its required function under such conditions.
ON Variations: A central alarm and control facility shall be provided on the storey containing the entrance for firefighter access referred to in Articles 3.2.5.4. and 3.2.5.5. in a location that, is readily accessible to firefighters entering the building, and takes into account the effect of background noise likely to occur under fire emergency conditions, so that the facility can properly perform its required function under such conditions.

ON Full: Joints between a firebrick liner and the adjacent back-up masonry shall be offset.
ON Variations: Joints between a firebrick liner and the adjacent back-up masonry shall be offset.

ON Full: Signs incorporating the International Symbol of Access shall be installed where necessary to indicate the location of a barrier-free means of egress.
ON Variations: Signs incorporating the International Symbol of Access shall be installed where necessary to indicate the location of a barrier-free means of egress.

ON Full: All duct materials and fittings shall be,(a) suitable for exposure to the temperature and humidity of the air being conveyed, and (b) resistant to corrosion due to contaminants in the air being conveyed in the duct.
ON Variations: All duct materials and fittings shall be,(a) suitable for exposure to the temperature and humidity of the air being conveyed, and (b) resistant to corrosion due to contaminants in the air being conveyed in the duct.

ON Full: Hardboard cladding that is not factory finished shall conform to Types 1, 2 or 5 in CAN/CGSB-11.3-M, "Hardboard".
ON Variations: Hardboard cladding that is not factory finished shall conform to Types 1, 2 or 5 in CAN/CGSB-11.3-M, "Hardboard".

ON Full: Suites of residential occupancy equipped with smoke detectors installed to CAN/ULC-S524, "Installation of Fire Alarm Systems", which are part of the fire alarm system in lieu of smoke alarms as permitted in Sentence 9.10.19.4.(3), need not incorporate the manually operated device required in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Suites of residential occupancy equipped with smoke detectors installed to CAN/ULC-S524, "Installation of Fire Alarm Systems", which are part of the fire alarm system in lieu of smoke alarms as permitted in Sentence 9.10.19.4.(3), need not incorporate the manually operated device required in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Where a building or part of a building is required to be of noncombustible construction, combustible elements shall be limited in conformance with the requirements in Subsection 3.1.5.
ON Variations: Where a building or part of a building is required to be of noncombustible construction, combustible elements shall be limited in conformance with the requirements in Subsection 3.1.5.

ON Full: Acetylene gas shall not be piped through copper or high copper content alloy, tubing, piping or fittings.
ON Variations: Acetylene gas shall not be piped through copper or high copper content alloy, tubing, piping or fittings.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.1.8.10.(1), the fire-protection rating of a closure shall conform to Table 3.1.8.4. for the required fire-resistance rating of the fire separation.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.1.8.10.(1), the fire-protection rating of a closure shall conform to Table 3.1.8.4. for the required fire-resistance rating of the fire separation.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), welding and cutting operations shall be located in a room, separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or protected by an automatic fire extinguishing system.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), welding and cutting operations shall be located in a room, separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, or protected by an automatic fire extinguishing system.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (8) to (10), fuel-fired appliances shall be installed in service rooms separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (8) to (10), fuel-fired appliances shall be installed in service rooms separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Anchor bolts referred to in Sentence (2) shall be fastened to the sill plate with nuts and washers and shall be embedded not less than 100 mm in the foundation and so designed that they may be tightened without withdrawing them from the foundation.
ON Variations: Anchor bolts referred to in Sentence (2) shall be fastened to the sill plate with nuts and washers and shall be embedded not less than 100 mm in the foundation and so designed that they may be tightened without withdrawing them from the foundation.

ON Full: If a closure in an opening in a fire separation would disrupt the nature of a manufacturing process, such as a continuous flow of material from storey to storey, the closure for the opening is permitted to be omitted provided precautions are taken to offset the resulting hazard. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: If a closure in an opening in a fire separation would disrupt the nature of a manufacturing process, such as a continuous flow of material from storey to storey, the closure for the opening is permitted to be omitted provided precautions are taken to offset the resulting hazard. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Subject to Sentence (2), storage tanks in buildings shall only be located in industrial occupancies.
ON Variations: Subject to Sentence (2), storage tanks in buildings shall only be located in industrial occupancies.

ON Full: All waste air-suspended powders shall be removed by exhaust ducts to a powder recovery system and shall not be released to the outside atmosphere.
ON Variations: All waste air-suspended powders shall be removed by exhaust ducts to a powder recovery system and shall not be released to the outside atmosphere.

ON Full: There shall be identification on a fire department connection for a standpipe system in a rapid transit station to indicate that the connection is part of the station system.
ON Variations: There shall be identification on a fire department connection for a standpipe system in a rapid transit station to indicate that the connection is part of the station system.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), a manually operated device shall be incorporated within the circuitry of a smoke alarm installed in a house or an individual dwelling unit so that the signal emitted by the smoke alarm can be silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the smoke alarm will reset and sound again if the level of smoke in the vicinity is sufficient to reactuate it.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), a manually operated device shall be incorporated within the circuitry of a smoke alarm installed in a house or an individual dwelling unit so that the signal emitted by the smoke alarm can be silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the smoke alarm will reset and sound again if the level of smoke in the vicinity is sufficient to reactuate it.

ON Full: Threaded cast iron drainage fittings shall conform to ASME B16.12, "Cast Iron Threaded Drainage Fittings".
ON Variations: Threaded cast iron drainage fittings shall conform to ASME B16.12, "Cast Iron Threaded Drainage Fittings".

ON Full: Auxiliary drains shall be inspected to prevent freezing.
ON Variations: Auxiliary drains shall be inspected to prevent freezing.

ON Full: Openings through any guard that is not required by Article 9.8.8.1. and that serves an occupancy other than industrial occupancy, shall be of a size that,(a) prevents the passage of a spherical object having a diameter of 100 mm, or (b) permits the passage of a spherical object having a diameter of 200 mm. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Openings through any guard that is not required by Article 9.8.8.1. and that serves an occupancy other than industrial occupancy, shall be of a size that,(a) prevents the passage of a spherical object having a diameter of 100 mm, or (b) permits the passage of a spherical object having a diameter of 200 mm. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: If a fire alarm transponder or annunciator located in one fire compartment is connected to a central processing unit or another transponder or annunciator located in a different fire compartment, the electrical conductors connecting them shall be protected in accordance with Sentence (2).
ON Variations: If a fire alarm transponder or annunciator located in one fire compartment is connected to a central processing unit or another transponder or annunciator located in a different fire compartment, the electrical conductors connecting them shall be protected in accordance with Sentence (2).

ON Full: Ducts used in a ventilation system as required in Article 4.1.7.2. shall not be used for any other ventilation or exhaust system.
ON Variations: Ducts used in a ventilation system as required in Article 4.1.7.2. shall not be used for any other ventilation or exhaust system.

ON Full: Sheathing need not be provided beneath stucco where not less than 1.19 mm diam galvanized wire is applied horizontally to the framing at vertical intervals not exceeding 150 mm, or where paper-backed welded wire metal lath is used.
ON Variations: Sheathing need not be provided beneath stucco where not less than 1.19 mm diam galvanized wire is applied horizontally to the framing at vertical intervals not exceeding 150 mm, or where paper-backed welded wire metal lath is used.

ON Full: Spiral stairs shall have,(a) handrails on both sides, the outer handrail being not less than 1 070 mm high, (b) a clear width not less than 660 mm between handrails, (c) risers that are not more than 240 mm high, (d) treads that, (i) are a minimum of 190 mm deep at a point 300 mm from the centre line of the inside handrail, (ii) have a consistent angle and uniform dimension, and (iii) turn in the same direction, and (e) a clear height not less than 1 980 mm.
ON Variations: Spiral stairs shall have,(a) handrails on both sides, the outer handrail being not less than 1 070 mm high, (b) a clear width not less than 660 mm between handrails, (c) risers that are not more than 240 mm high, (d) treads that, (i) are a minimum of 190 mm deep at a point 300 mm from the centre line of the inside handrail, (ii) have a consistent angle and uniform dimension, and (iii) turn in the same direction, and (e) a clear height not less than 1 980 mm.

ON Full: If a fire alarm system is provided, waterflow indicating devices required by Sentence (1) shall be connected to the fire alarm system so that on actuation an alert signal or an alarm signal is initiated.
ON Variations: If a fire alarm system is provided, waterflow indicating devices required by Sentence (1) shall be connected to the fire alarm system so that on actuation an alert signal or an alarm signal is initiated.

ON Full: Subject to Article 2.1.1.3., this Part applies to buildings, premises, tents, air-supported structures and outdoor public amusement areas.
ON Variations: Subject to Article 2.1.1.3., this Part applies to buildings, premises, tents, air-supported structures and outdoor public amusement areas.

ON Full: Polyvinyl chloride sheet applied roofing membrane shall be installed in accordance with CGSB 37-GP-55M, "Application of Sheet Applied Flexible Polyvinyl Chloride Roofing Membrane".
ON Variations: Polyvinyl chloride sheet applied roofing membrane shall be installed in accordance with CGSB 37-GP-55M, "Application of Sheet Applied Flexible Polyvinyl Chloride Roofing Membrane".

ON Full: If more than two exits are provided from a floor area, exits are permitted to converge in conformance with Sentence 3.4.3.1.(2), provided the cumulative capacity of the converging exits does not contribute more than 50% of the total required exit width for the floor area.
ON Variations: If more than two exits are provided from a floor area, exits are permitted to converge in conformance with Sentence 3.4.3.1.(2), provided the cumulative capacity of the converging exits does not contribute more than 50% of the total required exit width for the floor area.

ON Full: The largest interstorey deflection at any level of the structure as determined in accordance with Sentence (1) shall conform to the limits stated in Sentence 4.1.8.13.(3).
ON Variations: The largest interstorey deflection at any level of the structure as determined in accordance with Sentence (1) shall conform to the limits stated in Sentence 4.1.8.13.(3).

ON Full: Where loose-fill insulation is installed in an unconfined sloped space, such as an attic space over a sloped ceiling, the supporting slope shall not be more than,(a) 4.5 in 12 for mineral fibre or cellulose fibre insulation, and (b) 2.5 in 12 for other types of insulation.
ON Variations: Where loose-fill insulation is installed in an unconfined sloped space, such as an attic space over a sloped ceiling, the supporting slope shall not be more than,(a) 4.5 in 12 for mineral fibre or cellulose fibre insulation, and (b) 2.5 in 12 for other types of insulation.

ON Full: Upper case letters indicating the designation assigned to each exit stair shaft shall be mounted permanently on each side of doors to the exit stair shaft and shall, be not less than 60 mm high, raised approximately 0.7 mm above the surface, be located 1 500 mm from the finished floor, and be contrasting in colour with the surface on which they are applied.
ON Variations: Upper case letters indicating the designation assigned to each exit stair shaft shall be mounted permanently on each side of doors to the exit stair shaft and shall, be not less than 60 mm high, raised approximately 0.7 mm above the surface, be located 1 500 mm from the finished floor, and be contrasting in colour with the surface on which they are applied.

ON Full: The fire-resistance rating required by Sentence (1) is permitted to be waived if the floor area in which the corridor is located is sprinklered.
ON Variations: The fire-resistance rating required by Sentence (1) is permitted to be waived if the floor area in which the corridor is located is sprinklered.

ON Full: Materials used for flashing shall conform to Table 9.20.13.1.
ON Variations: Materials used for flashing shall conform to Table 9.20.13.1.

ON Full: The limits on the area of glazed openings shall not apply to the exposing building face of a house facing a detached garage or accessory building, where, (a) the detached garage or accessory building serves the house or an individual dwelling unit in the house, (b) the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as the house, and (c) the house is the only major occupancy on the property.
ON Variations: The limits on the area of glazed openings shall not apply to the exposing building face of a house facing a detached garage or accessory building, where, (a) the detached garage or accessory building serves the house or an individual dwelling unit in the house, (b) the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as the house, and (c) the house is the only major occupancy on the property.

ON Full: Where both hot and cold water is supplied to fixtures in residential buildings containing more than one dwelling unit, the water system may be sized in accordance with Table 7.6.3.4. provided, (a) the hydraulic loads for maximum separate demands on water distribution system piping are not less than 100% of the total hydraulic load of the fixture units given in Tables 7.6.3.2.A., 7.6.3.2.B., 7.6.3.2.C. and 7.6.3.2.D. for private use, (b) the minimum water pressure at the entry to the building is 200 kPa, and (c) the total maximum length of the water system is 90 m. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where both hot and cold water is supplied to fixtures in residential buildings containing more than one dwelling unit, the water system may be sized in accordance with Table 7.6.3.4. provided, (a) the hydraulic loads for maximum separate demands on water distribution system piping are not less than 100% of the total hydraulic load of the fixture units given in Tables 7.6.3.2.A., 7.6.3.2.B., 7.6.3.2.C. and 7.6.3.2.D. for private use, (b) the minimum water pressure at the entry to the building is 200 kPa, and (c) the total maximum length of the water system is 90 m. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), ceiling joists supporting part of the roof load from the rafters shall be not less than 25 mm greater in depth than required for ceiling joists not supporting part of the roof load.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), ceiling joists supporting part of the roof load from the rafters shall be not less than 25 mm greater in depth than required for ceiling joists not supporting part of the roof load.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), a saddle hub or fitting shall not be installed in drainage systems, venting systems or water systems.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), a saddle hub or fitting shall not be installed in drainage systems, venting systems or water systems.

ON Full: Linings of ducts shall be installed so that they will not interfere with the operation of volume or balancing dampers.
ON Variations: Linings of ducts shall be installed so that they will not interfere with the operation of volume or balancing dampers.

ON Full: Other load combinations that must also be considered are the principal loads acting with the companion loads taken as zero.
ON Variations: Other load combinations that must also be considered are the principal loads acting with the companion loads taken as zero.

ON Full: This Section does not apply to distilleries covered in Section 4.9.
ON Variations: This Section does not apply to distilleries covered in Section 4.9.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (7), insulation and coverings on piping located in rooms and spaces other than the service spaces described in Sentence (3) shall have a flame-spread rating of not more than that required for the interior finish for the ceiling of the room or space.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (7), insulation and coverings on piping located in rooms and spaces other than the service spaces described in Sentence (3) shall have a flame-spread rating of not more than that required for the interior finish for the ceiling of the room or space.

ON Full: The minimum clear width of aisles shall be at least 1100 mm, except as permitted by Sentence (4).
ON Variations: The minimum clear width of aisles shall be at least 1100 mm, except as permitted by Sentence (4).

ON Full: Finished flooring in bathrooms, kitchens, public entrance halls, laundry and general storage areas shall consist of resilient flooring, felted-synthetic-fibre floor coverings, concrete, terrazzo, ceramic tile, mastic or other types of flooring providing similar degrees of water resistance. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Finished flooring in bathrooms, kitchens, public entrance halls, laundry and general storage areas shall consist of resilient flooring, felted-synthetic-fibre floor coverings, concrete, terrazzo, ceramic tile, mastic or other types of flooring providing similar degrees of water resistance. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where a duct carrying outdoor air that is not tempered or not mixed with indoor air passes through heated space, it shall be insulated to not less than RSI 0.5 except that, where such a duct is exposed in the heated space for more than 3 m of length in the heated space, it shall be,(a) insulated to not less than the values listed in Table 9.32.3.10.A., and (b) provided with a vapour barrier.
ON Variations: Where a duct carrying outdoor air that is not tempered or not mixed with indoor air passes through heated space, it shall be insulated to not less than RSI 0.5 except that, where such a duct is exposed in the heated space for more than 3 m of length in the heated space, it shall be,(a) insulated to not less than the values listed in Table 9.32.3.10.A., and (b) provided with a vapour barrier.

ON Full: Pumps required to have a rated net head pressure greater than 280 kPa and their controllers shall be listed and labelled.
ON Variations: Pumps required to have a rated net head pressure greater than 280 kPa and their controllers shall be listed and labelled.

ON Full: Make-up air facilities required by Sentence (1) shall be interlocked with the exhaust devices they serve so that both operate together.
ON Variations: Make-up air facilities required by Sentence (1) shall be interlocked with the exhaust devices they serve so that both operate together.

ON Full: This Section applies to the construction of a Class 4 sewage system.
ON Variations: This Section applies to the construction of a Class 4 sewage system.

ON Full: Portable open-flame weed burners shall not be used in chip storage yards.
ON Variations: Portable open-flame weed burners shall not be used in chip storage yards.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), a buried water service pipe shall be separated from the building drain, building sewer and a private sewage disposal system, by not less than 2 440 mm measured horizontally, of undisturbed or compacted earth.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), a buried water service pipe shall be separated from the building drain, building sewer and a private sewage disposal system, by not less than 2 440 mm measured horizontally, of undisturbed or compacted earth.

ON Full: Additional circuit vents shall be required,(a) when each cumulative horizontal change in direction of a branch served by a circuit vent exceeds 45° between vent pipe connections, or (b) where more than eight circuit vented fixtures are connected to a branch between vent pipe connections.
ON Variations: Additional circuit vents shall be required,(a) when each cumulative horizontal change in direction of a branch served by a circuit vent exceeds 45° between vent pipe connections, or (b) where more than eight circuit vented fixtures are connected to a branch between vent pipe connections.

ON Full: A circulation system in a factory-built public spa may be served by a built-in suction or gravity outlet with multiple openings that are connected to a full-size manifold.
ON Variations: A circulation system in a factory-built public spa may be served by a built-in suction or gravity outlet with multiple openings that are connected to a full-size manifold.

ON Full: Where locked doors that prevent entry into a fare-paid area are to be used as part of a required means of egress from a rapid transit station, provision shall be made to release the doors in accordance with Sentence (4) to allow them to operate freely in the direction of egress travel.
ON Variations: Where locked doors that prevent entry into a fare-paid area are to be used as part of a required means of egress from a rapid transit station, provision shall be made to release the doors in accordance with Sentence (4) to allow them to operate freely in the direction of egress travel.

ON Full: Where a building trap is installed, it shall,(a) be provided with a cleanout fitting on the upstream side of and directly over the trap, (b) be located upstream of the building cleanout, and (c) be located, (i) inside the building as close as practical to the place where the building drain leaves the building, or (ii) outside the building in a manhole.
ON Variations: Where a building trap is installed, it shall,(a) be provided with a cleanout fitting on the upstream side of and directly over the trap, (b) be located upstream of the building cleanout, and (c) be located, (i) inside the building as close as practical to the place where the building drain leaves the building, or (ii) outside the building in a manhole.

ON Full: A rooftop enclosure that is more than 200 m2 in area shall be provided with at least two means of egress.
ON Variations: A rooftop enclosure that is more than 200 m2 in area shall be provided with at least two means of egress.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (4), no water distributing pipe, drainage pipe or fittings shall be drilled, tapped or swaged.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) to (4), no water distributing pipe, drainage pipe or fittings shall be drilled, tapped or swaged.

ON Full: Operating and maintenance instructions for a special fire suppression system shall be posted in proximity to the equipment and, if manual controls are provided, shall also be posted near the manual controls.
ON Variations: Operating and maintenance instructions for a special fire suppression system shall be posted in proximity to the equipment and, if manual controls are provided, shall also be posted near the manual controls.

ON Full: A filling connection described in Sentence (3) may be located inside a building if made necessary by a process or activity located indoors and to which the tank is directly associated, or for the collection of used liquids, and the fill piping is provided with means to prevent flammable vapours from returning to the building.
ON Variations: A filling connection described in Sentence (3) may be located inside a building if made necessary by a process or activity located indoors and to which the tank is directly associated, or for the collection of used liquids, and the fill piping is provided with means to prevent flammable vapours from returning to the building.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the hydraulic load in litres from a roof or paved surface is the maximum 15 min rainfall determined in conformance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-1, "Climatic and Seismic Data", multiplied by the sum of,(a) the area in square metres of the horizontal projection of the surface drained, and (b) one-half the area in square metres of the largest adjoining vertical surface. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the hydraulic load in litres from a roof or paved surface is the maximum 15 min rainfall determined in conformance with MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-1, "Climatic and Seismic Data", multiplied by the sum of,(a) the area in square metres of the horizontal projection of the surface drained, and (b) one-half the area in square metres of the largest adjoining vertical surface. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A shelf and rack storage system shall not be designed for production, manufacturing, assembling, disassembling or ancillary administrative functions.
ON Variations: A shelf and rack storage system shall not be designed for production, manufacturing, assembling, disassembling or ancillary administrative functions.

ON Full: The size of individual vents and dual vents shall be determined using Table 7.5.7.1. according to the largest trap served.
ON Variations: The size of individual vents and dual vents shall be determined using Table 7.5.7.1. according to the largest trap served.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences 8.2.1.4.(1) and (2), a holding tank shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.C.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 8.2.1.4.(1) and (2), a holding tank shall not be located closer than the minimum horizontal distances set out in Table 8.2.1.6.C.

ON Full: Portable extinguishers suitable for Class K fires shall be provided to protect cooking operations.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers suitable for Class K fires shall be provided to protect cooking operations.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Clauses (h) and (i), plastic pipe used as described in Sentence (1) shall have a stiffness equal or greater than 320 kPa.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Clauses (h) and (i), plastic pipe used as described in Sentence (1) shall have a stiffness equal or greater than 320 kPa.

ON Full: Where a building is constructed in close proximity to existing above ground electrical conductors, the requirements of Subsection 3.1.19. shall apply.
ON Variations: Where a building is constructed in close proximity to existing above ground electrical conductors, the requirements of Subsection 3.1.19. shall apply.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), all reasonable steps shall be taken to recover escaped liquid and to remove or treat contaminated soil, surface water, ground water or aquatic sediments.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), all reasonable steps shall be taken to recover escaped liquid and to remove or treat contaminated soil, surface water, ground water or aquatic sediments.

ON Full: The walls of any chimney or flue pipe shall be constructed to be smoke- and flame-tight.
ON Variations: The walls of any chimney or flue pipe shall be constructed to be smoke- and flame-tight.

ON Full: The floor or roof assembly projection referred to in Clause (2)(b) shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h and shall have no openings within the projection
ON Variations: The floor or roof assembly projection referred to in Clause (2)(b) shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h and shall have no openings within the projection

ON Full: For the design of buildings that may be subject to wake buffeting or channelling effects from nearby buildings, or that are classified as very dynamically sensitive in accordance with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(3), the Wind Tunnel Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.12. shall be used to determine the specified wind loads.
ON Variations: For the design of buildings that may be subject to wake buffeting or channelling effects from nearby buildings, or that are classified as very dynamically sensitive in accordance with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(3), the Wind Tunnel Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.12. shall be used to determine the specified wind loads.

ON Full: Earthquake forces shall be assumed to act horizontally and independently about any two orthogonal axes.
ON Variations: Earthquake forces shall be assumed to act horizontally and independently about any two orthogonal axes.

ON Full: Pipe clamps and tie-rods, thrust blocks, locked mechanical or push-on joints, mechanical joints utilizing set screw retainer glands, or other suitable means of thrust restraint shall be provided at each change of direction of a water service pipe 4 in. or more in size and at all tees, plugs, caps and bends.
ON Variations: Pipe clamps and tie-rods, thrust blocks, locked mechanical or push-on joints, mechanical joints utilizing set screw retainer glands, or other suitable means of thrust restraint shall be provided at each change of direction of a water service pipe 4 in. or more in size and at all tees, plugs, caps and bends.

ON Full: A building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A. is considered to face one street provided not less than 10% of the building perimeter is located within 15 m of a street or streets.
ON Variations: A building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A. is considered to face one street provided not less than 10% of the building perimeter is located within 15 m of a street or streets.

ON Full: Required exit signs shall be clearly visible and maintained in a clean and legible condition.
ON Variations: Required exit signs shall be clearly visible and maintained in a clean and legible condition.

ON Full: Computational fluid dynamics shall not be used to determine the specified wind loads for a building and its components. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Computational fluid dynamics shall not be used to determine the specified wind loads for a building and its components. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (5), for single-layer application on walls, where gypsum board is required to provide bracing, lateral support or fire protection, screws shall be spaced not more than 300 mm o.c. on,(a) vertical wall supports, and (b) top and bottom plates.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (5), for single-layer application on walls, where gypsum board is required to provide bracing, lateral support or fire protection, screws shall be spaced not more than 300 mm o.c. on,(a) vertical wall supports, and (b) top and bottom plates.

ON Full: All Class 5 sewage systems shall be equipped with a device that shall produce an audible and visual warning alarm so located to warn that the sewage system is nearing capacity.
ON Variations: All Class 5 sewage systems shall be equipped with a device that shall produce an audible and visual warning alarm so located to warn that the sewage system is nearing capacity.

ON Full: Except as provided in Articles 6.3.1.2. and 6.3.1.3., the products of combustion from solid fuel-burning appliances shall be vented in conformance with the requirements in the applicable appliance installation standards listed in Article 6.2.1.4.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Articles 6.3.1.2. and 6.3.1.3., the products of combustion from solid fuel-burning appliances shall be vented in conformance with the requirements in the applicable appliance installation standards listed in Article 6.2.1.4.

ON Full: Every retaining wall that is designated in Sentence 1.3.1.1.(1) of Division A shall be protected by guards on all open sides where the public has access to open space at the top of the retaining wall.
ON Variations: Every retaining wall that is designated in Sentence 1.3.1.1.(1) of Division A shall be protected by guards on all open sides where the public has access to open space at the top of the retaining wall.

ON Full: Every wiped joint in straight pipe shall,(a) be made of solder, (b) have an exposed surface on each side of the joint at least 19 mm wide, and (c) be at least 10 mm thick at the thickest part.
ON Variations: Every wiped joint in straight pipe shall,(a) be made of solder, (b) have an exposed surface on each side of the joint at least 19 mm wide, and (c) be at least 10 mm thick at the thickest part.

ON Full: Except as otherwise specified in this Part, every smoke damper used as a closure in a required fire separation shall be installed in conformance with NFPA 105, "Smoke Door Assemblies and Other Opening Protectives".
ON Variations: Except as otherwise specified in this Part, every smoke damper used as a closure in a required fire separation shall be installed in conformance with NFPA 105, "Smoke Door Assemblies and Other Opening Protectives".

ON Full: Vertical reinforcement in above-grade flat insulating concrete form walls shall,(a) consist of 10M bars spaced not more than 400 mm o.c., and (b) be placed in the middle third of the wall section.
ON Variations: Vertical reinforcement in above-grade flat insulating concrete form walls shall,(a) consist of 10M bars spaced not more than 400 mm o.c., and (b) be placed in the middle third of the wall section.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (13), an audible signal device located within a dwelling unit shall incorporate a means that enables the device to be silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the device shall restore to normal operation. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (13), an audible signal device located within a dwelling unit shall incorporate a means that enables the device to be silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the device shall restore to normal operation. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where the building is in a location where the spectral response acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.55, heating and air-conditioning equipment with fuel or power connections shall be secured to the structure to resist overturning and displacement.
ON Variations: Where the building is in a location where the spectral response acceleration, Sa(0.2), is greater than 0.55, heating and air-conditioning equipment with fuel or power connections shall be secured to the structure to resist overturning and displacement.

ON Full: Where the method of operation of an existing heating, ventilating or air-conditioning system is altered, the repair or component replacements that change the capacity or extent of safety of the system shall conform to this Code. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where the method of operation of an existing heating, ventilating or air-conditioning system is altered, the repair or component replacements that change the capacity or extent of safety of the system shall conform to this Code. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: An unreinforced masonry SFRS shall not be permitted where, (a) IE is greater than 1.0, or (b) the height above grade is greater than or equal to 30 m.
ON Variations: An unreinforced masonry SFRS shall not be permitted where, (a) IE is greater than 1.0, or (b) the height above grade is greater than or equal to 30 m.

ON Full: Snow removal by mechanical, thermal, manual or other means shall not be used as a rationale to reduce design snow loads.
ON Variations: Snow removal by mechanical, thermal, manual or other means shall not be used as a rationale to reduce design snow loads.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2) and Article 3.2.2.3., storage sites for lumber and other forest products shall consist of level and solid ground that is paved or surfaced with noncombustible material.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2) and Article 3.2.2.3., storage sites for lumber and other forest products shall consist of level and solid ground that is paved or surfaced with noncombustible material.

ON Full: Class I liquids shall not be dispensed into a metal container or storage tank unless it is electrically connected in conformance with Article 4.1.8.2.
ON Variations: Class I liquids shall not be dispensed into a metal container or storage tank unless it is electrically connected in conformance with Article 4.1.8.2.

ON Full: Platforms intended solely for periodic inspection and elevated catwalks need not be considered as floor assemblies or mezzanines for the purpose of determining building height provided, they are not used for storage, they are constructed with noncombustible materials unless the building is permitted to be of combustible construction, and where they are intended to be occupied, they have an occupant load of not more than four persons.
ON Variations: Platforms intended solely for periodic inspection and elevated catwalks need not be considered as floor assemblies or mezzanines for the purpose of determining building height provided, they are not used for storage, they are constructed with noncombustible materials unless the building is permitted to be of combustible construction, and where they are intended to be occupied, they have an occupant load of not more than four persons.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the hydraulic load that is drained to every soil or waste stack shall conform to Table 7.4.10.6.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), the hydraulic load that is drained to every soil or waste stack shall conform to Table 7.4.10.6.

ON Full: Where venting is provided at the junction of sloped roofs and exterior walls and where preformed baffles are used to contain the insulation, the baffles shall,(a) provide an unobstructed air space between the insulation and the underside of the roof sheathing, that is, (i) not less than 25 mm in dimension, and (ii) of sufficient cross area to meet the attic or roof space venting requirements of Article 9.19.1.2., and (b) extend vertically not less than 50 mm above the top of the insulation.
ON Variations: Where venting is provided at the junction of sloped roofs and exterior walls and where preformed baffles are used to contain the insulation, the baffles shall,(a) provide an unobstructed air space between the insulation and the underside of the roof sheathing, that is, (i) not less than 25 mm in dimension, and (ii) of sufficient cross area to meet the attic or roof space venting requirements of Article 9.19.1.2., and (b) extend vertically not less than 50 mm above the top of the insulation.

ON Full: Concrete slabs shall be not less than 75 mm thick exclusive of concrete topping. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Concrete slabs shall be not less than 75 mm thick exclusive of concrete topping. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where the bottom portions of mansard style roofs are vented, the vertical framing members behind the sloping portions shall be considered on the same basis as exterior wall studs and shall conform to the appropriate requirements in Articles 9.27.3.2. to 9.27.3.6.
ON Variations: Where the bottom portions of mansard style roofs are vented, the vertical framing members behind the sloping portions shall be considered on the same basis as exterior wall studs and shall conform to the appropriate requirements in Articles 9.27.3.2. to 9.27.3.6.

ON Full: A public pool shall be equipped with clean water inlets arranged in conjunction with surface skimmers or overflow gutters to provide uniform distribution and circulation of clean water.
ON Variations: A public pool shall be equipped with clean water inlets arranged in conjunction with surface skimmers or overflow gutters to provide uniform distribution and circulation of clean water.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), valves controlling water supplies used exclusively for fire protection systems or combined domestic water supplies and fire protection systems shall be sealed in the open position and inspected weekly.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences (2) and (3), valves controlling water supplies used exclusively for fire protection systems or combined domestic water supplies and fire protection systems shall be sealed in the open position and inspected weekly.

ON Full: The deck area required to make a lateral transfer to the transfer wall shall, be outside and adjacent to the barrier-free path of travel described in Sentence (1), have no obstructions at the side of the transfer wall serving the transfer space, have a clear space of 900 mm by 2 200 mm, and have a slope less than 2% provided at the base of the transfer wall surface.
ON Variations: The deck area required to make a lateral transfer to the transfer wall shall, be outside and adjacent to the barrier-free path of travel described in Sentence (1), have no obstructions at the side of the transfer wall serving the transfer space, have a clear space of 900 mm by 2 200 mm, and have a slope less than 2% provided at the base of the transfer wall surface.

ON Full: Notwithstanding the requirements of Sentence (5), the plastic portion of an interior sign placed over or forming part of an interior wall surface in corridors, covered or enclosed walkways at or above grade in buildings shall, not exceed 15% of the wall area in, or over which it may be installed, be supported by a device that will not detrimentally affect the fire-resistance rating of the interior wall to which it is attached or of which it may form a part, and encase the edges of the plastic sign face in metal, not be positioned or sized in such a manner that it is less than 600 mm from the vertical line separating two adjacent premises, be placed so that there is at least 600 mm vertical separation of noncombustible material between the top of the plastic sign surface and the ceiling surface, be permitted to have an increase of 100% in area required in Clause (a) and a decrease of 50% of the separation distances required in Clauses (c) and (d) if the area is sprinklered, and have a flame-spreading rating not more than 250.
ON Variations: Notwithstanding the requirements of Sentence (5), the plastic portion of an interior sign placed over or forming part of an interior wall surface in corridors, covered or enclosed walkways at or above grade in buildings shall, not exceed 15% of the wall area in, or over which it may be installed, be supported by a device that will not detrimentally affect the fire-resistance rating of the interior wall to which it is attached or of which it may form a part, and encase the edges of the plastic sign face in metal, not be positioned or sized in such a manner that it is less than 600 mm from the vertical line separating two adjacent premises, be placed so that there is at least 600 mm vertical separation of noncombustible material between the top of the plastic sign surface and the ceiling surface, be permitted to have an increase of 100% in area required in Clause (a) and a decrease of 50% of the separation distances required in Clauses (c) and (d) if the area is sprinklered, and have a flame-spreading rating not more than 250.

ON Full: When the secondary containment is designed to prevent the entry of precipitation and water used for fire fighting purposes into the contained space, it shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than the capacity of the largest storage tank located in the contained space.
ON Variations: When the secondary containment is designed to prevent the entry of precipitation and water used for fire fighting purposes into the contained space, it shall have a volumetric capacity of not less than the capacity of the largest storage tank located in the contained space.

ON Full: Movable partitions used to separate a public corridor from an adjacent business and personal services occupancy or a mercantile occupancy need not conform to Sentence (1), provided the partitions are not located in the only means of egress.
ON Variations: Movable partitions used to separate a public corridor from an adjacent business and personal services occupancy or a mercantile occupancy need not conform to Sentence (1), provided the partitions are not located in the only means of egress.

ON Full: If a floor area or part of it has been designed for an occupant load other than that determined from Table 3.1.17.1., a permanent sign indicating that occupant load shall be posted in a conspicuous location.
ON Variations: If a floor area or part of it has been designed for an occupant load other than that determined from Table 3.1.17.1., a permanent sign indicating that occupant load shall be posted in a conspicuous location.

ON Full: Soldered joints shall be made in accordance with ASTM B828, "Making Capillary Joints by Soldering of Copper and Copper Alloy Tube and Fittings".
ON Variations: Soldered joints shall be made in accordance with ASTM B828, "Making Capillary Joints by Soldering of Copper and Copper Alloy Tube and Fittings".

ON Full: Every interceptor shall have sufficient capacity to perform the service for which it is provided.
ON Variations: Every interceptor shall have sufficient capacity to perform the service for which it is provided.

ON Full: Windows and doors installed to provide the required means of egress from bedrooms shall conform to Subsection 9.9.10.
ON Variations: Windows and doors installed to provide the required means of egress from bedrooms shall conform to Subsection 9.9.10.

ON Full: Where local design and construction practice has shown soil temperature analysis to be unnecessary, soil temperatures need not be determined. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where local design and construction practice has shown soil temperature analysis to be unnecessary, soil temperatures need not be determined. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The fire-resistance rating of roof assemblies required by Clause 3.2.2.43A.(2)(b) or 3.2.2.50A.(2)(b) is not permitted to be waived.
ON Variations: The fire-resistance rating of roof assemblies required by Clause 3.2.2.43A.(2)(b) or 3.2.2.50A.(2)(b) is not permitted to be waived.

ON Full: Linings and coatings of domestic water tanks that come into contact with potable water shall be certified to NSF/ANSI 61, "Drinking Water System Components - Health Effects".
ON Variations: Linings and coatings of domestic water tanks that come into contact with potable water shall be certified to NSF/ANSI 61, "Drinking Water System Components - Health Effects".

ON Full: The hydraulic load of urinals and water closets with direct flush valves shall be the number of fixture units listed in Tables 7.6.3.2.B. and 7.6.3.2.C.
ON Variations: The hydraulic load of urinals and water closets with direct flush valves shall be the number of fixture units listed in Tables 7.6.3.2.B. and 7.6.3.2.C.

ON Full: In boarding, lodging or rooming houses, (a) where sleeping accommodation is provided for not more than eight persons, a single exit is permitted from each floor area, or (b) where sleeping accommodation is not provided in the basement, a single exit is permitted from the basement floor area.
ON Variations: In boarding, lodging or rooming houses, (a) where sleeping accommodation is provided for not more than eight persons, a single exit is permitted from each floor area, or (b) where sleeping accommodation is not provided in the basement, a single exit is permitted from the basement floor area.

ON Full: A stack referred to in Sentence (2) shall be a soil stack if one is available and may be a vent stack or waste stack that provides at least 3 in. stack vent and that goes to open air above the roof, either directly or through a header.
ON Variations: A stack referred to in Sentence (2) shall be a soil stack if one is available and may be a vent stack or waste stack that provides at least 3 in. stack vent and that goes to open air above the roof, either directly or through a header.

ON Full: Smoking shall not take place and open flame and spark-producing equipment shall not be used in areas containing combustible dust producing operations.
ON Variations: Smoking shall not take place and open flame and spark-producing equipment shall not be used in areas containing combustible dust producing operations.

ON Full: An air gap shall not be located in a noxious environment.
ON Variations: An air gap shall not be located in a noxious environment.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.13.8.1.(2), the number of barrier-free entrances into a building shall conform to Table 3.8.1.2.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.13.8.1.(2), the number of barrier-free entrances into a building shall conform to Table 3.8.1.2.

ON Full: Where proposed construction would reduce the performance level of an existing building, compensating construction shall be required in conformance with Articles 11.4.3.1., 11.4.3.2., 11.4.3.4., 11.4.3.6. and 11.4.3.7.
ON Variations: Where proposed construction would reduce the performance level of an existing building, compensating construction shall be required in conformance with Articles 11.4.3.1., 11.4.3.2., 11.4.3.4., 11.4.3.6. and 11.4.3.7.

ON Full: A vent pipe that protects a water closet or any other fixture that also depends on siphonic action for its proper functioning shall be located so that the distance between the connections of the fixture drain to the fixture and the vent pipe shall not exceed, (a) 1 000 mm in the vertical plane, and (b) 3 m in the horizontal plane.
ON Variations: A vent pipe that protects a water closet or any other fixture that also depends on siphonic action for its proper functioning shall be located so that the distance between the connections of the fixture drain to the fixture and the vent pipe shall not exceed, (a) 1 000 mm in the vertical plane, and (b) 3 m in the horizontal plane.

ON Full: The working capacity of the tanks described in Sentence (3) shall not include any portion of any tank that cannot be completely drained due to the manner in which the connections are made.
ON Variations: The working capacity of the tanks described in Sentence (3) shall not include any portion of any tank that cannot be completely drained due to the manner in which the connections are made.

ON Full: Organic peroxide initiators shall be stored so that they will be kept away from contact with other stored materials.
ON Variations: Organic peroxide initiators shall be stored so that they will be kept away from contact with other stored materials.

ON Full: Septic tanks and other treatment units shall be cleaned whenever sludge and scum occupy one-third of the working capacity of the tank.
ON Variations: Septic tanks and other treatment units shall be cleaned whenever sludge and scum occupy one-third of the working capacity of the tank.

ON Full: A T fitting shall not be used in a drainage system except to connect a vent pipe.
ON Variations: A T fitting shall not be used in a drainage system except to connect a vent pipe.

ON Full: An ancillary building on the same property as the main building may be served by the same service.
ON Variations: An ancillary building on the same property as the main building may be served by the same service.

ON Full: Except as provided in Articles 9.5.11.3., 9.9.6.2. and 9.9.6.3., doorway openings within dwelling units shall be designed to accommodate at least the door sizes in Table 9.5.11.1. for swing-type doors or folding doors.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Articles 9.5.11.3., 9.9.6.2. and 9.9.6.3., doorway openings within dwelling units shall be designed to accommodate at least the door sizes in Table 9.5.11.1. for swing-type doors or folding doors.

ON Full: When joists are parallel to the wall, anchors required in Sentence (1) shall extend across no fewer than three joists.
ON Variations: When joists are parallel to the wall, anchors required in Sentence (1) shall extend across no fewer than three joists.

ON Full: Where a building is required to have a barrier-free entrance, signs incorporating the International Symbol of Access shall be installed to indicate the location of, that entrance, ramps located in a required barrier-free path of travel serving that entrance, and an exterior passenger loading zone conforming to Sentence 3.8.2.2.(3), if one is provided.
ON Variations: Where a building is required to have a barrier-free entrance, signs incorporating the International Symbol of Access shall be installed to indicate the location of, that entrance, ramps located in a required barrier-free path of travel serving that entrance, and an exterior passenger loading zone conforming to Sentence 3.8.2.2.(3), if one is provided.

ON Full: The area of the unprotected openings in an exposing building face shall be the aggregate area of unprotected openings expressed as a percentage of the area of the exposing building face in Table 3.2.3.1.B., Table 3.2.3.1.C., Table 3.2.3.1.D. or Table 3.2.3.1.E.
ON Variations: The area of the unprotected openings in an exposing building face shall be the aggregate area of unprotected openings expressed as a percentage of the area of the exposing building face in Table 3.2.3.1.B., Table 3.2.3.1.C., Table 3.2.3.1.D. or Table 3.2.3.1.E.

ON Full: In supported group living residences and intensive support residences regulated under the Services and Supports to Promote the Social Inclusion of Persons with Developmental Disabilities Act, 2008, suitable noncombustible ashtrays shall be provided where smoking is permitted.
ON Variations: In supported group living residences and intensive support residences regulated under the Services and Supports to Promote the Social Inclusion of Persons with Developmental Disabilities Act, 2008, suitable noncombustible ashtrays shall be provided where smoking is permitted.

ON Full: Sentence (7) shall also apply in an assembly occupancy in which music and other sounds associated with performances could exceed 100 dBA.
ON Variations: Sentence (7) shall also apply in an assembly occupancy in which music and other sounds associated with performances could exceed 100 dBA.

ON Full: The areas where smoking is not permitted shall be identified by signs having black lettering 50 mm high with a 12.5 mm stroke on a yellow background, except that symbols of 150 mm by 150 mm may be used in lieu of lettering, or covered by instructions established under a fire safety plan and available to all persons.
ON Variations: The areas where smoking is not permitted shall be identified by signs having black lettering 50 mm high with a 12.5 mm stroke on a yellow background, except that symbols of 150 mm by 150 mm may be used in lieu of lettering, or covered by instructions established under a fire safety plan and available to all persons.

ON Full: Checkout counters or control posts in retail outlets may be used within access to exits if there is a clear width of at least 450 mm up to a height of 914 mm.
ON Variations: Checkout counters or control posts in retail outlets may be used within access to exits if there is a clear width of at least 450 mm up to a height of 914 mm.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), a door opening from a service room onto a means of egress in a rapid transit station shall be located not less than 5 m from an escalator balustrade and from the top and bottom riser of a flight used as a means of egress from the rapid transit station.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), a door opening from a service room onto a means of egress in a rapid transit station shall be located not less than 5 m from an escalator balustrade and from the top and bottom riser of a flight used as a means of egress from the rapid transit station.

ON Full: The temperature relief valve required in Clause (4)(b) shall,(a) have a temperature sensing element located within the top 150 mm of the tank, and (b) be designed to open and discharge sufficient water to keep the temperature of the water in the tank from exceeding 99°C under all operating conditions.
ON Variations: The temperature relief valve required in Clause (4)(b) shall,(a) have a temperature sensing element located within the top 150 mm of the tank, and (b) be designed to open and discharge sufficient water to keep the temperature of the water in the tank from exceeding 99°C under all operating conditions.

ON Full: Gas tanks on vehicles to be salvaged shall be drained and ventilated prior to salvage operations.
ON Variations: Gas tanks on vehicles to be salvaged shall be drained and ventilated prior to salvage operations.

ON Full: A beam may be considered to be laterally supported if, (a) the wood joists bear on its top flange at intervals of 610 mm or less over its entire length, (b) the load being applied to this beam is transmitted through the joists, and (c) 19 mm by 38 mm wood strips in contact with the top flange are nailed on both sides of the beam to the bottom of the joist supported.
