ON Full: Construction in respect of a Group B, Division 3 occupancy, a hotel or a retirement home may be carried out in accordance with Sentence (1) only if the construction will be in conformance with the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.
ON Variations: Construction in respect of a Group B, Division 3 occupancy, a hotel or a retirement home may be carried out in accordance with Sentence (1) only if the construction will be in conformance with the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.

ON Full: A storage garage below the third storey is permitted in a building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A.
ON Variations: A storage garage below the third storey is permitted in a building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A.

ON Full: Unobstructed access to fire hydrants, portable extinguishers and fire department connections for standpipe and sprinkler systems shall be maintained during demolition.
ON Variations: Unobstructed access to fire hydrants, portable extinguishers and fire department connections for standpipe and sprinkler systems shall be maintained during demolition.

ON Full: The horizontal joints of siding described in Sentence (1) shall overlap not less than 1 mm per 16 mm width of siding board but not less than 9.5 mm for matched joint siding or 25 mm for lapped siding.
ON Variations: The horizontal joints of siding described in Sentence (1) shall overlap not less than 1 mm per 16 mm width of siding board but not less than 9.5 mm for matched joint siding or 25 mm for lapped siding.

ON Full: Flue liners referred to in Sentence (1) shall be installed to prevent significant lateral movement.
ON Variations: Flue liners referred to in Sentence (1) shall be installed to prevent significant lateral movement.

ON Full: The top rail of a guard is permitted to serve as a handrail if it is free from obstructions that could break a handhold.
ON Variations: The top rail of a guard is permitted to serve as a handrail if it is free from obstructions that could break a handhold.

ON Full: No door leaf in an exit doorway with more than one leaf shall be less than 600 mm wide.
ON Variations: No door leaf in an exit doorway with more than one leaf shall be less than 600 mm wide.

ON Full: When a treatment unit described in Article 8.6.2.2. is used in conjunction with a leaching chamber, the total length of leaching chamber shall not be less than the value determined by the formula,
ON Variations: When a treatment unit described in Article 8.6.2.2. is used in conjunction with a leaching chamber, the total length of leaching chamber shall not be less than the value determined by the formula,

ON Full: A room intended for the storage of reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A room intended for the storage of reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Hardboard shall conform to CAN/CGSB-11.3-M, "Hardboard".
ON Variations: Hardboard shall conform to CAN/CGSB-11.3-M, "Hardboard".

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (10), the sides of the added leaching bed fill shall be sloped to ensure stability, but shall not be steeper than one unit vertically to four units horizontally.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (10), the sides of the added leaching bed fill shall be sloped to ensure stability, but shall not be steeper than one unit vertically to four units horizontally.

ON Full: Lumber dimensions referred to in this Part are actual dimensions determined in conformance with CSA O141, "Softwood Lumber".
ON Variations: Lumber dimensions referred to in this Part are actual dimensions determined in conformance with CSA O141, "Softwood Lumber".

ON Full: A parapet wall shall be solid masonry that extends from the top of the parapet wall to not less than 300 mm below the adjacent roof level.
ON Variations: A parapet wall shall be solid masonry that extends from the top of the parapet wall to not less than 300 mm below the adjacent roof level.

ON Full: Backfill within 600 mm of the foundation shall be free of deleterious debris and boulders larger than 250 mm diam. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Backfill within 600 mm of the foundation shall be free of deleterious debris and boulders larger than 250 mm diam. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where methane or radon gases are known to be a problem, construction shall comply with the requirements for soil gas control in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-9, "Requirements for Soil Gas Control".
ON Variations: Where methane or radon gases are known to be a problem, construction shall comply with the requirements for soil gas control in MMAH Supplementary Standard SB-9, "Requirements for Soil Gas Control".

ON Full: Where flow-regulating dampers are required, they shall be adjustable and accessible without requiring the removal of fans, motors, or insulating materials and without the need for specialized tools.
ON Variations: Where flow-regulating dampers are required, they shall be adjustable and accessible without requiring the removal of fans, motors, or insulating materials and without the need for specialized tools.

ON Full: A wall assembly described in Sentence (6) that includes combustible cladding of fire-retardant treated wood shall be tested for fire exposure after the cladding has been conditioned in conformance with ASTM D2898, "Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing".
ON Variations: A wall assembly described in Sentence (6) that includes combustible cladding of fire-retardant treated wood shall be tested for fire exposure after the cladding has been conditioned in conformance with ASTM D2898, "Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing".

ON Full: The construction of non-contiguous roof assemblies at different elevations is permitted to be evaluated separately to determine which roof assemblies are required to be constructed in accordance with Clause (2)(c).
ON Variations: The construction of non-contiguous roof assemblies at different elevations is permitted to be evaluated separately to determine which roof assemblies are required to be constructed in accordance with Clause (2)(c).

ON Full: A rapid transit station need not be provided with more than one barrier-free entrance described in Article 3.8.1.2.
ON Variations: A rapid transit station need not be provided with more than one barrier-free entrance described in Article 3.8.1.2.

ON Full: Flashing and sealants used with stucco shall conform to Subsections 9.27.3. and 9.27.4., except that if aluminum flashing is used, it shall be separated from the stucco by an impervious membrane or coating.
ON Variations: Flashing and sealants used with stucco shall conform to Subsections 9.27.3. and 9.27.4., except that if aluminum flashing is used, it shall be separated from the stucco by an impervious membrane or coating.

ON Full: Where compressed chlorine gas is used as a pool water disinfectant, the cylinders or containers of gas shall be located in a service room that, except as provided in Sentences 3.1.9.4.(3) to (7), is separated from the remainder of the building by a 1 h fire separation that is substantially gas tight, is designed for the sole purpose of containing all installed pressurized chlorine gas apparatus and piping and storing all chlorine gas containers or chlorine gas cylinders that are individually secured against toppling, is located at or above ground level, is provided with an exit door opening to the outdoors, has screened openings to the outdoors with at least one opening located within 150 mm from the floor and at least one opening located within 150 mm from the ceiling, each opening being 2% of the area of the floor, is equipped with emergency mechanical ventilation capable of producing at least 30 air changes per hour, taking suction at a maximum of 900 mm above the floor level and discharging at least 2 500 mm above ground level directly to the outdoors, and contains a platform weigh scale of at least 135 kg capacity for each chlorine cylinder in use.
ON Variations: Where compressed chlorine gas is used as a pool water disinfectant, the cylinders or containers of gas shall be located in a service room that, except as provided in Sentences 3.1.9.4.(3) to (7), is separated from the remainder of the building by a 1 h fire separation that is substantially gas tight, is designed for the sole purpose of containing all installed pressurized chlorine gas apparatus and piping and storing all chlorine gas containers or chlorine gas cylinders that are individually secured against toppling, is located at or above ground level, is provided with an exit door opening to the outdoors, has screened openings to the outdoors with at least one opening located within 150 mm from the floor and at least one opening located within 150 mm from the ceiling, each opening being 2% of the area of the floor, is equipped with emergency mechanical ventilation capable of producing at least 30 air changes per hour, taking suction at a maximum of 900 mm above the floor level and discharging at least 2 500 mm above ground level directly to the outdoors, and contains a platform weigh scale of at least 135 kg capacity for each chlorine cylinder in use.

ON Full: Evaporative cooling towers, evaporative fluid coolers and evaporative condensers shall be provided with water treatment equipment for biological growth control in accordance with Subsection 7.6.2. of ASHRAE Guideline 12, "Minimizing the Risk of Legionellosis Associated with Building Water Systems".
ON Variations: Evaporative cooling towers, evaporative fluid coolers and evaporative condensers shall be provided with water treatment equipment for biological growth control in accordance with Subsection 7.6.2. of ASHRAE Guideline 12, "Minimizing the Risk of Legionellosis Associated with Building Water Systems".

ON Full: A Class A pool is a public pool to which the general public is admitted or that is, operated in conjunction with or as a part of a program of an educational, instructional, physical fitness or athletic institution or association, supported in whole or in part by public funds or public subscription, or operated on the premises of a recreational camp, for use by campers and their visitors and camp personnel.
ON Variations: A Class A pool is a public pool to which the general public is admitted or that is, operated in conjunction with or as a part of a program of an educational, instructional, physical fitness or athletic institution or association, supported in whole or in part by public funds or public subscription, or operated on the premises of a recreational camp, for use by campers and their visitors and camp personnel.

ON Full: The bottom of the pit shall be at least 900 mm above the high ground water table.
ON Variations: The bottom of the pit shall be at least 900 mm above the high ground water table.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in business and personal services occupancies, care occupancies, care and treatment occupancies, detention occupancies, non-residential schools, universities and colleges.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to the storage, handling and use of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in business and personal services occupancies, care occupancies, care and treatment occupancies, detention occupancies, non-residential schools, universities and colleges.

ON Full: Loudspeakers described in Sentence (1) shall be tested monthly as an all-call signal to ensure they function as intended.
ON Variations: Loudspeakers described in Sentence (1) shall be tested monthly as an all-call signal to ensure they function as intended.

ON Full: Where the proposed construction would reduce the performance level of an existing building, compensating construction shall be required in conformance with Subsection 11.4.3.
ON Variations: Where the proposed construction would reduce the performance level of an existing building, compensating construction shall be required in conformance with Subsection 11.4.3.

ON Full: The energy rating and the overall coefficient of heat transfer required for windows and sliding glass doors shall be determined in conformance with,(a) CSA A440.2, "Fenestration Energy Performance", or (b) NFRC 100, "Procedure for Determining Fenestration Product U-factors" and NFRC 200, "Procedure for Determining Fenestration Product Solar Heat Gain Coefficient and Visible Transmittance at Normal Incidence".
ON Variations: The energy rating and the overall coefficient of heat transfer required for windows and sliding glass doors shall be determined in conformance with,(a) CSA A440.2, "Fenestration Energy Performance", or (b) NFRC 100, "Procedure for Determining Fenestration Product U-factors" and NFRC 200, "Procedure for Determining Fenestration Product Solar Heat Gain Coefficient and Visible Transmittance at Normal Incidence".

ON Full: Leaching bed fill with a percolation time not exceeding 15 min may be used to satisfy the vertical separation requirements of Clause (6)(d) or Subclause (6.1)(b)(iii), provided that the leaching bed fill conforms to the requirements specified in Sentence (5) regardless of the percolation time of the underlying soil.
ON Variations: Leaching bed fill with a percolation time not exceeding 15 min may be used to satisfy the vertical separation requirements of Clause (6)(d) or Subclause (6.1)(b)(iii), provided that the leaching bed fill conforms to the requirements specified in Sentence (5) regardless of the percolation time of the underlying soil.

ON Full: In-service exposed piping systems may be visually inspected for leakage in accordance with Article 4.4.11.5.
ON Variations: In-service exposed piping systems may be visually inspected for leakage in accordance with Article 4.4.11.5.

ON Full: Access panels required in Sentence (1) need not be provided in houses.
ON Variations: Access panels required in Sentence (1) need not be provided in houses.

ON Full: The thickness of concrete in flat insulating concrete form foundation walls shall be not less than the greater of,(a) 140 mm, or (b) the thickness of the concrete in the wall above.
ON Variations: The thickness of concrete in flat insulating concrete form foundation walls shall be not less than the greater of,(a) 140 mm, or (b) the thickness of the concrete in the wall above.

ON Full: Each storage yard shall be provided with fire access routes.
ON Variations: Each storage yard shall be provided with fire access routes.

ON Full: The landlord shall test battery-operated carbon monoxide alarms after the battery is replaced.
ON Variations: The landlord shall test battery-operated carbon monoxide alarms after the battery is replaced.

ON Full: Except for perimeter sealing material, floating roof assemblies or internal floating covers installed in storage tanks shall be constructed of metal, or other materials and design conforming to one of the tank construction standards set out in this Subsection.
ON Variations: Except for perimeter sealing material, floating roof assemblies or internal floating covers installed in storage tanks shall be constructed of metal, or other materials and design conforming to one of the tank construction standards set out in this Subsection.

ON Full: The exposed surface of every aboveground storage tank for flammable liquids or combustible liquids which is fabricated of any ferrous substance shall be thoroughly coated with rust-resisting material compatible with the tank.
ON Variations: The exposed surface of every aboveground storage tank for flammable liquids or combustible liquids which is fabricated of any ferrous substance shall be thoroughly coated with rust-resisting material compatible with the tank.

ON Full: No more than 30 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 10 L may be Class I liquids, may be stored in a dwelling unit.
ON Variations: No more than 30 L of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, of which not more than 10 L may be Class I liquids, may be stored in a dwelling unit.

ON Full: A door opening in a fire separation and the areas surrounding the door opening shall be kept clear of anything that would be likely to obstruct or interfere with the free operation of the door.
ON Variations: A door opening in a fire separation and the areas surrounding the door opening shall be kept clear of anything that would be likely to obstruct or interfere with the free operation of the door.

ON Full: Except as provided by Sentence (4), a horizontal concealed space within a floor assembly or roof assembly of combustible construction in a building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A. shall be separated by construction conforming to Article 3.1.11.7. into compartments not more than, 600 m2 in area with no dimension more than 60 m, if the exposed construction materials within the space have a flame-spread rating not more than 25, and 300 m2 in area with no dimension more than 20 m, if the exposed construction materials within the space have a flame-spread rating more than 25.
ON Variations: Except as provided by Sentence (4), a horizontal concealed space within a floor assembly or roof assembly of combustible construction in a building within the scope of Article 3.2.2.43A. or 3.2.2.50A. shall be separated by construction conforming to Article 3.1.11.7. into compartments not more than, 600 m2 in area with no dimension more than 60 m, if the exposed construction materials within the space have a flame-spread rating not more than 25, and 300 m2 in area with no dimension more than 20 m, if the exposed construction materials within the space have a flame-spread rating more than 25.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (3), a non-potable water system shall not be connected to a potable water system.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (3), a non-potable water system shall not be connected to a potable water system.

ON Full: Pressure regulators for inert gas transfer systems referred to in Sentence (1) shall be provided in the gas line to control the pressure of the gas at the minimum pressure required to force the liquid through the piping system at the required rate.
ON Variations: Pressure regulators for inert gas transfer systems referred to in Sentence (1) shall be provided in the gas line to control the pressure of the gas at the minimum pressure required to force the liquid through the piping system at the required rate.

ON Full: Floor finishing operations shall be carried out in accordance with Subsection 5.14.8.
ON Variations: Floor finishing operations shall be carried out in accordance with Subsection 5.14.8.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and 3.1.10.3.(2), a firewall shall extend above the roof surface to form a parapet not less than, 150 mm high for a firewall required to have a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h, and 900 mm high for a firewall required to have a fire-resistance rating not less than 4 h.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and 3.1.10.3.(2), a firewall shall extend above the roof surface to form a parapet not less than, 150 mm high for a firewall required to have a fire-resistance rating not less than 2 h, and 900 mm high for a firewall required to have a fire-resistance rating not less than 4 h.

ON Full: Flammable liquids and combustible liquid piping is permitted to be heated by steam lines provided the minimum steam temperature and pressure to make the liquid fluid are used and Sentences (2) and (3) are complied with.
ON Variations: Flammable liquids and combustible liquid piping is permitted to be heated by steam lines provided the minimum steam temperature and pressure to make the liquid fluid are used and Sentences (2) and (3) are complied with.

ON Full: The unobstructed glass area of a door or skylight is considered equivalent to that of a window.
ON Variations: The unobstructed glass area of a door or skylight is considered equivalent to that of a window.

ON Full: The air temperature in a building undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging shall be kept sufficiently low to prevent the actuation of any sprinkler system.
ON Variations: The air temperature in a building undergoing fumigation or thermal insecticidal fogging shall be kept sufficiently low to prevent the actuation of any sprinkler system.

ON Full: The location and number of portable extinguishers required under Sentence (2) shall be approved.
ON Variations: The location and number of portable extinguishers required under Sentence (2) shall be approved.

ON Full: Where storage areas are fenced or otherwise enclosed, gates at least 3.5 m in width shall be provided to permit entry of fire department vehicles.
ON Variations: Where storage areas are fenced or otherwise enclosed, gates at least 3.5 m in width shall be provided to permit entry of fire department vehicles.

ON Full: Where fixed bench-type seats without arms are provided, the occupant load shall be based on a seat width of 450 mm per person.
ON Variations: Where fixed bench-type seats without arms are provided, the occupant load shall be based on a seat width of 450 mm per person.

ON Full: The surface of the leaching bed shall be shaped to shed water and together with the side slopes of any raised portion, shall be protected against erosion in such a manner as to not inhibit the evaporation and transpiration of waters from the soil or leaching bed fill, and to not cause plugging of the distribution pipe.
ON Variations: The surface of the leaching bed shall be shaped to shed water and together with the side slopes of any raised portion, shall be protected against erosion in such a manner as to not inhibit the evaporation and transpiration of waters from the soil or leaching bed fill, and to not cause plugging of the distribution pipe.

ON Full: Written records shall be kept of weekly checks of the power supply for at least six months after they are made, and be available upon request to the Chief Fire Official.
ON Variations: Written records shall be kept of weekly checks of the power supply for at least six months after they are made, and be available upon request to the Chief Fire Official.

ON Full: A building and its structural components shall be checked for serviceability limit states as defined in Clause 4.1.3.1.(1)(a) under the effect of service loads for serviceability criteria specified or recommended in Articles 4.1.3.5. and 4.1.3.6. and in the standards listed in Section 4.3. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A building and its structural components shall be checked for serviceability limit states as defined in Clause 4.1.3.1.(1)(a) under the effect of service loads for serviceability criteria specified or recommended in Articles 4.1.3.5. and 4.1.3.6. and in the standards listed in Section 4.3. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Concrete blocks exposed to the weather shall have weight and water absorption characteristics conforming to Classes A, B, C or D, described in CSA A165.1, "Concrete Block Masonry Units".
ON Variations: Concrete blocks exposed to the weather shall have weight and water absorption characteristics conforming to Classes A, B, C or D, described in CSA A165.1, "Concrete Block Masonry Units".

ON Full: Quench tanks shall not be located on or near combustible floors.
ON Variations: Quench tanks shall not be located on or near combustible floors.

ON Full: Hot work equipment shall be inspected daily or prior to use for defects by personnel in charge of the equipment.
ON Variations: Hot work equipment shall be inspected daily or prior to use for defects by personnel in charge of the equipment.

ON Full: Where a solid fuel-fired combustion appliance is installed, the ventilation system shall include a heat recovery ventilator that is designed to operate so that the flow of exhaust air does not exceed the flow of intake air in any operating mode, and that complies with the requirements of Article 9.32.3.11.
ON Variations: Where a solid fuel-fired combustion appliance is installed, the ventilation system shall include a heat recovery ventilator that is designed to operate so that the flow of exhaust air does not exceed the flow of intake air in any operating mode, and that complies with the requirements of Article 9.32.3.11.

ON Full: The part of the fixture outlet pipe that is common to three compartments of a sink shall be one size larger than the largest fixture outlet pipe of the compartments that it serves.
ON Variations: The part of the fixture outlet pipe that is common to three compartments of a sink shall be one size larger than the largest fixture outlet pipe of the compartments that it serves.

ON Full: The minimum specified load applied vertically at the top of every required guard shall be 1.5 kN/m and need not be considered to act simultaneously with the horizontal load provided for in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: The minimum specified load applied vertically at the top of every required guard shall be 1.5 kN/m and need not be considered to act simultaneously with the horizontal load provided for in Sentence (1).

ON Full: A diving platform greater than 600 mm in height above the water surface shall project a horizontal distance of at least 1 200 mm from the vertical projection of the pool wall under it.
ON Variations: A diving platform greater than 600 mm in height above the water surface shall project a horizontal distance of at least 1 200 mm from the vertical projection of the pool wall under it.

ON Full: Where the foundation wall referred to in Sentence (1) is unit masonry, it is permitted to be corbelled to meet flush with the inner face of a cavity wall provided,(a) the projection of each course does not exceed half the height or one-third the width of the corbelled unit, and (b) the total corbel does not exceed one-third of the foundation wall thickness. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where the foundation wall referred to in Sentence (1) is unit masonry, it is permitted to be corbelled to meet flush with the inner face of a cavity wall provided,(a) the projection of each course does not exceed half the height or one-third the width of the corbelled unit, and (b) the total corbel does not exceed one-third of the foundation wall thickness. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: If a building contains fewer than nine sprinklers, the water supply for these sprinklers is permitted to be supplied from the domestic water system for the building provided the required flow for the sprinklers can be met by the domestic system.
ON Variations: If a building contains fewer than nine sprinklers, the water supply for these sprinklers is permitted to be supplied from the domestic water system for the building provided the required flow for the sprinklers can be met by the domestic system.

ON Full: Every storm drainage system shall be connected to a public storm sewage works, a public combined sewage works or a designated storm water disposal location but shall not be connected to a sanitary sewage works.
ON Variations: Every storm drainage system shall be connected to a public storm sewage works, a public combined sewage works or a designated storm water disposal location but shall not be connected to a sanitary sewage works.

ON Full: Storage tanks are permitted to be located in buildings on piers and wharves of solid-fill or noncombustible construction provided they conform to Subsections 4.3.12. to 4.3.14.
ON Variations: Storage tanks are permitted to be located in buildings on piers and wharves of solid-fill or noncombustible construction provided they conform to Subsections 4.3.12. to 4.3.14.

ON Full: The run for rectangular treads shall conform to Table 9.8.4.1.
ON Variations: The run for rectangular treads shall conform to Table 9.8.4.1.

ON Full: Except as provided by Sentence (5), an emergency power supply capable of operating under a full load for not less than 30 min shall be provided by emergency generator for water supply for firefighting in conformance with Article 3.2.5.7., if the supply is dependent on electrical power supplied to the building, and the building is not within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6.
ON Variations: Except as provided by Sentence (5), an emergency power supply capable of operating under a full load for not less than 30 min shall be provided by emergency generator for water supply for firefighting in conformance with Article 3.2.5.7., if the supply is dependent on electrical power supplied to the building, and the building is not within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6.

ON Full: Except where the entire pool depth is greater than 1 220 mm, where a pool lift is installed, at least one lift shall be located where the water level does not exceed 1 220 mm.
ON Variations: Except where the entire pool depth is greater than 1 220 mm, where a pool lift is installed, at least one lift shall be located where the water level does not exceed 1 220 mm.

ON Full: Insulating fibreboard sheets shall be not less than 11.1 mm thick on supports not more than 406 mm o.c.
ON Variations: Insulating fibreboard sheets shall be not less than 11.1 mm thick on supports not more than 406 mm o.c.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), fire blocks shall be provided to block off concealed spaces within wall assemblies, including spaces created by furring,(a) at each floor level, (b) at each ceiling level where the ceiling contributes to part of the required fire-resistance rating, and (c) at other locations within the wall, so that the distance between fire blocks does not exceed 20 m horizontally and 3 m vertically.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), fire blocks shall be provided to block off concealed spaces within wall assemblies, including spaces created by furring,(a) at each floor level, (b) at each ceiling level where the ceiling contributes to part of the required fire-resistance rating, and (c) at other locations within the wall, so that the distance between fire blocks does not exceed 20 m horizontally and 3 m vertically.

ON Full: The building shall be located and the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building and will not adversely affect any adjacent properties.
ON Variations: The building shall be located and the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building and will not adversely affect any adjacent properties.

ON Full: Except as otherwise provided in this Subsection, if a standpipe system is required, the design, construction, installation and testing of the system shall be in conformance with NFPA 14, "Installation of Standpipe and Hose Systems".
ON Variations: Except as otherwise provided in this Subsection, if a standpipe system is required, the design, construction, installation and testing of the system shall be in conformance with NFPA 14, "Installation of Standpipe and Hose Systems".

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (3), the emergency power supply for elevators required by Clause (1)(a) shall be capable of operating all elevators for firefighters plus one additional elevator simultaneously.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (3), the emergency power supply for elevators required by Clause (1)(a) shall be capable of operating all elevators for firefighters plus one additional elevator simultaneously.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), two or more storage tanks are permitted to be connected to a common vent pipe for normal relief venting provided the vent pipe size is designed to vent the combined vapours produced in the connected tanks without exceeding the allowable stresses of the tanks.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), two or more storage tanks are permitted to be connected to a common vent pipe for normal relief venting provided the vent pipe size is designed to vent the combined vapours produced in the connected tanks without exceeding the allowable stresses of the tanks.

ON Full: If the vertical distance between seating platforms in bleachers is more than 450 mm, two intermediate steps shall be provided the full width of the aisle so that there are three equal risers between platforms.
ON Variations: If the vertical distance between seating platforms in bleachers is more than 450 mm, two intermediate steps shall be provided the full width of the aisle so that there are three equal risers between platforms.

ON Full: Where clothes washers do not drain to a laundry tray, the trap inlet shall be fitted with a vertical standpipe that is not less than 600 mm long measured from the trap weir and the top of the standpipe shall terminate above the flood level rim of the clothes washer it serves.
ON Variations: Where clothes washers do not drain to a laundry tray, the trap inlet shall be fitted with a vertical standpipe that is not less than 600 mm long measured from the trap weir and the top of the standpipe shall terminate above the flood level rim of the clothes washer it serves.

ON Full: A fire separation common to two exits shall be smoke-tight and not be pierced by doorways, duct work, piping or any other opening that may affect the continuity of the separation.
ON Variations: A fire separation common to two exits shall be smoke-tight and not be pierced by doorways, duct work, piping or any other opening that may affect the continuity of the separation.

ON Full: Handrails installed in addition to required handrails need not comply with Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Handrails installed in addition to required handrails need not comply with Sentence (2).

ON Full: A building is considered to face three streets provided not less than 75% of the building perimeter is located within 15 m of a street or streets.
ON Variations: A building is considered to face three streets provided not less than 75% of the building perimeter is located within 15 m of a street or streets.

ON Full: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations and, if of combustible construction, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less 45 min, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.
ON Variations: The building referred to in Sentence (1) is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations and, if of combustible construction, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less 45 min, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.

ON Full: Where a submerged ramp is adjacent to the pool wall and is used for access to the water, the pool shall be constructed so that, the water depth at the bottom of the ramp is at least 600 mm and not greater than 900 mm, a hard-surfaced area that is at least 750 mm wide is contiguous to the entire length of the part of the submerged ramp that pierces any part of the deck, (See Appendix A.) the area described in Clause (b) is capable of accommodating a movable barrier separating the area from the deck, the finishes in submerged portions of the ramps and curbs are different in colour or shade from each other and from that of the pool walls and bottom, and the submerged ramp has a slope not exceeding 1 in 9.
ON Variations: Where a submerged ramp is adjacent to the pool wall and is used for access to the water, the pool shall be constructed so that, the water depth at the bottom of the ramp is at least 600 mm and not greater than 900 mm, a hard-surfaced area that is at least 750 mm wide is contiguous to the entire length of the part of the submerged ramp that pierces any part of the deck, (See Appendix A.) the area described in Clause (b) is capable of accommodating a movable barrier separating the area from the deck, the finishes in submerged portions of the ramps and curbs are different in colour or shade from each other and from that of the pool walls and bottom, and the submerged ramp has a slope not exceeding 1 in 9.

ON Full: The requirements of this Section apply to a shelf and rack storage system.
ON Variations: The requirements of this Section apply to a shelf and rack storage system.

ON Full: The minimum specified load due to equipment, machinery or other objects that may produce impact shall be the sum of the weight of the equipment or machinery and its maximum lifting capacity, multiplied by an appropriate factor listed in Table 4.1.5.11.
ON Variations: The minimum specified load due to equipment, machinery or other objects that may produce impact shall be the sum of the weight of the equipment or machinery and its maximum lifting capacity, multiplied by an appropriate factor listed in Table 4.1.5.11.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (4) and Sentence 3.10.2.4.(9), not more than one suite of residential occupancy shall be contained within a building classified as a Group F, Division 2 major occupancy.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (4) and Sentence 3.10.2.4.(9), not more than one suite of residential occupancy shall be contained within a building classified as a Group F, Division 2 major occupancy.

ON Full: Personnel working in laboratories shall be trained in the safe handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids.
ON Variations: Personnel working in laboratories shall be trained in the safe handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids.

ON Full: Despite the requirements of the standards referenced in Sentences (1) and (2) for the installation of automatic sprinkler systems, sprinklers shall not be omitted in any room or closet in the storey immediately below a roof assembly if the fire-resistance rating of the roof assembly is waived as permitted by Article 3.2.2.17. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Despite the requirements of the standards referenced in Sentences (1) and (2) for the installation of automatic sprinkler systems, sprinklers shall not be omitted in any room or closet in the storey immediately below a roof assembly if the fire-resistance rating of the roof assembly is waived as permitted by Article 3.2.2.17. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: For the purpose of the application of the load combinations given in Table 4.1.3.2.A., the geotechnical components of loads and the factored geotechnical resistances at ULS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced person. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: For the purpose of the application of the load combinations given in Table 4.1.3.2.A., the geotechnical components of loads and the factored geotechnical resistances at ULS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced person. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Sentence (1) does not apply where other approved records are maintained that show the maintenance or recharge date, the servicing agency and the signature of the person who performed the service.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) does not apply where other approved records are maintained that show the maintenance or recharge date, the servicing agency and the signature of the person who performed the service.

ON Full: Where termites are known to exist, exterior wood columns, such as porch supports, shall be,(a) pressure-treated with a chemical that is toxic to such termites, in accordance with Article 9.3.2.9., or (b) supported on non-cellulosic material extending not less than 150 mm above the finished ground and shall be located not less than 50 mm from the exterior wall of an adjacent building.
ON Variations: Where termites are known to exist, exterior wood columns, such as porch supports, shall be,(a) pressure-treated with a chemical that is toxic to such termites, in accordance with Article 9.3.2.9., or (b) supported on non-cellulosic material extending not less than 150 mm above the finished ground and shall be located not less than 50 mm from the exterior wall of an adjacent building.

ON Full: Filters shall not be alternately used for different types of coating materials if the combination of materials might result in spontaneous heating or ignition.
ON Variations: Filters shall not be alternately used for different types of coating materials if the combination of materials might result in spontaneous heating or ignition.

ON Full: Every sanitary building drain and every sanitary building sewer shall be at least 4 in. in size.
ON Variations: Every sanitary building drain and every sanitary building sewer shall be at least 4 in. in size.

ON Full: Side aisles shall be not less than 1 100 mm wide if seating is provided in conformance with Sentence 3.3.2.3.(4).
ON Variations: Side aisles shall be not less than 1 100 mm wide if seating is provided in conformance with Sentence 3.3.2.3.(4).

ON Full: Except as required in Sentence (1), two or more means of egress are permitted to converge in conformance with Sentence 3.13.4.4.(6).
ON Variations: Except as required in Sentence (1), two or more means of egress are permitted to converge in conformance with Sentence 3.13.4.4.(6).

ON Full: Each building in a camp for housing of workers shall be provided with portable fire extinguishers in conformance with the provisions of the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.
ON Variations: Each building in a camp for housing of workers shall be provided with portable fire extinguishers in conformance with the provisions of the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.

ON Full: The voice communication system required by Sentence (1) shall consist of loudspeakers that are, operated from the central alarm and control facility or, in the absence of a central alarm and control facility, from a designated area, and designed and located so that transmitted messages are audible and intelligible in all parts of the building, except in elevator cars.
ON Variations: The voice communication system required by Sentence (1) shall consist of loudspeakers that are, operated from the central alarm and control facility or, in the absence of a central alarm and control facility, from a designated area, and designed and located so that transmitted messages are audible and intelligible in all parts of the building, except in elevator cars.

ON Full: A door shall be provided to each room containing a water closet within a dwelling unit.
ON Variations: A door shall be provided to each room containing a water closet within a dwelling unit.

ON Full: The fire separation required by Sentence 3.3.5.5.(1) between a retirement home and a repair garage shall have no openings.
ON Variations: The fire separation required by Sentence 3.3.5.5.(1) between a retirement home and a repair garage shall have no openings.

ON Full: If the material alterations or repairs concern a fitting cover or grille, the affected fitting cover or grille shall comply with Sentences 3.12.4.1.(7) to (10).
ON Variations: If the material alterations or repairs concern a fitting cover or grille, the affected fitting cover or grille shall comply with Sentences 3.12.4.1.(7) to (10).

ON Full: The surface temperature of electrostatic fluidized bed coating areas shall not exceed 66°C.
ON Variations: The surface temperature of electrostatic fluidized bed coating areas shall not exceed 66°C.

ON Full: The value of Ca0 shall be the highest of Cases I, II and III, considering the different roof source areas for drifting snow, as specified in Sentence (3) and Figure 4.1.6.5.B.
ON Variations: The value of Ca0 shall be the highest of Cases I, II and III, considering the different roof source areas for drifting snow, as specified in Sentence (3) and Figure 4.1.6.5.B.

ON Full: A wave action pool shall be equipped with a first-aid room located within 50 m of the pool.
ON Variations: A wave action pool shall be equipped with a first-aid room located within 50 m of the pool.

ON Full: Where a washroom required by Subsection 3.7.4. is provided in a storey that is required by Article 3.8.2.1. to have a barrier-free path of travel, the washroom shall conform to Articles 3.8.3.8. to 3.8.3.11., and the number of barrier-free water closet stalls or enclosures provided in the washroom shall conform to Table 3.8.2.3.B.
ON Variations: Where a washroom required by Subsection 3.7.4. is provided in a storey that is required by Article 3.8.2.1. to have a barrier-free path of travel, the washroom shall conform to Articles 3.8.3.8. to 3.8.3.11., and the number of barrier-free water closet stalls or enclosures provided in the washroom shall conform to Table 3.8.2.3.B.

ON Full: Compensating construction required under this Subsection applies to the existing building systems that are adversely affected by the proposed construction.
ON Variations: Compensating construction required under this Subsection applies to the existing building systems that are adversely affected by the proposed construction.

ON Full: Stainless steel pipe flanges shall be made of a material that matches the grade of the pipe material used.
ON Variations: Stainless steel pipe flanges shall be made of a material that matches the grade of the pipe material used.

ON Full: High voltage components shall be insulated and protected against mechanical damage and accidental contact or grounding.
ON Variations: High voltage components shall be insulated and protected against mechanical damage and accidental contact or grounding.

ON Full: Except for sleeping rooms within dwelling units, sleeping rooms in a building in a camp for housing of workers shall be separated from each other and from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having not less than a 30 min fire-resistance rating.
ON Variations: Except for sleeping rooms within dwelling units, sleeping rooms in a building in a camp for housing of workers shall be separated from each other and from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having not less than a 30 min fire-resistance rating.

ON Full: A tire storage area intended for the storage of more than 375 m3 of tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A tire storage area intended for the storage of more than 375 m3 of tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2), solder-joint fittings for water systems shall conform to,(a) ASME B16.18, "Cast Copper Alloy Solder Joint Pressure Fittings", or (b) ASME B16.22, "Wrought Copper and Copper Alloy Solder Joint Pressure Fittings".
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2), solder-joint fittings for water systems shall conform to,(a) ASME B16.18, "Cast Copper Alloy Solder Joint Pressure Fittings", or (b) ASME B16.22, "Wrought Copper and Copper Alloy Solder Joint Pressure Fittings".

ON Full: The requirements of Sentences (1) and (2) are waived when the building is sprinklered.
ON Variations: The requirements of Sentences (1) and (2) are waived when the building is sprinklered.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), combustible wall framing, finishes or cabinets within 450 mm of the area where the cooktop is to be located shall be protected above the level of the heating elements or burners by material providing fire resistance not less than that of a 9.5 mm thickness of gypsum board.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), combustible wall framing, finishes or cabinets within 450 mm of the area where the cooktop is to be located shall be protected above the level of the heating elements or burners by material providing fire resistance not less than that of a 9.5 mm thickness of gypsum board.

ON Full: The inner surfaces of spray booths and spray rooms shall be cleaned of combustible residue as often as necessary to prevent a fire hazard.
ON Variations: The inner surfaces of spray booths and spray rooms shall be cleaned of combustible residue as often as necessary to prevent a fire hazard.

ON Full: Water supply pressure and system air pressure for automatic dry standpipe systems shall be checked weekly by using gauges to ensure that the system is maintained at the required operating pressure.
ON Variations: Water supply pressure and system air pressure for automatic dry standpipe systems shall be checked weekly by using gauges to ensure that the system is maintained at the required operating pressure.

ON Full: This Subsection applies to carbon monoxide alarms in buildings containing a residential occupancy.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to carbon monoxide alarms in buildings containing a residential occupancy.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (3), an air barrier system shall be installed to provide the principal resistance to air leakage.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (3), an air barrier system shall be installed to provide the principal resistance to air leakage.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), fire blocks conforming to Article 3.1.11.7. shall be provided to block off concealed spaces within a wall assembly, at every floor level, at every ceiling level where the ceiling forms part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, and so that the maximum horizontal dimension is not more than 20 m and the maximum vertical dimension is not more than 3 m.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (2), fire blocks conforming to Article 3.1.11.7. shall be provided to block off concealed spaces within a wall assembly, at every floor level, at every ceiling level where the ceiling forms part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, and so that the maximum horizontal dimension is not more than 20 m and the maximum vertical dimension is not more than 3 m.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.8.2.(2), when tank vehicles or tank cars are filled with Class I or II liquids through the top of the tank, the fill pipe shall terminate within 150 mm of the bottom of the tank.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 4.1.8.2.(2), when tank vehicles or tank cars are filled with Class I or II liquids through the top of the tank, the fill pipe shall terminate within 150 mm of the bottom of the tank.

ON Full: Where a group of two or more doors serves as a single exit facility, only one door in the group is required to comply with Sentence 3.4.6.16.(1).
ON Variations: Where a group of two or more doors serves as a single exit facility, only one door in the group is required to comply with Sentence 3.4.6.16.(1).

ON Full: Where fire separations between major occupancies are damaged in a manner so as to affect the integrity of their fire-resistance rating, such damaged fire separations shall be repaired so that the integrity of the fire separations is maintained.
ON Variations: Where fire separations between major occupancies are damaged in a manner so as to affect the integrity of their fire-resistance rating, such damaged fire separations shall be repaired so that the integrity of the fire separations is maintained.

ON Full: At the time of installation, underground storage tanks and associated piping shall be tested for leakage in conformance with Subsections 4.3.15. and 4.4.6.
ON Variations: At the time of installation, underground storage tanks and associated piping shall be tested for leakage in conformance with Subsections 4.3.15. and 4.4.6.

ON Full: Where the total length of distribution pipe or leaching chamber required is 150 m or more, the sewage system shall have at least one pump or a siphon contained in a dosing tank that may be a separate compartment within the tank structure, for distribution of the effluent. (1.1) Where the total length of leaching chamber is 150 m or more, a distribution pipe shall be installed at the centreline of the leaching chamber and extend the total length of leaching chamber to allow for dosing of the effluent.
ON Variations: Where the total length of distribution pipe or leaching chamber required is 150 m or more, the sewage system shall have at least one pump or a siphon contained in a dosing tank that may be a separate compartment within the tank structure, for distribution of the effluent. (1.1) Where the total length of leaching chamber is 150 m or more, a distribution pipe shall be installed at the centreline of the leaching chamber and extend the total length of leaching chamber to allow for dosing of the effluent.

ON Full: Except for heat recovery ventilators, exhaust fans required to make up any part of the total ventilation capacity required by Article 9.32.3.3. shall have a sound rating not greater than that specified in Table 9.32.3.9.
ON Variations: Except for heat recovery ventilators, exhaust fans required to make up any part of the total ventilation capacity required by Article 9.32.3.3. shall have a sound rating not greater than that specified in Table 9.32.3.9.

ON Full: Where a fixture or equipment that produces a continuous or semi-continuous flow drains to a storm drainage system, the hydraulic load from the fixture is 900 litres for each litre per second of flow.
ON Variations: Where a fixture or equipment that produces a continuous or semi-continuous flow drains to a storm drainage system, the hydraulic load from the fixture is 900 litres for each litre per second of flow.

ON Full: Class I liquids may be stored in mercantile occupancies in accordance with Subsection 4.2.5.
ON Variations: Class I liquids may be stored in mercantile occupancies in accordance with Subsection 4.2.5.

ON Full: The vapour barrier shall have sufficiently low permeance and shall be positioned in the building component or assembly so as to,(a) minimize moisture transfer by diffusion, to surfaces within the assembly that would be cold enough to cause condensation at the design temperature and humidity conditions, or (b) reduce moisture transfer by diffusion, to surfaces within the assembly that would be cold enough to cause condensation at the design temperature and humidity conditions, to a rate that will not allow sufficient accumulation of moisture to cause deterioration or otherwise adversely affect any of, (i) the health or safety of building users, (ii) the intended use of the building, or (iii) the operation of building services. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The vapour barrier shall have sufficiently low permeance and shall be positioned in the building component or assembly so as to,(a) minimize moisture transfer by diffusion, to surfaces within the assembly that would be cold enough to cause condensation at the design temperature and humidity conditions, or (b) reduce moisture transfer by diffusion, to surfaces within the assembly that would be cold enough to cause condensation at the design temperature and humidity conditions, to a rate that will not allow sufficient accumulation of moisture to cause deterioration or otherwise adversely affect any of, (i) the health or safety of building users, (ii) the intended use of the building, or (iii) the operation of building services. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Flashing shall conform to Subsection 9.26.4.
ON Variations: Flashing shall conform to Subsection 9.26.4.

ON Full: Discharge from evaporative cooling towers to ventilation air intakes shall comply with CAN/CSA-Z317.2, "Special Requirements for Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Systems in Health Care Facilities".
ON Variations: Discharge from evaporative cooling towers to ventilation air intakes shall comply with CAN/CSA-Z317.2, "Special Requirements for Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Systems in Health Care Facilities".

ON Full: Provisions shall be made for removing liquid from the secondary containment in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.
ON Variations: Provisions shall be made for removing liquid from the secondary containment in conformance with Subsection 4.1.6.

ON Full: Instructions for manually operating the fire protection systems required under Article 2.6.1.12. shall be posted conspicuously in the kitchen.
ON Variations: Instructions for manually operating the fire protection systems required under Article 2.6.1.12. shall be posted conspicuously in the kitchen.

ON Full: Staples for stucco lath reinforcing shall be not less than 1.98 mm diam or thickness.
ON Variations: Staples for stucco lath reinforcing shall be not less than 1.98 mm diam or thickness.

ON Full: The flame-spread rating required in Sentence (2) is permitted to be greater than 25 if an automatic special fire suppression system conforming to an applicable standard set out in Article 6.8.1.1. is provided inside the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system.
ON Variations: The flame-spread rating required in Sentence (2) is permitted to be greater than 25 if an automatic special fire suppression system conforming to an applicable standard set out in Article 6.8.1.1. is provided inside the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system.

ON Full: Except as required by Article 3.3.3.4. and Sentences 3.3.4.11.(11), 3.8.3.3.(1) and (2), a door that opens into or is located within a public corridor or other facility that provides access to exit from a suite, shall provide a clear opening of not less than 800 mm, if there is only one door leaf, shall, in a doorway with multiple leaves, have the active leaf providing a clear opening of not less than 800 mm, shall not open onto a step, and shall not have a threshold more than 13 mm higher than the floor surface except where, the threshold is used to contain spillage, or the doorway provides access to an exterior balcony, other than a balcony required by Sentence 3.3.1.7.(2).
ON Variations: Except as required by Article 3.3.3.4. and Sentences 3.3.4.11.(11), 3.8.3.3.(1) and (2), a door that opens into or is located within a public corridor or other facility that provides access to exit from a suite, shall provide a clear opening of not less than 800 mm, if there is only one door leaf, shall, in a doorway with multiple leaves, have the active leaf providing a clear opening of not less than 800 mm, shall not open onto a step, and shall not have a threshold more than 13 mm higher than the floor surface except where, the threshold is used to contain spillage, or the doorway provides access to an exterior balcony, other than a balcony required by Sentence 3.3.1.7.(2).

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), a vent pipe that protects a fixture trap shall be located so that,(a) the developed length of the trap arm is not less than twice the size of the fixture drain, (b) the total fall of the trap arm is not greater than its inside diameter, and (c) the trap arm does not have a cumulative change in direction of more than 135°.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), a vent pipe that protects a fixture trap shall be located so that,(a) the developed length of the trap arm is not less than twice the size of the fixture drain, (b) the total fall of the trap arm is not greater than its inside diameter, and (c) the trap arm does not have a cumulative change in direction of more than 135°.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (4) to (7), the minimum depth of foundations below finished ground level shall conform to Table 9.12.2.2.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (4) to (7), the minimum depth of foundations below finished ground level shall conform to Table 9.12.2.2.

ON Full: Unless it can be shown that the location and size of openings do not present a hazard, a guard for a fire escape shall be designed so that no member, attachment or opening located between 140 mm and 900 mm above a platform or the nosing of any tread will facilitate climbing.
ON Variations: Unless it can be shown that the location and size of openings do not present a hazard, a guard for a fire escape shall be designed so that no member, attachment or opening located between 140 mm and 900 mm above a platform or the nosing of any tread will facilitate climbing.

ON Full: Where special foundation systems are used, such systems shall conform to Subsection 4.2.4. and Sentence 4.1.1.4.(2).
ON Variations: Where special foundation systems are used, such systems shall conform to Subsection 4.2.4. and Sentence 4.1.1.4.(2).

ON Full: An atmospheric vacuum breaker shall be installed so that the critical level is at least the distance specified by the manufacturer at which the device will operate safely but not less than 25 mm above,(a) the flood level rim of a fixture or tank, or (b) the highest point open to atmosphere in an irrigation system.
ON Variations: An atmospheric vacuum breaker shall be installed so that the critical level is at least the distance specified by the manufacturer at which the device will operate safely but not less than 25 mm above,(a) the flood level rim of a fixture or tank, or (b) the highest point open to atmosphere in an irrigation system.

ON Full: A building shall not be located beneath existing above ground electrical conductors.
ON Variations: A building shall not be located beneath existing above ground electrical conductors.

ON Full: Plastic pipe used as described in Sentence (2) shall have a pipe stiffness equal or greater than 320 kPa.
ON Variations: Plastic pipe used as described in Sentence (2) shall have a pipe stiffness equal or greater than 320 kPa.

ON Full: Flue liners in the same chimney shall be separated by not less than 70 mm of masonry or concrete exclusive of liners where clay liners are used, or 90 mm of firebrick where firebrick liners are used.
ON Variations: Flue liners in the same chimney shall be separated by not less than 70 mm of masonry or concrete exclusive of liners where clay liners are used, or 90 mm of firebrick where firebrick liners are used.

ON Full: The surface of the ground in the area of the cesspool shall be graded such that surface drainage in the area will be diverted away from the cesspool.
ON Variations: The surface of the ground in the area of the cesspool shall be graded such that surface drainage in the area will be diverted away from the cesspool.

ON Full: Buildings or facilities where a moderate hazard or severe hazard may be caused by backflow shall be provided with premise isolation of the potable water system by the installation of a backflow preventer selected in accordance with Clauses 5.3.4.2.(b) and (c) of CSA B64.10, "Selection and Installation of Backflow Preventers".
ON Variations: Buildings or facilities where a moderate hazard or severe hazard may be caused by backflow shall be provided with premise isolation of the potable water system by the installation of a backflow preventer selected in accordance with Clauses 5.3.4.2.(b) and (c) of CSA B64.10, "Selection and Installation of Backflow Preventers".

ON Full: For the purposes of this Section, every reference to a public pool or a recirculation system in a definition in Article 1.4.1.2. of Division A, or a Sentence or Clause in Section 3.11. that is made applicable to public spas by this Section, is deemed to be a reference to a public spa or water circulation system, respectively.
ON Variations: For the purposes of this Section, every reference to a public pool or a recirculation system in a definition in Article 1.4.1.2. of Division A, or a Sentence or Clause in Section 3.11. that is made applicable to public spas by this Section, is deemed to be a reference to a public spa or water circulation system, respectively.

ON Full: A tightly fitted access door shall be installed for each fire damper to provide access for the inspection of the damper and the resetting of the release device. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A tightly fitted access door shall be installed for each fire damper to provide access for the inspection of the damper and the resetting of the release device. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Structural members, including beams, columns and arches, placed wholly or partly outside an exterior face of a building that are less than 3 m from the property line or centreline of a public thoroughfare shall be protected from exterior fire by fire protection having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required by Articles 3.2.2.20. to 3.2.2.83. for their protection from interior fires, but not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Structural members, including beams, columns and arches, placed wholly or partly outside an exterior face of a building that are less than 3 m from the property line or centreline of a public thoroughfare shall be protected from exterior fire by fire protection having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required by Articles 3.2.2.20. to 3.2.2.83. for their protection from interior fires, but not less than 1 h.

ON Full: Noncombustible material shall be used to cover piping referred to in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Noncombustible material shall be used to cover piping referred to in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Unless otherwise approved, each storage yard shall be provided with at least two fire access routes in conformance with Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Unless otherwise approved, each storage yard shall be provided with at least two fire access routes in conformance with Sentence (2).

ON Full: Reinforcement required in Sentence (1) shall be lapped not less than 150 mm.
ON Variations: Reinforcement required in Sentence (1) shall be lapped not less than 150 mm.

ON Full: Where galvanized sheet steel is intended for use in locations exposed to the weather or as a flashing material, it shall have a zinc coating not less than the G90 (Z275) coating designation or an aluminum-zinc alloy coating not less than the AZM150 coating designation, as referred to in Sentence (1).
ON Variations: Where galvanized sheet steel is intended for use in locations exposed to the weather or as a flashing material, it shall have a zinc coating not less than the G90 (Z275) coating designation or an aluminum-zinc alloy coating not less than the AZM150 coating designation, as referred to in Sentence (1).

ON Full: Immediate corrective action shall be taken in conformance with Subsection 4.3.15. when a loss of liquid or a gain of water is indicated by any of the leakage detection measures described in Articles 4.3.16.1. and 4.3.16.2., or the level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank exceeds 50 mm.
ON Variations: Immediate corrective action shall be taken in conformance with Subsection 4.3.15. when a loss of liquid or a gain of water is indicated by any of the leakage detection measures described in Articles 4.3.16.1. and 4.3.16.2., or the level of water at the bottom of an underground storage tank exceeds 50 mm.

ON Full: The performance level of a building or part of a building is reduced where, after a change of major occupancy,(a) the total daily design sanitary sewage flow of the new major occupancy, calculated in accordance with Article 8.2.1.3., exceeds the capacity of any component of a sewage system serving the building, or (b) the type or amount of sanitary sewage that will, under the new major occupancy, be discharged to a sewage system serving the building is prohibited by Article 8.1.3.1.
ON Variations: The performance level of a building or part of a building is reduced where, after a change of major occupancy,(a) the total daily design sanitary sewage flow of the new major occupancy, calculated in accordance with Article 8.2.1.3., exceeds the capacity of any component of a sewage system serving the building, or (b) the type or amount of sanitary sewage that will, under the new major occupancy, be discharged to a sewage system serving the building is prohibited by Article 8.1.3.1.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (3), the interior wall, ceiling and floor finishes in a building regulated by the provisions of Subsection 3.2.6. shall conform to the flame-spread rating requirements in Articles 3.1.13.2. to 3.1.13.6. and to the flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification values in Table 3.1.13.7.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (2) and (3), the interior wall, ceiling and floor finishes in a building regulated by the provisions of Subsection 3.2.6. shall conform to the flame-spread rating requirements in Articles 3.1.13.2. to 3.1.13.6. and to the flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification values in Table 3.1.13.7.

ON Full: Except as required by Sentence (4), for single-layer application on walls, nails shall be spaced, (a) not more than 200 mm o.c. on vertical wall supports, or (b) every 300 mm o.c. along vertical wall supports, in pairs about 50 mm apart.
ON Variations: Except as required by Sentence (4), for single-layer application on walls, nails shall be spaced, (a) not more than 200 mm o.c. on vertical wall supports, or (b) every 300 mm o.c. along vertical wall supports, in pairs about 50 mm apart.

ON Full: Except in a modified pool, a black disc 150 mm in diameter on a white background shall be affixed to the bottom of a public pool within the area of its greatest depth.
ON Variations: Except in a modified pool, a black disc 150 mm in diameter on a white background shall be affixed to the bottom of a public pool within the area of its greatest depth.

ON Full: The centre line of the seat for the pool lift shall be located over the deck and a minimum of 400 mm from the edge of the pool when in the raised position.
ON Variations: The centre line of the seat for the pool lift shall be located over the deck and a minimum of 400 mm from the edge of the pool when in the raised position.

ON Full: In-service underground piping systems that do not comply with Sentence (1) may remain in-service if the piping does not leak and if the piping system met the requirements of this Code on December 31, 2014, as it read on that day.
ON Variations: In-service underground piping systems that do not comply with Sentence (1) may remain in-service if the piping does not leak and if the piping system met the requirements of this Code on December 31, 2014, as it read on that day.

ON Full: The fire separation required by Sentence (1) is permitted to be waived if the distance from any point in the floor area to an exit measured along the path of travel to an exit does not exceed the travel distance permitted by Article 3.4.2.5.
ON Variations: The fire separation required by Sentence (1) is permitted to be waived if the distance from any point in the floor area to an exit measured along the path of travel to an exit does not exceed the travel distance permitted by Article 3.4.2.5.

ON Full: Water softener and iron filter discharge may be directed to the sewage system provided the system has been designed to accept such discharges.
ON Variations: Water softener and iron filter discharge may be directed to the sewage system provided the system has been designed to accept such discharges.

ON Full: Openings through floors that are not protected by shafts or closures shall be protected in conformance with Subsection 3.2.8.
ON Variations: Openings through floors that are not protected by shafts or closures shall be protected in conformance with Subsection 3.2.8.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (3) and (4), return ducts shall be constructed of material having a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 150.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (3) and (4), return ducts shall be constructed of material having a surface flame-spread rating of not more than 150.

ON Full: The space between the duct and combustible material shall be sealed with noncombustible insulating material.
ON Variations: The space between the duct and combustible material shall be sealed with noncombustible insulating material.

ON Full: Every pipe that passes through an exterior wall to supply water to the exterior of the building shall be provided with,(a) a frost-proof hydrant with a separate shut-off valve located inside the building, or (b) a stop-and-waste cock located inside the building and close to the wall.
ON Variations: Every pipe that passes through an exterior wall to supply water to the exterior of the building shall be provided with,(a) a frost-proof hydrant with a separate shut-off valve located inside the building, or (b) a stop-and-waste cock located inside the building and close to the wall.

ON Full: A reference in this Code to a document set out in Table 1.2.1.A. includes all amendments up to and including January 1, 2015.
ON Variations: A reference in this Code to a document set out in Table 1.2.1.A. includes all amendments up to and including January 1, 2015.

ON Full: The potential for slope instability and its consequences, such as slope displacement, shall be evaluated based on site-specific material properties and ground motion parameters referenced in Subsection 1.1.2., as modified by Article 4.1.8.4., and shall be taken into account in the design of the structure and its foundations. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: The potential for slope instability and its consequences, such as slope displacement, shall be evaluated based on site-specific material properties and ground motion parameters referenced in Subsection 1.1.2., as modified by Article 4.1.8.4., and shall be taken into account in the design of the structure and its foundations. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Branch vents, headers, circuit vents and continuous vents shall be sized in accordance with Table 7.5.8.3., unless they are individual vents or dual vents.
ON Variations: Branch vents, headers, circuit vents and continuous vents shall be sized in accordance with Table 7.5.8.3., unless they are individual vents or dual vents.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), where panel-type roof sheathing requires edge support, the support shall consist of,(a) metal H clips, or (b) not less than 38 mm by 38 mm blocking securely nailed between framing members.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (2), where panel-type roof sheathing requires edge support, the support shall consist of,(a) metal H clips, or (b) not less than 38 mm by 38 mm blocking securely nailed between framing members.

ON Full: During the test referred to in Sentence (2), the control valve is not required to be in the fully open position.
ON Variations: During the test referred to in Sentence (2), the control valve is not required to be in the fully open position.

ON Full: The maximum aggregate area of unprotected openings shall be not more than twice the area determined according to Sentence (1) where the unprotected openings are glazed with, (a) wired glass in steel frames as described in Article 9.10.13.5., or (b) glass blocks, as described in Article 9.10.13.7.
ON Variations: The maximum aggregate area of unprotected openings shall be not more than twice the area determined according to Sentence (1) where the unprotected openings are glazed with, (a) wired glass in steel frames as described in Article 9.10.13.5., or (b) glass blocks, as described in Article 9.10.13.7.

ON Full: Despite Subsections 11.3.1. to 11.3.3., where an existing sewage system is extended or is subject to material alteration or repair, the requirements respecting the vertical separation to the water table set out in Part 8 apply to the extended, altered or repaired portions of the sewage system as well as to the existing portions of the sewage system.
ON Variations: Despite Subsections 11.3.1. to 11.3.3., where an existing sewage system is extended or is subject to material alteration or repair, the requirements respecting the vertical separation to the water table set out in Part 8 apply to the extended, altered or repaired portions of the sewage system as well as to the existing portions of the sewage system.

ON Full: When the conditions of Article 2.9.3.3. apply, an approved communications system shall be provided.
ON Variations: When the conditions of Article 2.9.3.3. apply, an approved communications system shall be provided.

ON Full: The forced air heating system circulation fan shall be controlled by a manual switch located adjacent to the ventilation fan switch required in Sentence 9.32.3.4.(4).
ON Variations: The forced air heating system circulation fan shall be controlled by a manual switch located adjacent to the ventilation fan switch required in Sentence 9.32.3.4.(4).

ON Full: Cylinders containing compressed gas shall be protected against mechanical damage.
ON Variations: Cylinders containing compressed gas shall be protected against mechanical damage.

ON Full: The water supply available shall be adequate for hose streams and monitor towers, based on the provision of approved fire protection.
ON Variations: The water supply available shall be adequate for hose streams and monitor towers, based on the provision of approved fire protection.

ON Full: Pump houses shall be of noncombustible construction with floors that are chemically resistant to the liquid being handled, liquid-tight and equipped with curbs or flashings around the base of the wall not less than 100 mm in height to contain any spilled liquid.
ON Variations: Pump houses shall be of noncombustible construction with floors that are chemically resistant to the liquid being handled, liquid-tight and equipped with curbs or flashings around the base of the wall not less than 100 mm in height to contain any spilled liquid.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (6) and (7), where a building is required to be equipped with a fire alarm system, a smoke detector shall be located near the entrance to, a walkway described in Articles 3.2.3.19. and 3.2.3.20., or a vestibule provided in conformance with Article 3.2.6.3.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (6) and (7), where a building is required to be equipped with a fire alarm system, a smoke detector shall be located near the entrance to, a walkway described in Articles 3.2.3.19. and 3.2.3.20., or a vestibule provided in conformance with Article 3.2.6.3.

ON Full: Where required for normal plant activity, quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids are permitted to exceed those specified in Sentence (1), but shall not be greater than the supply for one day of normal operation.
ON Variations: Where required for normal plant activity, quantities of flammable liquids and combustible liquids are permitted to exceed those specified in Sentence (1), but shall not be greater than the supply for one day of normal operation.

ON Full: Blocking for the attachment of cladding shall be not less than 38 mm by 38 mm lumber securely nailed to the framing and spaced not more than 610 mm o.c.
ON Variations: Blocking for the attachment of cladding shall be not less than 38 mm by 38 mm lumber securely nailed to the framing and spaced not more than 610 mm o.c.

ON Full: Flashing material and installation shall comply with Articles 9.27.3.7. and 9.27.3.8.
ON Variations: Flashing material and installation shall comply with Articles 9.27.3.7. and 9.27.3.8.
