ON Full: The distribution pipes shall,(a) be self-draining so as to prevent freezing of their contents, and (b) have orifices of at least 3 mm in diameter, spaced equally along the length of the pipes.
ON Variations: The distribution pipes shall,(a) be self-draining so as to prevent freezing of their contents, and (b) have orifices of at least 3 mm in diameter, spaced equally along the length of the pipes.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Article 5.7.3.4., building assemblies described in Article 5.7.3.1. shall be protected by waterproofing in accordance with Article 5.7.3.3. so as to minimize the ingress of ground water into the building or the accumulation of ground water against the building.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Article 5.7.3.4., building assemblies described in Article 5.7.3.1. shall be protected by waterproofing in accordance with Article 5.7.3.3. so as to minimize the ingress of ground water into the building or the accumulation of ground water against the building.

ON Full: Except in dwelling units and except as provided in Sentence (2), the surface flame-spread rating of wall and ceiling surfaces in corridors and walkways, exclusive of doors, shall not exceed 25 over not less than 90 percent of the exposed surface area and not more than 150 over the remaining surface area.
ON Variations: Except in dwelling units and except as provided in Sentence (2), the surface flame-spread rating of wall and ceiling surfaces in corridors and walkways, exclusive of doors, shall not exceed 25 over not less than 90 percent of the exposed surface area and not more than 150 over the remaining surface area.

ON Full: In buildings that are 3 storeys in building height, any part of an exit ramp or stairway that continues up or down past the lowest exit level shall be clearly marked to indicate that it does not lead to an exit where the portion below exit level may be mistaken as the direction of exit travel.
ON Variations: In buildings that are 3 storeys in building height, any part of an exit ramp or stairway that continues up or down past the lowest exit level shall be clearly marked to indicate that it does not lead to an exit where the portion below exit level may be mistaken as the direction of exit travel.

ON Full: Each fuel-fired industrial truck shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2A:30B:C.
ON Variations: Each fuel-fired industrial truck shall be equipped with at least one portable extinguisher having a minimum rating of 2A:30B:C.

ON Full: Where there is no fire department or where a fire department is not organized, trained and equipped to meet the needs of the community, the required limiting distance determined from Sentences 9.10.15.4.(2) and (5) and Sentence 9.10.15.5.(6), shall be doubled for a building that is not sprinklered.
ON Variations: Where there is no fire department or where a fire department is not organized, trained and equipped to meet the needs of the community, the required limiting distance determined from Sentences 9.10.15.4.(2) and (5) and Sentence 9.10.15.5.(6), shall be doubled for a building that is not sprinklered.

ON Full: The thickness specified in this Part for plywood, hardboard, particleboard, OSB and waferboard shall be subject to the tolerances permitted in the standards referenced for these products unless specifically indicated in this Part.
ON Variations: The thickness specified in this Part for plywood, hardboard, particleboard, OSB and waferboard shall be subject to the tolerances permitted in the standards referenced for these products unless specifically indicated in this Part.

ON Full: The higher mode factor, Mv, and its associated base overturning moment reduction factor, J, shall conform to Tables 4.1.8.11.A. to 4.1.8.11.E.
ON Variations: The higher mode factor, Mv, and its associated base overturning moment reduction factor, J, shall conform to Tables 4.1.8.11.A. to 4.1.8.11.E.

ON Full: The travel distance within the room to the nearest egress door described in Clause (5)(b) shall be not more than 23 m.
ON Variations: The travel distance within the room to the nearest egress door described in Clause (5)(b) shall be not more than 23 m.

ON Full: The performance level of a building after construction shall not be less than the performance level of the building prior to construction.
ON Variations: The performance level of a building after construction shall not be less than the performance level of the building prior to construction.

ON Full: The filter and water evaporation medium of every air washer and evaporative cooling section enclosed within a building shall be made of noncombustible material.
ON Variations: The filter and water evaporation medium of every air washer and evaporative cooling section enclosed within a building shall be made of noncombustible material.

ON Full: The height restrictions noted in Table 4.1.8.9. need not apply to seismically isolated structures.
ON Variations: The height restrictions noted in Table 4.1.8.9. need not apply to seismically isolated structures.

ON Full: Automobile undercoating spray operations shall conform to the requirements of Section 5.12 or to the requirements in this Subsection.
ON Variations: Automobile undercoating spray operations shall conform to the requirements of Section 5.12 or to the requirements in this Subsection.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.7.4.1.(2) and (3), two washrooms, each containing a water closet and a lavatory, shall be provided within one of the buildings on the property.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.7.4.1.(2) and (3), two washrooms, each containing a water closet and a lavatory, shall be provided within one of the buildings on the property.

ON Full: Every pharmacy shall be provided with a sink with hot and cold potable water for washing utensils used in the preparation, service or storage of drugs.
ON Variations: Every pharmacy shall be provided with a sink with hot and cold potable water for washing utensils used in the preparation, service or storage of drugs.

ON Full: Section 2.2 (Fire Separations), Article 2.4.4.4. (Open-air burning), Subsection 2.4.7. (Vacant Buildings), Section 2.6 (Service Equipment), Section 2.11 (Insulation and Re-Insulation), Section 2.13 (Installation of Smoke Alarms), Section 2.15 (Portable Oxygen and Section 2.16 (Installation of Carbon Monoxide apply to individual dwelling units.
ON Variations: Section 2.2 (Fire Separations), Article 2.4.4.4. (Open-air burning), Subsection 2.4.7. (Vacant Buildings), Section 2.6 (Service Equipment), Section 2.11 (Insulation and Re-Insulation), Section 2.13 (Installation of Smoke Alarms), Section 2.15 (Portable Oxygen and Section 2.16 (Installation of Carbon Monoxide apply to individual dwelling units.

ON Full: Vents shall be, (a) uniformly distributed on opposite sides of the building, and (b) designed to prevent the entry of snow, rain and insects.
ON Variations: Vents shall be, (a) uniformly distributed on opposite sides of the building, and (b) designed to prevent the entry of snow, rain and insects.

ON Full: The gateways shall be locked when the storage yard is not staffed.
ON Variations: The gateways shall be locked when the storage yard is not staffed.

ON Full: Where proposed construction will result in a temporary or permanent change in the groundwater level, the effects of this change on adjacent buildings shall be fully investigated and provided for in the design.
ON Variations: Where proposed construction will result in a temporary or permanent change in the groundwater level, the effects of this change on adjacent buildings shall be fully investigated and provided for in the design.

ON Full: The side slope of the leaching bed fill may be increased up to one unit vertically to three units horizontally if measures are taken to prevent erosion and ensure stability of the leaching bed fill.
ON Variations: The side slope of the leaching bed fill may be increased up to one unit vertically to three units horizontally if measures are taken to prevent erosion and ensure stability of the leaching bed fill.

ON Full: Where a building drain enters a building above the elevation of the bottom of the wall of a building, the building drain may be deemed to terminate at the first point that the drainage pipe changes direction from the horizontal to the vertical.
ON Variations: Where a building drain enters a building above the elevation of the bottom of the wall of a building, the building drain may be deemed to terminate at the first point that the drainage pipe changes direction from the horizontal to the vertical.

ON Full: The evaluation and measures shall be put in writing and kept in the building for review by the Chief Fire Official.
ON Variations: The evaluation and measures shall be put in writing and kept in the building for review by the Chief Fire Official.

ON Full: Decking for wood shingled roofs may be continuous or spaced.
ON Variations: Decking for wood shingled roofs may be continuous or spaced.

ON Full: After release, the gates or turnstiles in Sentence (2) or the doors in Sentence (3) shall be capable of reactivation only by manual actuation of the switch in Clause (4)(c).
ON Variations: After release, the gates or turnstiles in Sentence (2) or the doors in Sentence (3) shall be capable of reactivation only by manual actuation of the switch in Clause (4)(c).

ON Full: Cargo pumps capable of producing pressures in excess of the safe working pressure of the cargo hose shall be provided with pressure relief devices such as return lines or relief valves.
ON Variations: Cargo pumps capable of producing pressures in excess of the safe working pressure of the cargo hose shall be provided with pressure relief devices such as return lines or relief valves.

ON Full: Except as permitted in Sentence (15), the floor of the electrical equipment vault described in Sentences (1) and (2) shall be liquid tight and surrounded by liquid tight walls and sills of sufficient height to confine within the vault all of the liquid from the largest item of electrical equipment, but to a height of not less than 100 mm.
ON Variations: Except as permitted in Sentence (15), the floor of the electrical equipment vault described in Sentences (1) and (2) shall be liquid tight and surrounded by liquid tight walls and sills of sufficient height to confine within the vault all of the liquid from the largest item of electrical equipment, but to a height of not less than 100 mm.

ON Full: Sentence (2) applies to the design and construction of a leaching bed with distribution pipes used within the leaching bed.
ON Variations: Sentence (2) applies to the design and construction of a leaching bed with distribution pipes used within the leaching bed.

ON Full: Couplings and joints for vitrified clay pipe shall be certified to CSA A60.3-M, "Vitrified Clay Pipe Joints".
ON Variations: Couplings and joints for vitrified clay pipe shall be certified to CSA A60.3-M, "Vitrified Clay Pipe Joints".

ON Full: A shelf and rack storage system intended for the storage of rubber tires shall conform to, Article 3.3.6.5., and the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.
ON Variations: A shelf and rack storage system intended for the storage of rubber tires shall conform to, Article 3.3.6.5., and the Fire Code made under the Fire Protection and Prevention Act, 1997.

ON Full: This Article applies to a mechanical ventilation system serving a house or an individual dwelling unit that contains a forced air heating system which is used for delivery of ventilation air.
ON Variations: This Article applies to a mechanical ventilation system serving a house or an individual dwelling unit that contains a forced air heating system which is used for delivery of ventilation air.

ON Full: For buildings with a Type 9 irregularity as described in Table 4.1.8.6. and where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.5, deflections determined in accordance with Article 4.1.8.13. shall be multiplied by 1.2.
ON Variations: For buildings with a Type 9 irregularity as described in Table 4.1.8.6. and where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.5, deflections determined in accordance with Article 4.1.8.13. shall be multiplied by 1.2.

ON Full: Where exits are provided to comply with Sentence 3.4.2.5.(2), main aisles serving the shelf and rack storage system on the ground floor, leading from egress stairs directly to an exit, shall be clearly demarcated and have a minimum unobstructed, clear-aisle width of 2.4 m.
ON Variations: Where exits are provided to comply with Sentence 3.4.2.5.(2), main aisles serving the shelf and rack storage system on the ground floor, leading from egress stairs directly to an exit, shall be clearly demarcated and have a minimum unobstructed, clear-aisle width of 2.4 m.

ON Full: Copper tube used in a plumbing appliance shall conform to,(a) ASTM B88, "Seamless Copper Water Tube", or (b) ASTM B68 / B68M, "Seamless Copper Tube, Bright Annealed".
ON Variations: Copper tube used in a plumbing appliance shall conform to,(a) ASTM B88, "Seamless Copper Water Tube", or (b) ASTM B68 / B68M, "Seamless Copper Tube, Bright Annealed".

ON Full: A standpipe system is not required to be installed in a rooftop enclosure if this enclosure has an area not more than 50 m2.
ON Variations: A standpipe system is not required to be installed in a rooftop enclosure if this enclosure has an area not more than 50 m2.

ON Full: Every room containing sanitary units for employees shall have a floor area not less than 2.3 m2.
ON Variations: Every room containing sanitary units for employees shall have a floor area not less than 2.3 m2.

ON Full: This Section also applies to supported group living residences and intensive support residences regulated under the Services and Supports to Promote the Social Inclusion of Persons with Developmental Disabilities Act, 2008.
ON Variations: This Section also applies to supported group living residences and intensive support residences regulated under the Services and Supports to Promote the Social Inclusion of Persons with Developmental Disabilities Act, 2008.

ON Full: Obstructions, such as counter gates, that do not satisfy Sentence (2), are permitted to be placed in a required means of egress from a part of a floor area in mercantile occupancies and business and personal services occupancies, provided that the part of the floor area served by the obstructed means of egress is not generally accessible to the public.
ON Variations: Obstructions, such as counter gates, that do not satisfy Sentence (2), are permitted to be placed in a required means of egress from a part of a floor area in mercantile occupancies and business and personal services occupancies, provided that the part of the floor area served by the obstructed means of egress is not generally accessible to the public.

ON Full: Foundation displacements and rotations shall be considered as required by Sentence 4.1.8.16.(1).
ON Variations: Foundation displacements and rotations shall be considered as required by Sentence 4.1.8.16.(1).

ON Full: Where an area of floor or roof is intended for 2 or more occupancies at different times, the value to be used from Table 4.1.5.3. shall be the greatest value for any of the occupancies concerned.
ON Variations: Where an area of floor or roof is intended for 2 or more occupancies at different times, the value to be used from Table 4.1.5.3. shall be the greatest value for any of the occupancies concerned.

ON Full: The hydrant barrel shall be inspected to ensure that no water has accumulated within the barrel when the main valve is in the closed position.
ON Variations: The hydrant barrel shall be inspected to ensure that no water has accumulated within the barrel when the main valve is in the closed position.

ON Full: OSB conforming to O-2 grade applied directly to framing or over furring strips shall conform to the thickness shown for plywood in Table 9.27.8.2. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: OSB conforming to O-2 grade applied directly to framing or over furring strips shall conform to the thickness shown for plywood in Table 9.27.8.2. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: An evaluation of the fire and explosion risks shall be undertaken to consider the material properties, quantities, operating conditions, storage arrangement, transportation, process design, operating and maintenance procedures.
ON Variations: An evaluation of the fire and explosion risks shall be undertaken to consider the material properties, quantities, operating conditions, storage arrangement, transportation, process design, operating and maintenance procedures.

ON Full: Dry-pipe systems shall be inspected every 15 years for obstructions in the sprinkler piping and, if necessary, the entire system flushed of foreign material.
ON Variations: Dry-pipe systems shall be inspected every 15 years for obstructions in the sprinkler piping and, if necessary, the entire system flushed of foreign material.

ON Full: Where an interior wall meets an exterior wall, ceiling, floor or roof required to be provided with an air barrier protection, the air barrier system shall extend across the intersection and shall be sealed in accordance with Sentences (1) and (2).
ON Variations: Where an interior wall meets an exterior wall, ceiling, floor or roof required to be provided with an air barrier protection, the air barrier system shall extend across the intersection and shall be sealed in accordance with Sentences (1) and (2).

ON Full: Panel-type underlay shall be not less than 6 mm thick and shall conform to,(a) ANSI A208.1, "Particleboard", (b) CAN/CGSB-11.3-M, "Hardboard", (c) ANSI/HPVA HP-1, "Hardwood and Decorative Plywood", (d) CSA O121, "Douglas Fir Plywood", (e) CSA O151, "Canadian Softwood Plywood", (f) CSA O153, "Poplar Plywood", or (g) CSA O437.0, "OSB and Waferboard".
ON Variations: Panel-type underlay shall be not less than 6 mm thick and shall conform to,(a) ANSI A208.1, "Particleboard", (b) CAN/CGSB-11.3-M, "Hardboard", (c) ANSI/HPVA HP-1, "Hardwood and Decorative Plywood", (d) CSA O121, "Douglas Fir Plywood", (e) CSA O151, "Canadian Softwood Plywood", (f) CSA O153, "Poplar Plywood", or (g) CSA O437.0, "OSB and Waferboard".

ON Full: This Subsection applies to the installation of storage tanks in buildings.
ON Variations: This Subsection applies to the installation of storage tanks in buildings.

ON Full: Facilities shall be provided at battery charging installations for flushing and neutralizing spilled electrolyte and for protecting charging apparatus from mechanical damage.
ON Variations: Facilities shall be provided at battery charging installations for flushing and neutralizing spilled electrolyte and for protecting charging apparatus from mechanical damage.

ON Full: Except as provided in Article 3.1.8.8., a fire damper having a fire-protection rating conforming to Sentence 3.1.8.4.(2) shall be installed in conformance with Article 3.1.8.9. in ducts or air-transfer openings that penetrate an assembly required to be a fire separation.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Article 3.1.8.8., a fire damper having a fire-protection rating conforming to Sentence 3.1.8.4.(2) shall be installed in conformance with Article 3.1.8.9. in ducts or air-transfer openings that penetrate an assembly required to be a fire separation.

ON Full: Despite Sentences 3.11.3.1.(4) and (8) and Clause 3.11.3.1.(9)(a), where a public pool is constructed in a building containing a Group B, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy and has a water depth not exceeding 1 500 mm and a water surface area not exceeding 100 m2, the pool deck contiguous to not more than 50% of the total perimeter of the pool may be replaced by one or more ramps that will permit a bather seated in a wheelchair to enter the water with or without the wheelchair.
ON Variations: Despite Sentences 3.11.3.1.(4) and (8) and Clause 3.11.3.1.(9)(a), where a public pool is constructed in a building containing a Group B, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy and has a water depth not exceeding 1 500 mm and a water surface area not exceeding 100 m2, the pool deck contiguous to not more than 50% of the total perimeter of the pool may be replaced by one or more ramps that will permit a bather seated in a wheelchair to enter the water with or without the wheelchair.

ON Full: Each hose required in Sentence (2) shall be connected to a water supply capable of supplying 1140 L/min of water to it at a pressure that will allow the hose stream to reach the top of the chip pile.
ON Variations: Each hose required in Sentence (2) shall be connected to a water supply capable of supplying 1140 L/min of water to it at a pressure that will allow the hose stream to reach the top of the chip pile.

ON Full: A wall or ceiling finish shall also conform to the appropriate requirements in Sections 9.10. and 9.11. in addition to the requirements in this Section.
ON Variations: A wall or ceiling finish shall also conform to the appropriate requirements in Sections 9.10. and 9.11. in addition to the requirements in this Section.

ON Full: If a fire alarm system is installed, an air handling system shall be designed to prevent the circulation of smoke upon a signal from a duct-type smoke detector if the air handling system, serves more than 1 storey, serves more than one suite in a storey, serves more than one fire compartment required by Sentence 3.3.3.5.(2) or Sentence 3.3.4.11.(2), or is not provided with fire dampers as permitted by Sentence 3.1.8.8.(4).
ON Variations: If a fire alarm system is installed, an air handling system shall be designed to prevent the circulation of smoke upon a signal from a duct-type smoke detector if the air handling system, serves more than 1 storey, serves more than one suite in a storey, serves more than one fire compartment required by Sentence 3.3.3.5.(2) or Sentence 3.3.4.11.(2), or is not provided with fire dampers as permitted by Sentence 3.1.8.8.(4).

ON Full: Equipment such as a pump or ejector that can lift the contents of the sump or tank and discharge it into the sanitary building drain or sanitary building sewer shall be installed.
ON Variations: Equipment such as a pump or ejector that can lift the contents of the sump or tank and discharge it into the sanitary building drain or sanitary building sewer shall be installed.

ON Full: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence (1) shall include a means to silence the alarm signal in a single-stage fire alarm system while voice messages are being transmitted, but only after the alarm signal has initially sounded for not less than 30 s.
ON Variations: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence (1) shall include a means to silence the alarm signal in a single-stage fire alarm system while voice messages are being transmitted, but only after the alarm signal has initially sounded for not less than 30 s.

ON Full: For all other occupancies, the total daily design sanitary sewage flow shall be at least the value in Column 2 as determined from Table 8.2.1.3.B. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: For all other occupancies, the total daily design sanitary sewage flow shall be at least the value in Column 2 as determined from Table 8.2.1.3.B. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Portable extinguishers shall be kept operable and fully charged.
ON Variations: Portable extinguishers shall be kept operable and fully charged.

ON Full: The Chief Fire Official shall be notified within an approved time period before every fire drill carried out under Sentence 2.8.3.2.(6).
ON Variations: The Chief Fire Official shall be notified within an approved time period before every fire drill carried out under Sentence 2.8.3.2.(6).

ON Full: A dishwashing sink and a food preparation sink shall not have concealed overflows.
ON Variations: A dishwashing sink and a food preparation sink shall not have concealed overflows.

ON Full: The clear height over landings shall be not less than,(a) 1 950 mm for landings serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and (b) 2 050 mm for landings not serving a house or an individual dwelling unit.
ON Variations: The clear height over landings shall be not less than,(a) 1 950 mm for landings serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and (b) 2 050 mm for landings not serving a house or an individual dwelling unit.

ON Full: A tightly fitted access door shall be installed for each smoke damper and combination smoke and fire damper to provide access for their inspection and the resetting of the release device.
ON Variations: A tightly fitted access door shall be installed for each smoke damper and combination smoke and fire damper to provide access for their inspection and the resetting of the release device.

ON Full: Hydrants shall be inspected annually and after each use in accordance with Articles 6.6.5.2. to 6.6.5.5.
ON Variations: Hydrants shall be inspected annually and after each use in accordance with Articles 6.6.5.2. to 6.6.5.5.

ON Full: Where the intake for a supplemental exhaust fan, other than a cooking appliance exhaust fan serving a cooktop, is installed in a kitchen, it shall be installed in the ceiling or on the wall within 300 mm of the ceiling.
ON Variations: Where the intake for a supplemental exhaust fan, other than a cooking appliance exhaust fan serving a cooktop, is installed in a kitchen, it shall be installed in the ceiling or on the wall within 300 mm of the ceiling.

ON Full: Where an elementary or secondary school is subdivided by a firewall, a horizontal exit shall not serve as an exit but is permitted to serve as an access to exit.
ON Variations: Where an elementary or secondary school is subdivided by a firewall, a horizontal exit shall not serve as an exit but is permitted to serve as an access to exit.

ON Full: Where a fire separation required to have a fire-resistance rating is penetrated by a ventilation system required by Sentence (1) for power-ventilated enclosures in laboratories, the ducts shall be continuously enclosed from the first penetrated fire separation to any subsequent fire separations or concealed spaces and to the outdoors so that the highest fire-resistance rating of all the penetrated fire separations is maintained.
ON Variations: Where a fire separation required to have a fire-resistance rating is penetrated by a ventilation system required by Sentence (1) for power-ventilated enclosures in laboratories, the ducts shall be continuously enclosed from the first penetrated fire separation to any subsequent fire separations or concealed spaces and to the outdoors so that the highest fire-resistance rating of all the penetrated fire separations is maintained.

ON Full: Every vent pipe in a plumbing system shall be installed so as to be direct as possible to a vent stack or open air, as the case may be, and so that any horizontal run below the flood level of the fixture to which the vent pipe is installed is eliminated where structurally possible.
ON Variations: Every vent pipe in a plumbing system shall be installed so as to be direct as possible to a vent stack or open air, as the case may be, and so that any horizontal run below the flood level of the fixture to which the vent pipe is installed is eliminated where structurally possible.

ON Full: Signs prohibiting smoking that conform to Article 2.4.3.2. shall be conspicuously posted at all powder-coating areas and powder storage rooms.
ON Variations: Signs prohibiting smoking that conform to Article 2.4.3.2. shall be conspicuously posted at all powder-coating areas and powder storage rooms.

ON Full: At sites where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, basement walls shall be designed to resist earthquake lateral pressures from backfill or natural ground. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: At sites where IEFaSa(0.2) is equal to or greater than 0.35, basement walls shall be designed to resist earthquake lateral pressures from backfill or natural ground. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: A building classified as Group A, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence (2) provided, except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.7.(1), the building shall be sprinklered, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than, 12 000 m2 if 1 storey in building height, or 6 000 m2 if 2 storeys in building height.
ON Variations: A building classified as Group A, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence (2) provided, except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.7.(1), the building shall be sprinklered, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than, 12 000 m2 if 1 storey in building height, or 6 000 m2 if 2 storeys in building height.

ON Full: If an exit stair in an assembly hall or theatre serves more than one balcony level, the exit stair shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence (1).
ON Variations: If an exit stair in an assembly hall or theatre serves more than one balcony level, the exit stair shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence (1).

ON Full: Every waste pipe carrying waste from a device for the display, storage, preparation or processing of food or drink shall be trapped and have a minimum diameter equal to the diameter of the drain outlet from the device.
ON Variations: Every waste pipe carrying waste from a device for the display, storage, preparation or processing of food or drink shall be trapped and have a minimum diameter equal to the diameter of the drain outlet from the device.

ON Full: Where a domestic dishwashing machine equipped with a drainage pump discharges through a direct connection into the fixture outlet pipe of an adjacent kitchen sink or disposal unit, the pump discharge line shall,(a) rise as high as possible to just under the counter, and (b) connect, (i) on the inlet side of the sink trap by means of a Y fitting, or (ii) to the disposal unit.
ON Variations: Where a domestic dishwashing machine equipped with a drainage pump discharges through a direct connection into the fixture outlet pipe of an adjacent kitchen sink or disposal unit, the pump discharge line shall,(a) rise as high as possible to just under the counter, and (b) connect, (i) on the inlet side of the sink trap by means of a Y fitting, or (ii) to the disposal unit.

ON Full: Dry-pipe valve rooms or enclosures in unheated buildings shall be checked as often as necessary when the outside temperature falls below 0°C to ensure that the system does not freeze.
ON Variations: Dry-pipe valve rooms or enclosures in unheated buildings shall be checked as often as necessary when the outside temperature falls below 0°C to ensure that the system does not freeze.

ON Full: For the purposes of calculating permissible quantities in Sentences (2) and (3), mercantile occupancies of less than 250 m2 floor area shall be assumed to be 250 m2 in area.
ON Variations: For the purposes of calculating permissible quantities in Sentences (2) and (3), mercantile occupancies of less than 250 m2 floor area shall be assumed to be 250 m2 in area.

ON Full: Sentence (1) need not apply where, (a) snow from the upper roof is prevented from sliding by a parapet or other effective means, or (b) the upper roof is not considered slippery and has a slope less than 20°.
ON Variations: Sentence (1) need not apply where, (a) snow from the upper roof is prevented from sliding by a parapet or other effective means, or (b) the upper roof is not considered slippery and has a slope less than 20°.

ON Full: The pool lift shall, have a weight capacity of at least 135 kg, and be capable of sustaining a static load of at least 1.5 times the rated load.
ON Variations: The pool lift shall, have a weight capacity of at least 135 kg, and be capable of sustaining a static load of at least 1.5 times the rated load.

ON Full: Bronze flanges for 50 mm diameter or smaller size piping referred to in Article 4.4.5.2. are permitted to be used where copper and brass piping is permitted.
ON Variations: Bronze flanges for 50 mm diameter or smaller size piping referred to in Article 4.4.5.2. are permitted to be used where copper and brass piping is permitted.

ON Full: Where a floor area is less than that shown in Table 6.2.6.A., one portable extinguisher not less than the minimum size permitted shall be provided.
ON Variations: Where a floor area is less than that shown in Table 6.2.6.A., one portable extinguisher not less than the minimum size permitted shall be provided.

ON Full: Fire alarm system branch circuits within a storey that connect transponders and individual devices need not conform to Sentence (2). (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Fire alarm system branch circuits within a storey that connect transponders and individual devices need not conform to Sentence (2). (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: The attachment of vinyl siding shall conform to the requirements in Subsection 9.27.5. for metal siding.
ON Variations: The attachment of vinyl siding shall conform to the requirements in Subsection 9.27.5. for metal siding.

ON Full: Where the sills of windows and doors installed in exterior walls are not self-flashing, flashing shall be installed between the underside of the window or door and the wall construction below. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where the sills of windows and doors installed in exterior walls are not self-flashing, flashing shall be installed between the underside of the window or door and the wall construction below. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Every dwelling unit that is supplied with electrical power shall be provided with a mechanical ventilation system in accordance with Subsection 9.32.3.
ON Variations: Every dwelling unit that is supplied with electrical power shall be provided with a mechanical ventilation system in accordance with Subsection 9.32.3.

ON Full: Where the limiting distance is less than 0.6 m, cladding on the exposing building face and on exterior walls located above the exposing building face that enclose an attic or roof spaces need not be noncombustible, provided the cladding,(a) conforms to Subsection 9.27.12., (b) is installed without furring members over not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum sheathing or over masonry, (c) has a flame-spread rating not more than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), and (d) is not more than 2 mm in thickness exclusive of fasteners, joints and local reinforcements.
ON Variations: Where the limiting distance is less than 0.6 m, cladding on the exposing building face and on exterior walls located above the exposing building face that enclose an attic or roof spaces need not be noncombustible, provided the cladding,(a) conforms to Subsection 9.27.12., (b) is installed without furring members over not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum sheathing or over masonry, (c) has a flame-spread rating not more than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), and (d) is not more than 2 mm in thickness exclusive of fasteners, joints and local reinforcements.

ON Full: Overhead piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be installed close to the ceiling or beams or along walls not less than 1.8 m above the floor to protect it against mechanical damage.
ON Variations: Overhead piping for flammable liquids or combustible liquids shall be installed close to the ceiling or beams or along walls not less than 1.8 m above the floor to protect it against mechanical damage.

ON Full: Doors required in Sentence (1) shall be spaced so that in the event one door is made inaccessible by a fire within such a room or suite, the other door will provide safe egress.
ON Variations: Doors required in Sentence (1) shall be spaced so that in the event one door is made inaccessible by a fire within such a room or suite, the other door will provide safe egress.

ON Full: A building containing a major occupancy that is classified as an assembly occupancy, a care occupancy, a care and treatment occupancy, a detention occupancy or a residential occupancy shall not contain a major occupancy that is classified as a high hazard industrial occupancy.
ON Variations: A building containing a major occupancy that is classified as an assembly occupancy, a care occupancy, a care and treatment occupancy, a detention occupancy or a residential occupancy shall not contain a major occupancy that is classified as a high hazard industrial occupancy.

ON Full: Shingles referred to in Sentence (1) shall be fastened with nails or staples on each side located not more than 25 mm from the edge and 25 mm above the butt of the overlying shingle.
ON Variations: Shingles referred to in Sentence (1) shall be fastened with nails or staples on each side located not more than 25 mm from the edge and 25 mm above the butt of the overlying shingle.

ON Full: Except where located in and serving only the dwelling units, a fuel-fired appliance shall be located in a service room separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
ON Variations: Except where located in and serving only the dwelling units, a fuel-fired appliance shall be located in a service room separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

ON Full: The requirements of Sentence (6) need not be applied where the exit stairs that serve interconnected floor spaces are designed so that the required width of each stair is cumulative.
ON Variations: The requirements of Sentence (6) need not be applied where the exit stairs that serve interconnected floor spaces are designed so that the required width of each stair is cumulative.

ON Full: Brass or bronze pipe flanges and flanged fittings shall conform to ASME B16.24, "Cast Copper Alloy Pipe Flanges and Flanged Fittings: Classes 150, 300, 600, 900, 1500 and 2500".
ON Variations: Brass or bronze pipe flanges and flanged fittings shall conform to ASME B16.24, "Cast Copper Alloy Pipe Flanges and Flanged Fittings: Classes 150, 300, 600, 900, 1500 and 2500".

ON Full: Masonry or concrete chimneys other than those described in Sentence (1) shall be designed and installed in conformance with the appropriate requirements in NFPA 211, "Chimneys, Fireplaces, Vents and Solid Fuel-Burning Appliances".
ON Variations: Masonry or concrete chimneys other than those described in Sentence (1) shall be designed and installed in conformance with the appropriate requirements in NFPA 211, "Chimneys, Fireplaces, Vents and Solid Fuel-Burning Appliances".

ON Full: The walls of a wave action pool shall be vertical from the water surface to within 150 mm of the bottom.
ON Variations: The walls of a wave action pool shall be vertical from the water surface to within 150 mm of the bottom.

ON Full: For walls, the air space described in Clause (1)(c) shall be drained and ventilated and shall be not less than 10 mm deep behind the cladding, over the full height and width of the wall.
ON Variations: For walls, the air space described in Clause (1)(c) shall be drained and ventilated and shall be not less than 10 mm deep behind the cladding, over the full height and width of the wall.

ON Full: The maximum depth of water to a seat or bench in a public spa shall be 600 mm.
ON Variations: The maximum depth of water to a seat or bench in a public spa shall be 600 mm.

ON Full: The clear height of landings shall be measured vertically, over the clear width of the landing, to the lowest point above.
ON Variations: The clear height of landings shall be measured vertically, over the clear width of the landing, to the lowest point above.

ON Full: Subject to Article 5.12.3.3., the exhaust air velocity at any opening in a spray booth shall be at least 30 m/min.
ON Variations: Subject to Article 5.12.3.3., the exhaust air velocity at any opening in a spray booth shall be at least 30 m/min.

ON Full: The natural ventilation of rooms or spaces required in Sentence (1) may be provided by mechanical means.
ON Variations: The natural ventilation of rooms or spaces required in Sentence (1) may be provided by mechanical means.

ON Full: Where vitrified clay is located less than 600 mm below a basement floor and the floor is constructed of other than 75 mm or more of concrete, the pipe shall be protected by a 75 mm layer of concrete installed above the pipe.
ON Variations: Where vitrified clay is located less than 600 mm below a basement floor and the floor is constructed of other than 75 mm or more of concrete, the pipe shall be protected by a 75 mm layer of concrete installed above the pipe.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), a building that includes a contained use area shall be sprinklered.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence (4), a building that includes a contained use area shall be sprinklered.

ON Full: A separate exhaust duct shall be provided for each spray booth, except that a common duct may be used if it serves spray booths having a combined open frontal area of not more than 1.8 m2.
ON Variations: A separate exhaust duct shall be provided for each spray booth, except that a common duct may be used if it serves spray booths having a combined open frontal area of not more than 1.8 m2.

ON Full: The requirements of Subsection 3.2.8. do not apply to a shelf and rack storage system conforming to this Section.
ON Variations: The requirements of Subsection 3.2.8. do not apply to a shelf and rack storage system conforming to this Section.

ON Full: Mezzanines, elevated walkways and platforms that are intended to be occupied in Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancies need not be considered as storeys in calculating building height provided, the building is of noncombustible construction, and the occupant load is not more than four persons.
ON Variations: Mezzanines, elevated walkways and platforms that are intended to be occupied in Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancies need not be considered as storeys in calculating building height provided, the building is of noncombustible construction, and the occupant load is not more than four persons.

ON Full: Interlayed strips in Sentence (2) shall be lapped at least 150 mm at hips and ridges in a manner that will prevent water from reaching the roof sheathing.
ON Variations: Interlayed strips in Sentence (2) shall be lapped at least 150 mm at hips and ridges in a manner that will prevent water from reaching the roof sheathing.

ON Full: A child care facility shall provide sleeping accommodation having not less than 0.93 m2 of floor surface area for each child with not less than 2 300 mm ceiling height over the entire room area.
ON Variations: A child care facility shall provide sleeping accommodation having not less than 0.93 m2 of floor surface area for each child with not less than 2 300 mm ceiling height over the entire room area.

ON Full: This Article applies to rental suites of residential occupancy.
ON Variations: This Article applies to rental suites of residential occupancy.

ON Full: Signs that prohibit smoking and that conform to Article 2.4.3.2. shall be posted conspicuously in the vicinity of dip tanks.
ON Variations: Signs that prohibit smoking and that conform to Article 2.4.3.2. shall be posted conspicuously in the vicinity of dip tanks.

ON Full: Every pipe that conveys water from a temperature relief, pressure relief, or a combined temperature and pressure relief valve shall,(a) be of a size at least equal to the size of the outlet of the valve, (b) be rigid, slope downward from the valve, and, (i) terminate with an indirect connection above a floor drain, sump or other safe location, with an air break of not more than 300 mm, or (ii) terminate at a distance not less than 150 mm and not more than 300 mm from a floor and discharge vertically down, (c) have no thread at its outlet, and (d) be capable of operating at a temperature of not less than 99°C.
ON Variations: Every pipe that conveys water from a temperature relief, pressure relief, or a combined temperature and pressure relief valve shall,(a) be of a size at least equal to the size of the outlet of the valve, (b) be rigid, slope downward from the valve, and, (i) terminate with an indirect connection above a floor drain, sump or other safe location, with an air break of not more than 300 mm, or (ii) terminate at a distance not less than 150 mm and not more than 300 mm from a floor and discharge vertically down, (c) have no thread at its outlet, and (d) be capable of operating at a temperature of not less than 99°C.

ON Full: In a building that contains dwelling units that have more than 1 storey, subject to the requirements of Sentence 3.3.4.2.(3), the floor assemblies, including floors over basements, that are entirely contained within these dwelling units, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min but need not be constructed as fire separations.
ON Variations: In a building that contains dwelling units that have more than 1 storey, subject to the requirements of Sentence 3.3.4.2.(3), the floor assemblies, including floors over basements, that are entirely contained within these dwelling units, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min but need not be constructed as fire separations.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Sentence 8.7.8.2.(2), a Type B dispersal bed shall conform to the requirements of Article 8.7.2.1.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (2) and Sentence 8.7.8.2.(2), a Type B dispersal bed shall conform to the requirements of Article 8.7.2.1.

ON Full: A Type B dispersal bed shall be,(a) rectangular in shape with the long dimension parallel to the site contours, (b) not more than 1 000 mm in depth measured from the bottom of the stone layer to the finished grade when installed in soil with a percolation time that exceeds 15 min, and (c) backfilled with leaching bed fill so as to ensure that, after the leaching bed fill settles, the surface of the leaching bed will not form any depressions.
ON Variations: A Type B dispersal bed shall be,(a) rectangular in shape with the long dimension parallel to the site contours, (b) not more than 1 000 mm in depth measured from the bottom of the stone layer to the finished grade when installed in soil with a percolation time that exceeds 15 min, and (c) backfilled with leaching bed fill so as to ensure that, after the leaching bed fill settles, the surface of the leaching bed will not form any depressions.

ON Full: If a two stage fire alarm system has been installed with an automatic signal silence as described in Sentence (13), the system shall be designed so that any silenced audible signal devices serving dwelling units are reactuated whenever an alarm signal is required to be transmitted as part of the second stage.
ON Variations: If a two stage fire alarm system has been installed with an automatic signal silence as described in Sentence (13), the system shall be designed so that any silenced audible signal devices serving dwelling units are reactuated whenever an alarm signal is required to be transmitted as part of the second stage.

ON Full: The gateways shall be kept clear of obstructions so that the gates may be fully opened at all times.
ON Variations: The gateways shall be kept clear of obstructions so that the gates may be fully opened at all times.

ON Full: Fasteners on horizontal surfaces shall be spaced not more than, (a) 150 mm o.c. along the framing members when members are spaced not more than 406 mm o.c., and (b) 100 mm o.c. along members when members are spaced not more than 610 mm o.c.
ON Variations: Fasteners on horizontal surfaces shall be spaced not more than, (a) 150 mm o.c. along the framing members when members are spaced not more than 406 mm o.c., and (b) 100 mm o.c. along members when members are spaced not more than 610 mm o.c.

ON Full: Lintels described in Sentence (2) over openings wider than 1.2 m shall be reinforced for shear with 10M stirrups at a maximum spacing of half the distance from the bottom reinforcing bar to the top of the lintel.
ON Variations: Lintels described in Sentence (2) over openings wider than 1.2 m shall be reinforced for shear with 10M stirrups at a maximum spacing of half the distance from the bottom reinforcing bar to the top of the lintel.

ON Full: The required limiting distance for an exposing building face is permitted to be measured to a point beyond the property line that is not the centre line of a street, lane or public thoroughfare if,(a) the owners of the properties on which the limiting distance is measured and the municipality enter into an agreement in which such owners agree that, (i) each owner covenants that, for the benefit of land owned by the other covenantors, the owner will not construct a building on his or her property unless the limiting distance for exposing building faces in respect of the proposed construction is measured in accordance with the agreement, (ii) the covenants contained in the agreement are intended to run with the lands, and the agreement shall be binding on the parties and their respective heirs, executors, administrators, successors and assigns, (iii) the agreement shall not be amended or deleted from title without the consent of the municipality, and (iv) they will comply with such other conditions as the municipality considers necessary, including indemnification of the municipality by the other parties, and (b) the agreement referred to in Clause (a) is registered against the title of the properties to which it applies.
ON Variations: The required limiting distance for an exposing building face is permitted to be measured to a point beyond the property line that is not the centre line of a street, lane or public thoroughfare if,(a) the owners of the properties on which the limiting distance is measured and the municipality enter into an agreement in which such owners agree that, (i) each owner covenants that, for the benefit of land owned by the other covenantors, the owner will not construct a building on his or her property unless the limiting distance for exposing building faces in respect of the proposed construction is measured in accordance with the agreement, (ii) the covenants contained in the agreement are intended to run with the lands, and the agreement shall be binding on the parties and their respective heirs, executors, administrators, successors and assigns, (iii) the agreement shall not be amended or deleted from title without the consent of the municipality, and (iv) they will comply with such other conditions as the municipality considers necessary, including indemnification of the municipality by the other parties, and (b) the agreement referred to in Clause (a) is registered against the title of the properties to which it applies.

ON Full: Gas fuel cylinders, whether full or empty, whose valves are not in a recessed or protected location shall have their caps in place and their valves tightly closed when not in actual use.
ON Variations: Gas fuel cylinders, whether full or empty, whose valves are not in a recessed or protected location shall have their caps in place and their valves tightly closed when not in actual use.

ON Full: Flashing shall be of material specified in Article 7.2.10.14. and on a shingled roof shall have a minimum dimension of 500 mm by 500 mm.
ON Variations: Flashing shall be of material specified in Article 7.2.10.14. and on a shingled roof shall have a minimum dimension of 500 mm by 500 mm.

ON Full: At the platform level, the distance separating the egress facilities in Sentences (1) and (2) shall be the greater of one car length or 25 m.
ON Variations: At the platform level, the distance separating the egress facilities in Sentences (1) and (2) shall be the greater of one car length or 25 m.

ON Full: Where a diving board or a diving platform in a public pool is more than 600 mm above the water surface, the board or platform shall be equipped with one or more adjacent handrails.
ON Variations: Where a diving board or a diving platform in a public pool is more than 600 mm above the water surface, the board or platform shall be equipped with one or more adjacent handrails.

ON Full: Leaching bed fill that does not meet the requirements of Sentence (2) may be used to form the leaching bed if, (a) the distance from the bottom of the absorption trench to the underlying soil is not less than 900 mm, or (b) where the distance from the bottom of the absorption trench to the underlying soil is less than 900 mm, the percolation time of the least permeable soil or leaching bed fill within 900 mm from the bottom of the absorption trench is used to calculate the length of the distribution pipe under Article 8.7.3.1. or the leaching chamber under Article 8.7.3.1A.
ON Variations: Leaching bed fill that does not meet the requirements of Sentence (2) may be used to form the leaching bed if, (a) the distance from the bottom of the absorption trench to the underlying soil is not less than 900 mm, or (b) where the distance from the bottom of the absorption trench to the underlying soil is less than 900 mm, the percolation time of the least permeable soil or leaching bed fill within 900 mm from the bottom of the absorption trench is used to calculate the length of the distribution pipe under Article 8.7.3.1. or the leaching chamber under Article 8.7.3.1A.

ON Full: Unless it can be shown to be unnecessary, where the percolation time is less than 10 minutes, the clearances listed in Articles 8.2.1.5. and 8.2.1.6. for wells, lakes, ponds, reservoirs, rivers, springs or streams shall be increased to compensate for the lower percolation time.
ON Variations: Unless it can be shown to be unnecessary, where the percolation time is less than 10 minutes, the clearances listed in Articles 8.2.1.5. and 8.2.1.6. for wells, lakes, ponds, reservoirs, rivers, springs or streams shall be increased to compensate for the lower percolation time.

ON Full: Fuel-burning service water heaters shall be connected to a chimney flue conforming to Section 9.21.
ON Variations: Fuel-burning service water heaters shall be connected to a chimney flue conforming to Section 9.21.

ON Full: For the purpose of Sentence (3), sensitive clay means the grain size of the majority of the particles is smaller than 0.002 mm, including leda clay.
ON Variations: For the purpose of Sentence (3), sensitive clay means the grain size of the majority of the particles is smaller than 0.002 mm, including leda clay.

ON Full: Where a horizontal service space or other concealed space is located above a required vertical fire separation other than a vertical shaft, such space need not be divided as required in Sentence (1) provided the construction between such space and the space below is constructed as a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the vertical fire separation, except that where the vertical fire separation is not required to have a fire-resistance rating greater than 45 min, the fire-resistance rating of the ceiling is permitted to be reduced to 30 min.
ON Variations: Where a horizontal service space or other concealed space is located above a required vertical fire separation other than a vertical shaft, such space need not be divided as required in Sentence (1) provided the construction between such space and the space below is constructed as a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the vertical fire separation, except that where the vertical fire separation is not required to have a fire-resistance rating greater than 45 min, the fire-resistance rating of the ceiling is permitted to be reduced to 30 min.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Sentences (6) and (7), electromagnetic locks are not permitted to be installed on exit doors, described in Clause (2)(a), (b) or (c), serving an elementary or secondary school, or leading directly from a high hazard industrial occupancy.
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences (6) and (7), electromagnetic locks are not permitted to be installed on exit doors, described in Clause (2)(a), (b) or (c), serving an elementary or secondary school, or leading directly from a high hazard industrial occupancy.

ON Full: Geotechnical components of service loads and geotechnical reactions for SLS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced person.
ON Variations: Geotechnical components of service loads and geotechnical reactions for SLS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced person.

ON Full: For the design of buildings that are not classified as dynamically sensitive in accordance with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1), one of the following procedures shall be used to determine the specified wind loads: (a) the Static Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.3., (b) the Dynamic Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.8., or (c) the Wind Tunnel Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.12.
ON Variations: For the design of buildings that are not classified as dynamically sensitive in accordance with Sentence 4.1.7.2.(1), one of the following procedures shall be used to determine the specified wind loads: (a) the Static Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.3., (b) the Dynamic Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.8., or (c) the Wind Tunnel Procedure described in Article 4.1.7.12.

ON Full: The firewatch personnel shall be equipped with portable illumination and protective equipment.
ON Variations: The firewatch personnel shall be equipped with portable illumination and protective equipment.

ON Full: A diaphragm or horizontal structural elements shall provide continuity immediately above the isolation interface to transmit forces due to non-uniform ground motions from one part of the structure to another.
ON Variations: A diaphragm or horizontal structural elements shall provide continuity immediately above the isolation interface to transmit forces due to non-uniform ground motions from one part of the structure to another.

ON Full: Garage or carport walls and columns shall be anchored to the foundation to resist wind uplift in conformance with Subsection 9.23.6., except that where a garage is supported on the surface of the ground, ground anchors shall be provided to resist wind uplift.
ON Variations: Garage or carport walls and columns shall be anchored to the foundation to resist wind uplift in conformance with Subsection 9.23.6., except that where a garage is supported on the surface of the ground, ground anchors shall be provided to resist wind uplift.

ON Full: A sewer lateral extension need not be tested and inspected if the sewer lateral extension was constructed, tested and inspected at the time of the installation of the public sewer.
ON Variations: A sewer lateral extension need not be tested and inspected if the sewer lateral extension was constructed, tested and inspected at the time of the installation of the public sewer.

ON Full: The width of an egress doorway or an exit leading directly from the seating area shall be not less than the required width of the widest aisle or converging aisle plus 50% of the total required width of the remaining aisles and converging aisles that it serves.
ON Variations: The width of an egress doorway or an exit leading directly from the seating area shall be not less than the required width of the widest aisle or converging aisle plus 50% of the total required width of the remaining aisles and converging aisles that it serves.

ON Full: Overspray collectors shall be inspected after each period of use and clogged filters shall be discarded and replaced.
ON Variations: Overspray collectors shall be inspected after each period of use and clogged filters shall be discarded and replaced.

ON Full: Doors in buildings of residential occupancy, where the finished floor on one side of the door is more than 600 mm above the floor or other surface or ground level on the other side of the door, shall be protected by, (a) a guard in accordance with this Subsection, or (b) a mechanism capable of controlling the free swinging or sliding of the door so as to limit any clear unobstructed opening to not more than 100 mm.
ON Variations: Doors in buildings of residential occupancy, where the finished floor on one side of the door is more than 600 mm above the floor or other surface or ground level on the other side of the door, shall be protected by, (a) a guard in accordance with this Subsection, or (b) a mechanism capable of controlling the free swinging or sliding of the door so as to limit any clear unobstructed opening to not more than 100 mm.

ON Full: Studs at openings and that are not full wall height shall be supported by a runner at the ends of the studs, securely fastened to the full length studs at the sides of the opening.
ON Variations: Studs at openings and that are not full wall height shall be supported by a runner at the ends of the studs, securely fastened to the full length studs at the sides of the opening.

ON Full: No more than three portable extinguishers shall be used to satisfy the requirements of Table 6.2.6.B.
ON Variations: No more than three portable extinguishers shall be used to satisfy the requirements of Table 6.2.6.B.

ON Full: The discharge pipe from every pumped sanitary sewage sump shall be equipped with a union, a check valve and a shut-off valve installed in that sequence in the direction of discharge.
ON Variations: The discharge pipe from every pumped sanitary sewage sump shall be equipped with a union, a check valve and a shut-off valve installed in that sequence in the direction of discharge.

ON Full: Where a Class A pool is installed on the premises of a recreational camp, dressing rooms, locker rooms, shower heads, water closets, urinals, lavatories and drinking fountains are not required if, dressing, water closet and shower facilities are conveniently available for bathers elsewhere on the premises, and foot sprays are provided in accordance with Sentence 3.11.3.1.(17).
ON Variations: Where a Class A pool is installed on the premises of a recreational camp, dressing rooms, locker rooms, shower heads, water closets, urinals, lavatories and drinking fountains are not required if, dressing, water closet and shower facilities are conveniently available for bathers elsewhere on the premises, and foot sprays are provided in accordance with Sentence 3.11.3.1.(17).

ON Full: All walls, ceilings and floors separating heated space from unheated space, the exterior air or the exterior soil shall be provided with thermal insulation in conformance with Section 12.2. to prevent moisture condensation on their room side during the winter and to ensure comfortable conditions for the occupants.
ON Variations: All walls, ceilings and floors separating heated space from unheated space, the exterior air or the exterior soil shall be provided with thermal insulation in conformance with Section 12.2. to prevent moisture condensation on their room side during the winter and to ensure comfortable conditions for the occupants.

ON Full: This Article applies to construction for which a permit has been applied for after December 31, 2016.
ON Variations: This Article applies to construction for which a permit has been applied for after December 31, 2016.

ON Full: Buildings classified as Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancies or Group C residential occupancies that are intended for use in the winter months on a continuing basis shall be insulated and be equipped with heating facilities that are capable of maintaining an indoor air temperature of 22°C at the outside winter design temperature referred to in Article 6.2.1.7.
ON Variations: Buildings classified as Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancies or Group C residential occupancies that are intended for use in the winter months on a continuing basis shall be insulated and be equipped with heating facilities that are capable of maintaining an indoor air temperature of 22°C at the outside winter design temperature referred to in Article 6.2.1.7.

ON Full: The ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure referred to in Article 6.2.13.3. shall,(a) conform to NFPA 91, "Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists and Noncombustible Particulate Solids", (b) provide continuous exhaust ventilation at an air velocity sufficient to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits in the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system, (c) confine flammable vapours and particles to the area where they are generated and exhaust them to the outdoors, (d) not return the exhausted air to the building, and (e) be provided with well identified control switches that are, (i) located outside the power-ventilated enclosure, and (ii) readily accessible in case of an emergency.
ON Variations: The ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure referred to in Article 6.2.13.3. shall,(a) conform to NFPA 91, "Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists and Noncombustible Particulate Solids", (b) provide continuous exhaust ventilation at an air velocity sufficient to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits in the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system, (c) confine flammable vapours and particles to the area where they are generated and exhaust them to the outdoors, (d) not return the exhausted air to the building, and (e) be provided with well identified control switches that are, (i) located outside the power-ventilated enclosure, and (ii) readily accessible in case of an emergency.

ON Full: Disconnect switches for mechanical air-conditioning and ventilating systems shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months to establish that the system can be shut down in an emergency.
ON Variations: Disconnect switches for mechanical air-conditioning and ventilating systems shall be tested at intervals not greater than 12 months to establish that the system can be shut down in an emergency.

ON Full: If it can be demonstrated through testing, research and analysis that the seismic performance of a structural system is at least equivalent to one of the types of SFRS mentioned in Table 4.1.8.9., then such a structural system will qualify for values of Rd and Ro corresponding to the equivalent type in that Table. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: If it can be demonstrated through testing, research and analysis that the seismic performance of a structural system is at least equivalent to one of the types of SFRS mentioned in Table 4.1.8.9., then such a structural system will qualify for values of Rd and Ro corresponding to the equivalent type in that Table. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where a foundation is insulated in a manner that will reduce the heat flow to the soil beneath the footings, the foundation depth shall conform to that required for foundations containing no heated space. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Where a foundation is insulated in a manner that will reduce the heat flow to the soil beneath the footings, the foundation depth shall conform to that required for foundations containing no heated space. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: Where elevator doors opening into an interconnected floor space are protected by vestibules in conformance with Sentence (1), the elevator doors opening into the lowest storey of the interconnected floor space need not be protected by such vestibules.
ON Variations: Where elevator doors opening into an interconnected floor space are protected by vestibules in conformance with Sentence (1), the elevator doors opening into the lowest storey of the interconnected floor space need not be protected by such vestibules.

ON Full: Methods described in CAN3-A123.51-M, "Asphalt Shingle Application on Roof Slopes 1:3 and Steeper", or CAN3-A123.52-M, "Asphalt Shingle Application on Roof Slopes 1:6 to Less than 1:3", are permitted to be used for asphalt shingle applications not described in this Section.
ON Variations: Methods described in CAN3-A123.51-M, "Asphalt Shingle Application on Roof Slopes 1:3 and Steeper", or CAN3-A123.52-M, "Asphalt Shingle Application on Roof Slopes 1:6 to Less than 1:3", are permitted to be used for asphalt shingle applications not described in this Section.

ON Full: Electrical equipment, mechanical systems, piping, valves and automatic and manual control and safety devices shall be inspected annually and maintained in good operating condition at all times.
ON Variations: Electrical equipment, mechanical systems, piping, valves and automatic and manual control and safety devices shall be inspected annually and maintained in good operating condition at all times.

ON Full: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.2.58. to 3.2.2.62., a building classified as Group E shall conform to Sentence (2).
ON Variations: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.2.58. to 3.2.2.62., a building classified as Group E shall conform to Sentence (2).

ON Full: A storage tank conforming to Sentence 4.3.7.4.(2) shall be considered as conforming to this Subsection provided it is used and maintained in conformance with Articles 4.3.7.8. and 4.3.7.9.
ON Variations: A storage tank conforming to Sentence 4.3.7.4.(2) shall be considered as conforming to this Subsection provided it is used and maintained in conformance with Articles 4.3.7.8. and 4.3.7.9.

ON Full: When a covered mall having a width of 9 m or more has been provided for the purpose of considering each portion of the building separated by the mall as a separate building, no merchandising or public activities shall be carried on within the 9 m width.
ON Variations: When a covered mall having a width of 9 m or more has been provided for the purpose of considering each portion of the building separated by the mall as a separate building, no merchandising or public activities shall be carried on within the 9 m width.

ON Full: Unless it can be shown that the location and size of openings do not present a hazard, a guard shall be designed so that no member, attachment or opening located between 140 mm and 900 mm above the level protected by the guard will facilitate climbing.
ON Variations: Unless it can be shown that the location and size of openings do not present a hazard, a guard shall be designed so that no member, attachment or opening located between 140 mm and 900 mm above the level protected by the guard will facilitate climbing.

ON Full: Reinforcing bars described in Sentences (3) and (4) shall extend not less than 600 mm beyond the edges of the opening.
ON Variations: Reinforcing bars described in Sentences (3) and (4) shall extend not less than 600 mm beyond the edges of the opening.

ON Full: The inadequacy of the existing structural floor or roof framing system and its supporting members to support the proposed dead loads and live loads does not reduce the performance level of the building if the portion of the floor affected by the proposed loads is restricted to the loading it will support and signs stating the restrictions are posted.
ON Variations: The inadequacy of the existing structural floor or roof framing system and its supporting members to support the proposed dead loads and live loads does not reduce the performance level of the building if the portion of the floor affected by the proposed loads is restricted to the loading it will support and signs stating the restrictions are posted.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), a storage garage shall be separated from other occupancies by a fire separation having not less than a 1.5 h fire-resistance rating.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentences (2) and (3), a storage garage shall be separated from other occupancies by a fire separation having not less than a 1.5 h fire-resistance rating.

ON Full: A mechanical ventilation system is deemed to meet the requirements of Sentence (3) if it is capable of exhausting at least 18 m3/h per square metre of room area and not less than 250 m3/h in total.
ON Variations: A mechanical ventilation system is deemed to meet the requirements of Sentence (3) if it is capable of exhausting at least 18 m3/h per square metre of room area and not less than 250 m3/h in total.

ON Full: A door serving a single dwelling unit shall swing on its vertical axis.
ON Variations: A door serving a single dwelling unit shall swing on its vertical axis.

ON Full: Fire detectors are permitted to be installed in lieu of the smoke detectors required by Sentence (5) in Group F occupancies where the smoke detectors may be subjected to false alarms due to the activities within the building.
ON Variations: Fire detectors are permitted to be installed in lieu of the smoke detectors required by Sentence (5) in Group F occupancies where the smoke detectors may be subjected to false alarms due to the activities within the building.

ON Full: Movable partitions used to separate a public corridor from an adjacent business and personal services occupancy or a mercantile occupancy need not conform to Sentence (1) and Sentences 3.3.1.10.(1) and (2) provided the partitions are not located in the only means of egress. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: Movable partitions used to separate a public corridor from an adjacent business and personal services occupancy or a mercantile occupancy need not conform to Sentence (1) and Sentences 3.3.1.10.(1) and (2) provided the partitions are not located in the only means of egress. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: If the bulk volume of stored tires and shredded tires is between 300 m3 and 1200 m3, the water supply system shall be capable of supplying at least 1860 L/min for a minimum of 3 h.
ON Variations: If the bulk volume of stored tires and shredded tires is between 300 m3 and 1200 m3, the water supply system shall be capable of supplying at least 1860 L/min for a minimum of 3 h.

ON Full: Ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit shall not be less than 860 mm wide.
ON Variations: Ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit shall not be less than 860 mm wide.

ON Full: The clear height over ramps shall be not less than,(a) 1 950 mm for ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and (b) 2 050 mm for ramps not serving a house or an individual dwelling unit.
ON Variations: The clear height over ramps shall be not less than,(a) 1 950 mm for ramps serving a house or an individual dwelling unit, and (b) 2 050 mm for ramps not serving a house or an individual dwelling unit.

ON Full: Guards are not required,(a) at loading docks, (b) at floor pits in repair garages, or (c) where access is provided for maintenance purposes only.
ON Variations: Guards are not required,(a) at loading docks, (b) at floor pits in repair garages, or (c) where access is provided for maintenance purposes only.

ON Full: If the aggregate volume of piles of stored matches exceeds 3 m3, storage compartments shall be constructed in accordance with the requirements of the Building Code for high hazard industrial occupancies.
ON Variations: If the aggregate volume of piles of stored matches exceeds 3 m3, storage compartments shall be constructed in accordance with the requirements of the Building Code for high hazard industrial occupancies.

ON Full: The sound patterns of smoke alarms shall,(a) meet the temporal patterns of alarm signals, or (See A-3.2.4.20.(2) in Appendix A.) (b) be a combination of temporal pattern and voice relay.
ON Variations: The sound patterns of smoke alarms shall,(a) meet the temporal patterns of alarm signals, or (See A-3.2.4.20.(2) in Appendix A.) (b) be a combination of temporal pattern and voice relay.

ON Full: Where a water closet is located in accordance with Clause (2)(b), a fold-down grab bar conforming to Sentence (8) shall be provided on each side of the water closet, and a grab bar conforming to Sentences (6) and (7) shall be provided on the wall behind the water closet.
ON Variations: Where a water closet is located in accordance with Clause (2)(b), a fold-down grab bar conforming to Sentence (8) shall be provided on each side of the water closet, and a grab bar conforming to Sentences (6) and (7) shall be provided on the wall behind the water closet.

ON Full: Membrane-type vapour barriers other than polyethylene shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.33-M, "Vapour Barrier, Sheet, Excluding Polyethylene, for Use in Building Construction".
ON Variations: Membrane-type vapour barriers other than polyethylene shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.33-M, "Vapour Barrier, Sheet, Excluding Polyethylene, for Use in Building Construction".

ON Full: Clay liners shall conform to CAN/CSA-A324-M, "Clay Flue Liners".
ON Variations: Clay liners shall conform to CAN/CSA-A324-M, "Clay Flue Liners".

ON Full: Eastern white cedar shakes shall be at least B (clear) grade, except that C grade may be used for undercoursing.
ON Variations: Eastern white cedar shakes shall be at least B (clear) grade, except that C grade may be used for undercoursing.

ON Full: A test may be applied to each section of the system or to the system as a whole.
ON Variations: A test may be applied to each section of the system or to the system as a whole.

ON Full: Palletized storage shall be arranged so that unobstructed horizontal channels formed by the top and bottom of pallets shall not exceed 15 m.
ON Variations: Palletized storage shall be arranged so that unobstructed horizontal channels formed by the top and bottom of pallets shall not exceed 15 m.

ON Full: The installation of fireplace inserts and hearth mounted stoves vented through the throat of a fireplace shall conform to CSA B365, "Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment".
ON Variations: The installation of fireplace inserts and hearth mounted stoves vented through the throat of a fireplace shall conform to CSA B365, "Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment".

ON Full: The systems for smoke control and venting described in Articles 3.2.8.4., 3.2.8.5., 3.2.8.6. and 3.2.8.9. shall be tested to ensure satisfactory operation.
ON Variations: The systems for smoke control and venting described in Articles 3.2.8.4., 3.2.8.5., 3.2.8.6. and 3.2.8.9. shall be tested to ensure satisfactory operation.

ON Full: Except as provided in Sentence (5), breakaway sliding doors, installed as required exit doors or required doors in means of egress, shall be identified as swinging doors by means of a label or decal affixed to the door.
ON Variations: Except as provided in Sentence (5), breakaway sliding doors, installed as required exit doors or required doors in means of egress, shall be identified as swinging doors by means of a label or decal affixed to the door.

ON Full: A subsurface investigation, including groundwater conditions, shall be carried out, by or under the direction of a person having knowledge and experience in planning and executing such investigations to a degree appropriate for the building and its use, the ground and the surrounding site conditions. (See Appendix A.)
ON Variations: A subsurface investigation, including groundwater conditions, shall be carried out, by or under the direction of a person having knowledge and experience in planning and executing such investigations to a degree appropriate for the building and its use, the ground and the surrounding site conditions. (See Appendix A.)

ON Full: During loading and unloading of a tank vehicle, measures shall be taken against static electric charges in conformance with Articles 4.1.8.2. and 4.6.4.5.
ON Variations: During loading and unloading of a tank vehicle, measures shall be taken against static electric charges in conformance with Articles 4.1.8.2. and 4.6.4.5.
